product_description:
For a flawless, natural look, this Stay Matte Pressed Powder from Rimmel minimises the appearance of pores and controls shine for up to five hours. Designed to set foundation for long-lasting coverage, its fragrance, oil, and paraben free formula is lightweight, giving you a smoother and brighter complexion. This neutral 'transparent' shade helps to create an even skin tone for a picture perfect finish. E.N.
Directions for use: Apply the powder over foundation for a smoother, matte finish. Reapply as required to absorb excess oil.
name: Stay Matte Pressed Powder - Transparent

product_description:
Achieve a flawless base with the Real Techniques 2 Pack Miracle Complexion Sponge.
Created by Youtube sensations Sam and Nic Chapman, the 3-in-1 beauty blender features three distinct surfaces that enable you to optimise and tailor your makeup application.
The rounded sides effortlessly blend large areas of the face with a 'stippling' action, whilst the precision tip perfectly conceals blemishes and targets smaller areas. The flat edge can be used to professionally blend foundation and concealer in the contours around the eyes and nose for a bright, highlighted complexion.
Achieve high definition results with a professionally smooth, blended finish. - K.N.
name: Techniques 2 Pack Miracle Complexion Sponge

product_description: Real Techniques Core Collection Kit (Face) is a pack of four makeup brushes by Samantha Chapman, for applying foundation and makeup flawlessly. The Real Techniques Core Collection Kit includes a detailer brush, which can be used for foundation and lipstick, a pointed foundation brush for applying concealer and liquid foundation, a buffing brush for cream-to-powder foundation, mineral foundation, blusher, bronzer and highlighter, and a contour brush for cream or powder highlighter and bronzer. The brushes are made with synthetic taklon bristles and are presented and stored in a Velcro fastening case, which has space for extra brushes. Real Techniques Core Collection Kit (Face) is 100% cruelty-free.
name: Techniques Core Collection Kit (Face)

product_description: Gently lift away dirt and impurities with the Garnier Skin Soothing 2-in-1 Make-Up Remover. Infused with waterlily extract and pro-vitamin B5, the cleanser effortlessly banishes even waterproof make-up from the face and eyes, without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Experience a refreshed, clear complexion that feels silky soft all day long. Suitable for even sensitive skin types. E.N.
name: Skin Soothing 2-in-1 Make-Up Remover (200ml)

product_description:
Highlight your best features with ALGENIST Drop and Glow Luminising Duo, a pair of lightweight serum highlighters infused with pink and gold pigments and ultra-fine, luminous pearls to lend your complexion a radiant glow.
Gliding effortlessly onto skin, the featherweight formulas diffuse light to create a soft focus, luminous effect whilst colour correcting and treating uneven skin tone with an AlgaCorrecting Complex. Wear them alone to highlight targeted areas such as the cheekbones and down the centre of the nose, or mix with your daily beauty products for an all-over glow. They also deliver anti-ageing and blurring properties with a dose of Alguronic Acid; a patented compound that helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Expect naturally radiant-looking skin.
Contains 2 x Reveal Concentrated Luminizing Drops in 'Champagne' and 'Rosé' (7ml).
name: Drop and Glow Luminising Duo 7ml

product_description:
Achieve a flawless base with the Real Techniques Miracle Complexion Sponge.
Created by Youtube makeup artists Sam and Nic Chapman, the 3-in-1 makeup blender features three distinct surfaces that enable you to optimise and tailor your makeup application. 
The rounded sides effortlessly blend large areas of the face with a 'stippling' action, whilst the precision tip perfectly conceals blemishes and targets smaller areas. The flat edge can be used to professionally blend foundation and concealer in the contours around the eyes and nose for a bright, highlighted base.
Achieve high performance results with a professionally smooth, blended finish.
name: Techniques Miracle Complexion Sponge

product_description:
Zelens Age Control Foundation is a lightweight foundation treatment that contains pearl extracts to target visible signs of ageing. Specially formulated with a blend of active ingredients to improve collagen production and reduce fine lines and wrinkles.
Its exclusive formula has been created by Dr Marko Lens, an internationally renowned authority in the field of skin ageing, and works to increase elasticity for firmer skin. Hyaluronic acid and shiso extract minimise the appearance of ageing and provide antioxidant protection against environmental stresses.
The luxurious foundation boosts moisture levels and contains photo-luminescent diamond spheres to give a medium coverage for a more youthful complexion. E.N.
Directions for use: Apply using a brush, sponge, or with fingertips over your preferred primer. Layer as required for a fuller coverage.
colour: Shade 1 - Cameo, Shade 2 - Porcelain, Shade 3 - Cream, Shade 4 - Beige, Shade 5 - Tan
name: Age Control Foundation (30ml)

product_description:
Highlight your best features with theBalm Manizer Sisters, a trio of versatile, shimmering shades that add effortless radiance and colour to your complexion. Housed in a mirrored compact for on-the-go touch-ups.
Mary-Lou Manizer®:
A 3-in-1 highlighter, shimmer and eyeshadow. With a honey-hued glow, the brightening pressed powder effortlessly diffuses light so your skin looks softer, younger and more radiant, and is perfect for brightening the eyes for a wide awake look. Sweep across your cheekbones and brow bones for a professional strobe finish, or sweep sparingly over the entire face for a subtly glowing complexion.
Cindy-Lou Manizer®:
A 3-in-1 highlighter, shimmer and eyeshadow. The light-reflecting pink-peach hue delicately illuminates your best features whilst adding a splash of healthy colour. Add the shimmering hue to your lids, cheeks and browbones for a radiant makeup look.
Betty-Lou Manizer®:
A 3-in-1 bronzer, shimmer and eyeshadow. With a shimmering bronze finish, the silky pressed powder is perfect for creating a subtle glow and brightening and defining the eyes. Sweep across your cheekbones and brow bones for a healthy tanned finish, or sweep sparingly over the entire face for a subtly glowing complexion. Talc-free.
name: Manizer Sisters (Manizer Trio) Highlighters

product_description:
Achieve a flawless makeup finish in no time at all with the brushworks HD Miracle Silicone Tear Drop Sponge in 'Purple', a revolutionary makeup applicator designed to speed up your daily makeup routine.
Ultra-hygienic and allergy free, the innovative makeup sponge is coated with a unique ultra-smooth (TPU) layer to minimise product wastage; it won't absorb your makeup and allows you to save more than half the amount of product compared to regular brushes and sponges. Long-lasting and easy to clean, the silicone sponge will expertly apply and blend your foundation with seamless, airbrushed results; simply spread using a circular motion and dab lightly to blend away lines. 
Skin looks smooth and flawless.
Tip: Fold the Sponge around your finger to improve control and coverage in hard to reach areas.
name: HD Miracle Silicone Tear Drop Sponge - Purple

product_description:
With the help of this handy Real Techniques Powder Brush, you will be able to quickly and evenly apply powders and mineral foundations across your face, achieving visible and professional-quality results in the comfort of your own home.
Your make-up will look pixel perfect, even in the most harsh daylight. Real Techniques is proud to produce products that are 100% cruelty-free, and this one is no exception. The brush is not only easy to use but also incredibly easy to store, since it is self-standing. You can also store it in a purse, since it is small and lightweight.
name: Techniques Powder Brush

product_description: Begin your personal beauty journey with the right tools by choosing the Real Techniques Starter Set Kit (eyes). It has been created by professional make-up artist Samantha Chapman, and now these cute metallic purple brushes can be yours. The set includes five brushes: the base shadow brush - perfect for achieving a flawless base for your eye make-up; the deluxe crease brush to ensure your colour reaches every area of the lid; the accent brush to create points of interest and drama on the lids; the pixel point eyeliner brush - a precise tool that enables you to work in high definition; and the brow brush - for the ideal arch and to emphasise your brow, this is the only brush you need.
name: Techniques Starter Set

product_description: Garnier Skin Naturals 2-in-1 Eye Make-Up Remover gently lifts away even waterproof make-up, without rubbing, over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Fortified with naturally-derived arginine to protect and care for your lashes, you can experience a purified, cleansed eye area. E.N.
name: Skin Naturals 2-in-1 Eye Make-Up Remover (125ml)

product_description: Bold in colour and with a matte finish, the Rouge Velvet Lipstick by Bourjois boasts a soft, melting texture which glides effortlessly onto the lips. Containing evanescent oils for a velvety effect, this lipstick gives a second-skin feel without drying the lips. It's every woman's must have! K.D.
colour: Cool Brown, Frambourjoise, Funchsia, Grand Cru, Honey Mood, Hot Pepper, Nude-Ist, Ole Flamingo, Peach Club, Plum Plum Girl
name: Rouge Velvet Lipstick (Various Shades)

product_description:
Create a smouldering summer look with the NARS Cosmetics Bord de Plage Highlighting and Bronzing Palette; a limited-edition palette that helps to step up your contour and highlight game. The sleek palette is host to six luxurious hues; four opalescent tones for illuminating the skin and two light-diffusing bronzers for a natural-looking, sun-kissed glow.
The water-activated highlighting shades deliver a universal glow, which complements and enhances any skin tone. Sweeping smoothly over the visage, the powder instantly works to illuminate skin. The bronzing powers can be used to apply a bronzed veil to the face, or applied with more precision for contouring and sculpting features. Working in synergy, all hues offer skin a natural-looking lustre with an enviable, professional looking finish.
Shades Include:
Rivage
Corniche
Crique
Galet
Laguna
Casino
name: Cosmetics Bord de Plage Highlighting and Bronzing Palette

product_description:
Illuminate your best features with theBalm's Mary-Lou Manizer, a 3-in-1 highlighter, shimmer and eyeshadow.
With a honey-hued glow, the brightening pressed powder effortlessly diffuses light so your skin looks softer, younger and more radiant, and is perfect for brightening the eyes for a wide awake look. Sweep across your cheekbones and brow bones for a professional strobe finish, or sweep sparingly over the entire face for a subtly glowing complexion. - K.N.
name: Mary Lou Manizer Highlighter

product_description: Achieve a super smooth, flawless complexion with the Hydra Veil Primer from Illamasqua. Enriched with Microalgae and Vitamins C and B3, its clear gel formula infuses optimum hydration, whilst Plant Extracts calm and comfort skin to leave it fresh, rebalanced, healthy-looking. Deeply nourishes your complexion to create the perfect base for make-up application.
name: Hydra Veil Primer 30ml

product_description:
Light up your complexion with the Baked Gelato Illuminator from Laura Geller’s New York 20th Anniversary limited edition collection.
The pioneering hybrid formula feels like a cream but applies like a sheer powder, instantly creating a translucent, iridescent veil that can be used all over the face for an ethereal glow that lasts.
Holographic shades of pink and pearlescent hues move with the light, utilising patented technology that allows the shade to flip from violet to pink for truly three-dimensional highlight and strobing effects. Housed in a compact palette and presented in special edition packaging.
name: Geller New York 20th Anniversary Baked Gelato Illuminator - Diamond Dust

product_description:
Zelens Youth Glow Foundation is a lightweight foundation treatment that boosts radiance to leave skin silky smooth. Specially formulated with a blend of active ingredients to regenerate and repair skin, whilst reducing visible fine lines and wrinkles.
Created by Dr Marko Lens, an internationally renowned authority in the field of skin ageing, it contains photo-luminescent diamond spheres to give a natural light to medium coverage for a more youthful complexion. Uyaku, a natural extract from the Japanese evergreen spicebush, minimises the appearance of ageing and provides antioxidant protection against environmental stresses. The luxurious foundation boosts elasticity for firmer skin. E.N.
Directions for use: Apply using a brush, sponge, or with fingertips over your preferred primer. Layer as required for a fuller coverage.
colour: Shade 1 - Cameo, Shade 2 - Porcelain, Shade 3 - Cream, Shade 4 - Beige, Shade 5 - Tan
name: Youth Glow Foundation (30ml)

product_description: The Brow This Way Eyebrow Kit in Medium-Brown by Rimmel is the perfect product for achieving more defined brows in just three simple steps. Boasting a comfortable and durable formula, the kit will keep your eyebrows looking perfect all day long. – I.M
name: Brow This Way Eyebrow Kit - Medium Brown

product_description:
If you're looking for a brush that's a bit wider than normal yet still ultra-thin, the Real Techniques Expert Face Brush is the perfect fit. It will help you create a flawless base on your skin. Each brush is colour-coded, which enables you to effectively distinguish between each brush's intended purpose: the gold one is intended for your base and foundation.
Thanks to this product from Real Techniques, you will be able to evenly apply your make-up with ease, thus achieving the perfect level of coverage. The results will be smooth and high definition. It is all you need to be a make-up professional in the safety and comfort of your own home.
name: Techniques Expert Face Brush

product_description:
Care for your makeup brushes with Real Techniques' Brush Cleansing Palette, a lightweight cleansing pad with exclusive multi-surfaces for enhanced deep cleaning.
Crafted from performance-grade silicone, and designed ergonomically to fit comfortably over your hand, the palette's raised surface helps sweep away makeup, oil and impurities from between the bristles, allowing your brushes to deliver truer, more consistent colour upon next use. Cleans brushes 55% better.*
name: Techniques Brush Cleansing Palette

product_description:
Daniel Sandler Watercolour in Cherub is a best-selling, delicate sheer pastel pink that’s perfect for fair to medium skin tones that want the daintiest, youthful flush of gorgeous colour.
Look at your most beautiful 24/7 with this Daniel Sandler Watercolour in Cherub. Whether you’re rushing around town, sitting on a beach or partying the night away, you’ll look fab from first thing in the morning to last thing at night in this blendable, waterproof formula.
Directions of use:
name: Sandler Watercolour - Cherub (15ml)

product_description:
Create fairytale worthy make-up with this Diego Dalla Palma make-up kit, worth £105 (when sold seperately).
Containing 6 full size eyeshadows, perfect for contouring and blending, giving you the perfect smokey eye. With 3 matte and 3 shimmer shades to give you daytime and nightime looks with stunning effects. Named Snow, Shield, Mirror Mirror, Fairest, Destiny and Battleground to give you seductive, enchanting results.
Teamed with Dark Night eye pencil to give you a super sultry finish and unbelievable depth.
To finish use the Wicked Queen lipstick in a vivid blood red to ensnare and captivate those around you.
Contains:
name: Dalla Palma Make Up Palette

product_description: Bourjois Liner Pinceau allows you to achieve a professional look as natural or dramatic as you desire. Featuring a high precision brush for ultimate control and mistake-free application, the eye liner gives you the ability to create both thick and thin accurate lines for expertly defined eyes. Its long-lasting formula glides effortlessly onto skin, whilst its deep colour creates a perfectly curved outline in just one stroke. E.N.
name: Liner Pinceau - Ultra Black

product_description:
Achieve a natural flawless base with the Just Skin Tinted Moisturiser from Chantecaille. Velvety smooth and lightweight, the three-in-one formula effortlessly blends into skin, providing hydration, SPF15 protection and foundation-like buildable coverage.
A unique blend of Thyme and Butterfly Bush extracts offer powerful antioxidant benefits, whilst Sodium Hyaluronate helps to seal in moisture. Blemishes and discolouration are concealed and your complexion is left looking naturally perfected.
colour: Alabaster, Bliss, Glow, Nude, Tan, Vanilla
name: Just Skin Anti Smog Tinted Moisturiser SPF 15 50g

product_description:
Add natural definition to your peepers with Eylure's Fleur de Force Lashes in 'Fleur Loves'.
Created in collaboration with Youtube sensation and top beauty vlogger, Fleur de Force, the lightweight, three quarter length false eyelashes are long-lasting, reusable and perfect for any occasion; their three quarter design, 'messed up' finish and stone-ground tapered tips add fullness to the outer corner of your eyes for a naturally sultry effect. Suitable for all eye shapes. Easy to apply.
name: de Force By Eylure Lashes - Fleur Loves

product_description:
Achieve long lasting, show stopping colour with the Bourjois Rouge Velvet lipstick in Happy Nude Year - a soft pink hue. Designed to last for up to 24 hours, this lightweight lipstick has a non-drying formula which keeps the lips hydrated to keep your pout perfected.
Containing a unique blend of evanescent oils, it'll leave lips feeling super soft and looking supple with a matte finish. It won't smudge either, meaning that you can stay looking fresh all day and night. K.D.
name: Rouge Velvet Happy Nude Year (7.7ml)

product_description:
Maximise your eyes with Maybelline's Lash Sensational Intense Mascara.
With a liquid ink formula and patented fanning brush with ten layers of bristles, the intensifying mascara grabs layer upon layer of lashes to create a clump-free, plumped up look, lifting and fanning out corner-to-corner for fuller looking lashes.
Lashes look instantly sensationalised and flourished. - K.N.
name: Lash Sensational Intense Mascara - Black

product_description: The brown Eylure Pro-Brow Dybrow kit will allow you to achieve darker brows that are pefectly defined. Boasting a proven formula that will give you dark, glossy brows for up to six weeks, the set will allow you to tint your brows in the comfort of your own home with no need to visit a salon! Easy to use, the brow tint will give deep yet natural-looking colour. - L.M.
name: Pro-Brow Dybrow - Dark Brown

product_description:
Discover an essential makeup trick with the Rimmel #Insta Fix and Go Setting Spray; a versatile setting spray that can be used before and after the application of makeup.
The transparent spray effortlessly mists over the face, absorbing quickly to lock makeup in place all day. Not only enhancing makeup’s wear and longevity, #Insta Fix and Go can be spritzed onto the visage to refresh makeup throughout the day. This restores a freshly applied look to makeup applied hours ago.
If applied prior to makeup application, the solution primes the complexion in order to offer a more durable finish. Without drying the skin, the spray gifts makeup the extra staying power is requires for all day wear.
name: #Insta Fix and Go Setting Spray 100ml

product_description:
Get ready to rock the dramatic eye look with Daniel Sandler Black Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner. With a groundbreaking formula that keeps your look intact for hours to no end, this eyeliner has excellent coverage and guarantees zero smudging.
Daniel Sandler Black Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner feels great to apply, thanks to its high content of silicone. Black Velvet is absolutely waterproof, super long-wearing and extraordinarily soft, combining rich colour with out-of-this-world coverage and no smudging.
name: Sandler Black Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner

product_description:
Beauty gurus Sam and Nic Chapman present their Real Techniques Sculpting Brush. Part of the Real Techniques 'Finish' range, identifiable by its pink coloured handle, the expert brush is designed to define and contour your face, naturally enhancing your best features. Fitted with a wide angled head, the must-have brush works with cream or powdered bronzers to professionally contour and shape your face.
Enliven natural features or completely modify your face shape by applying to the hollows of your cheeks, down your nose, along your jawline and on your temples. Expect a professional finish that will give Kim K a run for her money. Can also be used to add a sweep of colour to your cheeks with your favourite blusher. - K.N.
name: Techniques Sculpting Brush

product_description:
The make-up essential for a trendsetting smile and mirror-like shine. Get instant sumptuous lips and a hint of colour with this award-winning Tinted Balm SPF 30 from Lanolips. Enriched with the brand's Ultra Pure Grade Lanolin (Natures Wonder Moisturiser™ which has a molecular structure that closely resembles and mimics your own skin oils) and Vitamin E, the non-sticky lip gloss hydrates lips, whilst its SPF30 protects from environmental stresses.
Delivering a sheer tint of colour, the gloss lends lips a healthy glow, and is perfect for lightly dabbing on cheekbones as a highlighter. Intensely nourishing, it transforms dry lips to leave them feeling soft, supple and conditioned.
name: Tinted Balm SPF 30 - Rose

product_description:
The make-up essential for a trendsetting smile and mirror-like shine. Get instant sumptuous lips and a hint of colour with this award-winning Tinted Balm SPF 30 from Lanolips. Enriched with the brand's Ultra Pure Grade Lanolin (Natures Wonder Moisturiser™ which has a molecular structure that closely resembles and mimics your own skin oils) and Vitamin E, the non-sticky lip gloss hydrates lips, whilst its SPF30 protects from environmental stresses.
Delivering a sheer tint of colour that deepens your natural lip colour, the gloss lends your pout a healthy glow, and is perfect for lightly dabbing on cheekbones as a highlighter. Intensely nourishing, it transforms dry lips to leave them feeling soft, supple and conditioned.
name: Tinted Balm SPF 30 - Rhubarb

product_description:
Enhance your natural radiance with Laura Geller's Baked Gelato Swirl Illuminator Palette, a trio of 3-D highlighters that feel like creams but apply like sheer powders.
Perfect for targeting high points of the face, such as the brow bone and cheekbones, or for sweeping across the whole face for an all-over glow, the long-wearing, swirled highlighters deliver a wash of glowing, translucent colour that bestows your complexion with natural-looking radiance and luminosity. Their swirled design pays tribute to the delectable Italian dessert, gelato. Housed in a mirrored palette with dual-ended makeup brush.
Ballerina (candlelit rose gold)
Gilded Honey (effervescent caramel honey)
Peach Glow (peachy champagne shimmer)
name: Geller Baked Gelato Swirl Illuminator Palette

product_description:
Discover the best-selling lashes in a convenient value pack with the Ardell Multipack Wispies False Eyelashes in Black. Lightweight and reusable, the natural looking false lashes are set upon an invisible band for discreet wear and the hairs have been knotted and feathered by hand for perfect uniformity.
The fluttery lashes have a graduated mixed length and are slightly more curvaceous with flared outer corners for enhanced definition. Comfortable to wear, they lend your eyes natural volume and fullness. Made with natural hair and easy to apply.
name: Multipack Wispies False Eyelashes (Set of 4) - Black

product_description:
Tailor your makeup look to any occasion with Maybelline's 'The Nudes' Eyeshadow Palette. Allowing you to experiment with a range of nude hued shades, the eyeshadow palette combines twelve complementary shades ranging from muted neutrals, vanilla beiges and deep, smokey hues.
Each colour is easy to apply and offers seamless blendability, allowing you to create layered, buildable makeup looks with depth, definition and expert results. Complete with a dual-ended applicator.
name: Eye Shadow Palette - The Nudes

product_description: All you need to keep your makeup looking perfect throughout the day and night, this Real Techniques trio set contains three mini makeup brushes ideal for carrying around in your handbag. The super soft brushes can be used for liquid foundation, eyeshadow, bronzer and blusher to ensure you're looking your best. K.D.
name: Techniques Mini Brush Set Trio

product_description:
Line and define your eyes with Maybelline's Mechanical Gel Eye Liner, an automatic, waterproof gel eye liner that creates high definition makeup results.
With a smooth, high quality formula, the pen eye liner glides effortlessly across the eye, delivering intense pigments with up to twenty-four hour staying power. Its convenient pen-like shape and rotating tip offers precise application. - K.N.
name: Mechanical Gel Eye Liner - Beyond Black

product_description:
Gently refresh on-the-go with Merci's Handy Love & Hand Cleansing Gel; a lightweight formula that instantly cleans and purifies hands without over-drying or sticky residue.
Infused with tiny emollient pearls and a cocktail of soothing ingredients, the gel leaves hands soft, fresh and delicately scented with a light Coconut fragrance. Its convenient size fits perfectly in your pocket or bag.
name: Handy Love & Hand Cleansing Gel - Coco Rico

product_description:
Add long-wearing, natural-looking colour to your complexion with the Daniel Sandler Watercolour Liquid Blush in 'Rose Glow'; a pastel pink-peach shimmer.
Enriched with Jojoba and Vitamin E, the multi-award winning, water-resistant formula nourishes and conditions skin, whilst delivering streak-free, blendable colour that applies effortlessly to create a subtle, dewy sheen. Can be used as a blusher or highlighter.
name: Sandler Watercolour Liquid Blush - Rose Glow (15ml)

product_description:
Add up to 50% more volume to your lashes with the Volume Glamour Ultra Black Mascara by Bourjois. It's enriched with black mineral pigments for a super black effect, whilst silicone and natural wax create show stopping volume.
Featuring a full roller brush for precise application, this mascara is a must have for any makeup bag. K.D.
name: Volume Glamour Ultra Black Mascara

product_description: Pamper your pout with the yes to Coconut Naturally Smooth Lip Balm; a rich, intensely hydrating formula with a delectable natural flavour to transport the senses to a blissful tropical isle. Packed with a triple-threat moisturising blend of Aloe, Coconut and Shea Butters, it leaves lips feeling smooth, softened and nourished.
name: to Coconut Naturally Smooth Lip Balm

product_description:
Line and define your eyes with the Rimmel Scandaleyes Liquid Liner in Black; an intense, liquid eyeliner that creates an enviably bold finish.
Arriving with an integrated, ball-tip applicator, the eyeliner glides smoothly across the lid. The liquid liner is highly pigmented, allowing the eye liner to deliver a precise line of rich, deep black colour. Boasting a waterproof, fade and transfer resistant formula, the liner is able to remain flawless for up to 24 hours. Expect a bold and eye-catching finish.
name: Scandaleyes Liquid Liner - Black 2.5ml

product_description:
Chantecaille Future Skin Oil-Free Foundation is an ultra-lightweight foundation with a refreshing texture. The oil free gel allows for adjustable coverage due to the buildable formula, ideal for every day and evening wear.
Light-reflecting pigment within the makeup reduces and masks the appearance of imperfections, offering a flawless finish. The formula contains 60% water and is infused with Aloe Leaf and Camellia Sinensis extract, working to moisturise skin whilst also providing coverage.
colour: Alabaster, Banana, Camomile, Carob, Cream, Hazel, Ivory, Porcelain, Shea, Suntan, Vanilla, Wheat
name: Future Skin Oil-Free Foundation 30g

product_description:
Give makeup the staying power it deserves with the Rimmel Magnif’eyes Eye Primer; an essential base product that prepares skin for flawless eyeshadow application.
The primer effortlessly smoothes over lids, absorbing quickly for an invisible finish. Once applied, the formula enhances the wear and longevity of both eyeshadow and eyeliner. The intelligent primer intensifies the colour of eye makeup, whilst preventing creasing, smudging and transfer.
Making makeup waterproof, the Magnif’eyes Eye Primer extends the wear of eye makeup by up to 24 hours. Expect smooth, flawless and long-lasting results.
name: Magnif'eyes Eye Primer 6ml

product_description:
The easiest way to line your lashes, theBalm's Schwing Liquid Eyeliner applies a rich and matte-black liquid to the lash-line, drying quickly to a smudge-free finish.
The thin and tapered felt-tip brush makes application quicker and more precise than ever, giving you careful control while experimenting with your cat eyes and winged edges. - K.R
name: Schwing Liquid Eyeliner

product_description:
Perfect for every mood, outfit or occasion, theBalm's Nude Dude Eyeshadow Palette combines twelve complementary shades in a range of hues that can be blended together or applied separately to create endless make-up looks with superior colour longevity.
With a satin texture that melts effortlessly onto the lids for smooth, even application, the powder can be used wet or dry to add definition and enhance eyes for show-stopping results. Complete with a dual-ended brush for precision and control. E.N.
name: Nude Dude Eyeshadow Palette 9.6g

product_description: Wake up your skin with this Correction Concentrate from Pixi. In  brightening peach, this highly pigmented concealer works on dark  circles, blurs lines and reduces uneven skintone. Giving you instant  results, this concealer freshens up your face to leave you looking  rested, bright and youthful.
name: Correction Concentrate Brightening Peach

product_description: Eylure present the Vegas Nay Grand Glamor Lashes; a pair of volumising false eyelashes to help you achieve an expertly defined, fuller-looking finish with a fanned-out effect. Suitable for all eye shapes, the reusable lashes are complete with adhesive glue and an instruction booklet for easy application. Long-lasting and lightweight.
name: Vegas Nay - Grand Glamor Lashes

product_description:
Get ready to rock the dramatic eye look with Daniel Sandler Brown Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner. With a groundbreaking formula that keeps your look intact for hours to no end, this eyeliner has excellent coverage and guarantees zero smudging.
Daniel Sandler Brown Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner feels great to apply, thanks to its high content of silicone. Brown Velvet is absolutely waterproof, super long-wearing and extraordinarily soft, combining rich colour with out-of-this-world coverage and no smudging.
name: Sandler Brown Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner

product_description:
Achieve a radiant and flawless complexion using the Bourjois Healthy Mix Foundation; skin-perfecting makeup that enhances the natural complexion. Boasting a soft, fresh texture, the foundation simply glides onto skin, blending effortlessly for a natural-looking seamless finish with ample coverage.
Harnessing a fruit therapy formula for an anti-fatigue effect, the foundation boasts Apricot extract to boost skin’s radiance, Melon extract to deliver essential moisture to skin and Apple extract to ensure the visage appears youthful. The liquid foundation is also infused with Crystalline Pigments, which visibly even the complexion for airbrushed results.
The makeup arrives in an array of complexion-enhancing hues to reveal fresh-looking skin for all skin tones. Expect an enviably radiant complexion that is comfortably hydrated and visibly flawless for up to 8 hours.
colour: 50 Rose Ivory, 52 Vanilla, 54 Beige, 55 Dark Beige, 58 Caramel
name: Healthy Mix Foundation 30ml (Various Shades)

product_description:
Experience intense hydration with the multi-award winning, multi-tasking 101 Ointment Multi-Purpose Balm from Lanolips. Its 100% natural formula is made with the brand's Ultra Pure Medical Grade Lanolin, also known as Nature's Wonder Moisturiser™ which has a molecular structure that closely resembles and mimics your own skin oils.
The versatile, super dense balm has a range of 101 uses; it can be used to treat extremely chapped lips, dry cuticles and itchy skin, or to moisturise dry nasal passages, brittle nails and insect bites. Experience hydrated, soothed and comfortable skin that is silky soft to the touch. Its moisture-sealing formula holds 200% of its weight in moisture and is baby friendly.
name: The Original 101 Ointment

product_description:
The Volume 1 Seconde Mascara from Bourjois is a unique mascara designed to give your lashes 360° volume that lasts around the clock. Promising to give a 16 hour hold, this clump free formula will enhance the thickness and length of your eyelashes for an intense look fit for the red carpet.
The innovative brush features a blend of spherical and straight bristles which work together to wrap around every lash to give full coverage for a longer lasting finish. You'll be given instant, show stopping volume! K.D.
name: Volume 1 Seconde Mascara - Ultra Black (12ml)

product_description: For a smooth complexion with a high quality make up finish, try the stippling brush by Samantha Chapman's Real Techniques. The stippling brush can be used with all ranges of make-up. The brush is made with high quality dual fibres. This duo-fibre design holds your make up application in the lower bristles, while the top, softer bristles give your face and neck a salon-style flawless look. The bristles are made from synthetic taklon material. They are hand-cut and are 100% animal cruelty free. The brush is self-standing. The brush is easy to use and has a comfortable, extended aluminium handle. The bristles are long enough for easy use, yet not too long to be unwieldy.
name: Techniques Stippling brush

product_description: Achieve a flawless complexion with the Dream Pure BB Cream from Maybelline. Specifically formulated for blemish-prone or oily skin types, its lightweight formula blends effortlessly to minimise the appearance of pores, combat uneven skin tone and target blackheads, whilst its SPF 15 protects from environmental aggressors. Infused with 2% Salicylic Acid, you can expect a hydrated, mattified complexion with a smooth, streak-free finish.
name: Dream Pure BB Cream SPF 15 Light 30ml

product_description:
Effortlessly remove makeup with the Magnitone London WipeOut! The Amazing MicroFibre Cleansing Cloth; a pack of two pink cloths that tackle stubborn makeup using just warm water.
The cloths are ultra-soft and ideal for sensitive and intolerant skin types. Without causing irritation or dragging on the delicate eye area, the towels effortlessly glide over skin; without the need for a cleanser. Unlike cleansing wipes, the eco-friendly cloths are designed to absorb water and swell when damp. The wet cloth is able to eliminate traces of makeup from skin without smearing them across the face first.
The cost effective cloths are reusable and machine washable, eliminating the need to purchase makeup remover again. Expect even long-wearing and oil-based makeup to simply melt away, leaving skin clean, cleansed and clear.
name: London WipeOut! The Amazing MicroFibre Cleansing Cloth - Pink (x2)

product_description:
Add secret definition to your peepers with Eylure's Fleur de Force Lashes in 'Petit Fleur'.
Created in collaboration with Youtube sensation and top beauty vlogger, Fleur de Force, the lightweight false eyelashes are long-lasting, reusable and perfect for everyday use; their subtle and textured, three quarter length adds an invisible lift to your natural lashes, and their softly tapered tips and subtle kick at the corner lend your eyes the perfect amount of natural definition for the day time. Easy to apply.
name: de Force By Eylure Lashes - Petite Fleur

product_description:
Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion with the Chantecaille Compact Makeup Foundation; an ultra-fine pressed powder that delivers sheer, natural-looking coverage.
Enriched with antioxidant Green Apple Extract to defend against ageing and environmental aggressors, the powder foundation controls shine and mattifies even oily skin types, whilst combating uneven skin tone to leave you with perfected, photo-ready skin. Housed in a mirrored compact for effortless application.
name: Compact Makeup Foundation

product_description:
Enhance your natural radiance with Laura Geller's Baked Gelato Swirl Illuminator, a baked, 3-D highlighter that feels like a cream but applies like a sheer powder.
Perfect for targeting high points such as the brow bone and cheekbones, or for sweeping across the whole face for an all-over glow, the illuminator delivers a wash of glowing, translucent colour that bestows your complexion with natural-looking radiance and luminosity.
colour: Ballerina, Charming Pink, Gilded Honey, Peach Glow
name: Geller Baked Gelato Swirl Illuminator

product_description: Give yourself a natural-looking, sun-kissed glow with Rimmel’s Natural Bronzer in a Sunlight shade. This waterproof bronzing powder improves the appearance of uneven skin tone and will make you look tanned all year round. It has a velvety soft texture and contains SPF15 for UVA and UVB protection. The golden tan bronzer will stay put for up to 10 hours and leaves you with a radiant, warm complexion. – N.P.
name: Natural Bronzer - Sunlight

product_description:
Perfect for every mood, outfit or occasion, Lottie London's Eyeshadow Palette combines twelve shades in a range of shimmer and matte finishes.
With a super smooth texture that melts effortlessly onto the lids, each powder can be applied separately or blended together to create endless eye make-up looks with long-wearing results.
Housed in a chic palette with a dual-ended applicator, you can achieve show-stopping results on-the-go.
name: London 12 Piece Eyeshadow Palette - The Rusts 12g

product_description:
Illuminate the complexion with the Illamasqua Beyond Powder in OMG; a shimmering champagne hue that instantly warms skin.
The silky powder glides effortlessly over skin, and can be used for an all-over illuminated finish or applied with more precision to perform like a highlighter. Perfect for illuminating the high points of the face and reflecting light, the powder is effective when worn on the top of the cheek bones, brow bones and even the collar bones.
Apply dry for a sheer, natural shimmer or apply the powder with a wet brush for a more dramatic, metallic finish, with long-lasting effect.
name: Beyond Powder - OMG

product_description:
Accentuate your favourite features with the Illamasqua Beyond Powder; a baked face powder that adds a subtle warm hue to your complexion.
Housed in a handy compact, the long-wearing, lightweight highlighter delivers a flush of natural colour, perfect for inspiring glowing cheekbones in one simple stroke. Can be used dry or wet for a more intense finish. Suitable for the face and body to achieve a bronzed skin effect.
name: Beyond Powder

product_description: Set your make-up in place all day long with the Infallible Fixing Mist from L'Oréal Paris. With an ultra-fine texture and invisible finish that keeps that just-applied make-up look, the lightweight setting spray extends longevity of wear for up to twenty-four hours. Easy to use, you can achieve a fuss-free, flawless finish. E.N.
name: Paris Infallible Fixing Mist (100ml)

product_description: Create flawless eyes with Bourjois Liner Stylo in Brown. The retractable eyeliner combines the ease of a pencil with the long wearing hold of a liquid liner. Enriched with carnuba and bees wax and also featuring a built-in sharpener, the liner ensures precision with every use. -SA
name: Liner Stylo - Brown

product_description: Bourjois Bronzing Powder - Délice de Poudre creates a radiant but non-shiny glow thanks to its subtly iridescent formula that is enriched with flecks of gold. The ultra soft texture can be added to the cheekbones and the décolletage for the ultimate sun kissed look. -SA
name: Bronzing Powder - Délice de Poudre

product_description:
The Elemis White Flowers Eye and Lip Make-Up Remover is essential for anyone who wears make-up on a daily basis. This formula contains gentle moisturisers that protect the skin around the eyes and help strengthen lashes. It also has powerful extracts such as white peony that remove make-up effortlessly. It is great for removing waterproof mascara and other stubborn cosmetic products. The white tea has a cooling effect on the skin, making it feel revitalised after a long day. This product may be used by those who wear contact lenses or have sensitive eyes, and has been tested by an ophthalmologist.
Add a small amount to a washcloth or cotton pad and wipe from the centre to the outside of the face in a single motion. Repeat if necessary.
name: White Flowers Eye & Lip Make Up Remover 125ml

product_description:
Perfect for travelling, Lottie London's Tools on Tour Mini Brush Set combines four super-soft brushes to help you achieve flawless make-up application on-the-go.
Perfect Powder Brush
A large face brush with ultra-soft bristles. Perfect for applying both loose and pressed powders, the brush picks up product perfectly and delivers an even coat onto skin. Sweep the super soft brush across the face and body for an even finish.
Ultimate Eye Smudger Brush
A super-soft eyeshadow brush with curved bristles. Perfect for buffing, shaping and diffusing your eyeshadow colour, the brush helps to create sultry, smokey make-up looks.
Expert Eyeshadow Brush
Perfect for applying base colour, or for buffing in the crease, the brush picks up and deposits the perfect amount of product, and works great with both crème or powder colours.
Defining Brow Brush
Create controlled lines, fill-in sparse brows and evenly apply colour to give eyes instant definition. Features a firm, angled tip that delivers the right amount of product for a professional finish every time.
name: London Tools on Tour - 4 Piece Mini Brush Set

product_description: Cover problem areas with the help of the Deluxe Concealer Brush from EcoTools. Ideal for concealing dark under-eye circles, sun spots and other minor imperfections, the gentle bristles buff concealer into the skin for a flawless, airbrushed look. Crafted with a highly sustainable bamboo handle, 100% cruelty free synthetic taklon bristles and a recycled aluminium ferrule.
name: Deluxe Concealer Brush

product_description:
Expertly define the face with the Chisel & Glow Highlight & Contour Set from Illamasqua. Boasting everything you need to carve a faultless contour and achieve an enviable glow, the set contains a trio of coveted Illamasqua products that partner perfectly to deliver a professional looking finish. The set is host to a cream highlighter, contouring gel and the versatile tool needed to create a show stopping look, the round buffing brush.
Gleam Highlighter - Aurora (6.5g)
Accentuate your favourite features with the Gleam Highlighter in Aurora; an iridescent cream formula that allows you to create make-up looks with depth, definition and expert results. Infused with Vitamin E and Mica Mineral, the translucent, silky highlighter delivers sheer, pearlescent pigments for a natural-looking, luminous glow. Can be used on the face and body.
Contouring Gel Sculpt (8g)
Achieve a sculpted and chiselled complexion with the Contouring Gel Sculpt, a sheer contouring gel that helps create subtle, natural-looking definition on the contours of your face. Perfect for defining your cheekbones, jawline and forehead, the gel formula creates delicate shadows on the face; apply to facial contours where shadows would naturally be cast. It enhances your face shape to enliven natural features. Easy to blend, the formula will leave your face looking naturally chiselled and sculpted.
Round Buffing Highlighter Brush
Achieve professional, flawless make-up looks with the Round Buffing Highlighter Brush; a versatile tool with high quality synthetic bristles that are suitable for all skin types. Ideal for applying highlighter or foundation, the brush features a soft domed head to buff product into the skin, creating an even, polished finish.
name: Chisel & Glow Highlight & Contour Set

product_description:
Achieve a sunkissed complexion with theBalm's Bahama Mama Bronzer, a 3-in-1 bronzer, contour powder and eyeshadow.
With a matt brown finish and no orange undertones, the pressed powder formulation is perfect for sweeping across the entire face for a radiant glow, and for contouring the cheekbones, forehead and jawline for a sculpted, defined face. Its natural-tan shade doubles as the perfect eyeshadow; ideal for blending into the crease for depth and definition. - K.N.
name: Bahama Mama Bronzer

product_description:
Define the natural beauty of your eyes with the 'No Mascara' Mascara from Perricone MD, a 2-in-1 lash treatment and mascara that works to lift, lengthen and thicken your eyelashes.
Its nourishing, strengthening formula harnesses the powerful effects of neuropeptides and biotin which help to restore and regenerate, creating stronger, fuller lashes, and it has been clinically proven to create longer, thicker, more lifted lashes.
With an innovative, dual face, root-to-tip brush, the mascara delivers precision application and its multi-dimensional, universal shade adapts to all skin tones for perfectly framed peepers. - K.N.
name: MD No Mascara Mascara - Black (8g)

product_description: Achieve a flawless, visibly smoother complexion with the Baby Skin Primer from Maybelline. Specially formulated using Insta-Blur Technology, the lightweight primer reduces the appearance of pores for long-lasting, professional results. With a narrow tip for easy application and a compact size ideal for use on-the-move, the primer can be worn alone or under make-up to leave skin silky soft. E.N.
name: Baby Skin Primer

product_description:
Get ready to rock the dramatic eye look with Daniel Sandler Blue Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner. With a groundbreaking formula that keeps your look intact all day, this eyeliner has excellent coverage and guarantees zero smudging.
Daniel Sandler Blue Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner feels great to apply, thanks to its high content of silicone. Blue Velvet is absolutely waterproof, super long-wearing and extraordinarily soft, combining rich colour with out-of-this-world coverage and no smudging.
name: Sandler Blue Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner

product_description:
Expertly create a perfect canvas with the Real Techniques Flawless Base Brush Set; a four-piece collection that covers every makeup lover’s needs. The kits contains an array of different brushes, each performing differently yet working in synergy to ensure a flawless complexion. Ideal for base makeup, the set contains two foundation brushes, a precision concealer brush and a brush for contouring and highlighting, each housed inside the convenient brush cup.
Contour Brush
Sculpt the complexion like a professional with the Contour Brush; ideal for the delicate application of contour and highlighting makeup products. Boasting a fluffy brush head with Real Techniques’ UltraPlush™ bristles, the brush effortlessly glides over skin, distributing product smooth and evenly. Ideal for creating chiselled cheekbones.
Detailer Brush
Achieve a completely flawless complexion with the Detailer Brush; a small makeup brush that is ideal for a targeted application of concealer, or can even be used as a lip brush. Crafted with a small, precision-cut brush head, the brush can tackle and effortlessly conceal problem areas.
Buffing Brush
Create an airbrushed complexion with the Buffing Brush; a fluffy makeup brush that is ideal for the expert application of foundation. Designed to buff product onto skin, the brush delivers a seamless and natural-looking finish with full coverage. Ideal for using with loose or compact powder foundation.
Square Foundation
Apply liquid foundation with ease using the Square Foundation Brush; an essential tool with a densely packed brush head. Boasting a unique, square-shaped cut, the makeup brush is the perfect tool for building custom coverage with a liquid foundation. Expect flawless results.
Brush Cup
Keep your brushes in tip top condition with the Real Techniques Brush Cup. Designed to store your favourite makeup brushes, the cup keeps tools neat and tidy on the dressing table.
name: Techniques Flawless Base Brush Set

product_description:
Create endless eye makeup looks with the Maybelline 24 Karat Nudes Eyeshadow Palette, a neutral eyeshadow palette filled with 12 matt and shimmer shades inspired by backstage runways.
Specially curated to work as harmonious duos, trios and quads for stunning, complementary looks, the versatile palette combines sparkling golds with rich aubergines and smokey tones that enable you to create a range of looks that add subtle depth or bold definition to the eyes. Each carefully selected shadow is infused with metallic gold pigments and blends seamlessly onto the lid for an intense finish. Create soft, subdued daytime looks, or sultry, evening glamour.
Housed in a palette with dual-ended sponge tip applicator.
name: 24 Karat Nudes Eyeshadow Palette 10g

product_description:
This Maxi Delight Bronzer by Bourjois is designed to give your skin a natural looking bronze finish. Formulated with an innovative mix of Pearls and Beta-Carotene to give the skin a summertime glow, this bronzer boasts an ultra fine texture and consistency to leave your skin a super soft feel.
The non-drying formula lets the skin breathe on application, giving you a makeup free feel, whilst the shimmer powder enhances your tan all year round. K.D.
name: Maxi Delight Bronzer (18g)

product_description:
Achieve a flawless base with the Maybelline Master Camo Color Correcting Concealer Kit in 'Light', a complexion-perfecting palette that corrects, conceals and highlights to create a photo-ready canvas.
Colour correcting your skin in three easy steps, the kit offers carefully curated colours that target specific skin tone concerns, such as redness, dark circles and uneven patches. Its neutralising and brightening properties counteract and conceal imperfections to lend the skin a beautifully smooth, radiant and even appearance.
Use the green shade for banishing redness; the yellow hue for under eye circles; and the highlighter to brighten shadows and enhance natural high points of the face such as the brow bone and cheekbones.
Complete with a dual-ended applicator brush.
name: Master Camo Color Correcting Concealer Kit 6g - Light

product_description: Create big, luscious lashes with the Great Lash Mascara from Maybelline. With a long-lasting, clump-free formula, the mascara lifts, curls and defines lashes from the root for voluminous results. The specially designed wand allows ultimate control for easy and mess-free application. E.N.
name: Great Lash Mascara - Black

product_description:
Create an array of eye makeup looks with the Spectrum Collections 8 Piece Eye Blending Brush Set; a complete collection comprising eight ultra-soft makeup brushes that combine a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design. Host to a variety of brushes for a number of uses including blending, contouring and building detail, the brush set is an essential for any makeup lover.
A16 Precision Crease
Boasting a small, flat brush head, the ‘Cut A Crease Police’ eyeshadow brush has soft yet firm synthetic bristles, which can pack product onto the eye and offer intense colour payoff. The unicorn-inspired makeup brush is an ideal companion for creating an on-trend, cut crease makeup look.
B06 Tall Tapered Blender
The ‘Blending Friend’ is the perfect tool for applying and blending eyeshadows seamlessly. The coveted blending brush is crafted with a super soft, fluffy brush head, which can create an array of eye-catching makeup looks, from soft and subtle, to smokey and defined. Whether it’s blending out colour or building up hues, the tapered blender is an essential addition to any makeup brush collection.
B04 Small Angled Shader
The versatile ‘Eye Spy’ brush boasts an angled brush head and is the perfect size for blending eyeshadows and defining peepers. The soft angle effortlessly shades the outer corner of the eye and allows colour to fade into the crease for a flawless contoured eye.
A08 Medium Fluffy Shader
The ‘Happy Medium’ blender boasts a medium-sized brush head with fluffy synthetic bristles, which are ideal for sweeping powders, pigments or cream makeup products to the entire eye lid, as well as building colour in the corners for a more defined look. Ideal for a subtle everyday look or for building colours to create intense drama.
A07 Stubby Shade
The ‘Full Colour’ brush is expertly designed with soft, fluffy bristles in a short and stubby length, which allows you to pack eyeshadow onto the eyes and build intense and enviable colour. The unicorn-inspired brush is the perfect start for creating a sultry smokey eye look. Creating ultra-pigmented colour, the applicator brush is an essential addition to any brush collection.
A12 Fluffy Pencil
The small ‘Draw Me Pretty’ brush is the ideal size for more intricate finishing touches, including highlighting the inner corner of the eye, adding colour to the crease and smoking out liners. An essential addition to any brush collection, the synthetic pencil brush offers professional-looking results.
A13 Short Smudge
The ‘Short ‘N’ Sweet’ eyeshadow brush boasts short, feathered bristles that are super soft and gentle on skin. The stubby design is ideal for applying powder or cream eyeshadows to the lash line, then blending out for a soft, smudged and smokey effect. Offering the opportunity to build up colour, the unicorn-inspired short smudge brush is an essential addition to any makeup brush collection.
C06 Tulip Eye Contour
A contouring pro, the ‘Pretty as a Petal’ brush boasts a fluffy, tulip shaped brush head that is ideal for contouring around the eye area. The super soft brush is able to reach into the eye socket and create enviable depth and definition. Seamlessly blending eye makeup, the eye contour brush is an essential addition to any makeup bag.
name: Collections 8 Piece Eye Blending Brush Set - Pink

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Garnier Oil Free Light BB Cream. Formulated specifically for combination to oily skin types, the non-greasy cream addresses and combats unwanted shine, banishes the look of imperfections and delivers intense hydration to restore a healthy-looking, radiant glow.
Lightweight and fast-absorbing, the beauty balm cream melts effortlessly onto skin to minimise the appearance of pores, whilst its SPF 20 shields from environmental aggressors and harmful UV rays. Expect a natural tint and long-lasting matte finish. E.N.
name: Oil Free Light BB Cream (40ml)

product_description:
Nourish your pout with the Burt's Bees Lip Balm Heritage Multi Pack; a duo of their best-selling lip balms in Honey and Pomegranate.
All natural, the signature formula is made upon a conditioning base of Beeswax, Shea Butter and Vitamin E to leave lips feeling sumptuously soft and supple. The addition of Honey adds essential vitamins, while Pomegranate Oil helps repair and replenish chaps and sores. Stash one in your handbag and keep the other in your pocket for to give your lips some daily TLC.
name: Bees Lip Balm Heritage Multi Pack - Honey and Pomegranate

product_description:
Bourjois Délice de Poudre creates a radiant but non-shiny glow thanks to its subtly iridescent formula enriched with flecks of gold. The ultra soft texture can be added to the cheekbones and the décolletage for the ultimate sun kissed look.
Paired with a lighter coloured illuminator, this duo gives you everything you need to achieve a perfected complexion. K.D.
name: Delice De Poudre Bronzer Duo

product_description:
Real Techniques Lash and Brow Groomer is a precision groomer essential for defined, separated lashes and beautiful eyebrows.
Real Techniques Lash and Brow Groomer is a 2-in-1 brush and comb and a must-have beauty makeup accessory that will help separate and define your lashes and groom your brows.
Brows frame your face and add definition around your eyes. Lashes help to widen your eyes and complete the definition of your look. The brushes in the Real Techniques range are all colour coded and each colour corresponds to a key step of makeup application. Purple is for enhancing and adding colour to the eyes.
Made with nylon bristles and a precision metal comb, the lash/brow groomer has a protective cap for safe storage and easy travel.
name: Techniques Lash and Brow Groomer

product_description:
Perfect for every mood, outfit or occasion, Lottie London's Eyeshadow Palette combines twelve shades in a range of shimmer and matte finishes.
With a super smooth texture that melts effortlessly onto the lids, each powder can be applied separately or blended together to create endless eye make-up looks with long-wearing results.
Housed in a chic palette with a dual-ended applicator, you can achieve show-stopping results on-the-go.
name: London 12 Piece Eyeshadow Palette - The Rose Golds 12g

product_description:
Designed to soothe, refresh and replenish the skin, the Pixi H2O Skintint in cream enhances the complexion for a naturally radiant look. Paraben and fragrance free, it contains Green Tea and Rose Water to moisturise and provide antioxidants, whilst Chamomile and Lavender soothe for a replenishing effect.
Lighter and more breathable than traditional foundations, Skintint gives your skin an even, all over natural coverage that lasts. Suitable for sensitive skin, it's a must have for your makeup bag! K.D.
name: H2O Skintint - 1 Cream

product_description:
Smooth and perfect the look of your complexion with Maybelline Fit Me! Matte and Poreless Foundation, a refining liquid foundation with natural, matt finish.
Ideal for normal to oily skin types, the makeup is infused with micro-powders to help control shine and blur pores; it glides effortlessly across skin, blending seamlessly to visibly minimise the appearance of pores and imperfections. Expect a more even toned, flawless complexion.
colour: 105 Natural Ivory, 115 Ivory, 120 Classic Ivory, 130 Buff Beige, 220 Natural Beige, 230 Natural Buff
name: Fit Me! Matte and Poreless Foundation 30ml (Various Shades)

product_description: Achieve a flawless, visibly smoother complexion with the Matte Veil Primer from Illamasqua. With a cream-gel formula, the lightweight primer blends on effortlessly to absorb excess oil and mattify skin, whilst maintaining moisture levels to prevent dryness. Improves make-up longevity and provides oil control throughout the day for a silky soft, shine-free finish.
name: Matte Veil Primer 30ml

product_description: The black Eylure Pro-Brow Dybrow kit will allow you to achieve darker brows that are pefectly defined. Boasting a proven formula that will give you dark, glossy brows for up to six weeks, the set will allow you to tint your brows in the comfort of your own home with no need to visit a salon! Easy to use, the brow tint will give deep yet natural-looking colour. - L.M.
name: Pro-Brow Dybrow - Black

product_description: The perfect way to take your make-up bag mobile, the Real Techniques Retractable Lip Brush boasts a brand new, retractable design and is ideal for applying lipstick, lip gloss or stain with perfect precision. An essential on-the-go tool that boasts an ultra-firm tapered tip that applies colour smoothly, this lip brush is also great for expertly lining the contours of the lips for added definition. - E.D
name: Techniques Retractable Lip Brush

product_description:
Add a hint of colour to your pout with the Burt's Bees Tinted Lip Balm; a deeply nourishing formula that infuses lips with long-lasting moisture and hydration.
Harnessing the powers of Shea Butter and Botanical Waxes, the luxurious balm glides on effortlessly to deliver sheer, natural-looking colour in one simple swipe. Expect soft, supple and luscious lips with a non-greasy finish.
name: Bees Tinted Lip Balm - Red Dahlia

product_description:
Create a flawless base with the brushworks Complexion Sponge, a high quality, hydrophilic makeup sponge that expertly applies liquid and powder products to the face.
Flake-resistant and long-wearing, the super soft blending sponge can be used wet or dry depending on desired coverage (wet for natural, dry for fuller), and effortlessly blends makeup onto skin with seamless, professional results. Its curved shape has been specially designed to hug the facial contours; use the rounded sides for dabbing foundation onto larger areas of the face, and the precision tip for smaller, hard to reach areas (such as around the nose and inner corners of the eyes). When used wet, the sponge will expand and absorb less makeup for minimal wastage; the product will sit on the surface of the sponge rather than being soaked in.
Expect an airbrushed makeup finish.
name: Complexion Sponge

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with EX1 Cosmetics Invisiwear Liquid Foundation, a lightweight, lumious makeup base.
Expertly concealing imperfections, the luminous foundation is formulated with 'true colour' pigments and light diffusers that work in harmony with your skin's natural tone, unifying and perfecting to leave skin flawless and youthful-looking.
Lightweight and ultra-blendable, expect a smooth and radiant complexion.
name: Cosmetics Invisiwear Liquid Foundation 30ml (Various Shades)

product_description:
Expertly define your eyes with Pixi's Lower Lash Mascara; a water-resistant, rich black formula to enhance, lengthen and separate lashes.
Perfect for even sensitive and watery eyes, the mascara is infused with Vitamin E and Panthenol to nourish and condition lashes, whilst its specially designed slim brush captures lower, hard-to-reach short hairs for ultimate impact.
name: Lower Lash Mascara - Black

product_description: Giving you a stunning false lash effect, the False Lash Architect Waterproof Mascara by L'Oréal Paris works to elongate and volumise lashes to give you a truly show-stopping look. With a waterproof formula that stays put, the black mascara moulds and re-shapes the lashes, whilst its 4mm fibres work to enhance texture, curve and lengthen the lashes. K.D.
name: Paris False Lash Waterproof Mascara - Black

product_description:
Ensure eyeshadow stays put with the Bourjois Eye Primer; an essential base before the application of eyeshadow. Gliding onto the lid assisted by the integrated wand applicator, the priming formula offers an invisible, undetectable finish, that smoothes skin and prepares it for makeup.
Worn under eyeshadow, the primer enhances the application of shadows, as well as increasing their longevity to guarantee flawless hold for up to 24 hours. The waterproof formula allows for a professional looking application of makeup, ensuring it remains crease, fade and flake-free all day.
name: Eye Primer 6ml

product_description:
Discover the essential tools for creating a flawless base with the brushworks HD Complexion and Make-Up Kit; a three-piece collection that combines two kabuki brushes with an innovative complexion sponge. Suitable for use with both liquid and powder products, the brushes can be used in synergy to apply, blend and smooth makeup, leaving the visage flawless and perfected.
Egg Shaped Complexion Sponge
Achieve a flawless base with the Egg Shaped Complexion Sponge; an expert tool for blending makeup. The latex-free sponge is effective with both liquid and powder products, simply dab across the face to blend makeup and reveal a seamless, natural-looking finish. The large surface can also be used to pat powder onto the face to reduce the appearance of shine. The pointed top of the sponge is ideal for navigating the contours of the face, such as the nose and eyes. The precision tip is able to target fine lines and creases to prevent a cakey appearance.
Angled Contour Kabuki Brush
Expertly sculpt the cheekbones with the Angled Contour Kabuki Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that creates a professional looking contour. Sweeping over skin, the kabuki evenly delivers liquid and powder product and is ideal for defining facial features.
Powder Kabuki Brush
Pack powder onto the complexion with the Powder Kabuki Brush; a flat-headed makeup brush developed for the expert application of powder products. Simply swirl onto the complexion for an ultra-smooth, airbrushed finish.
name: HD Complexion and Make-Up Kit

product_description:
Add natural definition to your peepers with Eylure's Fleur de Force Lashes in 'Simply Fleur'.
Created in collaboration with Youtube sensation and top beauty vlogger, Fleur de Force, the lightweight false eyelashes are long-lasting, reusable and perfect for day time use; their subtle design and soft-tip technology adds natural definition to your eyes for a flawless and fresh, everyday look. Suitable for all eye shapes. Easy to apply.
name: de Force By Eylure Lashes - Simply Fleur

product_description:
Achieve flawless makeup with the brushworks Multi-Tasking Brush; a tapered, dome-shaped brush ideal for stippling, blending and buffing.
Made from synthetic taklon bristles, it’s suitable for use with both liquid and powder products to create a variety of looks and finishes. The dense, fluffy fibres pick up the perfect amount of product to build an even coverage with foundation, bronzer or blusher.
A must have for any beauty kit, use the tool to create a natural looking base, dapple cheeks with a rosy hue or define and contour.
name: Multi Tasking Brush

product_description:
Drench lips in brightening moisture using the Hurraw! Black Cherry Tinted Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
The rich and creamy balm is infused with a hydrating blend of Castor Seed Oil, Cocoa Seed Butter and Coconut Oil, which works to eliminate dryness and thoroughly nourish lips. Simply twist the stick and sweep across lips for instant and long-lasting moisture.
The tinted formula is complete with a delicious dose of Black Cherries, which lends the balm a sheer red tint that awakens dull lips. Expect soft and smooth skin that is ultra-kissable.
Please Note: The tint of the balm can vary slightly in colour. Although Hurraw! craft each batch with precision and aim to make every balm the ’same’, please know that the plant infusion strengths will vary based on seasonal growing fluctuations and is somewhat expected when using 100% natural ingredients.
name: Black Cherry Tinted Lip Balm 4.3g

product_description: Hydrate skin and control shine with Bourjois Happy Light Mattifying Primer. With its lightweight texture, the primer mattifies your complexion in any light, whilst minimising pores with its airbrushing action.
name: Happy Light - Matifying Primer

product_description:
Shape and shade your brows with Eyelure Firm Brow Pencil in Dark Brown. Ideal for creating a firm textured look that will build up nicely, the pencil allows you to tame and fill in sparse areas whilst conditioning and nourishing your brows.
The eyebrow pencil features a natural pencil on one end and a built in brush on the other for quick, easy and professional looking, well-groomed brows. -SA
name: Firm Brow Pencil - Dark Brown

product_description: The perfect way to take your make-up bag mobile, the Real Techniques Retractable Bronzer Brush boasts a brand new, retractable design as well as a firm, full brush for smooth application. Working to give your skin a rich, healthy glow, the brush is ideal for expertly blending out bronzer and finishing powder and creates a natural finish on all skin types. - E.D
name: Techniques Retractable Bronzer Brush

product_description: The Foam Applicator brush from EcoTools is designed to apply liquid foundation and blend cream concealers flawlessly, useful for contouring. The sponge features a rounded side and a flat side for ultimate versatility. The firm applicator tip is ideal for applying makeup to the hard to reach contours of the eyes nose and face, blending immaculately and smoothly. Crafted with a highly sustainable bamboo handle and a recycled aluminium ferrule.
name: Foam Applicator

product_description:
Refresh your complexion with the Pixi Glow Tonic To-Go Make-Up Remover Pads; pre-soaked, alcohol-free toner pads housed in a travel-friendly container.
Fortified with 5% Glycolic Acid, the toning pads deliver a gentle exfoliating action to eliminate all traces of make-up without over-drying, whilst a revitalising blend of Aloe Vera and Ginseng brighten, hydrate and soften. Suitable for all skin types, you can expect a smooth, renewed complexion with restored radiance.
name: Glow Tonic To-Go Make-Up Remover Pads (Pack of 60)

product_description:
Prime, perfect and protect your skin all at once with Laura Geller's Spackle® Under Make-Up Supercharged Primer, an award-winning makeup primer that combines age-fighting ingredients with skin-priming action to create the perfect canvas for makeup application.
Supercharged with soothing Botanicals and anti-ageing Antioxidants, the primer glides effortlessly across skin, priming and safeguarding from free radicals to promote smoother, prolonged makeup wear and improved skin elasticity. DC Detoxdefense™, a synergy of Vitamins, Minerals, Amino Acids and Phospholipids combines with polyphenol-rich Wine Extract and Resveratrol to leave skin looking protected and perfected.
Wear beneath your foundation to keep that freshly applied look for hours.
name: Geller Spackle Treatment Under Make-Up Supercharged Primer 59ml

product_description:
Get brighter, moisturised, even skin with a golden glow with Caudalie Teint Divin Mineral Tinted Moisturiser for Light To Medium Skin. Mineral based pigments, grape-seed polyphenols and shea butter leave skin with a natural, healthy sun kissed look.
Specially formulated for light skins, Caudalie Teint Divin Mineral Tinted Moisturiser for Light To Medium Skin gives your complexion a flattering, year round glow. Rich in antioxidants from grape-seed polyphenols and soothing, plumping moisturisation from hyaluronic acid, this nourishing skin treat improves the overall appearance of your complexion. Non-comedogenic and suitable for all skin types, this delicate moisturiser has a warm, floral fragrance reminiscent of summer days.
Directions of use:
name: Teint Divin Mineral Tinted Moisturiser - Light To Medium Skin

product_description: Relieve dry, chapped lips with the Burt's Bees Lip Balm in Coconut and Pear. Formulated with intense moisturising ingredients such as pear extract, coconut oil and shea butter, it is made up from 100% natural ingredients. The tropical flavoured lip balm melts into lips leaving them feeling soft and hydrated. - K.R
name: Bees Lip Balm - Coconut and Pear

product_description:
Awaken the eyes with the Ardell Wispies Clusters False Eyelashes in 601 Black. Perfect for any occasion, the false lashes are effortless to apply and can be used a number of times.
The precision engineered cluster lashes are designed with shorter lashes at the ends and longer, fuller clusters toward the centre, which has an eye opening effect. Simply add lash adhesive and expect voluminous, fluttering and long-lasting results
name: Wispies Clusters False Eyelashes - 601 Black

product_description:
Achieve a sculpted and chiselled complexion with the Illamasqua Contouring Gel Sculpt in 'Silhouette', a sheer contouring gel that helps create subtle, natural-looking definition on the contours of your face.
Perfect for defining your cheekbones, jawline and forehead, the gel formula creates delicate shadows on the face; apply to facial contours where shadows would naturally be cast. It enhances your face shape to enliven natural features. Easy to blend, the formula will leave your face looking naturally chiselled and sculpted.
name: Contouring Gel Sculpt - Silhouette

product_description:
Create enviable curves with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Eyelash Curlers, a pair of high quality carbon steel lash curlers with spring mechanism for maximum curve appeal.
Enhancing the shape and curvature of your natural lashes, the rose gold curlers delicately envelope the lashes with soft, silicone pads, and gently curl and reshape for curvaceous results. Warm them up ever so slightly with a hairdryer before using for enhanced results. They can even be used to bind strip lashes to your natural lashes after application by gently pressing into place.
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Eyelash Curlers - Rose Gold

product_description:
Line and define your eyes with Maybelline's Master Precise Skinny Liner in 'Black', an automatic, waterproof gel eyeliner pencil with 1.8mm micro-tip for ultra-precision application.
Delivering sleek, intense colour, the eyeliner expertly defines your eyes with long-lasting results. Staying put for up to 24 hours, the liner will accentuate your natural eye shape, allowing you to create thick to thin lines for subdued daytime looks or sultry cat eyes.
name: Master Precise Skinny Liner - Black

product_description:
Achieve an airbrushed complexion with the Spectrum Collections SC020 Wonder Sponge in Pink. The textured sponge is an essential tool for creating a flawless base with a seamless finish.
The rounded sides of the ‘Unicorn Tears’ sponge effortlessly applies and blends makeup on the large areas of the face, whilst the precision tip perfectly conceals blemishes and targets smaller areas of the face such as the contours of the nose and eyes. Simply moisten the sponge and use to apply cream, mineral or liquid makeup products.
name: Collections SC020 Wonder Sponge - Pink

product_description:
Pucker up with Lord & Berry Skin Lipgloss. The light  formula is enriched with vitamin E to nourish and protect the lips,  whilst leaving a 'barely there' hint of colour and giving off a an  irresistible lacquered finish. The lipgloss comes in four different  finishes: sparkle, shimmer, shine and overcoat.
Use the in-built wand to apply the gloss over the lips. Build up the colour or use over lipstick for a glossy finish.
name: & Berry Skin Lip Gloss (various colours)

colour: Berry Rush 04, Fair, Medium, Nectar 03, Nude
name: Cosmetics SKU

product_description:
Providing intense and long-lasting colour, the Kardashian Beauty - Joystick Lip Stick Pen will leave your pout looking perfect. Gliding on smoothly and effortlessly, the creamy formula will also condition your lips to leave them feeling smooth and soft. - L.M.
Directions for Use: Apply directly to your lips.
name: Beauty - Joystick Lip Stick Pen

product_description:
Set and perfect your makeup with Christian BRETON Compact Powder, a silky face powder with natural-looking finish.
Delivering a flawless makeup look whilst locking foundation and concealer in place, the lightweight powder glides effortlessly onto skin, setting makeup in place whilst promoting a smoother-looking complexion. Expect a velvety soft, perfected canvas with long-wearing finish. Available in a range of shades to suit all skin tones.
name: BRETON Compact Powder 8g (Various Shades)

product_description:
Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the Daniel Sandler Lipstick; a long-wearing, easy-to-apply formula that glides onto lips to deliver sheer coverage with a high shine finish.
Infused with a nourishing blend of Vitamin A, C and E, the lipstick provides powerful antioxidant protection to shield against dryness, ensuring lips are left smooth, hydrated and conditioned with luxurious colour.
name: Sandler Lipstick (3g) (Various Shades)

product_description:
Smooth and perfect the appearance of your complexion with EX1 Cosmetics Delete Anti-Blemish/Dark Circle Concealer.
Lightweight and easy-to-blend, the creamy concealer expertly camouflages imperfections and banishes blemishes; its antioxidant and Vitamin E-rich formula protects skin from free radical attacks whilst soothing and healing blemishes.
Dark circles are diminished and unruly spots are concealed. Skin looks naturally flawless and perfected.
name: Cosmetics Delete Anti-Blemish/Dark Circle Concealer 6.5g (Various Shades)

product_description:
This Glamstick from Rodial  is a nourishing lip balm that helps to keep lips moisturised and smooth  all day long.
Imbued with the light flavour of coconut, your lips will  be gorgeously scented and boast a lavish sheen. With added Vitamin E to  nourish and Cocoa Butter to hydrate and protect, this balm adds a hint  of instant warm colour to your lips.
Not only does this lip balm  protect and soothe your lips, they leave them silky soft and looking  stylish. A perfect handbag accessory, carry around this Glamstick with  you and add instant glamour to your look
Directions of Use
name: Glamstick 4g

product_description:
Enhance natural radiance with the Trifle Cosmetics Liquid Glow; a liquid highlighter that delivers a long-wearing, lit-from-within make-up look.
Infused with Cocoa Extract to soften and hydrate, the blendable formula can be applied to the cheekbones, brow bones and cupid's bow for a luminous, defined and expertly sculpted finish. Your complexion appears smooth and flawless with an ethereal glow.
name: Cosmetics Liquid Glow 15ml

product_description:
Create flawless makeup looks with the brushworks HD Definer Complexion Sponge; a lightweight, double-ended tool for versatile use and even coverage.
Suitable for use wet or dry to achieve different finishes, the premium makeup sponge doesn’t absorb product for minimal waste and has been specially shaped to allow for seamless blending with a precise, pointed tip for those hard-to-reach crevices. Perfect for highlight and contour shades to build natural looking chiselled cheekbones.
name: HD Definer Complexion Sponge

product_description:
Shield lips from damaging rays with the Hurraw! Tangerine Chamomile Lip Balm SPF 15; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients. Enriched with SPF15, the creamy balm blocks UVA and UVB rays to give lips the extra protection they need during periods of prolonged sun exposure.
The twist-up stick effortlessly glides over lips, enveloping skin in the extra-thick formula, which boasts long-lasting results. Formulated with a skin-loving blend of Red Raspberry Seed Oil, Sea Buckthorn Oil and Pomegranate Seed Oil, the rich lip balm provides superior nourishment, hydration and protection. Not only preventing sun damage, the formula is also the perfect companion when soothing and healing already damaged lips. Expect a healthy and hydrated pout.
name: Tangerine Chamomile Lip Balm SPF 15 (4.3g)

product_description:
Blend to perfection with the brushworks HD Midi Sponge Set; a four-piece selection of various shaped makeup sponges for a variety of applications.   
Suitable for use wet or dry to achieve different finishes, the premium makeup sponges won’t absorb product for minimal waste and effortless application.
