Each sponge has been specially shaped to allow for seamless blending with specific designs to strobe, contour and conceal. Ideal for foundation, blush and powder formulations.
The Set Contains:
1 x Midi Cone Sponge – Purple
1 x Midi Egg Sponge – Green
1 x Midi Complexion Sponge – Pink
1 x Midi Ellipse Sponge – Orange
name: HD Midi Sponge Set

product_description: A hand-sculpted blending brush designed for contouring and shading. Its angled, flat-headed tip allows you to accurately buffer around the eye area for definition. Featuring a weighted handle with an embossed brush name for easy reference. 'Look Good Feel Better' is the only global cancer charity supporting women with the visible side effects of cancer treatment. E.N.
name: Good Feel Better Angled Blending Brush

product_description:
Sheer, semi-matte and weightless, the jane iredale PurePressed Foundation SPF20 in Radiant provides untraceable coverage, leaving your complexion flawless. The light diffusing properties leave skin looking healthy and younger.
Minimise pores and fine lines with the jane iredale PurePressed Foundation SPF20 in Radiant. Highly water resistant and pigmented, this light shade applies evenly and easily, providing long-lasting, gorgeous coverage. Acting as a foundation, powder, concealer and sunscreen in one, this do-it-all formula is even gentle enough for sensitive skins and is great for shading, highlighting, contouring and lining.
Directions of use:
name: iredale Purepressed Base SPF 20

product_description:
Easy and efficient to apply, the Pixi Shea Butter Lip Balm in Natural Rose is the ultimate tinted lip balm. Perfect for keeping in your handbag, this balm boasts a twist-up design with a secure click lid for safe keeping.
Featuring a subtle hint of colour for a chic look, it's infused with shea butter to nourish and hydrate the lips to ensure you're given a long lasting kissable pout! K.D.
name: Shea Butter Lip Balm - Natural Rose

product_description:
Maximise your eyes with Maybelline's Lash Sensational Luscious Mascara in 'Richest Black'.
Infused with precious Argan, Safflower and Rose Hip Oils, the intensifying mascara coats every lash for a softer, denser feel. Its arched brush features a reservoir that holds the jet black formula in the bristles, allowing it to coat even the smallest of eyelashes and fill the lash line for an intense, plumped-up look. The multiplying mascara coats lashes on all sides and delivers full coverage to create layers and layers of luscious lashes.
name: Lash Sensational Luscious Mascara 9.5ml - Richest Black

product_description:
Say hello to show stopping lashes with the Bourjois Volume Glamour Push Up Mascara in black. This unique formula contains innovative ingredients which work to give a clump free, voluptuous effect that lasts.
Featuring an uplifting brush made to give a stunning curl to your lashes, this mascara is perfect for creating that coveted intense look for stand-out eyes. Your lashes will be left looking thicker, fuller and showing off an amazing curl! K.D.
name: Volume Glamour Push Up Mascara - Black (6ml)

product_description:
This Rosa Centifolia Express Make-Up Remover by REN is designed to gently but efficiently remove makeup and impurities from the face to leave you feeling and looking fresh. A the soft milky formula even works to remove waterproof mascara, ensuring that every last trace of makeup is gone.
Suitable for all skin types, including contact lens wearers, this Express Make-up remover contains a 100% natural Rose Extract Complex to tone, soften and soothe, and is designed to respect the skin's natural barrier to ensure your complexion is never irritated or stressed. It's a must have addition to your beauty regime. K.D.
name: Rosa Centifolia™ Express Make-Up Remover

product_description:
Achieve a flawless base with Chantecaille's Hi Definition Perfecting Powder, a translucent matt powder specially formulated for use with High Definition cameras.
With a skin-smoothing finish that's undetectable on application, the weightless, non-drying powder glides effortlessly over skin and blends like a fluid to expertly camouflage pores and imperfections; it delivers a matt yet radiant finish with added Luminosity Agent. Utilising micro-fine light perfecting powders that give skin a flawless, natural finish under a HD lens, the powder helps even out skin tone and set makeup in place for long-lasting, flawless, photo-ready results.
name: Hi Definition Perfecting Powder

product_description:
Define your eyes to the max with the Colossal Waterproof Mascara in black from Maybelline's 'Volum' Express' collection. With an expert collagen formula and exclusive mega brush, the volumising mascara creates a plumped up, waterproof look in just one stroke, filling out lashes up to seven times in volume for a lush, smudge-proof appearance.
Lashes will look fuller, longer and instantly volumised. - K.N.
name: Colossal Waterproof Mascara - Black

product_description: Define your eyes with Mascara Lash Sensational from Maybelline, a plumping mascara to enhance eyelashes. With an expert liquid formula, the clump-free black mascara delivers ultimate impact and maximum definition so you can create a look as dramatic as desired. Its specially designed wand and curved brush allows you to layer the mascara and reach even the tiniest lashes for extra volume and bigger, bolder lashes. E.N.
name: Mascara Lash Sensational - Very Black

product_description: Achieve a smooth and beautiful complexion with Bourjois Flower Perfection Primer. The translucent primer evens out and refines skin's texture, hides pores, blemishes and fine lines, leaving the skin looking flawless. Enriched with wild azalea extract to protect cell's youth, the soft textures helps you to create an airbrush finish. -SA
name: Flower Perfection Primer

product_description:
Intensify your peepers with Ardell's 131 Lashes. Lightweight and reusable, the short, full and flared false lashes are ideal for first time users, and create ample volume and natural-looking definition. Comfortable to wear and easy to apply, the lashes feature a dark band that connects the hair strands to form a strip that ensures secure corners. They are knotted and feathered by hand for perfect uniformity.
Made with 100% natural hair and easy to apply.
Shape: Large eyes. Almond shaped eyes. Deep set eyes.
name: Natural Lashes 131 Black

product_description: Achieve enviable arches with the Pixi Brow Tamer; a clear brow gel that works to prolong the wear of your brow colour. Infused with Aloe Vera and Panthenol, the fast-drying formula nourishes and conditions, whilst delivering soft hold to define and shape brows. Complete with a spoolie brush for easy application, you can create perfectly groomed, professional results that last.
name: Brow Tamer

product_description:
Add beautiful definition to your peepers with Eylure's Fleur de Force Lashes in 'Fully Fleur'.
Created in collaboration with Youtube sensation and top beauty vlogger, Fleur de Force, the lightweight false eyelashes are long-lasting, reusable and perfect for every occasion; their full, fluttery design offers a kick at the corner with naturally tapered tips to lend your eyes the perfect amount of definition for day time and evening use. Easy to apply.
name: de Force By Eylure Lashes - Fully Fleur

product_description:
DuWop Venom Flash Gold is a spin-off from the original Lip Venom plumping gloss. This time injected with golden Mica, the tingly pout perfecter reflects light for yet more shine.  With this sleek gloss, lips will be fantastically full in a flash.
Precious pearly, Venom Flash Gold shines with the superior quality we have come to expect from the unique DuWop range. Infused with the metallic Mica mineral, the subtle gold tone gives warmth to the lips. Great when teamed with natural eye colours & bronzed cheeks.
Celebrity fans of the Venom line include Lindsay Lohan, Jennifer Aniston, Teri Hatcher, and Sienna Miller.
Directions of use:
Not tested on animals.
name: Lip Venom Flash Gold (3.5ml)

product_description:
Mix up your makeup routine with the brushworks Assorted Make Up Sponges; a 24 piece pack of various shapes and sizes suitable for use with a range of products.
Offering rounded, squared and pointed types, each sponge can be used more than once and is ideal for seamless application of foundation, blusher and concealer. Can also be used with cleanser to efficiently remove makeup.
name: Assorted Make Up Sponges

product_description:
Korean skincare brand, Skin79, have carefully curated a BB cream gift set to help you achieve smoother, brighter, younger-looking skin. The Super Plus BB Cream Best 3 Set combines a trio of triple action blemish balms that expertly improve the appearance of skin with both natural and full coverage finishes. Expect flawless makeup results.
Super+ Beblesh Balm - Pink (7g)
A triple-function BB cream that works to brighten, smoothen and protect the skin. The fresh textured blemish balm delivers a veil of natural coverage; it absorbs effortlessly and infuses skin with vitamin-rich Damask Rose Water and Acerola to brighten and enhance radiance. Its anti-ageing properties help to keep skin looking young, and SPF 30 protects against the sun's damaging UV rays. Skin looks perfected and clarified. 
Super+ Beblesh Balm - Orange (7g)
A skin-correcting BB cream that counteracts discolouration and dark spots. The balm functions as a high coverage BB cream, concealing and correcting pigmentation issues. Boasting SPF50, the potent formula offers UVA and UVB protection to prevent any future skin damage, including discolouration. The transparent BB cream is enriched with Phytoshingosine and Ceramide, which combine to strengthen the skin’s protective barrier. Expect a smooth and brightened complexion, visibly free from damage.
Super+ Beblesh Balm - Gold (7g)
A triple action BB cream that delivers whitening, anti-wrinkle and sun protection properties; it expertly perfects the appearance of skin for a smoother, more even toned makeup look whilst improving elasticity and skin texture with its cocktail of Gold and Caviar. Delivering a hydrating veil of natural coverage, the blemish balm creates a film of protection, infusing skin with moisture whilst keeping it safe from harmful UV rays which can induce premature ageing. It also helps to keep skin clear and prevent future breakouts. Skin looks naturally flawless and perfectly moisturised.
name: Super Plus BB Cream Best 3 Set

product_description:
Daniel Sandler Watercolour Fluid Blusher So Pretty contains vitamin E and jojoba to enhance application and nourish skin. Itis silicone based and oil free, doesn't clog pores and suits every skin type. The silicone makes it virtually rub-off proof and water-resistant.
Give your cheeks a hint of colour with Daniel Sandler Watercolour Fluid Blusher So Pretty, this pink shade will add an instant glow to your cheeks. Your skin will be left feeling nourished and looking fab!
name: Sandler Watercolour Fluid Blusher So Pretty (15ml)

product_description:
The 6 Piece Eye Brush Set from EcoTools contains every brush for creating the perfect natural or smokey look. Crafted with highly sustainable bamboo handles, 100% cruelty free synthetic taklon bristles and recycled aluminium ferrules.
Large Eye Brush: The earth-friendly eye brush evenly blends a base shadow over the eye lids, ideal for prepping eyes in order to work into and build up shadows.
Angled Crease Brush: The crease brush is designed at the perfect angle in order to blend darker tone shadows at the outer crease, enhancing the eyes and creating depth.
Petite Eye Shading Brush: The shading brush is the ideal size for adding dark accents to the edge of the eye, adding another dimension to the smokey eye.
Ultra Fine Eyeliner: Use with a favourite gel, cream or shadow liner to smoothly line eyes with ease. Perfect for creating a winged eyeliner look and adding final definition.
Smudge Brush: The soft smudge brush is the ultimate tool for blending the different shadow tones to compete the smokey effect with a professional finish.
Case: Protect the brushes inside the patterned, EcoTools zip pouch in an ombre design. Made from natural materials.
name: 6 Piece Eye Brush Set

product_description:
Enhance your own eyelashes with the Rimmel Wonder Full Mascara, and never feel the need for false ones again. The lightweight brush provides a clump-free application, that separates the lashes for a fuller and thicker effect.
Infused with argan oil the formula not only adds dramatic black colouring, but also conditions the lashes whilst providing a smoother consistency. Eyelashes appear fuller, thicker and longer, as well as feeling healthier and reducing hair loss with its kind formula. - K.R
Directions for use: - Apply to top lashes using upward strokes, and downward for the bottom lashes.
Top tip: For even more lift and bigger looking lashes, move brush in a zig zag motion as you brush out.
name: Wonder Full Mascara - Black

product_description:
Create an expert smokey eye with the Bourjois Quad Eyeshadow in Taupissime; a sleek, golden palette that houses four complementary eyeshadow hues. Arriving with a double ended applicator with a precise, foam tip, the quad hosts everything you need for flawless makeup application.
Part of the ‘Smoky Stories’ collection, the quad boasts four powdered eyeshadows that effortlessly glide onto the eye and blend together seamlessly for a professional looking finish. The palette contains a hue to prime, shadow, define and highlight the eyes, which work in synergy to create the perfect, long-lasting smokey eye.
name: Quad Eyeshadow - Taupissime 3.2g

product_description:
The ALGENIST Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Melting Cleanser lifts away makeup, dirt and impurities while helping to visibly replenish skin for refreshed and revitalised complexion.
Based upon ALGENIST’s proprietary biotechnology research, the luxurious formula delivers an unparalleled sensorial experience – transforming from a silk-textured oil into a fluid, milky emulsion when applied with water to maximise efficacy.
The pioneering facial cleanser combines age-defying Alguronic Acid and Microalgae Oil, a duo of patented ingredients that have been sustainably sourced and scientifically tested to deliver superior anti-ageing benefits.
Rich in Oleic Acid, Phytosterols, Tocopherols and Tocotrienols, the pair work in synergy to optimise hydration levels and counteract nutrient loss while smoothing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Gentle enough for daily use, the unique cleanser leaves skin feeling soft and supple with a youthful looking radiance.
name: Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Melting Cleanser 150ml

product_description:
The Mega Liner in ultra black from Bourjois is a unique eyeliner which promises to deliver intense, long lasting and sharp lines to give you show stopping eyes for up to 24 hours. Featuring an extra large angled tip, it's perfect for creating both thin and thick lines with unbeatable precision.
Achieving amazing eyes has never been easier thanks to the Mega Liner! K.D.
name: Mega Liner - Ultra Black (0.8ml)

product_description:
Sculpt and define your natural features with Maybelline Master Contour V-Shape Duo, a 2-in-1 contour and highlighter stick.
The contouring chubby stick is split into two colours; one side features a defining contour shade, and the other, an illuminating highlighter. Perfect for adding definition to your face, the contouring shade can be applied to natural hollows on the face, such as under the cheekbones and along the jawline to help sculpt and sharpen your facial shape. The radiant highlighter can be applied to high points on the face, such as the cheekbones, brow bones, down the centre of the nose and the cupid's bow; areas that would naturally catch light. The result? A professionally contoured complexion with strobe-like radiance.
name: Master Contour V-Shape Duo 27g (Various Shades)

product_description:
Achieve a flawless makeup finish in no time at all with the brushworks HD Miracle Silicone Shaped Sponge in 'Glitter', a revolutionary makeup applicator designed to speed up your daily makeup routine.
Ultra-hygienic and allergy free, the innovative makeup sponge is coated with a unique ultra-smooth (TPU) layer to minimise product wastage; it won't absorb your makeup and allows you to save more than half the amount of product compared to regular brushes and sponges. Long-lasting and easy to clean, the silicone sponge will expertly apply and blend your foundation with seamless, airbrushed results; simply spread using a circular motion and dab lightly to blend away lines. 
Skin looks smooth and flawless.
Tip: Fold the Sponge around your finger to improve control and coverage in hard to reach areas.
name: HD Miracle Silicone Shaped Sponge - Glitter

product_description:
The delicate skin on your lips is constantly exposed and needs extra  moisture and protection. Our treatment uses eight essential vitamins,  nutrients and minerals plus advanced sun protection against damaging  UVA/UVB rays to keep them soft, smooth and healthy looking.
Dry, flaky lips can be uncomfortable and embarrassing. Our daily  treatment combines the right combination of vitamins and minerals to  indulge your lips with the moisture they need to stay soft and smooth.  And to help prevent further damage, nothing beats our UVA and UVB broad  spectrum sun protection. In short, this portable squeeze tube with the  comfy slanted applicator delivers everything your lips need look  radiant, healthy, and beautiful all day.
name: Arden Eight Hour Nourishing Lip Balm

product_description:
Create the ultimate fanned out flutter with L'Oréal Paris Volume Million Lashes - Extra-Black (9ml). With a Millionizer brush that boasts a multitude of long and short bristles, the flexible elastomer applicator evenly coats your lashes from root to tip.
Finished with an excess wiper to remove clumps and overload, it gives you just the right amount of formula to achieve long, volumised lashes. - L.M.

Directions of Use:

Apply to top and bottom lashes using the brush.
name: Paris Volume Million Lashes - Extra-Black (9ml)

product_description:
Awaken eyes with this Eye Bright Liner from Pixi. Designed for use on  the lower inner rim of the eye to give eyes a wide eyed effect
Enhancing the white of your eyes, this waterproof liner offers  precise application. In a nude flesh toned colour to give the illusion  of larger, brighter and awakened eyes. Perfect for days when your tired  and lacking lustre.
Benefits:
-Sunflower seed oil soothes eyes and retains moisture.
name: Eye Bright Liner - No.1 Nude

product_description:
Wipe the slate clean with Garnier Skin Naturals 2-in-1 Make-up Remover, a gentle, foaming gel that works to remove makeup and impurities from the skin.
Performing a deep cleanse, the makeup remover combines salicylic acid with soothing, makeup removing agents to clear the complexion of stubborn makeup and daily grime. All traces of makeup, including waterproof, are diminished, and its cleansing formula decongests pores, reduces shine and protects from blemish reappearance. The formula is even gentle enough to use on your eyes.
Skin feels purified, makeup-free and expertly protected. - K.N.
name: Skin Naturals 2-in-1 Make-up Remover (200ml)

product_description:
Enhance and intensify your lashes with Rimmel's Volume Colourist Mascara, a volumising, extreme black mascara enriched with an innovative lash tint.
Working to add drama to every lash, the cone-shaped brush coats even the shortest of eyelashes to create a wide-eyed effect, and the formula's complex lash tint works over time to naturally enhance the colour of your lashes. Expect rich, intense lashes with added oomph.
name: Volume Colourist Mascara (11ml) - Extreme Black

product_description:
Achieve a naturally flawless complexion with the 'No Foundation' Foundation in No 1 from Perricone MD, a mineral based makeup formula with broad spectrum SPF 30 and dewy, radiant finish.
Effortlessly blending into the skin to help conceal imperfections and correct undertones, the radiance restoring foundation harnesses the powerful effects of antioxidant alpha lipolic acid which helps to minimise the appearance of pores, wrinkles and imperfections on the skin.
Its dewy finish leaves skin glowing and radiant with a youthful, flawless finish. - K.N.
name: MD No Foundation Foundation - No 1 30ml (Light)

product_description:
The ultimate travel accessory by Real Techniques includes everything you need to create flawless make-up at home and away. 
Includes 3 full - size brushes and case
Panoramic brush case is a 2-in-1 case and stand look pixel-perfect even in harsh light ultra-plush, synthetic taklon bristles are hand-cut and 100% cruelty-free. Extended aluminum handles are light and easy to use
name: Techniques Travel Essentials Kit (travel)

product_description:
Help keep those shiny moments away with the shine-free, no colour finish Daniel Sandler Invisible Blotting Pressed Powder. This technologically advanced formula won’t cake, dry out the skin or alter the shade of your foundation.
You can use Daniel Sandler Invisible Blotting Pressed Powder on naked skin, or over foundation without destroying your make-up. Because its formula contains super lightweight, oil-absorbing powder, the only thing you’ll notice is the shine-free results. This powder applies invisibly and works on every skin tone, from dark to light.
Directions of use:
name: Sandler Invisible Blotting Pressed Powder

product_description: The EcoTools Blush Brush is designed to work with all blush formulas including powders and creams, in order to achieve every desired look. The square shape brush allows for precise colour application giving you ultimate control. The earth friendly tool is created with a highly sustainable bamboo handle, 100% cruelty free synthetic taklon bristles and a recycled aluminium ferrule.
name: Blush Brush

product_description:
The Vintage Cosmetics Company Dolly Bow Make-Up Headband is a retro-inspired, polka dot headband that makes cleansing and makeup application a breeze.
Made from super soft fabric, the headband is perfect for keeping your face clear of hair during times of pampering, and features a repeat polka dot print with cute bow detail. Complete with an elasticated band for a secure fit.
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Dolly Bow Make-Up Headband

product_description:
Apply makeup like a professional with the Spectrum Collections 10 Piece Essential Brush Set; a complete collection comprising ten ultra-soft makeup brushes that combine a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design. With a variety of brushes for a number of uses including the face and eyes, the brush set is an essential for any makeup lover.
B01 Flat Top Buffer
Helping you step up your foundation game, the buffer brush is designed with a flat top brush head comprising super soft bristles, which create a light buffing action on skin. The unicorn-inspired brush is the ideal tool for applying cream and liquid products evenly, with the option of buildable coverage. It is also efficient for stippling powder onto shiny and oil-prone areas of the face. Offering superior buffing and blending, the brush helps to create a flawless complexion and seamless results.
A01 Large Domed Powder
Perfect for touch ups on-the-go, the domed powder brush is an essential companion when applying translucent powder or bronzer. The super soft, synthetic bristles effortlessly pick up product and distribute it evenly across skin. Use with bronzer for an all-over sunkissed glow or translucent powder to set makeup in place and achieve long-lasting results.
A05 Precision Blush
The ‘Blush Crush’ brush boasts an angled brush head and super soft, synthetic bristles, which are ideal for applying a small amount of product and building up colour. Effortlessly blending product for a seamless finish, the brush offers natural and professional looking results. Changing the way you apply colour to cheeks, the unicorn-inspired precision blush brush is an essential addition to any brush collection, leaving cheeks shaded, highlighted and enhanced.
B03 Baby Buffer
The miniature ‘Under Cover’ buffer boasts super soft synthetic bristles and a flat top brush head, making it the most effective brush for applying and blending cream concealer into skin. The small brush is the perfect size for targeting and covering dark circles and blemishes with concealer. The baby buffer is an essential addition to any brush collection, simply buff until a flawless finish is achieved.
A06 Large Fluffy Shader
The ‘Shady Lady’ blending brush arrives in a wide, flat shape, which is ideal for applying a wash of powder and cream makeup products to the entire eye lid. The large, fluffy head boasts super soft, synthetic bristles to blend hues with a seamless, expert finish. Ideal for a subtle everyday look or for building colours to create intense drama.
B06 Tall Tapered Blender
The ‘Blending Friend’ is the perfect tool for applying and blending eyeshadows seamlessly. The coveted blending brush is crafted with a super soft, fluffy brush head, which can create an array of eye-catching makeup looks, from soft and subtle, to smokey and defined. Whether it’s blending out colour or building up hues, the tapered blender is an essential addition to any makeup brush collection.
B04 Small Angled Blender
The versatile ‘Eye Spy’ brush boasts an angled brush head and is the perfect size for blending eyeshadows and defining peepers. The soft angle effortlessly shades the outer corner of the eye and allows colour to fade into the crease for a flawless contoured eye. The fluffy, unicorn-inspired brush is an essential addition to any makeup bag.
A17 Angled Brow
Expertly frame the face with the Angled Brow Brush. The brush boasts super soft yet firm, synthetic bristles and a precise, angled brush head, which makes applying gel, wax or powder brow makeup effortless. The winged definer leaves brows defined and enhanced. The unicorn-inspired brush can also be used to apply gel eyeliner. The angled head reaches right into the lash line to deliver precise application and a fierce, cat-eye flick.
A15 Lip Liner
The ‘Get Your Pout Out’ brush boasts soft yet firm, flat bristles, which work with a variety of cream and liquid liners. Effortlessly gliding over skin, the brush is ideal for lining, defining and filling in the lips.  Complete with a tapered tip, the unicorn-inspired brush offers superior precision and prepares lips for a wash of colour.
A09 Angled Eyeliner
The ‘So Fine’ liner brush is Spectrum Collections’ thinnest brush. The precision tool comprises an ultra-fine brush head with a pointed tip and an angled ferrule. Ideal for application gel, cream or liquid eyeliner, the brush delivers superior precision and fluid movement for expert results. The angled brush allows for additional control of the movement, meaning it’s never been easier to create a fine and fluid line to define eyes.
name: Collections 10 Piece Essential Brush Set

product_description:
Maximise your eyes with 'The Falsies' Waterproof Mascara in black from Maybelline's 'Volum' Express' collection. With an expert pro-keratin formula and flexible, patented spoon brush, the volumising mascara creates a clump-free, plumped up, waterproof look, lifting and fanning out lashes corner-to-corner to create the look of 300% more visible, fuller lashes.
Lashes will look instantly volumised with no gaps from any angle. - K.N.
name: Volum' Express The Falsies Waterproof Mascara - Black

product_description:
Achieve an expert cat-eye with the Spectrum Collections A17 Winged Eyeliner Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The eyeliner brush boasts super soft yet firm, synthetic bristles and a precise, angled brush head, which allows you to apply gel eyeliner with ease. The brush glides across skin, evenly dispersing product and reaching right into the lash line. The brush’s precision makes it the perfect tool for creating flawless winged liner.
name: Collections A17 Winged Eyeliner Brush

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your complexion with theBalm Stainiac Lip and Cheek Stain – Beauty Queen, a gel-based formula that imparts a natural, buildable wash of colour on the lips and cheeks.
Delivering a 'hint of tint' in a classic pink hue, the dual purpose stain effortlessly adds a healthy glow to your complexion; apply sparingly for a subtle look, or layer and build for a more intense, colour pop experience. Its aloe infused formula is easy to blend and allows you more time to blend and dab before it sets. The results? Streak free makeup with a healthy pop of pink. - K.N.
name: Stainiac Lip and Cheek Stain – Beauty Queen

product_description:
Add customised definition to your peepers with Eylure's Fleur de Force Individual Lashes in 'Couture Fleur'.
Created in collaboration with Youtube sensation and top beauty vlogger, Fleur de Force, the lightweight, individual false eyelashes are long-lasting, reusable and perfect for any occasion. The tapered, knot-free tip flares allow you to create a custom-lash look; apply sparsely for a natural finish, or layer for a more dramatic, wide-eyed effect. Suitable for all eye shapes. Easy to apply.
name: de Force By Eylure Lashes - Couture Fleur (Individual Lashes)

product_description:
Effortlessly blur imperfections with the 'No Concealer' Concealer from Perricone MD, a brightening formula fortified with broad spectrum SPF 35 for expert sun protection.
Melting into the skin to help diffuse imperfections whilst instantly brightening, the youth-inspiring concealer harnesses the powerful effects of vitamin C ester, a fat-soluble form of vitamin C which helps to minimise discolouration of the skin. Its brightening blend is great for the delicate eye area; it stimulates collagen production to help to gradually fade away the appearance of dark circles for a radiant, wide awake finish.
Completely versatile, the concealer is great for priming the eyes, concealing blemishes and imperfections and highlighting high points on the face. - K.N.
name: MD No Concealer Concealer (9g)

product_description:
Boost your pucker with the Burt's Bees Refreshing Lip Balm; a 100% natural treatment bursting with vitamins and nutrients to leave your lips feeling soft and supple.
Formulated with a creamy base of Beeswax and Coconut Oil, the hydrating chapstick is enriched with Pink Grapefruit Oil to help boost moisture levels and protect against environmental aggressors. Complete with a delectable citrus flavour, it leaves lips kissably conditioned and plush. Housed in convenient tube, perfect for stashing in your handbag.
name: Bees Refreshing Lip Balm 4.25g - Pink Grapefruit

product_description: Expertly define your pout with the Colorshow Shaping Lip Liner from Maybelline. Gliding effortlessly across the lips, the creamy, high-pigmented pencil delivers long-wearing colour with a smudge-proof finish. Can be used for all-over colour or to enhance the wear of your favourite lipstick.
colour: Brick Red, Dusty Rose, Nude Whisper, Palest Pink, Rich Wine
name: Colorshow Shaping Lip Liner (Various Shades)

product_description:
Create a naturally flawless complexion with the Real Techniques Fresh Face Favourites Brush Set; a limited edition, four-piece collection that boasts two Real Techniques products that are new and exclusive to the set. Helping to achieve the coveted ‘no makeup makeup’ look, the Fresh Face Favourites create natural-looking dewiness with ease.
BB/CC Brush
Create a natural-looking, dewy complexion with the new and exclusive BB/CC Brush. Crafted with large, firm bristles, the tool is ideal for applying BB or CC cream evenly and effortlessly over the face.
Contour Brush
Sculpt the complexion like a professional with the Contour Brush; the ideal tool for the delicate application of contour and highlighting makeup products. Boasting a fluffy brush head with Real Techniques’ UltraPlush™ bristles, the brush effortlessly glides over skin, distributing product smoothly and evenly. Ideal for creating chiselled cheekbones.
Detailer Brush
Achieve a completely flawless complexion with the Detailer Brush; a small makeup brush that is ideal for a targeted application of concealer, or can even be used as a lip brush. Crafted with a small, precision-cut brush head, the brush can tackle and effortlessly conceal problem areas.
Wedge Sponges x 6
Blend like a professional with the new and exclusive Wedge Sponges. The set arrives with six, brightly coloured tools that are ideal for achieving a seamless makeup application. Blending and blurring harsh lines, the sponges are essential for a natural-looking finish. Tip: Use damp for additional dewiness.
name: Techniques Fresh Face Favourites Brush Set

product_description:
Banish blemishes and imperfections with Elizabeth Arden Flawless Finish Maximum Coverage Concealer. The luxurious yet lightweight texture is easy to blend, flawlessly covering dark circles and reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
The handy compact comes with an in-built mirror, making it perfect for touching up your skin on the go.
Directions of Use:  Using a concealer brush or your fingertip, dab a small amount onto problem areas, ensuring it blends into your skin.
name: Arden Flawless Finish Maximum Coverage Concealer (1.5g)

product_description: Add sumptuous colour to your pout with Chantecaille's Lip Chic Lipstick. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid to plump the appearance of lips, the formula combines the high shine of a gloss with the smooth, even coverage of a lipstick. Gliding on effortlessly, Lip Chic delivers comfortable, long-wearing colour with a non-sticky, velvety soft finish.
name: Lip Chic Lipstick - Petunia

product_description:
Say hello to wonderfully radiant skin with Elizabeth Arden Mineral Makeup 8.33g. Housed in a portable grinder, it releases a fresh layer of microlight mineral powder with each application, so you get just the amount you need. Virtually weightless, it blends effortlessly into the skin, whilst the buildable formula allows you to achieve both sheer and full coverage.
Rich in vitamins and minerals, as well as sea water complex and SPF 20, it protects, smoothes and nourishes your skin. Suitable for all skin types, it's comfortable to wear and won't cake or settle into fine lines, leaving your skin looking bright and even.Directions of Use:Use the sponge applicator to smooth the powder over your face.
colour: Pure Finish 2, Pure Finish 3, Pure Finish 4, Pure Finish 6, Pure Finish 7
name: Arden Mineral Makeup 8.33g

product_description:
Achieve an airbrushed complexion with the Spectrum Collections B01 Flat Top Buffer Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
Helping you step up your foundation game, the buffer brush is designed with a flat top brush head comprising super soft bristles, which create a light buffing action on skin. The unicorn-inspired brush is the ideal tool for applying cream and liquid products evenly, with the option of buildable coverage. It is also efficient for stippling powder onto shiny and oil-prone areas of the face.
Offering superior buffing and blending, the brush helps to create a flawless complexion and seamless results.
name: Collections B01 Flat Top Buffer Brush

product_description:
Illuminate your pout with the Nude Gold CP36 Color Riche Gold Obsession Lipstick from L'Oréal Paris. Offering rich colour and care, the Gold Obsession lipstick leaves lips defined and shimmering. The Nude Gold hue provides an iridescent veil of nude colour to lips.
Enriched with a lip-loving blend of Omega-3 Oils and Vitamin E, the lipstick not only delivers luscious colour, but protects lips from drying out. The lipstick utilises velvety pigments blended with a touch of pure gold, leaving lips illuminated with a metallic finish.
name: Paris Color Riche Gold Obsession Lipstick CP36 - Nude Gold

product_description: Add sumptuous colour to your pout with Chantecaille's Lip Chic Lipstick. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid to plump the appearance of lips, the formula combines the high shine of a gloss with the smooth, even coverage of a lipstick. Gliding on effortlessly, Lip Chic delivers comfortable, long-wearing colour with a non-sticky, velvety soft finish.
name: Lip Chic Lipstick - Tuberose

product_description:
Create the ultimate dramatic flutter with L'Oreal Volume Million Lash Mascara Waterproof. The millionizer brush boasts a multitude of short and long bristles, which separate your lashes for a full, fanned-out effect, coating your lashes quickly and evenly.
With an excess wiper to remove clumps, the waterproof formula is perfect for wet weather and holidays, ensuring fantastic staying power. Your eyes will be perfectly framed, creating a show-stopping, glamourous look. - L.M.
Directions of Use:  Use the in-built elastomer applicator to apply the mascara to your upper and lower lashes.
name: Volume Million Lash Waterproof Mascara

product_description:
Create a customised makeup look with Eylure's Lash-Pro Individual Lashes - Multipack Knot Free.
Offering 216 flares of individual false lashes (4x more more than a single pack), the set allows you to perfectly tailor volume and thickness for your ideal lash look. Long-lasting and easy to apply.
name: Lash-Pro Individual Lashes - Multipack Knot Free

product_description:
Perfect your complexion with Elizabeth Arden's Flawless Start Instant Perfecting Primer, a lightweight, universal formula that works to instantly smoothen uneven skin whilst prolonging makeup wear.
Infused with light-diffusing technology and a triple blurring-complex, the primer glides effortlessly across the skin, evening out texture whilst diminishing the appearance of pores, fine lines and wrinkles. Skin looks perfected and shine-free thanks to its time-release, skin balancing technology and oil-absorbing silica beads. Expect a flawless complexion with improved texture and shine. - K.N.
name: Arden Flawless Start Instant Perfecting Primer

product_description:
From RMS comes the best-selling Living Luminzer, a highlighting balm that will instantly add a youthful, dewy glow to the skin.
The sheer, silky textured luminizer has a translucent finish that is suitable for all skin types. Especially effective on skin that is in need of illumination without artificial glitter, stickiness or greasiness, the highlighter will revitalise the appearance of your skin and ensure its place in your ‘must-have’ beauty bag.
name: Beauty Living Luminizer Highlighter

product_description:
Discover the must-have palette for bringing out your inner glow with the Rosy Radiance Palette Rosette from Pixi. An all-in-one colour kit, the palette boasts an array of rose, crème and taupe hues that are able to sculpt and enhance cheeks, add a wash of colour to eyes and fill in sparse brows.
The blush, glow and contour shades combine in one handy palette to deliver radiance and shape to your face. Ideal as a gift or an indulgent treat for yourself.
8 x Eye Shades
3 x Brow Shades
3 x Face Shades
Duo Applicator
name: Palette Rosette - Rosy Radiance

product_description:
Discover a next generation makeup tool with the STARSKIN Artist FX™ Auto-Patting Makeup Applicator; an innovative applicator that is designed to mimic the expert airbrushing techniques of professional makeup artists.
The easy-to-use device combines a pulsating and patting action, and is able to deliver 4,800 taps a minute. Patting in foundation in this manner provides flawless and long-lasting coverage with an airbrushed finish. The electronic applicator arrives with three interchangeable heads, each suited to a different type of product, including cream, serums, foundations and powder.
The compact device can be taken on-the-go and is fully rechargeable, allowing you to achieve a professional makeup application each and every day.
name: Artist FX™ Auto-Patting Makeup Applicator

product_description: Refine, define and smoothen the appearance of your favourite facial features with the Flat Contour Brush from Real Techniques' Bold Metals Collection. Its weighted design offers superior control, whilst its flat tip and premium synthetic bristles distribute cream and powder products for effortless contouring and highlighting on the cheekbones, nose and chin. Achieve a sculpted, seamless finish every time. E.N.
name: Techniques Bold Metals Flat Contour Brush

product_description:
Perfect your pout with the award-winning, Banana Balm Lip Sheen 3-in-1 from Lanolips, a lip balm that works to condition, smooth and add sheen.
The luxurious, creamy formula is enriched with natural Banana extract and a host of Vitamins, Minerals and Antioxidants to help protect skin from environmental stresses. Its dose of  the brand's exclusive Ultra Pure Medical Grade Lanolin (Nature's Wonder Moisturiser™ which has a molecular structure that closely resembles and mimics your own skin oils), combined with Shea Butter ensures lips are luscious, conditioned and shimmering.
Delivering a subtle sheen, the multi-purpose balm leave lips lustrous and healthy-looking.
name: Banana Balm Lip Sheen 3-in-1

product_description:
Achieve mesmerising, picture-perfect eyes with the Bourjois Quad Smokey Stories Eyeshadow. Allowing you to experiment with four complementary shades, you can prime, define and highlight your eyes for natural-looking results with excellent colour longevity and seamless blendability.
Simply use the lightest shade to prime the eyelid, shadow with the medium shade, define with the darkest hue, and illuminate with the glitter for expert results and a soft, smokey finish. Features a dual-ended wand with a cushioned tip for effortless blending and a precision tip to contour. E.N.
name: Quad Smokey Stories Eye Shadow - Sau-Mondaine

product_description:
Sculpt enviable cheek bones with the Spectrum Collections C01 Large Fan Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘#No.1 Fan’ brush is the ideal companion for applying both highlighter and bronzer like a professional. The rounded brush head comprises super soft, synthetic bristles, which offer light coverage for a soft focus finish, or can be built upon for additional impact. The large fan brush is Spectrum Collections’ largest face brush, perfect for sweeping powdered bronzer or highlighter across the cheek bones and collar bones.
The unicorn-inspired brush is an essential addition to any brush collection, allowing you to expertly contour and enhance skin with an enviable glow.
name: Collections C01 Large Fan Brush

product_description:
Boasting an innovative, mineral rich formula, this Mineral Lipstick from Bellapierre Cosmetics is designed to give your lips a flash of irresistible colour whilst working to keep them hydrated and nourished throughout the day. Containing natural waxes and rich mineral pigments, this lipstick does nothing but good things for your lips.
Formulated with iron oxides and antioxidants such as vitamin C and vitamin E, this silky lipstick also provides SPF protection from the sun. Available in a gorgeous range of colours that are sure to have you turning heads for all the right reasons, this lipstick is a make-up bag must have. K.D.
colour: Catwalk, LA Diva, P.I.N.K, Ruby, Va!Va! Voom
name: Cosmetics Mineral Lipstick 3.5g - Various Shades

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your pout with Christian BRETON Lipstick, a rich, creamy lip colour in a range of glossy, metallic, sheen, matt and pearlescent finishes.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips, the lipstick delivers a slick of illuminating colour that emphasises and smoothens your pout. Lips look bright and healthy with a supple feel.
colour: Bronze, Burgundy, Chamel, Copper, Gold Pink, Pink XL, Red
name: BRETON Lipstick 3.9ml (Various Shades)

product_description:
Perfect the look of your skin with Christian BRETON Powder Foundation, a pressed powder foundation that delivers long-wearing coverage whilst regulating moisture to keep skin comfortable.
A foundation and powder all-in-one, the multi-tasking makeup utilises invisible, ultra-smoothing powders to unify the appearance of skin; it creates a flawless veil with a radiant finish. Ideal for travel, the compact foundation is humidity-resistant and contains a moisture regulator to provide skin with optimal comfort.
name: BRETON Powder Foundation 7g (Various Shades)

product_description:
Achieve a completely flawless complexion with L'Oreal Paris Infallible Total Cover Foundation, a full coverage liquid foundation with long-wearing, ultra-matt finish that feels lightweight on skin.
Formulated with 30% more pigment for better coverage and less product, the makeup glides effortlessly onto skin, blending seamlessly to cover a multitude of imperfections, including blemishes, redness and even tattoos. Its full coverage finish expertly camouflages your complexion to leave your skin looking even toned, shine free and instantly perfected for up to 24 hours. Transfer-resistant.
name: Paris Infallible Total Cover Foundation (Various Shades)

product_description:
Achieve flawless eyebrows with the Brows on Point Micro Pencil - Taupe from brow experts Billion Dollar Brows. Dual ended, Brows on Point comprises a precision point to one end and a spoolie brush to the other. The ultra-fine tip creates natural looking brush strokes that mimic the appearance of individual hairs for a subtle finish, whilst the spoolie can be used to comb and blend.
The pencil boasts a mechanical function, constantly delivering a precision tip without the need to sharpen. Filling in sparse brows to accentuate your look, the brow makeup offers maximum colour pay off and a professional finish. The formula is both water and smudge proof, gliding onto brows effortlessly and providing long lasting results.
name: Dollar Brows Brows on Point Micro Pencil - Taupe

product_description:
Get gorgeously groomed brows with the Lord & Berry Magic Brow Pencil. The  smart design features three highly pigmented colours that enhance and  define the natural shape of your brows, whilst the built-in brush  allows for effortless blending.
Brush eyebrows upwards with the integrated applicator, fill any gaps with the pencil then blend and shape with the applicator.
name: & Berry Magic Brow (various colours)

product_description:
Add a touch of colour to your complexion with RMK Ingenious Powder Cheeks N, a selection of vibrant blushers that add glowing radiance to your cheeks.
Blending effortlessly onto skin, the blush delivers a vivid hue that enhances your natural complexion with a striking flush of colour. Use on the apples of your cheeks or for subtle contouring.
name: Ingenious Powder Cheeks N EX (Various Shades)

product_description:
Achieve professional looking eyebrows with Laura Geller's Brow Sculpting Palette, an all-in-one brow palette that allows you to shape, fill, define and highlight your perfect brows.
Use the dual-coloured, baked brow powder to customise the perfect brow tone for shaping, filling and defining; use the setting wax to groom, tame and hold brows in place; and use the illuminating highlighter to add radiance to the brow bone for a professional, wide-eyed makeup look.
Bestowing you with fuller, face-framing brows, the palette is the perfect makeup tool to accentuate your natural features. Complete with a double ended applicator.
name: Geller Brow Sculpting Palette

product_description:
Created to give your eyebrows that perfect finishing touch, this Eyebrow Pencil from Bellapierre Cosmetics is an essential addition to your makeup bag. Available in various shades, this silky pencil will give you a precise application with maximum staying power, meaning that you'll be looking your best all day and night.
Working to fill in your eyebrows, this pencil boasts an innovative formula that nourishes, ensuring that your skin is kept in great condition. K.D.
name: Cosmetics Eyebrow Pencils - Various shades

product_description:
Living Nature's Light Tinted Moisturiser delivers a sheer, natural hint of colour to leave your complexion fresh, radiant and healthy-looking.
Fortified with natural minerals and active Manuka Honey, the fast-absorbing, lightweight formula provides long-lasting hydration and intense nourishment, whilst leaving you with perfect colour and a smoothened, even toned complexion. Suitable for all skin types.
name: Nature Light Tinted Moisturiser 50ml - Various Shades

product_description:
Illuminate the complexion for naturally radiant look with the Japonesque Liquid Lights, an innovative face illuminator. The unique, weightless formula glides onto the skin for a silky feel and effortless feel.
It contains light reflecting particles which uplift the skin and create a younger looking, more supple complexion. Available in different shades suitable for light to dark skin tones. K.D.
name: Liquid Lights (Various Shades)

product_description:
The Bio-Lift Concealer from Chantecaille offers an innovative double effect, working to erase fine lines whilst covering them to leave a perfect-looking complexion.
The clear core is enriched with a concentrated dose of Hexapeptide that helps to smooth the appearance of wrinkles, and the surrounding coloured cream provides smooth, even coverage for dark circles. Specially formulated with SPF10 and Vitamin E, the delicate eye area is moisturised and protected, plus light-reflecting particles leave your peepers looking more youthful.
name: Bio-Lift Concealer

product_description:
Expertly line and define your eyes with the Vincent Longo Pro Waterproof Eye Pencil, a professional grade eyeliner pencil that delivers highly pigmented colour with a waterproof, long-lasting finish.
With a rich and creamy formula, the eyeliner glides effortlessly across the lid or waterline, creating both smokey or subdued day time looks. Its true colour on application intensifies the look of your peepers with long-wearing results.
name: Longo Pro Waterproof Eye Pencil (Various Shades)

product_description:
Combat blemishes with Lord & Berry Soft Touch Concealer.  Formulated with a blend of raspberry oil and date extract, the liquid  concealer hides under-eye circles, discolouration and imperfections  whilst helping to fight the signs of ageing. Leaving a velvet-like  finish, the matte effect is long-lasting for all day coverage.
Use the in-built wand to apply the concealer to imperfections, concentrating on the eye area.
name: & Berry Soft Touch Concealer (various colours)

product_description:
Perfect the look of your complexion with EX1 Cosmetics Invisiwear Compact Powder, a feather light, ultra-finely milled pressed powder that works to beautify your skin whilst setting makeup in place.
The lightweight powder delivers just a hint of colour whilst controlling shine with long-lasting effect; it's the ultimate skin finisher. Expect a flawless and photo-ready complexion.
name: Cosmetics Invisiwear Compact Powder 9.5g (Various Shades)

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the RMS Tinted 'Un' Powder; an ultra-fine, light-reflecting powder that blends effortlessly onto skin for a picture-perfect finish.
Available in three shades, the face powder delivers a hint of natural-looking colour to help absorb oil and minimise the appearance of pores, whilst targeting unwanted shine on the T-zone area for a long-lasting, matte effect. Complete with a puff for application on-the-move.
name: Beauty Tinted 'Un' Powder

product_description:
Boasting a unique formula, the Cream Foundation by Lord & Berry is easy to apply, gives complete coverage and moisturises the skin on application. An emulsion with long lasting coverage, this foundation contains anti-oxidant vitamin E, hyaluronic acid and argan oil to protect the skin and keep your complexion hydrated.
Also formulated with UVA-UVB filters to protect against sun damage and pollution, the Cream Foundation is easily blendable to give a flawless, shine controlled finish. Available in a range of shades suitable for all skin tones. K.D.
name: & Berry Cream Foundation

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Rimmel 9-in-1 Super Make-Up BB Cream; a lightweight, multi-purpose formula that perfects the complexion in one simple step.
The BB cream deliver nine benefits to skin. The formula primes the visage for makeup application, which enhances its wear and longevity, offers a veil of moisture and minimises the appearance of enlarged pores. The cream sweeps over skin, concealing the look of minor blemishes, as well as covering other imperfections. Delivering a bright and mattified finish, the BB cream is complete with SPF25, which shields the complexion from damaging rays, with long-lasting effect.
Once applied to skin, the BB cream instantly smoothes the visage, yet offers an invisible, natural-looking finish. The formula arrives in several hues, which are designed to complement and enhance all skin tones. Expect flawless results.

product_description: Add a flush of colour to your complexion with Chantecaille's Cheek Crème Refill; a cream-to-powder formula that melts on effortlessly to deliver buildable, natural-looking colour with a long-wearing finish. Infused with White Lily Bulb and Peach Extracts, the antioxidant-rich blusher nourishes and protects skin, whilst creating a lit-from-within look. Can be applied using fingertips or a blush brush.

product_description: Add sumptuous, saturated colour to your pout with the Hydra Chic Lipstick from Chantecaille. Harnessing the anti-ageing and antioxidant powers of natural Papaya and Orchid Extracts, the lightweight formula glides on effortlessly to deliver comfortable, full coverage that lasts up to four hours without over-drying. Lips are hydrated, protected and velvety soft.

Highly water resistant and pigmented, this sandy shade applies evenly and easily, providing long-lasting, gorgeous coverage. Acting as a foundation, powder, concealer and sunscreen in one, this do-it-all formula is even gentle enough for sensitive skins and is great for shading, highlighting, contouring and lining.

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Max Factor Miracle Match Foundation; a long-wearing, hydrating formula that blends seamlessly with individual skin tone for a dewy, photo-ready finish.
Delivering natural-looking colour, the lightweight liquid foundation smoothens the appearance of imperfections and enhances luminosity for streak-free, professional results.

Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Christian BRETON Blusher, a silky, pressed powder blush to enhance and sculpt your complexion.
Delivering long-wearing colour that instantly brightens the skin, the blush is easy to blend and creates a healthy glow. Apply to the apples of your cheeks for a classic flush, or use as a contour shade to sculpt and define your complexion. The non-drying powder will lend skin a soft, naturally radiant appearance.

Perfect for wear alone or over lipstick, the Make Up by HD Brows Lip Gloss has a long lasting formula that works to condition the lips whilst giving a stunning shine. Available in a range of lightly pigmented colours, this non-sticky gloss contains vitamin E to give a noticeable plumping effect for a perfected pout. You'll be left with soft, shiny and kissable lips that last.
The perfect finishing touch to any look. K.D.

Achieve a natural-looking, flawless complexion with L'Oréal Paris Nude Magique Cushion Foundation, a revolutionary liquid foundation with a unique, cushion-drenched delivery system.
Housed in a compact, the packaging contains a foundation-soaked cushion that allows you to 'squeeze out' product by tapping on the makeup-soaked sponge; it is easy and quick to apply. The foundation's buildable coverage allows you to create a sheer, luminous finish, or build to a medium coverage depending how many layers you wish to apply. Enriched with SPF 25, the foundation is perfect for on-the-go touch ups. Skin looks smooth, luminous and perfected.

product_description:
The Pressed Powder by Lord & Berry is a lightweight, silky soft powder which boasts a unique formula containing finely milled talc and corn starch for a shine-free finish. Designed to sit invisibly on the skin, it'll give you an illuminated complexion with an even veil of colour.
Working to minimise the appearance of pores and fine lines to give a matte effect on the skin, this powder is a must have addition to your makeup bag. K.D.Directions of use:
name: & Berry Pressed Powder

product_description:
Add a pop of dazzling colour to your pout with Revlon's Ultra HD Lipstick, a high definition lip colour with ultra-pigmented finish.

Utilising a wax-free gel formula, the unique lipstick delivers a rich, burst of colour with a lightweight feel. Lips feel comfortable and defined.

product_description:
Pucker up with beautiful colour thanks to Lord & Berry Vogue Lipstick. Enriched with anti-oxidants and bees wax to protect and nourish the delicate skin on the lips, it gives a velvety soft finish. When applied, it creates the illusion of fuller and more defined lips for a dramatic and glamourous look.
Apply straight from the bullet onto the lips, blot with a tissue then reapply.

product_description:
Achieve all-day coverage with the glo minerals Tinted Primer SPF30; a multi-tasking, mattifying formula that perfects the complexion and prepares skin for makeup application.
Suitable for all skin types, including those with sensitive skin, acne and rosacea, the primer effectively smoothes skin and delivers flawless radiance. The non-comedogenic formula utilises an array of skin-conditioning silicones, which fill and visibly eliminate fine lines, wrinkles and enlarged pores to leave the face perfected with an airbrushed finish.
Use the tinted primer alone for a natural look, or apply before foundation to extend its wear. Expect a smooth and protected complexion that is radiant and youthful.
name: minerals Tinted Primer SPF30 (Various Shades)

product_description:
Achieve a naturally flawless-looking complexion with Christian BRETON Liquid Foundation, a lightweight formula that creates a flawless yet barely there makeup look.
Gliding effortlessly onto skin, the foundation creates a veil of perfection that allows skin to breathe and won't block pores. Its smoothing properties help to even out the appearance of skin whilst minimising the look of imperfections. Delivering light yet high performance results, each shade offers a unique finish depending on your skin type; moisturising, matt and oil-free, or higher coverage. Expect a smoother-looking complexion with a 'second skin' feel.

product_description:
Douse your lips in moisturising colour. INIKA Certified Organic Lip Glaze is a high shine lip gloss infused with a host of natural and organic ingredients to leave lips feeling hydrated and protected.
Enriched with Organic Carbauba Wax and Vanilla Oil for a sensual texture and fragrance, the gloss glides effortlessly across the lips with a soft wand applicator and delivers a vibrant pop of colour and shine. Its dose of Vitamin E expertly moisturises and protects for a healthy, luscious pout. Safe, non-toxic.

product_description:
Helping you to keep skin radiant and healthy, glo minerals Pressed Base combines an exclusive blend of antioxidants including Vitamins A, C, E, along with green tea extract to provide you with a expert base that c?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen>
glo minerals award-winning, mineral make-up have developed this beauty product with natural, high pigment minerals to offer you these gorgeous range of colours that are suitable for all skin types and will nourish, correct and protect your skin and leave you with a semi-matte finish. -SA
name: minerals Pressed Base (Various Shades)

product_description:
All you will ever need to perfect your look, this Compact Foundation from Bellapierre Cosmetics is a 5-in-1 compact that acts as a concealer, foundation, setting powder and SPF 15 protection all in one. The perfect size for your haandbag, this foundation is formulated with pure mineral pigments ground to the smoothest texture, meaning that your skin is nourished and kept hydrated whilst wearing.
The added SPF protection means that not only is your skin kept looking picture perfect, but is protected from environmental aggressors. An absolute must have for your makeup bag, don't miss out on the Bellapierre Cosmetics Compact Foundation! K.D.

product_description:
Say hello to natural looking skin with RMK Liquid Foundation. The light and fresh texture applies evenly to your skin, creating the perfect balance of coverage and translucency for flawless looking skin.
The waterproof formula will withstand perspiration, giving you long-lasting coverage that will keep your skin looing perfect from morning until night, no matter what the weather.
name: Liquid Foundation

product_description:
Achieve show stopping style with Bellapierre Cosmetics' Eyeliner Pencil. Boasting an innovative formula enriched with Botanical Waxes such as Jojoba, Safflower and Vitamin E, this pencil stays put all day and night to ensure that you stay looking your best.
Containing pure mineral pigments, this eyeliner pencil gives intense colour on the top and bottom eyelids. Suitable for all skin types, this lavish eyeliner is a must have additon to your makeup collection. K.D.
Directions of use:
name: Cosmetics Eyeliner Pencils - Various shades

product_description:
The NUDESTIX Lip and Cheek Pencil offers both quality and convenience. One creamy soft pencil, available in a range of colours, will provide lip liner, lip colour and cheek cream.
Wearing the same colour on both lips and cheeks creates a stunning effect. This pencil provides excellent colour payoff, blendability and coverage that will last for hours. As well as looking great, the NUDESTIX pencil will also nourish your lips and skin, packed as it is with shea butter, vitamin E and peptides.
For added convenience, the lip and cheek pencil is eco-packaged in a collectible tin that includes a large mirror and pencil sharpener.

product_description: Add a touch of colour to your cheeks with a FACE Stockholm Blush, available in a range of shimmer and non-shimmer shades. The velvety, delicate powder will add contour to your face and cast a naturally flushed, healthy glow. – E.W.
name: Stockholm Blush 2.8g

product_description: Add sheer colour to your eyes with the RMS Eye Polish; a cream eyeshadow with a glowing, light-reflecting finish. When applied sparingly, the delicate formula nourishes and moisturises the eye area, and delivers a subtle metallic veil with a barely-there, buildable finish. It provides all the benefits of raw mineral pigments without the dryness. Can also be used as a highlighter for a frosted make-up look.
name: Beauty Eye Polish

product_description:
Brightening eyes and creating long-lasting definition, the Lord & Berry  Smudgeproof Eye Pencil glides on easily for a pop of colour that stays  put from morning until night. It won't run or smudge, and just one  stroke is enough to create a graphic line. Drying and sealing in 30  seconds, it's ideal for perfecting your beauty regime on the go.
Pull  eyelids taught and line the upper and lower lashline by gently gliding  the pencil from the inner to the outer corner of your eye. Wait 30  seconds for it to dry and seal.
name: & Berry Smudgeproof Eye Pencil (various colours)

product_description:
The Lord & Berry Velluto Eye Pencil is a delicate and powdery liner  that gives beautiful definition. Create a sheer look for day, or build up  the colour for sultry, sexy eyes that look gorgeous at night. Easy to  apply, the built-in sponge means the colour can be effortlessly smudged  and blended for fail-safe application.
Apply to the lashline in small strokes. Use the built-in sponge to smudge and blend the colour.
name: & Berry Velluto Eye Pencil

product_description:
Lend your eyes a naturally luminous finish with jane iredale Smooth Affair Eyeshadow, a cream-to-powder formula that can be worn alone or as an eyeshadow primer.
Infused with Coco Glycerides and Mineral Powders, each sheer, lustrous colour glides effortlessly onto the lids like butter, delivering a fresh, subtle hue with long-lasting finish that adds delicate definition to the eyes whilst helping to minimise the appearance of fine lines. When used as a primer, it preps lids for seamless, long-wearing makeup looks. Smudge and crease-proof.
name: iredale Smooth Affair Eyeshadow (Various Shades)

product_description:
brushworks' Mini Brush Set is a must have makeup brush collection that combines four mini face brushes. Fitted with soft, synthetic taklon bristles, each brush can be used with liquid or powder products to lend your complexion a professional, airbrushed finish. Each brush has a precision shaped handle for improved control during application.
Multi-Tasking Brush
A tapered, dome-shaped brush ideal for stippling, blending and buffing. The dense, fluffy fibres pick up the perfect amount of product to build an even coverage with foundation, bronzer or blusher. A must have for any beauty kit, use the tool to create a natural looking base, dapple cheeks with a rosy hue or define and contour.
Mini Powder Brush
A high quality makeup brush designed to apply and set makeup with expert results. The soft, fluffy, dome-shaped brush effortlessly sweeps makeup across the face, seamlessly blending to ensure flawless coverage. Picking up and distributing the perfect amount of product, the brush facilitates easy makeup application, and when used with setting powder, will help to prolong makeup wear.
Mini Concealer Brush
Perfect for concealing the under eyes and smaller areas of the face, the fluffy, tapered head picks up and delivers the perfect amount of product to help cover up dark shadows, blemishes and imperfections.
Mini Eye Shading Brush
Carefully shaped and cut to blend round the eye, the precise brush allows you to apply concealer or eyeshadow with expert, evenly blended results. Perfect for covering dark circles or for buffing eyeshadow into the crease.
name: Mini Brush Set

product_description:
Add a pop of dazzling colour to your pout with Revlon's Super Lustrous Lipstick, a luxurious lip colour with choice of four finishes: crème, matt, pearl, and shine.
Utilising a LiquiSilk™ formula that helps seal in colour and softness, the lipstick delivers a rich, highly pigmented colour with lustrous shine for a glamorous makeup look.
name: Super Lustrous Lipstick (Various Shades)

product_description: Achieve a perfected complexion with the A Little Amazing Concealer, a miniature version of the original Amazing Concealer. Formulated with waterproof formula which works to make all imperfections disappear, it's available in a range of shades perfect for all skin tones. It's effective waterproof technology and highly pigmented formula is designed to conceal dark circles, blemishes, sun damage and broken capillaries; it's the ultimate skin perfector. It's super lightweight yet promises to give full coverage every time - simply dab onto the skin and blend to see the amazing results of this makeup artist favourite. K.D.

product_description:
Treat your lips to Elizabeth Arden's Eight Hour Sheer Tint Lip Colour; a portable version of the brand's renowned Eight Hour Cream with subtle hint of colour.
Intensely nourishing and protective, the lip formula is infused with emollients, sunscreen and antioxidant Vitamin E to keep lips moisturised and safe from external aggressors, including UV rays. Gliding effortlessly over lips, the portable stick delivers a subtle hue to leave lips soft, supple and delicately tinted. Wear alone or beneath lipstick.
name: Arden Eight Hour Sheer Tints (3.7g)

product_description:
A cream-to-powder eyeshadow that creates brightening and dramatic results with non-creasing results.
A chubby crayon with light reflecting pigments that softens and highlights for gorgeous, low maintenance looks. No brushes required.
Benefits:
-Vitamin E nourishes and protects
-Peptides plump fine lines for a softened, smooth look.

product_description:
Add natural-looking definition to your eyebrows with the Maybelline Brow Precise Micro Pencil, a dual-ended mechanical eyebrow pencil with ultra-fine, 1.5mm tip and built-in grooming brush to precisely fill, shape and enhance your brows.
The precision pencil glides effortlessly through hairs, filling in sparse areas of the brow whilst adding depth and definition to your arches to expertly frame your face. Its ultra-fine tip delivers natural-looking strokes that blend seamlessly with your natural hairs to define, sculpt and accentuate your brows. Use the integrated grooming brush to blend and tame for an ultra-preened finish.
name: Brow Precise Micro Pencil (Various Shades)

Expertly create a flawless complexion with the Spectrum Collections A18 Oval Concealer Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
Boasting a flat shape with rounded bristles, the firm ‘No Baggage’ brush can be used to apply cream and liquid concealers with ease. Sweeping under the eyes or onto blemishes, the brush perfects the complexion by evening skin tone and leaving skin visibly clear. The soft yet firm synthetic bristles also make the concealer brush an ideal tool for applying contour product before blending.

product_description:
Treat your lips to Zelens Lip Enhancer in 'Naturalle', a moisturising lip formula that works to visibly enhance moisture, colour and volume.
Infused with 15 active ingredients, including three natural butters (Mango, Cocoa and Shea), Hyaluronic Acid and Phospholipids, the sheer treatment intensely hydrates whilst delivering a firming and plumping effect. Its natural tripeptide paired with a fatty acid stimulates collagen production to enhance the volume and outline of lips. Hydration is improved and the appearance of furrows are reduced. Lips' colour appears enhanced and volume is re-densified. Antioxidants from green Shiso leaves ensure lips are protected from external aggressors.
Expect supple, shiny lips that feel intensely hydrated and voluptuous.

product_description: A makeup bag must-have, Lottie London’s Kabuki Babe Brush is the perfect tool for applying finishing powder. With a chunky handle and dense, super-soft bristles, the brush delivers the perfect amount of product to create a lightweight, flawless complexion. Sweep the super-soft bristles across your face for a perfectly finished makeup look. - K.N.

product_description:
Achieve a smooth and refined complexion with the ALGENIST Pore Corrector Anti-Ageing Primer; an essential step before makeup application.
Effortlessly gliding over the visage, the primer boasts Alguronic Acid and an array of potent ingredients, which works in synergy to improve skin’s texture and tone. The silky formula is able to visibly reduce the size of pores, whilst also blurring fine lines, wrinkles and other imperfections to leave skin youthful and flawless.
The lightweight primer offers an ultra-smooth finish that enhances the wear and longevity of makeup.
name: Pore Corrector Anti-Ageing Primer 30ml

Reveal a rested and radiant complexion with the Bourjois Healthy Mix Concealer; a skin-correcting formula that effortlessly covers imperfections to deliver a flawless visage. Harnessing a fruit therapy formula for an anti-fatigue effect, the foundation boasts Apricot extract to boost skin’s radiance, Melon extract to deliver essential moisture and Raspberry extract to improve micro-circulation. Instantly brightening dull skin, the concealer revives skin’s radiance for an enviably flawless finish.

product_description:
Achieve the perfect pout with Lanolips 101 Ointment Multi-Balm in 'Strawberry'. Its natural formula is made with the brand's Ultra Pure Medical Grade Lanolin, also known as Nature's Wonder Moisturiser™ which has a molecular structure that closely resembles and mimics your own skin oils. Suitable for even the most sensitive skin.
The versatile lip balm combines the healing, hydrating properties of the multi-purpose ointment with Vitamin E and 100% natural strawberry to treat chapped lips, dry cuticles and small cuts and bites. The strawberry's main ingredient is alpha-hydroxy acids which help to buff away dead cells to reveal soft, renewed skin. Experience hydrated, soothed and comfortable skin that is silky soft to the touch. Its moisture-sealing formula holds 200% of its weight in moisture and is baby friendly.
Enjoy its range of 101 uses: dry cuticles; cracked heels; dry nasal passages windburn and cold-chapped cheeks; dry, brittle nails; paper cut; insect bites and more.

Become an expert with eyeliner with the Real Techniques Detail + Define Brush Set; a coveted, three-piece collection that assists in flawless eyeliner application. Boasting an angled liner brush, small detail brush and a bonus eyeliner guide, the set covers everything you need to apply liquid, cream, gel or powder liners like a professional.
Definer Brush
Apply eyeliner with ease using the Definer Brush. Developed with firm UltraPlush™ bristles and boasting an angled brush head, the makeup brush is the perfect tool for performing a controlled application of gel and cream eyeliner along the lash line. Expect ultra-defined results.
Square Detailer Brush
Be creative with your eyes using the Square Detailer Brush; an expertly crafted tool that assists in creating small, ultra-precise lines. Crafted with precision cut bristles and a square-shaped brush head, the makeup brush is the perfect accompaniment for creating precise details and accents on any makeup look.
Bonus Liner Guide
Apply eyeliner like a professional with the Real Techniques Liner Guide. Assisting with steady liner application, the guide should be placed onto the corner of the eye to help create the perfect winged finish.

product_description:
Create an enviable pout with ease using the Real Techniques Lip Colour + Blur Brush Set; a coveted duo arriving in one convenient package. Working with an array of lip products, including lipsticks, stains and glosses, the brush set is an essential addition to any makeup lover’s collection.
Lip Brush
Apply lipstick like a professional with the Lip Brush; a slim pink tool with an ultra-firm, brush head. Working with lipstick, lip stain or lip gloss, the brush glides over skin, delivering product smooth and evenly. The versatile brush has been crafted with a precision tapered tip, meaning it can also be used to line and define your pout.
Lip Blur Brush
Achieve a soft focus finish with the Lip Blur Brush; an innovative tool that takes away the harshness of freshly applied lip colour. Boasting a rounded head with a comfortable, delicate texture, the brush effortlessly blurs and blends together lip colour for an enviable finish.

product_description: A translucent creation designed to suit all skin types, the Flawless Finishing Powder from Pixi brightens skin with a sheer veil. Easy to apply and super convenient, these reusable lashes are suitable for all eye shapes and are even safe for contact lens wearers. Your lashes will look longer and more defined, without being glaringly obvious.

A luxurious skincare experience, the FOREO Night Cleanser eliminates excess oil, dirt and impurities. For a high performance ritual, the absorption of the cleanser is enhanced when used in conjunction with the T-Sonic™ pulsations of FOREO's LUNA™ device, allowing it to reach deeper into pores, removing pollution, make-up and dead skin cells and revealing a refined, healthy-looking complexion.
Suitable for all skin types, its unique formula transforms from a silky gel into a velvety milk and utilises precious Meteorite Powder to detoxify skin, leaving you with a touchably soft texture and luminous glow. With 97% ingredients of natural origin, the cleanser is infused with Moringa extract to diminish pollution particles, whilst Sweet Almond Oil deeply nourishes, soothes and smoothens skin for restored radiance and increased suppleness.

Suitable for all skin types and complete with folding kabuki style brush, the Elizabeth Arden Pure Finish Mineral Bronzing Powder in Medium promises to dust face, décolletage and shoulders in a blanket of luminous bronze. Just turn the dial and boast a fresh golden glow whatever the season.

product_description:
Calling all Watercolour devotees, this Daniel Sandler Watercolour Crème-Rouge Blusher in Soft Peach is perfect for those who fell in love with his award-winner fluid formulas who want a flawless finish with long-stay and water resistant results!
This Daniel Sandler Watercolour Crème-Rouge Blusher in Soft Peach comes with added care for the cheeks and contains anti-oxidants vitamin E and grape seed oil to help fight free radicals. Daniel hates to set rules, so he created this soft peach shade to be as versatile as possible on a spectrum of complexions. He recommends soft peach for cool skin tones and high colour.
Directions of use:

product_description: Add lift to your lashes with Eylure's 'Camellia' Enchanted Eyelashes. Add definition to your brow bone with the highlighter, and line your lashes with the black wet/dry liner. A creamy wax has been included to swipe over your brows and keep them in place, or turn your powders into creamy eyeshadows if desired.

product_description: Carnauba and bees wax give this Bourjois Liner Stylo thickening properties and a soft texture for professional results. The retractable eyeliner with a built in sharpener allows all day definition for eyes. E.N.

Suitable for use with cream, liquid or powder products, the ultra-plush, hand-cut, synthetic taklon bristles help to produce an air-brushed finish. Lightweight and easy to use, each brush features an extended aluminium handle for added sturdiness and durability. - L.M.

product_description: Maybelline present Baby Lips Dr. Rescue, a conditioning lip balm that delivers twelve hour hydration for moisturised, silky smooth lips. With a hint of eucalyptus and menthol to cool and soothe dry, chapped lips, the non-greasy balm leaves a natural tint and evens out tone to leave lips healthy-looking. Relieves and renews lips for long-lasting comfort. E.N.

product_description:
Awaken your face with the Powder Blusher from Illamasqua. Arriving in a selection of highly-pigmented hues, the blush works to radiate and illuminate the complexion.
Each powder blusher can be used to brighten, enhance and define the face shape. The powder makeup can be applied lightly for a subtle look, or intensely for a dramatic and daring finish. Use the blusher wet for a more intense colour pay off.
Expect professional looking results.
colour: Allure, Ambition, Beg, Chased, Disobey, Excite, Hussy, Intrigue, Katie, Lover, Morale, Naked Rose, Nymph, S.O.P.H.I.E, Thrust, Tweak

Created by stacking two sets of strip lashes on top of one another, the double ‘Demi Wispies’ add extreme volume and additional length to the natural lash, giving the appearance of ultra-full and fluttering lashes. The double up strip lashes are effortless to apply and can be used a number of times, simply add lash adhesive and expect long-lasting results

The make-up essential for a trendsetting smile and mirror-like shine. Get instant sumptuous lips and a hint of colour with this award-winning Tinted Balm SPF 30 from Lanolips. Enriched with the brand's Ultra Pure Grade Lanolin (Natures Wonder Moisturiser™ which has a molecular structure that closely resembles and mimics your own skin oils) and Vitamin E, the non-sticky lip gloss hydrates lips, whilst its SPF30 protects from environmental stresses.
