Delivering a sheer red tint that brightens your natural lip colour, the gloss lends your pout a healthy glow, and is perfect for lightly dabbing on cheekbones as a highlighter. Intensely nourishing, it transforms dry lips to leave them feeling soft, supple and conditioned.
name: Tinted Balm SPF 30 - Red Apple

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the award-winning Skin Base Foundation from Illamasqua. With a lightweight, creamy texture that blends effortlessly, the liquid foundation delivers a long-wearing, natural-looking finish without over-drying skin.
Providing perfect, streak-free coverage, its vitamin-rich, buildable formula conditions and softens skin, whilst concealing imperfections and smoothening your complexion for a picture-perfect make-up base. Available in a range of shades.
name: Skin Base Foundation

product_description: Maximise lashes with the Bourjois Volume Reveal Mascara; a black mascara that works to define, enhance and lengthen lashes. Featuring a specially designed brush, the intense formula captures individual lashes from the root, whilst its built-in mirror with x3 zoom allows mistake-free application. Expect clump-free definition and ultimate volume.
name: Volume Reveal Mascara 7.5ml - Black

product_description: The Pebble from Chantecaille is a refillable compact which holds all Chantecaille Eye and Cheek Shades and Cheek Cremes (sold separately). The magnetic closing strip holds the makeup refills in place securely and allows you to remove, recycle and replace favourite shades effortlessly. The interior mirror allows for application whilst on-the-go.
name: The Pebble Refillable Compact

product_description: Keep makeup brushes in tip-top condition with the brushworks Brush Guards. An ideal storage solution, the synthetic guard slips over the top of all types of brushes, with three different sizes provided to fit all shapes. The innovative case prevents the brush head from becoming frayed or damaged, maintaining their quality and enhancing the lifespan.
name: Brush Guards

product_description:
Perfect your pout with the Bourjois Rouge Edition 12 Hour Lipstick, boasting a long lasting, silky smooth formula that's designed to stay put for up to 12 hours without the need to re-apply!
In a range of hues perfect for all moods, occasions and skin tones, this lavish lipstick is enriched with pure lacquer pigments for an intense colour and shea butter to give prolonged moisture to keep your lips feeling soft and looking sumptuous. Giving a semi-matte finish, the Rouge Edition 12 Hour Lipstick really is a makeup bag essential. K.D.
colour: Beige Shooting, Cherry My Cherrie, Entry VIP, Pretty in Nude, Prune Afterwork
name: Rouge Edition 12 Hour Lipstick - Various Shades (3.5g)

product_description:
Perfect your eye area with Maybelline's Dream Brightening Concealer; a creamy, blendable crayon that camouflages dark circles for a more wide-awake appearance.
Infused with light-reflecting pearl pigments, the lightweight concealer delivers medium to full, natural-looking coverage to minimise under-eye darkness, puffiness and signs of fatigue. Eyes appear bright and fresh with a smooth, even tone.
colour: Fair, Light, Medium, Medium Deep, Universal
name: Dream Brightening Concealer (Various Shades)

product_description:
The Astalift Complete Make-Up Remover Oil deeply cleanses skin to remove excess sebum and the build up of dirt and impurities to leave you with a refreshed complexion. Created by FUJIFILM, Astalift is an award-winning beauty brand that uses advanced antioxidation technology, similar to that used to prevent colour fading in photographs, to help reduce premature skin ageing.
The non-greasy oil contains collagen, an important structural protein in the skin and a key ingredient used in photographic film, which works with Astaxanthin to effectively hydrate skin. FUJIFILM has taken its expertise of nanotechnology to develop colour in film, and applied it to the oil to allow high concentrations of nourishing ingredients to be penetrated into the skin. Experience smooth and radiant skin that is full of moisture. E.N.
name: Complete Make-Up Remover Oil (120ml)

product_description:
Achieve luscious lashes and intense colour with the Full Lash Volume Mascara from Shiseido. With a smudge-free formula and the brand's patented 360° Full Expression Brush®, the mascara allows precise application and curls and lifts eyelashes from the root to create an elegant fan effect.
Its exclusive, layerable Curl Up Wax dries instantly to set the curl and can be applied throughout the day without clumping to create a long-lasting look as dramatic or natural as you desire. Easily removed with water. E.N.
name: Full Lash Volume Mascara - Black

product_description:
Achieve a sun-kissed glow with Bourjois Sculpt Bronze; a dreamy, bronzing highlighter that enhances and illuminates a natural tan.
Boasting a silky gel formula infused with light-reflecting, pearlescent pigments, Sclupt Bronze visibly boosts a tan, whilst delivering a shimmering finish. To appear naturally sun-kissed, the bronzing liquid should be applied to areas of the face that are caressed by the sun, including the cheekbones, brow bones and forehead.
Expect an expertly sculpted complexion with an enviably radiant and luminous finish.
name: Sculpt Bronze 15ml

product_description:
Silky soft to the touch, Daniel Sandler Waterbrush is the perfect tool for applying Daniel Sandler's award winning Waterbase Foundations to your cheeks and cheekbones.
Daniel Sandler Waterbrush, made from taklon (revolutionary synthetic nylon), is specially designed for absolutely flawless application of base make-up and is the ultimate make-up artists’ must-have tool for an impeccable finish. Create a perfect canvas only with the best tools.
name: Sandler Waterbrush

product_description:
This Natio Eye Make-Up Remover is enriched with fresh floral waters of rose and chamomile to form a gorgeous, non-irritating lotion. Suitable for all skin types, this remover is ideal for use around the delicate eye contour area.
With a pH level closely matched to natural tears, this Natio Eye Make-Up Remover is a delicate cleanser that refreshes and removes all traces of eye make-up. Gentle and non-oily, this remover will leave your skin feeling as fresh as daisy.
Directions of use:
name: Eye Make-Up Remover (75ml)

product_description: Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the Creamy Matte Lipstick from Mellow Cosmetics. Gliding on effortlessly, the ultra-smooth lipstick delivers high-pigmented, moisturising colour with a long-wearing, velvety finish. Available in a range of shades.
colour: Blossom, Candy Floss, Chocolate, Danger Zone, Electro, Madness, New York, Nude, Passion, Posh
name: Cosmetics Creamy Matte Lipstick (Various Shades)

product_description:
Protect and perfect your pout with Maybelline's Baby Lips Vitamin Shot Lip Balm, a lip colour that combines moisturising benefits with a hint of fruity colour.
Drenching your lips in eight hour hydration, the vitamin-rich lip balm delivers comforting, moisturising properties whilst imparting a delicious, fruity scent. Lips look luscious, hydrated and naturally beautiful. - K.N.
name: Baby Lips Vitamin Shot Lip Balm - Melon Mania

product_description:
Eyelure Brow Ink in Dark Brown temporarily dyes the skin underneath your brows to fill in, define and help you to create a professional shape to your brows.
Allowing you to make a statement with your brows, the ink has a soft tip that makes the process of applying intense and even colour even easier. -SA
name: Brow Ink - Dark Brown

product_description:
Achieve a smooth, flawless make-up base with the Shiseido Synchro Skin Glow Luminizing Foundation; a lightweight, long-wearing formula that delivers up to eight hour hydration.
Developed with Advanced Sensing Technology, the liquid foundation works with the skin's tone and moisture levels throughout the day for a photo-ready complexion with a fresh, dewy finish.
Infused with a nourishing blend of Argan Oil, Yuzu Seed and antioxidant Wild Thyme Extract, the fluid, serum-like formula blends seamlessly onto skin to deliver buildable coverage with natural-looking, streak-free results. Helps to minimise the appearance of fine lines and enlarged pores, whilst restoring a youthful, luminous glow.
colour: Golden 3, Golden 4, Neutral 2, Neutral 3, Neutral 4, Rose 2, Rose 3, Rose 5
name: Synchro Skin Glow Luminizing Foundation 30ml (Various Shades)

product_description:
The Pixi Mesmerizing Mineral Palette in copper peach boasts six lavish gem-stone inspired hues that are perfect for all occasions. Super easy to apply and blendable, this palette comes complete with a double ended application sponge for a fuss free application.
The shimmery shades feature creamy formulas that stay put on the skin, meaning that your makeup will stay looking fresh all day and night! K.D.
name: Mesmerizing Mineral Palette - Copper Peach

product_description:
Achieve expertly sculpted eyebrows with the Bourjois Brow Palette in 02 Brown; a 3-in-1 compact that boasts a brow powder, eyebrow wax and a shimmering highlighter, alongside a convenient, double-ended brush applicator.
The coloured wax can be used to tame and discipline brows, whilst the powder formula should be used to fill in sparse areas and create a desired shape. Complete the look with the highlighter, which instantly illuminates and visibly lifts the brow bone, leaving brows sculpted, shaped and flawless.
name: Brow Palette - 02 Brown 3.2g

product_description:
Discover a new era of lipstick with the Bourjois Rouge Edition Velvet Lipstick in Poppy Days. Boasting a soft, melting texture, the liquid lipstick effortlessly glides over lips, assisted by the integrated wand applicator.
Enriched with evanescent oils, the silky formula delivers a smooth, second-skin feel with an undetectable texture. The lip colour will not strip essential moisture from lips, ensuring skin remains comfortable and hydrated, whilst flaunting a sensual hue.
Expect an ultra-lightweight finish, with velvety, on-trend matte results.
name: Rouge Edition Velvet Lipstick - Poppy Days 6.7ml

product_description:
Designed specifically for added length, Eylure Lashes Starter Kit No.118 (Lengthening) are for those wanting to create a longer lash look. - R.H
Ideal for beginners, the starter kit comes with a selection of tools for perfect application. The kit includes a silicone, tipped lash applicator, orange sticks for tweaking lash position and adding seperation and adhesive for multiple applications.
Kit contains: Naturalites exclusive corner lash, Naturalites 101, lash applicator, glue vials x2, orange sticks
name: Lashes Starter Kit No.118 (Lengthening)

product_description: Add sumptuous colour to your pout with Chantecaille's Lip Chic Lipstick. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid to plump the appearance of lips, the formula combines the high shine of a gloss with the smooth, even coverage of a lipstick. Gliding on effortlessly, Lip Chic delivers comfortable, long-wearing colour with a non-sticky, velvety soft finish.
name: Lip Chic Lipstick - Lily

product_description:
Expertly apply eyeshadows with the Spectrum Collections B06 Tall Tapered Blender Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘Blending Friend’ is the perfect tool for applying and blending eyeshadows seamlessly. The coveted blending brush is crafted with a super soft, fluffy brush head, which can create an array of eye-catching makeup looks, from soft and subtle, to smokey and defined.
Whether it’s blending out colour or building up hues, the tapered blender is an essential addition to any makeup brush collection.
name: Collections B06 Tall Tapered Blender Brush

product_description:
Seamlessly blend makeup with the brushworks Foundation Brush; a high-quality, flat brush that enables you to achieve professional looking results.
Suitable for both liquid and powder formulas, the soft, synthetic fibres have been shaped and designed to pick up the perfect amount of product to build smooth, even coverage, instantly veiling the appearance of blemishes and imperfections, with a rounded tip to reach every contour of your face.
Complete with an ergonomic handle for ultimate precision, the tool is a must have addition to any makeup collection for a flawless, airbrushed finish.
name: Foundation Brush

product_description: Add luscious colour to your pout with the Rouge Edition Souffle de Velvet Lipstick from Bourjois. With a silky smooth texture that glides on effortlessly, the long-wearing formula delivers non-drying, matte colour, whilst its cushioned tip applicator wand allows mistake-free application. Lips are left super soft, sumptuous and hydrated for up to ten hours.
colour: Carameli Melo, Cherry Leaders, Coquelic'oh!, Fucshiamallow, Orangélique, Plum Plum Pidou, Ravie En Rose, VIPeach
name: Rouge Edition Souffle de Velvet Lipstick (Various Shades)

product_description: Real Techniques present the Bold Metals Angled Liner Brush; a versatile brush ideal for adding depth to brows, blending eye shadow and helping you achieve ultimate precision when applying gel or liquid liners. Its weighted design features a firm, angled tip that fits close to the lash line for smooth, effortless application and creates beautifully defined eyes in an instant. E.N.
name: Techniques Bold Metals Angled Liner Brush

product_description:
Correct skin discolouration and dark spots with the Super Plus Beblesh Triple Functions Balm SPF50+ PA+++ 40g – Orange from Skin79. The balm functions as a high coverage BB cream, concealing and correcting pigmentation issues.
Boasting SPF50, the potent formula offers UVA and UVB protection to prevent any future skin damage, including discolouration. The transparent BB cream is enriched with Phytoshingosine and Ceramide, which combine to strengthen the skin’s protective barrier. Expect a smooth and brightened complexion, visibly free from damage.
name: Super Plus Beblesh Triple Functions Balm SPF50+ PA+++ 40g - Orange

product_description:
Enhance the look of your eyes with Chantecaille's Faux Cils Mascara, a water-resistant, volumising mascara that makes your eyelashes appear thicker, fuller and longer.
The amplifying formula blends a cocktail of natural waxes to help thicken the look of lashes, whilst its full bristled brush expertly grabs every lash to create a dramatic, wide-eyed makeup look. Rich in Mineral Salts and Red Seaweed extract, the mascara defines lashes to create a fuller, thicker appearance, and its dose of Vegetal Polymers ensure easy application.
name: Faux Cils Mascara

product_description:
Enhance the look of your skin with Laura Geller's Baked Body Frosting, a silky body bronzer that works to add a sunkissed glow to skin.
Housed in a large compact with easy-to-use applicator puff, the baked powder glides effortlessly over skin and delivers instant bronzed luminosity; its buildable formula allows you to customise your look - add a single layer for a subtle hint of radiance, or apply layer after layer to create more intense, sunkissed results.
The body frosting can be used both wet or dry; when used wet, it creates a more dramatic, diamond-like sheen on skin.
name: Geller Baked Body Frosting

product_description: Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion with the City Radiance Foundation from Bourjois. With a hydrating, lightweight and breathable formula that melts effortlessly onto skin for even coverage, the liquid foundation delivers long-wearing, natural-looking colour with a luminous glow, whilst providing SPF 30 to protect from pollution and harmful UV rays. Blendable and buildable, you can expect a fresh, streak-free finish with concealed imperfections. E.N.
colour: Beige, Golden Beige, Golden Sun, Light Beige, Rose Ivory, Vanilla
name: City Radiance Foundation (Various Shades)

product_description:
Line and define your lips with Rimmel 1000 Kisses Lip Liner, a long-wearing lip pencil with highly pigmented finish.
Gliding effortlessly across the lips with its blend of Capric Oil and Carnauba Wax, the pencil delivers a rich, creamy colour that feels comfortable on lips and lasts for eight hours. Perfect for outlining or filling the whole lips, the liner contains Mica particles to help prevent lipstick from feathering and bleeding, and Vitamin E for moisturising, antioxidant protection. Expect long-lasting, flawless and vibrant lips.
name: 1000 Kisses Lip Liner 1.2g (Various Shades)

product_description:
Define your eyes to the max with the Colossal Mascara in black from Maybelline's 'Volum' Express' collection. With an expert collagen formula and exclusive brush, the volumising mascara creates a plumped up look in just one stroke, filling out lashes up to nine times in volume for a lush, smudge-proof appearance.
Lashes will look fuller, longer and instantly volumised. - K.N.
name: Volum' Express Colossal Mascara - 100% Black

product_description:
Enhance your lips with the ModelCo Shine Lip Gloss in 'Showgirl Red', a shimmering, high shine lip lacquer that delivers a shock of beautifully reflective colour with long-lasting finish.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with its wand applicator, the non-sticky gloss imparts a soft colour tint and features an in-built mirror for flawless, on-the-go applications . Lips looks luscious and hydrated.
name: Shine Lip Gloss - Showgirl Red

product_description:
Achieve salon-style results from home with the butter LONDON Patent Shine 10X Nail Lacquer; a fade-resistant, fast-drying nail polish that applies effortlessly to deliver chip-resistant colour with a gel-like cushioned effect for up to ten days.
Fortified with patented Shock Resistant Polymer Technology to prevent chipping and peeling, its unique formula coats nails in a long-wearing bright coral crème with mirror-like shine, whilst its dense curved brush applicator allows full coverage for a professional finish. Infused with Bamboo Extract and Diamond Powder, the nail varnish promotes smoother, stronger and healthier nails with every use.
name: LONDON Patent Shine 10X Nail Lacquer 11ml - Trout Pout

product_description:
Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the butter LONDON Lippy Liquid; a long-wearing formula that combines the pigment of a lipstick with the shine of a gloss.
Infused with Shea Butter and antioxidant Vitamin E, the liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to moisturise and protect lips, whilst delivering non-drying colour with an ultra-glossy finish. Expect smooth, luscious lips that are subtly scented with delicious notes of Vanilla.
name: LONDON Lippy Liquid - Ladybird

product_description:
RMK Face Pop Eyes in 'Red Brown Beige' is a limited edition eyeshadow duo that has been specially curated in celebration of the brand's twentieth birthday.
Each striking eyeshadow (pink and neutral) delivers a shimmering finish that blends effortlessly on the lid. Wear each colour individually or blend together to create a bold or subtle makeup finish. Complete with a dual-ended sponge tip applicator.
name: Face Pop Eyes - Deep Brown Beige

product_description:
Make a bold and individual statement with Illamasqua’s Powder Eyeshadow in Cascade. Part of the Extinct collection, the powder shadow boasts an extremely long lasting formula to ensure all-night intensity and a highly pigmented finish.
Cascade is a frosty, white colour with an iridescent finish that adds a subtle, translucent blue shimmer to eyes. Wear alone with a delicate wash over the eyelids, or layer up and apply with a damp brush for a more solid colour finish.
name: Powder Eyeshadow - Cascade

product_description:
Achieve professional make-up looks with the Get Gilded Illuminating Palette from Laura Geller. Combining a dual-ended brush, lip gloss, baked blush and three shades of eyeshadow, the collection allows you to create salon-worthy results every time. Housed in a compact with built-in mirror.
Baked Color Intense Eye Shadow in 'Dolce', 'Honey' and 'Raisin'
Beginning as liquid pigments that are baked on terracotta tiles and hand-finished in Italy, the silky formulas blend effortlessly to deliver vibrant colour that won't smudge, fade or crease. Infused with antioxidant-rich White Tea Extract, Vitamin E and Jojoba Oil to nourish and protect the eyelids, you can expect high impact results that look fresh all day long.
Baked Blush in 'Gilded Nectar'
Add a pop of colour to your complexion. Infused with swirls of liquid pigments, the smooth, long-wearing blush glides effortlessly over skin and delivers a radiant flush of colour to cheeks. Its brightening properties enhance luminosity, and its dose of antioxidants, Centella Asiatica and White Tea Extracts, help to defend against environmental aggressors.
Color Luster Lip Gloss in 'Gilded Honey'
An ultra-moisturising formula that delivers light-to-medium coverage with a high-shine finish. Enriched with Kendi Oil and antioxidant Italian Tomato Extract, the lip gloss hydrates and protects lips to leave them soft, supple and comfortable all day long. Complete with a cushioned wand for mistake-free application.
Double-Ended Powder and Eyeshadow Brush
A multi-tasking tool with rounded and angled sides for effortless, precision application of eye make-up and powder. Perfect for applying base colour, or for buffing in the crease, the brush picks up and deposits the right amount of product each time for expertly defined results.
name: Geller Get Gilded Illuminating Palette

product_description:
Add a flush of colour to your complexion with the Trifle Cosmetics Cheek Parfait; a cream blush that applies effortlessly to deliver buildable, long-wearing colour.
Infused with Shea Butter and Coconut Oil, the blusher nourishes and protects skin, whilst enhancing natural radiance for a bright, lit-from-within make-up look. Simply sweep the colour directly onto the apples of your cheeks and blend with your fingertips.
name: Cosmetics Cheek Parfait - Marmalade 4g

product_description:
The fabulous, too-cute safari chic animal print Japonesque Bronzer Brush is a short stubby, high bristle density brush which gives you perfect application of bronzer and works very well for highlighters, face powders and mineral makeup application.
It has synthetic bristles that deliver exceptional results – every time.
Loved by makeup professionals and beauty enthusiasts alike!
name: Safari Chic Bronzer Brush

product_description: Achieve professional, flawless make-up looks with the Illamasqua Round Buffing Brush; a versatile tool with high quality synthetic bristles that are suitable for all skin types. Ideal for applying highlighter or foundation, the brush features a soft domed head to buff product into the skin, creating an even, polished finish.
name: Round Buffing Brush

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your cheeks with the Illamasqua Cheek Brush, a rounded blusher brush with soft, synthetic bristles.

Perfect for applying cream and powder products to cheeks, the makeup tool helps deliver a natural flush of colour to the face. Sweep the brush across the contours and apples of your cheeks to achieve a rosy, radiant glow.

Hypoallergenic. Suitable for all skin types. Cruelty-free.
name: Cheek Brush

product_description: With an endless array of colours, the Bellapierre Cosmetics Shimmer  9Stack Pandera contains a selection of multi-purpose pigments that can be  used as eyeshadows, mixed with lipgloss, or even added to your cheeks  for a pop of quirky colour. Easy to apply, they'll keep you looking  sparkly from morning until night. - L.M.
name: Cosmetics Shimmer 9Stack Pandera

product_description:
Infuse your skin with RMS Beauty Oil, a pure, multi-purpose elixir that strikes the perfect balance between skin and oil.
Its lightweight yet highly concentrated formula promotes skin radiance and antioxidant protection; its dose of exotic oils, including nutrient-rich Buriti Oil, and in-house-sourced herbal extracts work in synergy to hydrate, illuminate and protect the skin.
Expect a healthy looking complexion with restored radiance.
name: Beauty Oil (30ml)

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the PUPA Maxy Powder Brush, a multi-tasking makeup brush for applying bronzers and powders to the face and body.
Handmade in Italy, the brush is fitted with synthetic bristles and offers a full, rounded shape for professional results. Ideal for adding bronzer all over the face, setting makeup in place with powder or illuminating the body with a highlighter. The soft bristles feel comfortable on skin and deliver flawless and even application.
name: Maxy Powder Brush

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your lips with the PUPA Lip Brush, a tapered makeup brush that expertly applies and blends lip colour with expert results.
Handmade in Italy, the brush is fitted with 100% natural marten bristles and has been designed with a tapered shape for maximum precision; it hugs the contours of the lips for a professional finish.
name: Lip Brush

product_description:
Achieve flawless brows with the glo minerals Brow Quad in Taupe. Host to a combination of products, the quad boasts everything you need to ensure brows are on point. The taupe quad is ideal for those with a fair hair colour.
The sleek black compact contains two brow powder hues, which can be used to customise the perfect shade to suit the natural brow. The brow powders work to fill, shape and define brows, transforming those that are sparse and enhancing any others.
The quad also houses a translucent eyebrow wax, which can be used on the finished brow to hold hairs in place for a long-lasting finish. The final product is a highlighter, this can be used to illuminate the brow bone, as well as other areas of the face.
Used in synergy, the products deliver defined yet natural-looking brows that will stay perfect all day.
name: minerals Brow Quad - Taupe

product_description:
Groom and perfect unruly brows with the PUPA Eyebrow Design Set. Custom tailored to suit individual shades, the comprehensive eyebrow tool kit contains everything you need to pluck, preen and shape for gorgeously defined arches – all conveniently housed in a mirrored compact for on-the-move applications.
The mini tweezers allow you to remove excess hair for the ideal starting point, while the subtly pigmented setting wax locks stray hairs into place without feeling sticky. Fortified with spherical polymers, the coloured compact powder offers a silky-soft texture and buildable coverage, working to fill in sparse gaps and add enhanced structure, with the double tipped applicator featuring a comb and angled brush for flawless looking results.
name: Eyebrow Design Set - Brown

product_description:
The Contour Cosmetics Lip Contour Kit combines a creamy lip liner with a matte liquid lipstick for luscious lips in an instant.
Paired for the perfect shade combination, the lip liner ensures clean and precise definition, with the intensely pigmented lipstick gliding across the lip for true colour pay off and an on-trend matte finish. Presented in gorgeous packaging, the set is ideal for on-the-go glamour.
name: Cosmetics Lip Contour Kit - JuJu

product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with Vincent Longo's La Riviera Sun Matte Bronzer; a multi-tonal, compact bronzer pressed into a unique pattern for warm, natural-looking colour with a long-lasting matte finish.
Suitable for all skin tones, the blendable powder can be applied to the entire face for a sun-kissed glow, or to targeted areas, such as the cheekbones, brow bones and centre of the nose to create a sculpted, defined make-up look. Infused with antioxidant Vitamin E to nourish and protect, the bronzer delivers the perfect balance of red and brown tones to enhance the skin's luminosity.
name: Longo La Riviera Sun Matte Bronzer 5g - Sun-Drenched

product_description:
Eylure have collaborated with Youtube beauty sensation, Fleur de Force, to create a sculpting Brow Palette in 'Dark'.
The custom-mix brow kit combines a two-tone powder shadow with an illuminating highlighter for expertly filling, defining and enhancing your natural eyebrows. The waterproof brow powder combines a dark and light shade that you can blend together to achieve the perfect, individual colour for your brow tone, or use each hue independently; use the darker shade for adding depth, and the lighter shade for subtle shaping or filling sparse areas.
The illuminating highlighter is perfect for accentuating the brow bone and arch, and can even be used to add light and dimension to the inner corner of the eyes. Long-lasting, waterproof and smudge-proof.
name: x Fleur de Force Brow Palette - Dark

product_description:
Accentuate your pout with Vincent Longo's Duo Lip Pencil; a dual-ended pencil that combines two complementary shades of creamy, long-wearing colour.
Sharpening to a fine point without breakage, the precision pencil glides on effortlessly for controlled, mistake-free application. Ideal as a lip liner or full lip colour, it helps to reduce feathering whilst delivering vitamin-rich, smudge-resistant colour with a smooth, comfortable finish.
name: Longo Duo Lip Pencil 1.8g - Roseberry/Spring Rose

product_description:
Prolong and intensify your eye makeup with PÜR Get a Grip Endurance Eyeshadow Primer, a high performance formula that locks makeup in place whilst laying the foundation for smooth, flawless eyeshadow application.
Infused with Agave which locks in hydration, the primer glides effortlessly across the lids, drying clear and smoothing the skin ready for product. Locking makeup in place, it will extend eyeshadow wear, resisting creasing and fading for an intense and long-lasting, vibrant finish. Can also be applied under the eye to prolong the wear of concealer, eyeshadow or eyeliner. Suitable for all skin tones.
name: Get a Grip Endurance Eyeshadow Primer 8.5g

product_description:
Create flawless eye makeup looks with PÜR Airbrush Blending Crease Brush.
Fitted with soft, slightly dense, synthetic bristles for maximum control, the flexible makeup brush is perfect for layering and blending eyeshadows; it expertly buffs and diffuses harsh lines for seamless, professionally blended results.
name: Airbrush Blending Crease Brush

product_description:
Achieve a flawless base with PÜR Sculpt and Contour Foundation Brush.
The tapered brush features dense, synthetic fibres for controlled, expert application. Ideal for defining and sculpting your complexion, the makeup brush delivers the perfect amount of product; it applies and blends without smudging foundation, so you can contour for a chiselled, professional finish. Apply around the edge of the face, along the cheekbones and across jawline for expert results.
name: Sculpt and Contour Foundation Brush

product_description:
ModelCo have collaborated with American model, Hailey Baldwin, to create the Perfect Brows Pencil & Clear Gel Duo; a two-step brow enhancer that allows you to create enviable arches with ease.
Featuring a precision tip, the soft wax pencil fills in sparse brows with natural, hair-like colour, whilst the high-gloss gel and spoolie brush tame, groom and set eyebrows in place for a perfectly defined, professional finish. Brows appear thicker, fuller and denser.
name: Perfect Brows Pencil & Clear Gel Duo - Medium/Dark

product_description:
ModelCo have collaborated with American model, Hailey Baldwin, to create the Coconut Luxe 100% Natural Beauty Oil; a multi-purpose oil to nourish and hydrate the face, body and hair.
Lightweight and fast-absorbing, the non-greasy formula utilises an antioxidant-rich blend of Coconut, Marula, Macadamia and Sweet Almond Oils to moisturise and condition skin, whilst helping to improve elasticity and minimise the appearance of stretch marks.
Ideal as a firming massage oil, replenishing post-sun treatment or restorative hair oil to combat split ends and dryness. Expect a soft, smooth body and strong, healthy-looking locks with a luxurious, rejuvenating fragrance.
name: Coconut Luxe 100% Natural Beauty Oil

product_description:
Accentuate your favourite facial features with The Filter Contour & Glow Powder from ModelCo's collaboration with American model, Hailey Baldwin.
Combining two micro-fine pigmented powders, the convenient compact houses a bronze shade to contour and add dimension, and a light pearl shade to illuminate and highlight for a soft-focus effect.
Sweep over the face to create a natural, sun-kissed glow and a sculpted, contoured make-up look with an undetectable finish. Ideal for all skin tones.
name: The Filter Contour & Glow Powder

product_description:
Line and define your peepers with the butter LONDON Wink Eye Pencil; an ultra-smooth eyeliner that glides effortlessly across the lid, without pulling on the delicate skin. The eye pencil arrives with a sharp point that can be used to produce clean and precise lines to enhance the eyes. The smooth formula can also be smudged and blended out for a smokey and sultry-looking finish.
Once applied, the long-wearing eyeliner sets firmly into place to ensure eyes remain flawlessly defined all day, however busy your lifestyle is.
name: LONDON Wink Eye Pencil Brown Sugar 1.2g

product_description:
Protect and perfect the complexion with the SAMPAR Crazy Cream in Tan; a lightweight, tinted moisturiser that delivers long lasting hydration, whilst protecting the visage from photo-ageing UV rays. The silky formula glides onto skin, absorbing quickly to deliver an essential veil of moisture.
Utilising a Hydrocomplex, the Crazy Cream ensures skin appears supple, firm and comfortably hydrated, whilst the addition of Adenosine boosts skin’s collagen levels to assist in reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The moisturiser also boasts Smart Sun Prevention to shield the complexion from harmful UV’s and in turn prevent signs of sun damage and photo-ageing.
Offering both skincare and makeup benefits, the tinted formula perfects the complexion with its tan hue, which is ideal for medium skin tones. The product can be worn alone for a naturally flawless-looking finish, or can function as an effective base for a makeup routine. However the product is used, the Crazy Cream guarantees to deliver a radiant and unified finish.
name: Crazy Cream - Tan 30ml

product_description:
Create subtle or defined makeup looks with Pupa's IL Principino in 'Cool Shades', a portable eye and lip palette combining four eyeshadows with a creamy lipstick and lip gloss.
Housed in a novelty, frog-shaped compact with built-in mirror, the palette (from the brand's 'This is a Love Story' collection) features four cool, neutral-toned eyeshadows that deliver highly pigmented, easy-to-blend colour, and two luscious lip colours to create a glossy, fuller-looking pout.
Perfect for popping in your handbag, it is equipped with a sponge tip applicator with regal gold crown detail.
name: IL Principino Eye and Lip Palette - Cool Shades

product_description:
Achieve a salon-worthy manicure from home with the Elegant Touch Trend Nails; a pack of stiletto false nails from the brand's After Dark Collection.
Created with super-flex technology, the flexible, easy-to-apply nails are comfortable to wear, and remove effortlessly without damaging natural nails. Complete with fast-drying glue, you can expect long-wearing, chip-free nails that can be filed into any shape.
Includes:
24 pack of nails, 10 sizes.
Glue, buffer and instruction leaflet.
name: Touch Trend After Dark Nails - Grey Metallic/Tipped Stiletto/Silver Lining

product_description:
Achieve a flawless, radiant makeup look with Lancôme Teint Miracle Cushion Foundation in '035', a buildable liquid foundation housed in a refillable compact with innovative, cushion release technology.
Delivering buildable coverage with a fresh, dewy finish, the foundation blends effortlessly onto skin to camouflage imperfections and promote a more even, radiant skin tone. The cushion delivery system ensures mess-free, easy application; simply touch to activate, then apply to skin with a patting motion to create a naturally flawless effect. The foundation is equipped with a Fresh Touch Puff, an advanced applicator that enables maximum control when picking up product, and feels cooling on contact with skin. 
Portable and refillable, its the perfect every day makeup.
name: Teint Miracle Cushion Foundation - 035

product_description:
Add a pop of wearable colour to your lips with butter LONDON Sheer Wisdom Lip Oil in 'Rich Nutmeg', a cocoa lip colour that deeply nourishes and revitalises your pout.
The makeup-meets-skincare formula combines a host of beneficial ingredients that work in synergy to condition, moisturise and protect your lips, all while imparting a beautiful, glossy hue. Gliding effortlessly onto lips, the melting, creamy oil fuses Tahitian Coconut Oil with Chia Seed Oil and Amino Acids to nourish, revitalise and firm the appearance of lips. It delivers a sheer colour whilst providing anti-ageing and antioxidant benefits. Lips feel intensely pampered and luscious.
name: LONDON Sheer Wisdom Lip Oil 2.5ml - Rich Nutmeg

product_description:
Create a neutral eye makeup look with the butter LONDON Sheer Wisdom Serum Eye Shadow in 'Maplewood', a natural-looking eyeshadow that combines the benefits of makeup with anti-ageing skincare.
Delivering a neutral hue with satin-matt finish, the eyeshadow contains a blend of anti-ageing peptides to help improve the appearance of wrinkles, and Spherical Polymers for a smoothing effect. Gliding effortlessly onto lids, the uniquely textured eyeshadow transforms from a fluid serum to a light powder, imparting high performance pigments with a subtle wash of colour that resists creasing for a flawless, natural makeup look. It blends easily and adheres seamlessly to the lids. Perfect worn alone or as a primer for other eyeshadows.
name: LONDON Sheer Wisdom Serum Eye Shadow 4ml - Maplewood

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Mavala Lipstick in 'Hibiscus'.
Gliding effortlessly across lips in a uniform layer, the lightweight lipstick delivers a rich, creamy hue that won't settle into fine lines. Its long-lasting coverage ensures lips feel comfortable all day, even if prone to dryness. Ideal for dry or sensitive lips, the lip colour helps protect against dryness for a healthy, supple-looking pout.
name: Lipstick - Hibiscus 4g

product_description:
Korean-based skincare brand, Skin79, present the Smart Derma Mild Shining BB Cream; a triple-function formula that works to brighten, smoothen and protect skin.
Fortified with Allantoin, Elderflower Extract and Centella Asiatica, the radiance-renewing blemish balm combats dull, uneven skin, whilst Nordenau Water (recognised as Germany's healing water) delivers intense moisture and provides anti-ageing benefits to help minimise the appearance of wrinkles. Its SPF shields from the sun's damaging UVA and UVB rays and strengthens the skin's natural barrier function to reveal perfected, rebalanced complexion with restored luminosity.
name: Smart Derma Mild BB Cream S (Shining) SPF30 PA+++ 40ml

product_description: Experiment and create the perfect brows with the Shiseido Eyebrow Styling Compact in deep brown. This compact kit contains two dark brown powders and a double-sided applicator for you to mix and blend to your desired look. Complete with a mirror inside the compact, you can pop the palette into your handbag and touch up your brows on the go. - K.R
name: Eyebrow Styling Compact GY901 4g

product_description: Perfect for use on the eyes, face and lips, Erno Laszlo Multi-Phase Makeup Remover will gently remove all traces of makeup, without tugging on your skin. Boasting a soothing and hydrating formula, it contains nourishing cucumber and aloe extracts to relieve your skin, whilst a blend of herbal anti-inflammatories soften the skin and defend it against free radicals. - L.M.
name: Laszlo Multi-Phase Makeup Remover (6.8oz)

product_description: Make your eyes the centre of attention with the Shiseido Luminizing Satin Eye Color Trio in Opera. Featuring three stunning shades, the eyeshadow palette comes with a brush and a sponge applicator for easy application no matter where you are. The silky smooth eyeshadows will glide effortlessly onto your eyelids, whilst blending seamlessly for a professional finish. - L.M.
name: Luminizing Satin Eye Color Trio GD804 - Opera 3g

product_description: Expertly define your eyes with Maybelline's Big Eyes; a compact palette that combines a light-catching primer and three eye shadow powders in complementing shades. Blendable and buildable, the silky primer creates the perfect base for eye shadow application, whilst the powders allow you to create a contoured effect and illuminate your eyes with ease. Complete with a dual-ended cushioned wand.
name: Big Eyes Eye Shadow 5g (Various Shades)

product_description:
Treat your skin to the nourishing properties of Elizabeth Arden's Limited Edition Eight Hour Skin Protectant; a classic cream that became an instant success after its creation in 1930. 
Enriched with a combination of Petrolatum (a skin-soothing Beta-Hydroxy), and Vitamin E, the smoothing and restorative formula works to relieve, protect and comfort dry, cracked skin; it helps to ease redness and minor skin irritations, including scrapes and abrasions. Its softening and hydrating properties help to calm and restore wanting skin, and its anti-inflammatory benefits ensure chapped, cracked skin feels restored and replenished. Perfect for dry skin, sunburn and chapped lips, the apricot-coloured balm is a multi-purpose moisturiser that keeps skin soft and protected.
Housed in limited edition packaging.
name: Arden Eight Hour Limited Edition Skin Protectant 50ml

product_description: The NUDESTIX Concealer Pencil helps to remove marks, spots and other blemishes from your skin. The Concealer Pencil provides a matte finish. It contains vitamin E and shea butter, which can help your skin hydrate and moisturise, restoring your complexion. It is ideal to revitalise your appearance on the go or to touch up your make-up. The Concealer Pencil can be used with all skin tones. It can be used to highlight your features or to give you a fresh-faced appearance. NUDESTIX pencils are preservative-free and were not tested on animals. They come with antioxidant and moisturising ingredients that can revitalise your skin.
name: Concealer Pencil

product_description: Highlight and conceal with the Contour Cosmetics 01 Sculpting Brush, perfectly shaped for precise makeup application. Featuring soft and flexible synthetic fibres, the small brush enables you to apply cream and powder formulas with expert precision. Use it to conceal discolouration in hard to reach crevices or draw meticulous contour lines and achieve immaculately sculpted cheekbones. Completely cruelty free, the sculpting brush is a must have tool for a professional finish.
name: Cosmetics 01 Sculpting Brush

product_description: Perfect your pout with the Summer Shades Lipstick from Rimmel's Kate Moss collection. With a smooth, creamy texture, the lipstick glides effortlessly onto lips to deliver a long-wearing, high impact colour. Get instant sumptuous lips with its non-drying, light-reflecting formula. Choose from a range of shades to find your favourite colour for the Summer season. E.N.
name: Kate Summer Shades Lipstick (Various Colours)

product_description:
Define and curl your lashes with Sigma's Sinuosity Lash Mascara, a waterproof mascara with long-lasting, 13 hour wear.
With a curved, moulded plastic wand to create incredible shape, the eye-opening mascara intensifies and lifts the appearance of your eyelashes; boosting body and creating drama. Its intense black formula effortlessly coats lashes from root to tip, lifting upwards and outwards with its even bristles for a high impact, smudge and flake resistant finish. Lashes are enviably curled and lifted.
name: Sinuosity Lash Mascara

product_description:
Line and define your lips with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Liner, a water resistant lip formula that works to define and plump the appearance of your pout.
Infused with filling spheres that help to add volume to lips and reduce the appearance of wrinkles, the lip liner applies effortlessly, and blends seamlessly with its built-in brush. Delivering true colour that never bleeds or feathers, the lip liner can be worn alone, or layered beneath your favourite lipstick for maximum colour and staying power.
name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Liner - Really Rose

product_description:
Add definition and depth to your eyes with Christian BRETON Eyeshadow, a range of soft, silky eye colours in individual pots.
Perfect for adding subtle colour or dramatic intensity to your eyes, the eyeshadows glide effortlessly onto the lid, delivering perfect coverage and blending seamlessly for long-lasting delicate, smokey or bold makeup looks. Can be applied wet or dry depending on desired finish.
colour: Gold Brown, Harmony, Natural, Pearl, Pink Diamond, Rose, Smoke
name: BRETON Eyeshadow 2g (Various Shades)

product_description:
Perfect your complexion with the Chantecaille Total Concealer; an innovative gel formula that blends seamlessly onto skin to deliver a natural-looking, flawless finish.
Blending Olive and Tamanu Nut Oils, the weightless concealer nourishes and hydrates skin, whilst Chamomile, Green Tea and Orchid Extract hide dark circles, blemishes and imperfections. Softens the appearance of fine lines and evens out skin tone for a smooth, photo-ready complexion.
name: Total Concealer

product_description:
Add depth and dimension to your eyes with RMK's Classic Film Eyes; a water-based formula that blends effortlessly to deliver a long-wearing, metallic finish.
With a unique liquid texture that transforms into smooth powder upon application, 'The Silver Screen Collection' eyeshadow creates a smooth veil on the lids, allowing you to enhance natural beauty with picture-perfect colour, inspired by the nostalgia of classic Hollywood cinema.
name: Classic Film Eyes (Various Shades)

product_description: Add sumptuous colour to your pout with Sigma's Lip Eclipse Liquid Lipstick. With a high pigmented formula and cushioned tip applicator, the opaque liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to deliver a magenta pink hue with a long-lasting, silky smooth finish.
colour: London Girl, Rosette, Seal of Approval, She Knows the Ropes, Sigma Pink
name: Lip Eclipse Liquid Lipstick (Various Shades)

product_description: Perfect your pout with the Moisture Renew Sheer and Shine Lipstick from Rimmel. Packed with vitamins A, C and E, its deeply hydrating formula delivers long-wearing, sumptuous colour, whilst softening and protecting lips to leave you with a trend-setting smile.
name: Moisture Renew Sheer and Shine Lipstick (4g) (Various Shades)

product_description: A high pigment colour that lasts for 24 hours without fading. Bourjois Colour Band Eyeshadows are soft and creamy in texture, allowing an effortless application. The crayon form tool enables a glide movement for precision and blending of colour. Perfect for day and night glamour, this eyeshadow is long lasting, even after a tiring day at work. E.N.
name: Colour Band Eyeshadow

product_description:
Douse your pout in Illamasqua Vanitas Matte Lipstick, an intensely pigmented lip colour with creamy, matt finish.
Gliding effortlessly across the lips, the long-wearing lipstick delivers immediate colour pay off that stays put for all-night perfection. Its versatile, matt colour can be applied lightly and worn as a lip stain with all-day staying power. Achieve professionally, perfected lips.
name: Vanitas Matte Lipstick (Various Shades)

product_description:
Intensify your eyes with this gorgeous Endless Silky Eye Pen from Pixi. A long-wearing, waterproof eye pen that gives you the effect of a liquid liner with an increase ease of application.
No smudge or budge formulas means that your look remains flawless and beautiful all day long. No retouch required with this innovative, intelligent liner.
Benefits:
-Vitamin E nourishes and protects delicate skin
colour: Black Blue, Black Noir, Deep Plum, Oyster Glow
name: Endless Silky Eye Pen

product_description: Add depth and definition to your eyes with Cream Pigment from Illamasqua. Crease-proof and water-resistant, the long-wearing, matte eyeshadow glides on effortlessly to deliver buildable, highly pigmented colour with superior payoff, allowing you to create results as natural or dramatic as desired with a professional finish. Can also be used on the face, lips and body for versatile make-up look.
name: Cream Pigment

product_description:
Achieve a flawless, younger-looking complexion with Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Lift and Firm Concealer, a lightweight, full coverage concealer with luminous finish.
With an ultra-creamy texture that feels comfortable on skin, the makeup blends seamlessly to help camouflage dark circles and imperfections whilst performing a lifting and firming effect with innovative Cellular Plumping Technology. Utilising a Ceramide Triple Complex, the intelligent concealer helps to strengthen and re-texturise skin, retaining vital moisture for a plumped-up, younger-looking face. Its micro-fine light diffusers help create a soft focus effect which expertly blurs away imperfections and fine lines; targeting deep wrinkles, puffiness and under eye circles to promote a smoother, re-densified, brighter-looking complexion.
Helping to perfect and protect your complexion, the crease-proof concealer expertly smoothens and evens the appearance of skin whilst shielding from potentially ageing, external factors with its blend of antioxidant-rich vitamins A, C and E.
name: Arden Ceramide Lift and Firm Concealer (5.5ml)

product_description:
Prepare your lips for the application of lipstick with the Bellapierre Cosmetics Lip Pencils - Various shades. Made from 100% pure mineral pigments that are kind to the delicate skin on your lips, the nautral botanical waxes such as jojoba, safflower and vitamin E create waterproof wear so the colour stays in place even after eating or drinking.
Available in four fantastic shades ranging from subtle and natural to dramatic and daring, the pencils are easy to control and apply, meaning creating wonderful lip definition has never been easier. - L.M.
name: Cosmetics Lip Pencils - Various shades

product_description:
Create endless make-up looks with the NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip and Cheek Pencil; a creamy, versatile formula that can be used as a lipstick, lip liner and blush.
Waterproof and long-wearing, the pencil glides on effortlessly to deliver smooth, high pigmented colour with a matte finish, whilst preventing feathering for up to six hours. Lips feel comfortable and hydrated, and cheeks are defined with a flush of natural-looking colour.
Eco-packaged in a collectible tin with a pencil sharpener and mirror for mistake-free application.
name: Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil - Various Shades

product_description:
The make-up essential for a trendsetting smile. Get instant sumptuous lips with this LipLift Max lip plumper from Pixi, a brand who create skin-loving products to give you a flawless finish in fuss-free minutes. Its unique formula is infused with peptides which add a burst of volume to make lips look fuller, and jojoba oil to enhance moisture and hydrate lips. Aloe and chamomile work to soothe and soften lips, whilst adding shine to your smile. The precision pen tip glides on for effortless application and the refreshing mint flavour leaves your lips with a cooling sensation. E.N.
Directions for use: Wear alone as a plumping treatment, or over any lip colour for a glossy finish.
name: LipLift Max - Petal Ice

product_description:
Create a range of eye makeup looks with the Stila Matte 'N Metal Eye Shadow Palette, a neutral eyeshadow palette filled with 12 complementary matt and shimmer eyeshadows.
The versatile palette combines six matt hues with six metallic shades, enabling you to create a range of looks that add subtle depth or bold definition to the eyes. From matt brown to rose gold; pewter to bronze, each carefully selected shadow is triple-milled and blends seamlessly on the lid, delivering true-colour pigment with an intense finish. Their soft texture imparts high impact, long-lasting results in one sweep. Can be used wet or dry depending on desired intensity.
Housed in a mirrored compact.
Vintage (Matt Pale Neutral Pink)
Velvet (Matt Pale Pink)
Feathered (Matt Pale Sand)
Fringe (Matt Light Taupe)
Suede (Matt Mid-Tone Mauve Pink)
Velour (Matt Mid-Tone Warm Tan)
Bohemian (Metallic Light Pewter)
Retro (Metallic Rose Gold)
Sequin (Metallic Gold)
Smolder (Metallic Smoky Gunmetal)
Sizzle (Metallic Rosy Copper)
Flare (Metallic Cool Bronze)
name: Matte 'N Metal Eye Shadow Palette 12g

product_description: Define your lips and prevent lipstick from feathering with FACE Stockholm’s Lipliner. Available in an array of rich colours, the lip pencil will enhance and complement your choice of lipstick or lip gloss. – E.W.
name: Stockholm Lipliner 2g

product_description: Accentuate your eyes with the Brow Pencil and Highlighter Duo from Lottie London. Featuring a dual-ended design, the pencil combines a highlighter to illuminate brow bones, and a hair-like colour to enhance natural shape and fill in sparse eyebrows. Adds dimension to your face for a professional eye make-up look.
name: London Brow Pencil and Highlighter Duo - Medium

product_description:
Restore moisture to dry lips with the Hurraw! Grapefruit Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
The refreshing balm is enriched with a skin-loving blend of Coconut Oil, Cocoa Seed Butter and Olive Oil, which deliver a nourishing veil of hydration to lips, with long-lasting effect. Enveloping skin in a zesty grapefruit fragrance, the twist-up stick ensures lips feel fruity and fresh.
Complete with a sheer pink tint, the lip balm drenches lips in essential moisture, whilst delivering a sheer gloss for a bright and healthy-looking finish.
name: Grapefruit Lip Balm 4.3g

product_description: The secret to flawless skin is the  amount of light that bounces off the surface. Elizabeth Arden's best-selling foundation now uses diamonds to reflect light, instantly  diminish discolourations and fine lines to-give you a perfectly even,  radiant finish that lasts 12 hours.
colour: Bronzed Beige, Cognac, Deep Amber, Gentle Beige, Honey Beige, Mahogany, Perfect Beige, Porcelain Beige, Softly Beige, Softly Beige 1, Toast, Toasty Beige, Vanilla, Vanilla Shell
name: Arden Flawless Finish Sponge On Cream Makeup (23g)

product_description:
A kiss of colour and pearlised shine add a hint of glamour to our world famous lip balm.
Condition, smooth & highlight your lips with our wonderful selection of twelve shimmering shades. Luminescent earth pigments add a hint of colour to our natural beeswax lip balm to give your lips the lift they need.
Nourish and moisturise your lips with natural ingredients like vitamin E and coconut and sunflower oils.
It's time to pucker up with shimmery colour.
name: Bees Lip Shimmer - Peony 2.6 g

product_description:
A large, ultra-soft custom shaped brush, this Natio Powder Brush is ideal to lightly dust powder, pressed powder and bronzer over the face to leave your complexion looking flawless all day long.
This Natio Powder Brush disperses pigment evenly and smoothly while feeling gorgeous against your skin. Ensure a professional-looking finish every time you apply your make-up with this high quality brush from Natio.
name: Powder Brush

product_description: The Shiseido Perfect Foundation Brush will effortlessly apply liquid, cream and powder foundations. Made using traditional Japanese brush-making techniques to create the perfect foundation finish, the makeup brush has gently tapered bristles which allow you to reach all of your facial contours. The shirt handle will also allow for greater control during application. - L.M.
name: Perfect Foundation Brush

product_description:
Say hello to beautiful, even skin with Elizabeth Arden Flawless Finish Ultra Smooth Pressed Powder 8.5g. Wonderfully lightweight, it gives skin a silky-smooth finish that lasts all day, without caking or settling in fine lines.
A fantastic multi-tasker, the powder can be used alone for small touch-ups throughout the day, or over the top of foundation to minimise shine and tone down cheek colour. Dermatologically tested, the long-wearing formula will give you a wonderfully radiant complexion that lasts from morning until night. Directions of Use:Apply using a large brush, either to bare skin or over foundation.
name: Arden Flawless Finish Ultra Smooth Pressed powder 8.5g

product_description:
Eyelure Brow Control and Shape Gel helps you to stay in control of your brows to create a well-groomed look. Featuring a taming brush and long-lasting fixer gel, the formula holds your shape throughout the day.
The gel is enriched with Aloe Vera, Panthenol, Nettle Leaf Extract and ProCircul8, so you can keep the perfect eyebrow look for longer. -SA
name: Brow Control and Shape Gel

product_description: Add luxurious definition to your peepers with Eylure's 'Bauble' False Eyelashes from The Luxe Collection. Super soft, lightweight and reusable, the tapered, silk-effect lashes are perfect for any occasion; their full and velvety design with soft tips lend your eyes a wide-eyed effect whilst still being wearable. Perfect for a glamorous look. Glossy and long-lasting.
name: The Luxe Collection False Eyelashes - Bauble

product_description: Create a Hollywood glow with Scott Barnes Body Bling Original (120ml) . The 24-hour tinted body moisturiser gives a subtle tone with a smooth naturally illuminated finish that makes the face and body look fabulous for longer.The moisturiser instantly warms the skin tone providing shimmery highlights that stay on the surface of the skin. -SA
name: Barnes Body Bling Original (120ml)

product_description:
Enjoy luminous, moisturised, even skin and a golden glow with Caudalie Teint Divin Mineral Tinted Moisturiser for Medium To Dark Skin. Mineral based pigments, grape-seed polyphenols and shea butter leave skin with a natural, healthy sun kissed look.
Specially formulated for dark skins, Caudalie Teint Divin Mineral Tinted Moisturiser for Medium To Dark Skin gives your complexion a flattering, year round glow. Rich in antioxidants from grape-seed polyphenols and soothing, plumping moisturisation from hyaluronic acid, this nourishing skin treat improves the overall appearance of your complexion. Non-comedogenic and suitable for all skin types, this delicate moisturiser has a warm, floral fragrance reminiscent of summer days.
Directions of use:
name: Teint Divin Mineral Tinted Moisturizer - Medium To Dark Skin

product_description:
Perfect your complexion with the Cream Colour Correcting Palette from Lottie London. Combining four creamy, blendable formulas, the kit helps to diminish the appearance of common skin concerns.
Housed in a chic compact with a convenient mirror, the palette includes a mint green shade to minimise redness and blemishes, a lilac shade to brighten dull, lack-lustre skin, an orange hue to banish under-eye circles and a yellow tone to combat pigmentation and signs of fatigue.
Expect a smooth, flawless finish and an even, balanced skin tone.
name: London Cream Colour Correcting Palette 16.8g

product_description: L'Oréal Paris presents the Mega Volume Miss Hippie Waterproof Mascara, with an intense, collagen-rich formula that works to instantly volumise and thicken the look of lashes without clumping, smudging or running. The super fuzzy brush features kaleidoscopic bristles, which coat each individual lash layer by layer for a bold, feathery finish. Apply to top and bottom lashes for that effortless retro look, perfect for festivals.
name: Paris Mega Volume Collagene Waterproof Mascara - Miss Hippie Black 01

product_description:
Perfect for every mood, outfit or occasion, The Delectable Eyeshadow Palette from Laura Geller combines fourteen crease-resistant shades that can be applied wet or dry to expertly define your eyes.
Combining the long-wearing benefits of a primer with luxurious colours of pure Baked pigments, the eyeshadows can be worn alone or blended together to create endless make-up looks with superior staying power. Melting effortlessly onto the lids for smooth, even application, the palette is complete with an integrated mirror and dual-ended brush.
name: Geller The Delectable Eyeshadow Palette with Brush - Delicious Shades of Cool

product_description:
Create an array of makeup looks with the Real Techniques Enhanced Eye Brush Set; a five-piece collection that covers any makeup addict’s needs. The set contains an array of brushes for expert eyeshadow application, as well as a brush tailored to eyeliner and a comb for volumising lashes. Delivering professional looking results, you can expect enviably enhanced eyes.
Medium Shadow Brush
Apply eyeshadow with ease using the Medium Shadow Brush. Crafted with a wide and flat brush head with tapered bristles, the makeup brush softly sweeps a wash of colour onto the lid. Suitable for both powder and cream eyeshadows, the shadow brush also blends product effortlessly.
Essential Crease Brush
Add depth to the eye with the Essential Crease Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush with an intelligent, tapered design. The synthetic brush is able to reach into the crease of the eye, blending powdered or cream eyeshadows for a seamless finish.
Fine Liner Brush
Expertly line and define your peepers with the Fine Liner Brush; the ultimate precision tool. Working with both cream and liquid eyeliners, the brush glides across the eye, evenly distributing product for an ultra-precise finish.
Shading Brush
Achieve a bold eye makeup look with the sleek purple Shading Brush. The brush boasts a dense brush head with short bristles that are ideal for packing colour onto the lid, yet still providing even distribution. Expect intense colour pay off.
Lash Separator
Reveal full and flattering lashes using the Lash Separator; a fine toothed, metal comb that divides lashes and eliminated mascara clumps.
Brush Cup
Keep your brushes in tip top condition with the Real Techniques Brush Cup. Designed to store your favourite makeup brushes, the cup keeps tools neat and tidy on the dressing table.
name: Techniques Enhanced Eye Brush Set

product_description:
Pixi Flawless Beauty Primer No.1 Even Skin neutralises and smoothes uneven skin tone, leaving your complexion looking more youthful and radiant. Enriched with vitamins and anti-ageing ingredients, this multi-tasking primer increases skin elasticity, whilst providing intense nourishment and hydration. Your skin will be left wonderfully radiant, with a healthy, youthful-looking glow.

Directions of Use:
name: Flawless Beauty Primer No.1 Even Skin

product_description:
Recipe for Men - Anti-Blemish Coverstick 2.5ml 
A high-coverage concealer for targeted treatment of spots, blackheads and skin blemishes. The dermatologically approved anti-blemish formula contains highly effective smoothing and anti-irritating ingredients such as salicylic acid (1,8%), bisabolol, amaranth oil and Australian myrtle oil. The creamy, non-oily texture absorbs excess sebum, while still allowing your skin to breathe. Waterproof and long-lasting (more than 4 hours).
name: for Men - Anti-Blemish Coverstick 2.5ml

product_description:
Add long-wearing, natural-looking colour to your complexion with the Daniel Sandler Watercolour Liquid Blush in 'Golden Glow'; a pastel pink-peach shimmer.
Enriched with Jojoba and Vitamin E, the multi-award winning, water-resistant formula nourishes and conditions skin, whilst delivering streak-free, blendable colour that applies effortlessly to create a subtle, dewy sheen. Can be used as a blusher or highlighter.
name: Sandler Watercolour Liquid Blush - Golden Glow (15ml)

product_description:
Sculpt and define your features with the 'No Bronzer' Bronzer from Perricone MD, a contouring formula enriched with broad spectrum SPF 30 for expert sun protection.
Delivering a warm veil of colour onto the skin, the youth-inspiring bronzer harnesses the powerful effects of vitamin C ester, a fat-soluble form of vitamin C which helps to minimise discolouration. Its versatile, adaptable colour mimics healthy skin pigments to create a universally flattering glow, helping to create shadows in natural contours of the face for a sculpted complexion.  
Helping to brighten and diffuse imperfections, the bronzer is perfect for adding depth to the forehead, cheekbones and jawline. - K.N.
name: MD No Bronzer Bronzer - Brown (10ml)

product_description:
Perfect for every mood, outfit or occasion, the L'Oréal Paris Color Riche La Palette Eyeshadow Palette combines ten complementing shades in a variety of matte and shimmering hues to expertly define your eyes.
From light, dusky pinks and nudes to smokey shades of purple, the eyeshadow can be worn alone or blended together for endless make-up looks with superior colour longevity.
Melting effortlessly onto the lids for smooth and even application, the palette is complete with an integrated mirror and dual-ended brush, allowing you to achieve show-stopping results. E.N.
name: Paris Colour Riche La Palette Nude Eye Shadow Palette 7g

product_description:
Boasting a super silky formula,  this Define Eye Pencil by Natio gives you a professional finish every  time. Crafted with jojoba oil to give you extra moisture and for a silky  application, this pencil is ideal for defining, filling and shaping the  eyebrows.
Directions of use:
name: Define Eye Pencil - Brown

product_description:
Forget falsies and get effortlessly thick, luxe lashes with the Longest Lash Faux Cils Mascara from Chantecaille. Utilising the latest Peptide Technology, the long lasting formula helps to dramatically enhance length, thickness and fullness.
With a unique combination of natural waxes, the mascara amplifies and volumises without becoming clumped or spidery and it’s enriched with Rosewsater Oil, which works to condition the lash whilst ensuring optimum adherence to limit smudging. The non-clumping, double helix brush is perfect for building feathery texture and helping to create gorgeously defined peepers with lusciously full lashes.
name: Longest Lash Faux Cils Mascara

product_description:
Enhance your lashes with Starter Kit No. 101 from Eylure Lashes. Created for a natural look, the blunt edge adds volume and fullness to even the shortest lashes. - R.H
Ideal for beginners, the starter kit comes with a selection of tools for perfect application. The kit includes a silicone, tipped lash applicator, orange sticks for tweaking lash position and adding seperation and adhesive for multiple applications.
Kit contains: Naturalites exclusive corner lash, Naturalites 101, lash applicator, glue vials x2, orange sticks
name: Lashes Starter Kit No. 101 (Volume)

product_description:
Add luminous radiance to your complexion with Maybelline Master Strobing Liquid 100 in 'Light', a liquid highlighter infused with micro-pearls to enhance and brighten your features.
Delivering an illuminating strobe effect, the liquid formula blends effortlessly onto skin, adding radiance and dimension to help sculpt and contour your complexion. Wear alone on high points of the face such as the brow bone, down the centre of the nose and the cheekbones, or mix with primer or foundation for an all-over glow. Skin looks beautifully dewy and radiant.
name: Master Strobing Liquid 100 25ml - Light

product_description:
Perfect your complexion with the Lottie London Pore Eraser Stick; a travel-friendly formula that can be applied directly to the face for minimal fuss and on-the-go touch-ups.
Blendable and buildable, the concealer stick instantly blurs visible pores, whilst combating uneven skin tone and eliminating unwanted shine. Skin is smooth, flawless and refined with a long-wearing finish.
name: London Pore Eraser Stick 9g

product_description: Add depth and definition to your eyes with the Bold Metals Pointed Crease Brush from Real Techniques. Featuring densely packed bristles and a tapered brush head, the weighted brush works best for all-over, even application of eye shadow on the eyelids, allowing effortless blending to create smoky effects and seamless make-up looks. E.N.
name: Techniques Bold Metals Pointed Crease Brush

product_description:
Create the ultimate fanned out flutter with L'Oréal Paris Volume Million Lashes - Black. With a Millionizer brush that boasts a multitude of long and short bristles, the flexible elastomer applicator evenly coats your lashes from root to tip.
Finished with an excess wiper to remove clumps and overload, it gives you just the right amount of formula to achieve long, volumised lashes. - L.M.

Directions of Use:

Apply to top and bottom lashes using the brush.
name: Paris Volume Million Lashes Mascara - Black (9ml)

product_description: This Natural Brow Duo from Pixi is a brow pencil and gel combo that can shape and tame your unruly brows in no time. One end of this Brow Duo contains a waterproof brow pencil with an angled tip to give you ultimate application, whilst the other end is home to a tinted soft-hold gel to keep your styled brows in place throughout the day. Now you can achieve super-star polished eyebrows with minimal effort!
name: Natural Brow Duo - Deep Brunette

product_description: Add dimension to your peepers with Eylure's Lengthening 115 Lashes. Lightweight and reusable, the natural-feel, fluted false lashes are perfect for day or night, and draw attention to the centre of your eyes for a perfectly doe-eyed finish. Perfect for adding extra definition and fullness to your eyes. Long-lasting.
name: Lengthening 115 Lashes

product_description:
Tame unruly brows with the Spectrum Collections A11 Spooly Brush; a professional brow tool that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The simple spooly comprises a comb to one side, which helps to tidy unruly brows, whilst the firm brush works to soften the application of makeup product for a more natural-looking finish. Used alone or working with wax, gel or powder brow makeup, the spooly brush is an essential addition to any makeup bag; keeping brows on point.
name: Collections A11 Spooly Brush

product_description:
Perfect the look of your skin with Garnier Pure Active Light BB Cream, a mattifying beauty balm that both conceals imperfections and prevents their return.
Utilising mineral pigments to instantly blur imperfections, the multi-tasking BB evens out your skin tone and its dose of 2% salicylic acid helps banish blemishes and blackheads for clearer, smoother looking skin. Melting effortlessly into skin with its lightweight, breathable texture, the moisturising cream delivers a beautiful, natural coverage so blemish prone complexions look clear, radiant and balanced.
Added SPF 15 helps shield from the damaging consequences of UV rays. - K.N.
name: Pure Active Light BB Cream (50ml)

product_description:
Witness a flawless complexion with Elizabeth Arden's Flawless Finish Perfectly Nude Makeup, a light to medium coverage liquid foundation with natural, radiant finish.
Suitable for all skin types, the makeup feels light and breathable on skin, gliding on effortlessly to deliver a veil of buildable perfection; its hydro-pigment formula and soft focus pigments promote radiance, whilst soy lipid technology helps minimises the look of pores instantly and over time with continued use.
Working to both perfect and protect skin, the foundation rich in vitamins and antioxidants intensely moisturises whilst shielding from sun damage with SPF 15. Skin looks flawless and more even in tone. It's your skin, but better.
colour: Alabaster, Beige, Bisque, Buff, Cameo, Chestnut, Cream Nude, Linen, Natural, Soft Beige, Spice, Toasty Beige, Vanilla Shell, Warm Cappuccino, Warm Mahogany
name: Arden Flawless Finish Perfectly Nude Makeup

product_description: Define your eyes from every angle with LOréal Paris Superliner Le Khol; a silky, long-wearing eyeliner that glides on effortlessly for professional results. Delivering a high-intensity finish, the pencil features a fine tip for precise, mistake-free application, allowing you to create a look as natural or dramatic as desired.
colour: Immaculate Snow, Midnight Black, Pure Espresso, Urban Grey
name: Paris Superliner Le Khol (Various Shades)

product_description:
Let your lips do the talking with the Lancôme Absolu Rouge Cream Lipstick; hydrating lip colour that arrives in a variety of shades, from timeless hues to vibrant new colours.
The lip-shaping lipstick treats the pout to a veil of moisturising colour, simply click the rose and sweep effortlessly over lips. Utilising Pro-Xylane™, the creamy formula seeks to boost skin’s moisture levels, leaving lips kissably soft, hydrated and comfortable.
Each L’Absolu Rouge Cream Lipstick offers ultra-smooth results and a luminous satin finish. Expect enviable definition.
name: Absolu Rouge Cream Lipstick (Various Shades)

product_description:
Achieve a fabulous flutter with L'Oréal Paris Telescopic False Lash Mascara - Telescopic Black (9ml). Boasting a fabulous lengthening effect, the innovative fibre formula builds intensity, creating an elongated effect that looks as though it extends beyond the tips of your lashes.
The new Telescopic brush stretches the lashes for an intense looks, so you can ditch those falsies for good! - L.M.

Directions of Use:

Apply to the upper and lower lashes using the Telescopic brush.
name: Paris Telescopic Magnetic Mascara - Black

product_description: Achieve a flawless, luminous complexion with the Radiance Veil Primer from Illamasqua. Infused with fine shimmer particles, its velvety soft crème formula blends effortlessly onto skin to reflect light, whilst conditioning Vitamin C maintains moisture levels to prevent dryness. Improves make-up longevity and restores a natural-looking glow.
name: Radiance Veil Primer 30ml

product_description: Achieve a smoother complexion with the Better Skin Foundation from Maybelline. Blending seamlessly, the foundation minimises the appearance of dull, uneven skin and discolouration, whilst delivering superior hydration for a streak-free, flawless finish and providing SPF 20 to protect from environmental aggressors. Suitable for sensitive skin, you can expect long-wearing, natural-looking colour and a healthy, glowing complexion.
name: Better Skin Foundation 30ml (Various Shades)

product_description: Winner of the Sunday Times Style Awards 2014 and soon to be your favourite lip product – the Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick! Lasting for up to 8 hours, this lippy contains Colour Protect technology for 25% more colour impact. It is intensely smooth, shiny and leaves your lips looking fantabulous! Get the London look! LB
colour: Alarm, Birthday Suit, Nude Pink, Pink Blush, Starry Eyed
name: Lasting Finish Lipstick (Various Shades)

product_description:
Enhance the look of your eyelashes with the Magnifibres Treatment Lash Primer, a clear conditioning formula that creates the perfect base for mascara application. Helping to make your lashes look longer and thicker, the 'triple-effect' treatment can be used alone or prior to your favourite mascara.
85% of women said their lashes looked longer in just eight weeks.
name: Treatment Primer 6ml

product_description: Perfect your pout with a nude shade lipstick from Rimmel's Kate Moss collection. With a soft, creamy texture, the lipstick glides effortlessly onto lips to deliver a long-wearing, neutral colour. Get instant sumptuous lips with its non-drying formula and choose from a range of shades to suit every skin tone. E.N.
name: Kate Nudes Lipstick (Various Shades)

product_description: Create a flawless base with Lottie London's Blend and Snap Sponge, a curved makeup sponge that allows you to apply primers, foundations and cream blushes with ease and precision. Crafted from a latex-free, ultra-luxe material, the blending sponge features a tapered tip to reach awkward facial contours and leaves your complexion looking flawless and radiant. - K.N.
name: London Blend and Snap Sponge

product_description:
Create enviable arches with Lottie London's Retractable Eyebrow Pencil; a long-wearing brow pencil with a built-in spoolie brush to smooth, groom and blend.
Delivering natural, hair-like colour, the precision pencil helps to fill in sparse brows, whilst enhancing shape and adding dimension to your face for a professional finish. Tames unruly brows to leave them beautifully defined. Available in a range of shades to suit all hair tones.
name: London Retractable Eyebrow Pencil with Spoolie 9g (Various Shades)

product_description:
EX1 Cosmetics Pure Crushed Mineral Powder Foundation is a 100% mineral based foundation that delivers natural-looking coverage. The crushed minerals buff effortlessly into your skin, giving a light, minimalistic finish for a fresh yet flawless complexion.
Enriched with anti-ageing antioxidants and Vitamin E, the natural-looking foundation will leave skin protected and naturally flawless looking.
name: Cosmetics Pure Crushed Mineral Powder Foundation 8g (Various Shades)

product_description: House all your make-up essentials in the 'Brush, Bag & Beyond' from Lottie London. Decorated with multi-coloured slogans, the transparent brush case is complete with Lottie branding and a zipped closure. Perfect for travelling or carrying in your handbag. E.N.
name: London Brush, Bag & Beyond

product_description: Achieve a naturally radiant complexion with the Pixi Glow-y Powder, designed in collaboration with international beauty blogger Aspyn Ovard.  Adding a hint of sheer, natural-looking colour, the mineral-based powder contains subtle light reflecting pigments to brighten and highlight, easily blended and universally flattering for all skin tones.
name: Glow-y Powder - Santorini Sunset

product_description:
Plump up your lips with jane iredale Just Kissed Lip Plumper in Tokyo. Using super fresh and all-natural ingredients for an incredibly kissable pout, this coral red lippy will ensure you have a long-lasting, flawless look.
Leave your lips full and kissable with jane iredale Just Kissed Lip Plumper in Tokyo - a coral red cool mint and ginger lip plumper. Special peptides give moisture and visible plumping that lasts so that after only one simple sweep, your lips are transformed with sheer natural colour and a refreshing feeling you can't top! Shea butter, sunflower oil and aloe vera ensure your lips are protected while spearmint, peppermint and ginger stimulate circulation so your lips look fuller and more beautiful than ever.
name: iredale Just Kissed Lip Plumper - Tokyo

product_description:
DuWop Venom Flash Silver is a spin-off from the original Lip Venom plumping gloss. This time injected with Silver Mica, the tingly pout perfecter reflects light for yet more shine.  With this sleek gloss, lips will be fantastically full in a flash.
Preciously pearly, Venom Flash Silver shines with the superior quality we have come to expect from the unique DuWop range. Infused with the metallic Mica mineral, the shiny silvery tone gives a cool shimmer to the lips. Great when balanced with smouldering eyes. May we suggest DuWop Smoke in Plum Wine?
Celebrity fans of the Venom line include Lindsay Lohan, Jennifer Aniston, Teri Hatcher, and Sienna Miller.
Directions of use:
 
Not tested on animals.
name: Lip Venom Flash Silver (3.5ml)

product_description: Perfect for special occasions, theBalm's Meet Matt(e) Trimony Eyeshadow Palette combines nine versatile shades with a satin texture.
