The colour melts effortlessly onto the lids for a smooth, even finish. Ideal for blending shades together or applying separately to create endless make-up looks with superior colour longevity.
name: Meet Matt(e)Trimony EyeShadow Palette

product_description: Add length and depth to your lashes with Eylure's 'Rose' Enchanted Eyelashes. Soft, lightweight and reusable, the handmade false lashes are perfect for evenings and nights out; their full, feathery design and dark, smokey finish lends eyes sultry definition for a striking effect.
name: Enchanted Eyelashes - Rose

product_description:
Enhance and intensify your lashes with Rimmel's Volume Colourist Mascara, a volumising black mascara enriched with an innovative lash tint.

Working to add drama to every lash, the cone-shaped brush coats even the shortest of eyelashes to create a wide-eyed effect, and the formula's complex lash tint works over time to naturally enhance the colour of your lashes. Expect rich, intense lashes with added oomph.
name: Volume Colourist Mascara (11ml) - Black

product_description:
Perfect and protect your skin with the Repairing Tint and Blur Moisturiser SPF30 from clinical skincare brand, ALGENIST.
Bridging the gap between makeup and skincare, the award-winning, multi-tasking formula delivers natural coverage to help even out skin tone, and utilises Microalgae Oil to replenish essential moisture and nutrients. Instantly blurring the look of imperfections, the tinted moisturiser camouflages dark spots and dark circles whilst neutralising red and sallow patches. Fortified with SPF 30, it provides broad spectrum sun protection and rejuvenates skin whilst improving and refining texture. Skin looks hydrated and revitalised.
name: Repairing Tint and Blur Moisturiser SPF30 40ml (Various Shades)

product_description:
Achieve a lit-from-within complexion with the Pixi Hello Glow!. The three-piece set combines a liquid highlighter, powder blush duo and lip plumping gloss to help you create an effortlessly radiant and healthy-looking visage.  
Glow Booster in Peach Gold
Lightweight and silk-textured, the liquid primer enhances your natural radiance and perfectly preps skin for further makeup. Working to smooth and blur the look of imperfections, the fluid highlighter contains brightening Mica as well as iridescent pigments to impart a dewy, radiant finish.
Beauty Blush Duo in Peach Honey
The mineral-based powder is the perfect finishing touch to any makeup look, adding soft and natural looking radiance with a hint of sheer color coverage. Infused with light reflecting particles and a soft shimmer, the universally flattering pair are easily blended to highlight and lift dull complexions.
LipLift Max in Honey Sheen
The LipLift Max has a unique formula infused with peptides to add a burst of volume to make lips look fuller, and Jojoba Oil to enhance moisture and intensively hydrate. Aloe and Chamomile work to soothe and soften, whilst adding a subtle sheen to your smile. The precision pen tip glides on for effortless application and the refreshing mint flavour leaves a cooling sensation.
name: Hello Glow!

product_description: Build the perfect smoky eye with the Lilah B. Palette Perfection Eye Quad in b. fabulous. The eyeshadow quad offers four complementary shades in both matte and shimmer finishes, allowing you to create multi-dimensional and layered looks. Super blendable and highly pigmented, simply dust the lighter shade all over the lid for a natural finish or add in depth and precise lining with the darker hues. Housed in Lilah B.’s signature chic pebble-shaped case.
name: B. Palette Perfection Eye Quad - b. fabulous

product_description: Sculpt your features like a pro with the Contour Cosmetics Multi Use Contouring Set in Contour Two. Combining six varied shades of smooth cream formulas, the universal contour palette offers three highlighters with yellow, pink and neutral undertones and two cool, dark shades that perfectly suit a range of skin tones from pale to dark. Each colour blends effortlessly to add definition and shape to your facial structure, leaving you with perfectly chiselled cheekbones and a flawless complexion.
name: Cosmetics Multi Use Contouring Set - Contour Two

product_description:
Even out your skin and eliminate excess oil with Menaji Anti-Shine Powder - Light. Enriched with vitamins C and E, the nourishing and soothing formula helps to heal damaged skin, and is formulated to specifically counteract the high oil production that is commen with male skin.
Made for professionals that are faced with the unforgiving nature of high definition television, the powder is undetectable even in the harshest of conditions, leaving you with a natural-looking, shine-free complexion.

Directions of Use:

Use the applicator to pat the powder across the forehead, down the bridge of the nose and over the cheek and jawline, blending up towards your hairline.
name: Anti-Shine Powder - Light

product_description: The ModelCo Face Base is a cult-favourite makeup primer that creates a smooth, flawless base to ensure long lasting coverage. Oil free and enriched with Vitamins C and E, the clear formula veils the look of imperfections, helping to minimise the look of fine lines and reduce the appearance of pores for the perfect canvas. Skin feels velvety-soft and foundation lasts for up to ten hours.
name: Face Base

product_description:
Add nourishing, vibrant colour to your pout with Lord & Berry's 20100 Shining Crayon Lipstick; a jumbo lip pencil that glides on effortlessly for a high-shine finish.
Long-wearing and ultra-comfortable, the pencil delivers highly pigmented colour, whilst soothing and softening lips for a trendsetting smile. Easy to hold and perfect for use on-the-go.
name: & Berry Shiny Lipstick - La Fiesta

product_description: The Japonesque Travel Luxury Kabuki Brush is the perfect tool for flawlessly applying bronzer. Made from high-grade natural bristles that are tightly packed together, it allows your bronzer to glide on in one easy sweep, without any streaks or patchiness.
name: Travel Luxury Kabuki Brush

product_description:
The High Definition Eye & Brow Pro Palette contains six pressed powders in neutral, earthy shades to suit all hair colours and help you create a professional, contoured look.
Ultra-lightweight and easily blended, each powder is enriched with Vitamins C and E to ensure a long-lasting, smooth and natural looking finish. Use the lighter tones to add highlight and the darker shades to create intense definition. Presented in a chic compact palette with convenient mirror for touch ups on-the-go.
name: Definition Eye & Brow Pro Palette

product_description:
Add a flush of colour to your complexion with the PUPA Angled Blusher Brush, a slanted makeup brush for applying powder blush and bronzer products to the face.
Handmade in Italy, the brush is fitted with Dermocura® synthetic fibre bristles that feel soft on application, and features a slanted head that seamlessly hugs the cheekbones for flawless results. Use to add colour to cheeks or for contouring and sculpting the face with bronzer.
name: Angled Blusher Brush

product_description:
Create subdued or smokey makeup looks with the PUPA Vamp! Compact Eyeshadow Duo in 'Dark Night', a carefully curated eyeshadow duo that combines two complementary shades.
Creamy and easy-to-blend, each highly pigmented colour delivers a rich finish with long-lasting wear. Use each colour individually or blend together to create a unique eye makeup look. Feels comfortable on the lid. Complete with dual-ended sponge tip applicator.
name: Vamp! Compact Eyeshadow Duo - Dark Night

product_description:
Create professional-looking eye makeup looks with the Illamasqua Eyeshadow Brush, an easy-to-use makeup tool fitted with synthetic bristles.
Perfect for applying cream, powder and liquid eyeshadows, the carefully designed makeup brush features a mix of soft, large and short bristles; utilise the shorter hairs for controlled colour placement, and the larger hairs for expert blending. Buff away colour in circular motions for a smouldering finish.
name: Eyeshadow Brush

product_description:
Tweezerman's Brush iQ Mini Contour Brush Kit combines the perfect tools for achieving a flawless makeup base. Certified by makeup artists, the travel-sized brushes and blending sponge allow you to expertly and easily apply your foundation with professional results. The brushes utilise Dunpont Natrafil patented technology which optimises the pick-up and release of product.
Mini Pointed Foundation Brush:
Perfect for applying cream formulas such as primers and liquid foundations. Its synthetic hairs are more hygienic than animal fibres, and perform with unrivalled results, picking up and delivering products for flawless skin. The travel-sized brush is perfect for covering large surface areas but also for detailing in natural curves and contours; its tapered tip enables perfect coverage in hard-to-reach areas.
Mini Contour Foundation Brush:
Perfect for contouring and defining facial features. Its synthetic hairs are more hygienic than animal fibres, and perform with unrivalled results, picking up and delivering products for flawless skin. The travel-sized brush features a unique angle to blend seamlessly along the angles of the face.
Blending Sponge:
Perfect for blending foundation along the hairline and jawline, this hypoallergenic (non-latex) sponge can be used damp or dry and creates a natural finish on skin. Velvety soft and a must-have for seamless blending.
name: Brush iQ Mini Contour Brush Kit

product_description:
Groom and perfect unruly brows with the PUPA Eyebrow Design Set. Custom tailored to suit individual shades, the comprehensive eyebrow tool kit contains everything you need to pluck, preen and shape for gorgeously defined arches – all conveniently housed in a mirrored compact for on-the-move applications.
The mini tweezers allow you to remove excess hair for the ideal starting point, while the subtly pigmented setting wax locks stray hairs into place without feeling sticky. Fortified with spherical polymers, the coloured compact powder offers a silky-soft texture and buildable coverage, working to fill in sparse gaps and add enhanced structure, with the double tipped applicator featuring a comb and angled brush for flawless looking results.
name: Eyebrow Design Set - Dark Brown

product_description:
Achieve a flawless base with PÜR Airbrush Blurring Concealer Brush.
Fitted with soft, synthetic bristles, the fluffy, domed head has been specially designed to apply concealer to blemishes and under eye circles, camouflaging imperfections to lend skin an airbrushed finish. The makeup brush expertly blends out lines and edges without smudging to ensure maximum coverage is attained.
name: Airbrush Blurring Concealer Brush

product_description:
Eylure have collaborated with Youtube beauty sensation, Fleur de Force, to create a sculpting Brow Palette in 'Medium'.
The custom-mix brow kit combines a two-tone powder shadow with an illuminating highlighter for expertly filling, defining and enhancing your natural eyebrows. The waterproof brow powder combines a dark and light shade that you can blend together to achieve the perfect, individual colour for your brow tone, or use each hue independently; use the darker shade for adding depth, and the lighter shade for subtle shaping or filling sparse areas.
The illuminating highlighter is perfect for accentuating the brow bone and arch, and can even be used to add light and dimension to the inner corner of the eyes. Long-lasting, waterproof and smudge-proof.
name: x Fleur de Force Brow Palette - Medium

product_description:
Line and define your peepers with the butter LONDON Wink Eye Pencil; an ultra-smooth eyeliner that glides effortlessly across the lid, without pulling on the delicate skin. The eye pencil arrives with a sharp point that can be used to produce clean and precise lines to enhance the eyes. The smooth formula can also be smudged and blended out for a smokey and sultry-looking finish.
Once applied, the long-wearing eyeliner sets firmly into place to ensure eyes remain flawlessly defined all day, however busy your lifestyle is.
name: LONDON Wink Eye Pencil Busker 1.2g

product_description: Add sumptuous colour to your pout with Sigma's Power Crayon, a high pigmented formula that glides on effortlessly to line and define lips with a magenta pink hue. With a twist-up design, the pencil delivers long-wearing, luscious colour without over-drying, leaving lips soft, hydrated and silky smooth.
colour: Ode to Pink, Own It, Rubicund, Sigma Pink, Signed, Sealed, Stage Name
name: Power Crayon

product_description:
Quench thirsty lips with the Hurraw! Root Beer Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
The convenient, twist-up lip balm is enriched with Sweet Almond and Coconut Oil, which work in synergy to envelop lips in essential, long-lasting hydration. Arriving with a sweetly spiced scent, the creamy lip balm is sure to satisfy those root beer cravings. Let dry lips drink up.
name: Root Beer Lip Balm

product_description:
Achieve flawless brows with the glo minerals Brow Quad in Brown. Host to a combination of products, the quad boasts everything you need to ensure brows are on point. The taupe quad is ideal for those with dark hair; from brunette to black.
The sleek black compact contains two brow powder hues, which can be used to customise the perfect shade to suit the natural brow. The brow powders work to fill, shape and define brows, transforming those that are sparse and enhancing any others.
The quad also houses a translucent eyebrow wax, which can be used on the finished brow to hold hairs in place for a long-lasting finish. The final product is a highlighter, this can be used to illuminate the brow bone, as well as other areas of the face.
Used in synergy, the products deliver defined yet natural-looking brows that will stay perfect all day.
name: minerals Brow Quad - Brown

product_description:
PÜR's Best Seller Kit in 'Blush Medium' is a carefully curated makeup set that combines everything you need to achieve a flawless, sunkissed complexion. Combining a primer with a powder foundation, bronzer and mascara, the kit will allow you to experience long-lasting, perfected makeup. Complete with a makeup brush for effortless application.
Prep & Perfect Correcting Primer
A skin-perfecting primer infused with clinically proven ingredients to smooth and prep skin for flawless, long-lasting foundation. Utilising a Ceretin Complex which contains age-defying Retinol, the hydrating formula expertly reduces the appearance of lines and wrinkles whilst instantly minimising the look of pores and promoting a more uniform, even toned complexion. Neutral in colour, the antioxidant-rich primer is suitable for all skin tones, and feels lightweight on skin. Its brightening and firming properties lend your makeup a radiant, youthful finish, and its cocktail of Salicylic Acid, Shea Butter and Aloe Vera work in synergy to decongest pores, moisturise and soothe the complexion. Makeup looks flawless and silky smooth with extended wear.
4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Powder Foundation SPF 15 in 'Blush Medium'
A lightweight, pressed powder foundation with award-winning formula that utilises innovative skincare ingredients. Delivering minimal coverage for a natural, flawless complexion, the all-in-one foundation works as a foundation, concealer, powder and SPF simultaneously to improve the appearance of skin; it's clinically proven to camouflage and prevent imperfections. Encapsulated Mineral Water intensely hydrates, whilst botanical extracts promote a brighter, more even toned complexion. Skin looks flawless and is protected against harmful UV rays. Mess-free application. Suitable for contact lens wearers. 
Mineral Glow Powder in 'Bronze'
A micronized mineral bronzer that adds all-over warmth to the complexion. Perfect for sweeping over the whole face, or for contouring to sculpt and define, the powder delivers rich, golden undertones to create a sunkissed finish. Infused with moisturising Shea Butter and a Ceretin Complex that utilises Retinol, it helps to improve elasticity whilst reducing the appearance of lines and wrinkles. Skin looks beautifully radiant, smooth and healthy. Suitable for contact lens wearers. 
Big Look Mascara
A volumising mascara with clump-resistant application wand. Coating lashes in a rich, nourishing formula, the buildable mascara lifts and lengthens even the smallest of eyelashes to create a maximised, dramatised eye makeup look. Infused with Argan Oil, Coconut Oil and antioxidant Vitamin E, the black mascara adds a dewy sheen to lashes whilst intensifying, nourishing and preserving moisture. Lashes are protected and expertly volumised. 
Chisel Brush
A professional makeup brush that has been specially designed to flawlessly apply the 4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Powder Foundation. Working well with all powder products, the brush offers soft, synthetic bristles that pick up and deliver the perfect amount of product for flawless, well-blended results.
name: Best Seller Kit - Blush Medium

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Pupa's IL Bacio Kit in 'Soft Rose', a portable lip colour palette offering one lip gloss and three creamy lipsticks.
Housed in a novelty, lip-shaped compact with gold crown embellishment, the palette is the smallest piece from the 'This is a Love Story' collection, and is the perfect way to add a touch of colour to your complexion. Use the creamy lipstick colours all-over the lips, and add a splash of gloss to the centre of lips to create the appearance of a fuller pout.
Perfect for popping in your handbag, it is equipped with a handy mirror for on-the-go touch-ups.
name: IL Bacio Kit - Soft Rose

product_description:
Create a range of makeup looks with Pupa's Sua Maesta in 'Green', a face, lip and eye palette combining seven eyeshadows with two lip creams, two lip glosses and one cream blusher.
Housed in a novelty, crown-shaped compact with built-in mirror, the palette (from the brand's 'This is a Love Story' collection) features two layers of colour. The top layer offers a striking green eyeshadow surrounded by luscious lip and cheek colours, and the bottom layer contains six neutral-toned eyeshadows that deliver highly pigmented, easy-to-blend colour.
Create subtle or show-stopping makeup looks; neutral smokey eyes and glossy, 3D effect lips. Complete with a sponge tip eyeshadow applicator.
name: Sua Maesta Makeup Palette - Green

product_description:

Directions of use:

product_description:
Even out your skin and eliminate excess oil with Menaji Anti-Shine Powder - Medium. Enriched with vitamins C and E, the nourishing and soothing formula helps to heal damaged skin, and is formulated to specifically counteract the high oil production that is common with male skin.
Made for professionals that are faced with the unforgiving nature of high definition television, the powder is undetectable even in the harshest of conditions, leaving you with a natural-looking, shine-free complexion.

Directions of Use:

Use the applicator to pat the powder across the forehead, down the bridge of the nose and over the cheek and jawline, blending up towards your hairline.

Maybelline New York's Super Stay 24 Hour Lip Colour in '510 Red Passion' is a dual-ended lip colour with outstanding colour and staying power.

name: New York Super Stay 24 Hour Lip Colour - 510 Red Passion

product_description: Enhance your lashes with the Ardell Wispies Cluster False Eyelashes in style 603. Reusable and easy to apply, the falsies have been carefully handcrafted with subtle clusters of lashes along an invisible band for a discreet and natural looking result. Knotted, feathered tips ensure perfect uniformity with longer lengths to the middle for an eye-opening effect. Lightweight and comfortable. Made from natural hair.
name: Wispies Cluster False Eyelashes - 603 Black

product_description:
Get professional results with the Three Steps to Beautiful Brows kit from the brow experts, Billion Dollar Brows. Designed to condition, colour and control, the set contains Boost brow conditioner to accelerate hair growth, a Universal pencil to fill in any gaps and an effective Brow Gel to complete the look and hold brows into place. When combining each step, the Beautiful Brow kit delivers long-lasting, flawless brows.
Brow Boost 4ml
Create beautiful and healthy looking brows with Brow Boost. Paraben free, the formula is designed to prime and condition eyebrows, leading to boosted growth. Brow Boost is tinted pink and delivers a translucent hue that blends into the brow invisibly and ensures makeup glides on effortlessly. Can be used both over and under brow makeup.
Universal Brow Pencil 0.25g
Shape, fill and define your brows with Universal Brow Pencil, a water-resistant, mechanical eyebrow pencil that works with almost all skin tones and hair colours. Extremely versatile, the dual-ended pencil is a neutral taupe colour that works equally well on blonde hair as it does on dark hair. Its smooth formula delivers a soft, natural finish for brows that look fuller and shapely. Use feather like strokes to achieve a natural finish, and utilise the spoolie to blend, groom and control.
Brow Gel 3ml
Take control of your brows with Brow Gel, a clear formula that works to lock eyebrow colour in place whilst taming hairs. Utilising high quality ingredients, the brow gel with spoolie applicator helps prolong the wear of your brow colour whilst imparting a radiant glow for a polished makeup look. The perfect brow tamer, the formula never flakes or leaves brows with a noticeable film.
name: Dollar Brows Three Steps to Beautiful Brows

product_description:
Promote a clearer complexion with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Blemish Wand Soft Touch in Pink, a useful beauty tool that enables you to safely and easily extract blemishes and blackheads without marking or scarring the skin.
Helping to unblock pores, the wand is made from high quality stainless steel and features a small loop to one end for removing white heads, and a flat side to the other for gently drawing out blackheads. Durable and easy to use, it will leave your skin looking spotless and clarified. Complete with a soft touch handle for easy, non-slip grip.
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Blemish Wand Soft Touch - Pink

product_description:

Infused with antioxidants and moisturising ingredients, the weightless formula glides effortlessly over skin, hydrating whilst delivering a sumptuous matt colour for that post-holiday glow.
Expect a golden, sunkissed complexion. Housed in a mirrored compact.
name: Geller Beach Matte Baked Hydrating Bronzer

product_description:
Madame La La Tan in Regular (200ml) is a dynamic do-all self tan  perfecting mousse that has been designed to create the ultimate LA  iconic glow. The LA tan develops into a deep golden colour in just 3  hours, making skin look flawless. Formulated with natural skincare  benefits, the mousse is infused with Coco water that Madame La La first  recognised benefits skin care. The Coco water extract sourced from Baja  California (Mexico)  hydrates the skin helping firm, tone and improve  elasticity.
The quick-dry tan perfector contains innovative colour customising  technology that ensures your tans looks natural whilst it adapts to your  natural skin tone. The combination of Coco water extract, Vitamins A  & E, and Aloe Vera Extract and Green Tea Extract enable the quick  dry tan to instantly colour correct like a CC for the body, reducing the  appearance of cellulite, lumps, bumps and uneven skin tones.
The LA tan lasts for 10 days and fades naturally so you don't have to worry about dreaded tanning patchiness. -SA
name: La La Tan - Regular

product_description: Blue Venom from DuWop is the latest addition to the DuWop collection which has been uniquely formulated to make teeth look whiter as well as to give you a voluminous pout.The subtle blue tint found in the Blue Venom will give the appearance of a brighter smile. Ingredients:
name: Blue Venom - 3.5ml

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Spectrum Collections A02 Angled Foundation Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
Applying foundation with ease, the makeup tool is crafted with an angled, densely-packed brush head, which is perfect for use with cream or liquid products. The unicorn-inspired brush offers a slightly heavier coverage than a buffing brush and can also be used for contouring; with the angled edge offering precision.
The foundation brush is an essential addition to any makeup bag, applying and blending product with ease for a professional looking finish.

product_description:

product_description:
Become a contour and highlight expert with the brushworks HD Complexion and Contouring Set; a three-piece sponge collection that assists in the flawless application of foundation and other base makeup. Each latex-free sponge arrives in a unique shape, which allows it to perform a specific task; from blending concealer around the eyes to applying liquid foundation. Expect a professional-looking, airbrushed finish.
Complexion Sponge
Achieve a flawless base with the Complexion Sponge; an expert tool for blending makeup. The latex-free sponge is effective with both liquid and powder products, simply dab across the face to blend makeup and reveal a seamless, natural-looking finish. The large surface can also be used to pat powder onto the face to reduce the appearance of shine.
Tear Drop Sponge
Experience an airbrushed finish with the Tear Drop Sponge. The larger areas of the sponge can be used to apply and blend liquid and cream foundation, whilst the pointed top of the applicator is ideal for navigating the contours of the face, such as the nose and eyes. The precision tip is able to target fine lines and creases to prevent a cakey appearance.
Micro Sponge
The Micro Sponge is the perfect tool for creating precise details with makeup. Its small surface area can be used to seamlessly blend contour product, in order to carve and define enviable cheekbones. The micro sponge’s small design also makes it perfect for applying and blending product at the contours of the face, such as concealing the under-eye area or applying foundation around the nose.

product_description: Perfect for creating a dramatic, bold lash effect without the weight, this black Volcanic Minerals Mascara by KORRES is enriched with volcanic minerals, cotton extract, sunflower polymers and grape is an ultra-volumising option that will really open up your eyes. - E.D

Seamlessly distributing and blending foundation for effortless application, the specially designed brush features a flat edge to cover larger areas of the face, whilst its angled edges are perfect for eye contours and narrow areas around the nose and hairline. E.N.

Achieve voluminous lashes and denser eyebrows with the Full Lash Serum from Shiseido. Its unique formula is enriched with Arginine to condition the eyelashes and brows, whilst delivering hydration to prevent them becoming sparse, short and thin.

Enriched with skin-loving, natural Chamomile and Cornflower, the softening formula is able to soothe and nourish eyelashes, as well as the sensitive skin at the delicate eye area. The remover is also formulated with Hyaluronic acid, which delivers hydration and conditions the hair and skin, without leaving behind a greasy residue.

Intense Therapy Lip Balm (7g)
An emollient balm enriched with superior skin conditioners and antioxidants, helping to soothe and relieve dry, chapped, irritated lips. Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the butter LONDON Lippy Liquid; a long-wearing formula that combines the pigment of a lipstick with the shine of a gloss.
Infused with Shea Butter and antioxidant Vitamin E, the liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to moisturise and protect lips, whilst delivering non-drying colour with an ultra-glossy finish. Expect smooth, luscious lips that are subtly scented with delicious notes of Vanilla.

product_description: Achieve a long-lasting, smudge-free finish with the Mr Write (Now) Eyeliner from theBalm. With a built-in sharpener and satin-smooth texture, the eyeliner glides on effortlessly for expertly defined eyes and superior colour pay-off, allowing you to create a look as natural or dramatic as desired with ultimate precision. E.N.
name: Mr Write (Now) Eyeliner (Various Shades)

product_description:
Create a flawless canvas with Christian BRETON Cream to Powder Foundation, a solid formula that is creamy to touch and transforms into a lightweight powder on contact with skin.
Delivering excellent coverage with a natural-looking finish, the fine and creamy foundation expertly smoothens the look of skin whilst camouflaging imperfections to lend the complexion a more even, flawless appearance. Lightweight on skin, it won't feel like a mask and is infused with pigments to lend you a perfected canvas.
name: BRETON Cream to Powder Foundation 17g (Various Shades)

product_description:
Add instant shine and protection to your lips with Christian BRETON Lip Gloss, a luscious lip formula that combines colour with care to leave lips looking bright and feeling comfortable.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with a lightweight feel, the gloss delivers a shock of vibrant colour and a host of nourishing active ingredients that leave lips feeling soft, plumped and supple. Imparting long-lasting shine, the lip colour will ensure lips look vivid and healthy.
colour: Anais, Angel, Bronze, Natural, Plum, Strass
name: BRETON Lip Gloss 3.5ml (Various Shades)

product_description:
The Cargo Cosmetics Double Agent Concealing Balm Kit features two fantastic products, a cream and a powder concealer, which help to hide any imperfections whilst working to highlight your skin. The powerful yet gentle formula consists of sweet almond oil which works specifically to target under eye circles, marula oil and tea seed oil which improve the skin’s elasticity and maintain the skin´s moisture levels. 
Enriched with butters, vitamins and pigments, the formula leaves the skin nourished and hydrated. Suitable for all skin types, your complexion will be left with a natural, flawless, professional and lightweight coverage. A.B.
The balm can be easily blended into the skin thanks to the creamy texture. Warm the balm up using your fingertips and apply to the necessary areas. 
The powder helps to set your look ensuring that you have a full coverage throughout the day.
Use the small applicator with the powder to set.
name: Cosmetics Double Agent Concealing Balm Kit - 3N

product_description:
The Fairy Dust from Pixi is a pigmented powder eye shadow. Pixi create skin-loving products that are infused with botanicals and beneficial ingredients to give you a flawless finish in fuss-free minutes. Specially formulated with natural mica pigments and enriched with pearl powder, the eyes are enhanced and left with a glimmering appearance. Its wand and cushioned applicator allow a smoother and more precise application of the powder. E.N.
Directions for use: Tap off excess powder and apply with wand. Layer shades for more dimension.
name: Fairy Dust - Silver Glow

product_description:
Take control of your eyebrows with FACE Stockholm's Brow Fix, a tinted, gel-based formula that works to keep brows in check.
Delivering superior hold with no risk of flaking, the brow gel helps keep brows in place, and features a spooled brush for easy application. Shape, tame and define your brows to perfection. - K.N.
name: Stockholm Tinted Brow Fix 3ml

product_description:
Created with a specific choice of colours to flatter the eyes of those with dark blonde to medium brown hair, the 'Foxy' Eyeshadow Palette from High Definition is the perfect way to make an impact. Containing 5 shades ranging from pale to dark, the highly pigmented powders arrive in a mix of matte and satin textures, allowing you to experiment and create different looks.
Shades Include:
Truffle
Bronze
Honey
Golden
Bare
name: Definition Eyeshadow Palette - Foxy

product_description:
Achieve a sun-kissed, luminous complexion with the NUDESTIX Bronzing Pencil. With a dual-ended design, the blendable pencil delivers a long-wearing, bronzed look and allows you to accentuate your favourite facial features for a refined, sculpted appearance.
Its lightweight, waterproof formula effortlessly glides onto skin and dries to a silky powder so you can contour and highlight for a natural-looking, professional finish every time. Housed in a collectable tin with integrated mirror and handy sharpener. E.N.
name: Bronzing Pencil in Golden Sugar/Earth

product_description: Make sure you stand out! RMK’s W Color Mascara SS 02 in Brown & Orange will forever change the way you add volume to your eyelashes. This double-headed mascara has two different shades, brown for your upper lashes and orange for the bottom lashes. This allows for a colorful contradiction that exudes both brightness and volume. The bristles will help to boost length and define even the tiniest of lashes. – N.P.
name: W Color Mascara SS 02

product_description:
Create flawless makeup looks with Japonesque's Retractable BB/CC Cream Brush, a versatile makeup brush with adjustable handle that allows you to customise fibre density.
Utilising a blend of natural and synthetic hairs for unrivalled delivery, the portable brush with softly domed head is perfect for blending BB and CC creams for a seamless, flawless finish; its soft fibres effortlessly blend, blur and diffuse cream for a sheer coverage look.
Retracting the handle makes the fibres more dense. Complete with protective cap.
name: Retractable BB/CC Cream Brush

product_description:
Emphasise your eyebrows with minimal effort with the Billion Dollar Brows 60 Second Brows Kit. Combining a high performance brush and silky smooth powder, you can expertly define your eyes.
Brow BrushA must-have make-up tool for perfectly preened brows. With a dual-ended design, the angled brush head features specially designed bristles that effortlessly pick up brow powder and deliver soft, clean lines, whilst the spoolie expertly grooms to keep hairs in place.
Brow Powder (Taupe)The easy to apply, velvety smooth powder helps to fill in any gaps in your eyebrows whilst enhancing their natural shape and adding dimension to your face. With seamless blendability and natural hair-like colours, the subtle powder will help to volumise and define your brows for a natural finish and enviable arch.

product_description:
Treat your lips to the moisturising and plumping properties of butter LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick, a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that delivers a shock of colour whilst dousing lips in essential moisture.
Accentuating the natural curves of your pout, the luscious formula is enriched with a Phyto-Endorphin Complex to boost your mood, and a Plumping Complex to help increase the appearance of fullness; lips look smoother, firmer and more defined. Standing the test of time, the lipstick withstands feathering and bleeding, so your pout looks irresistably kissable, for longer.

Perfect for sculpting the complexion with bronzer and powder products, its soft tilt hugs the contour of your cheeks to ensure a professional finish, and blends effortlessly and evenly with smooth colour distribution.
Cruelty-free.

Line and define your lips with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Liner, a water resistant lip formula that works to define and plump the appearance of your pout.
Infused with filling spheres that help to add volume to lips and reduce the appearance of wrinkles, the lip liner applies effortlessly, and blends seamlessly with its built-in brush. Delivering true colour that never bleeds or feathers, the lip liner can be worn alone, or layered beneath your favourite lipstick for maximum colour and staying power.

Enhance the look of your pout with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss, a plumping lip formula that works to add a slick of colour to your lips whilst creating a fuller appearance.
Delivering high shine colour, the lip gloss glides effortlessly across lips with a cushion like feel, and expertly stimulates hyaluronic synthesis to enhance your natural lip shape. Lips appear fuller, smoother and plumper. Leaving lips with a lasting tingling sensation, the lip gloss will boost lips, your mood and your confidence.

Define your eyes with the Angle Brush #009 from Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics. Crafted from sustainable materials and bonded with vegan-sourced adhesive, the brush features a weighted, nickel-plated ferrule for superior control.
With an angled brush head and soft, synthetic nylon and taklon fibres, the professional brush can be used in the crease, corners or across the entire lid to create depth and definition. Ideal for applying brow product, eyeliner or lip liner with expert results.

product_description: Expertly define your eyes with the Tapered Blending Brush #004 from Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics. Crafted from sustainable materials and bonded with vegan-sourced adhesive, the weighted brush features soft nylon and taklon bristles that effortlessly apply and blend eyeshadows into the crease. Perfect for contouring, or creating sultry, smoky make-up looks.

product_description: Accentuate your favourite facial features with the NUDESTIX Sculpting Pencil. With a dual-ended design, the pencil delivers long-lasting coverage and allows you to highlight and contour for a refined, smoother complexion. Its skin-nourishing formula is infused with moisturising shea butter and vitamin E, whilst its matte cream texture can be blended easily for a natural finish. The featherlite hybrid formula glides onto the lid with a rich, creamy colour coverage, working to smooth the look of fine lines and discolouration while priming skin to create the perfect base that doesn’t crease or smudge for optimum adherence and staying power.
With the addition of brightening actives and mineral-based SPF 15 filters, the eyeshadow is easily applied with the paddle applicator and can be blended and layered for the desired effect. Wear alone or underneath your favourite eyeshadows for up to 12 hours wear.

Its host of moisturising ingredients, including Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil keep lips feeling hydrated and comfortable.

Enhance your lips with the ModelCo Shine Lip Gloss in 'Tangerine', a shimmering, high shine lip lacquer that delivers a shock of beautifully reflective colour with long-lasting finish.

product_description:
Expertly frame your face with ModelCo's Instant Brows Brow Pencil in 'Light to Medium', a dual-ended eyebrow pencil with built-in spoolie brush.
Instantly filling gaps in your brows with a soft and natural finish, the pencil features a fine tip for precision application, and a unique, buildable wax formula that glides effortlessly through the brows, defining, filling and enhancing to help shape and contour your face. Expect beautifully defined and groomed brows with a natural finish. Long-wearing.

product_description:
Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the butter LONDON Lippy Liquid; a long-wearing formula that combines the pigment of a lipstick with the shine of a gloss.

product_description:
Add a flush of colour to your complexion with the butter LONDON BlushClutch Palette in 'Just Darling'. Housed in a mirrored compact, the palette combines three cool-toned shades of blusher and a white gold highlighter pen for a subtle strobe of light.
Infused with Ruby Powder and Pepper Tree Extract, the creamy, primer-infused powders deliver buildable, natural-looking colour with a long-wearing, lit-from-within finish. For a soft glow, apply the highlighter pen to the brow bones, bridge of the nose and centre of your lips for a three-dimensional, contoured make-up look.
'Magnolia' - dusty rose sheen
'Petal' - soft matte nude
'Orchid' - deep mauve shimmer
name: LONDON BlushClutch Palette - Just Darling

product_description:
RMS present Master Mixer; a luxurious rose gold toned highlighter that blends effortlessly with any lip, cheek or eye product to deliver a pearlescent glow.
Working to illuminate your favourite features, the highlighter can be used on the face and body for a professional strobe finish, whilst its silky texture applies seamlessly for a 'lit from within' effect.
name: Beauty Master Mixer Highlighter

product_description:
RMK Face Pop Eyes in 'Natural Brown' is a limited edition eyeshadow duo that has been specially curated in celebration of the brand's twentieth birthday.
Each striking eyeshadow (pink and neutral) delivers a shimmering finish that blends effortlessly on the lid. Wear each colour individually or blend together to create a bold or subtle makeup finish. Complete with a dual-ended sponge tip applicator.
name: Face Pop Eyes - Natural Brown

product_description:
Prep your nails for the perfect pedicure with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Toenail Clippers.
Made from durable stainless steel with a vintage-inspired floral design, the clippers have been specially designed to tackle thick toenails and are sturdy and sharp for precise results. Easy to use.
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Toenail Clippers - Floral

product_description:
The Vintage Cosmetics Company Airbrush Make-Up Brush Set combines a trio of face brushes to help you achieve a flawless makeup base. Each brush is fitted with soft, synthetic bristles and an aluminium ferrule for a long-lasting, rust-free life. Complete with wooden handles. Housed in vintage-patterned packaging.
Foundation Brush
A flat, slightly tapered brush that expertly applies liquid foundation with flawless results. The synthetic bristles seamlessly blend product into skin, promoting a smooth and even toned complexion.
Concealer Brush
A small brush for precision and targeted application. Its perfectly formed brush head is perfect for dabbing concealer onto smaller areas of the face, helping to camouflage under eye circles, blemishes and redness.
Powder Brush
A super soft brush for applying loose powder or mineral makeup. Its large, fluffy head is perfect for sweeping across the whole face and patting powder down to set makeup in place.
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Airbrush Make-Up Brush Set

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your complexion with the Trifle Cosmetics Creamsicle; a creamy, tinted lip and cheek stain with a long-wearing finish.
Infused with Organic Shea Butter, the blendable, buildable balm melts onto skin to soften and moisturise, whilst delivering smooth, vibrant colour for a bright, lit-from-within look that won't fade.
name: Cosmetics Creamsicle - Acerola 20ml

product_description:
Enhance natural radiance with the Trifle Cosmetics Sponge Bronzer. Beginning as a mousse, the pressed powder has been liquefied, poured into pans and allowed to set for smooth, flawless application.
Infused with Aloe Vera, Goji Berry and Rosehip Extract, the blendable, buildable formula is perfect for sweeping across the entire face for a sun-kissed glow, or for contouring the cheekbones, forehead and jawline to create a sculpted, defined make-up look.

product_description:
Perfect the look of your skin with Laura Geller's Real Deal Concealer, a silicone-based concealer that works to camouflage anything from scars, dark circles and birthmarks to uneven lip lines and unwanted tattoos.
Infused with a cocktail of beneficial Vitamins, the perfecting formula glides effortlessly across skin and delivers long-lasting coverage that smooths on evenly and resists water. Helping to even out your complexion, the professional concealer will cover-up imperfections and leave your makeup with a flawless and perfected finish.

product_description:
Add luscious colour to your pout with the Juicy Shaker Lip Gloss from Lancôme. Fortified with a bi-phased formula that synergises beautiful pigments and a nourishing blend of Sweet Almond Oil, Omega 3 and Cranberry Oil, you can expect super smooth, plump lips with mirror-like shine.
Housed in unique cocktail shaker-inspired packaging with a shake-to-wake formula, the lip gloss allows you to tailor colour vibrancy; simply shake more for an intensified make-up look. Complete with a soft cushioned applicator to hug the lip contour for a mistake-free finish.

product_description: Achieve a flawless complexion with the Illamasqua Matte Primer. Ideal for oily skin, the lightweight formula works to prolong the wear of your foundation while creating a smooth, shine-free base. Fortified with oil-regulating Silica, it helps absorbs excess sebum and minimise the look of imperfections for an even and mattified finish. Wear alone, layer or mix with foundation for skin that looks perfected and balanced.
name: Matte Primer 30ml

product_description:
Get your tea fix with the Hurraw! Earl Grey Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Hydrating lips in one simple swipe, the tea scented lip balm is formulated with a skin-loving blend of Jojoba Seed Oil, Cocoa Seed Butter and Olive Fruit Oil. These work in synergy to envelop lips in a comforting veil of moisture.
Finished with the unique scent of Italian Bergamot Orange, which lends the balm a distinctive flavour, the creamy lip balm leaves lips ultra-smooth and moisturised.
name: Earl Grey Lip Balm 4.3g

product_description:
Control unruly brows with Eylure Brow Tame and Define Wax. Enriched  with rosemary oil, plant waxes and sweet almond oil, the wax strengthens  and controls the shape of brows to create a defined look.
The non-drag wax nourishes and promotes healthy hair growth whilst shaping to create instantly sleek brows. -SA
name: Brow Tame and Define Wax

product_description: Perfect your complexion with the ModelCo Mco High Definition Concealer. Lightweight and ultra-creamy, the silky formula delivers a buildable, medium coverage to minimise the appearance of dark circles and imperfections. Enriched with antioxidants to help protect skin, it lasts all day without creasing or drying, seamlessly blending to hide redness and spots for a flawless, natural looking finish.

product_description: Intensify your peepers with Eylure’s Texture 150 Lashes. Lightweight and reusable, the natural-feel false lashes are perfect for day or night; their fuller, longer length and extra length to the outer corners add texture and natural definition. Perfect for adding extra depth and fullness to your eyes. Long-lasting.
name: Texture 150 Lashes

product_description:
Hold defined brows in place with the Brow Wax from High Definition. Able to tame unruly brows, the translucent gel is designed to set brows, holding each hair in its desired place.
Acting like hairspray for brows, the lightweight formula holds and conditions eyebrows all day. Enriched with Argan Oil, the wax softens the hair, delivering a long-lasting and shiny yet non-sticky finish. Brows are left immaculate.

product_description:
Perfect the look of combination to oily skin with Garnier's Oil Free Medium BB Cream, a mattifying cream with optimal coverage that expertly blurs imperfections whilst providing UV protection.
With a lightweight, oil-free formula, the multi-tasking BB cream works to even out your skin tone, smooth the appearance of fine lines and provide twenty four hour hydration for healthy looking, radiant skin.
Utilising mineral pigments to instantly perfect, and absorbent perlite to combat shine, the cream soaks up excess oil for a controlled and balanced looking complexion. Skin looks even, glowing and naturally perfect. - K.N.

product_description:
Build an ideal base with the Spectrum Collections A03 Oval Foundation Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘So Oval You’ brush comprises firm yet super soft, synthetic bristles, which allow for a precise and even application of product. The small, oval head is suited to the contours of the face, ensuring cream and liquid products are applied expertly.
Offering light to moderate coverage, the unicorn-inspired face brush leaves the complexion even and perfected.

product_description:

Made from premium silicone to reduce product wastage, the 'sponge' won't absorb your makeup; it enables you to use less product compared to traditional brushes and sponges. Durable, anti-microbial and easy to clean, the silicone sponge will expertly apply and blend your foundation with seamless, airbrushed results and zero product absorption; simply spread using a circular motion and dab lightly to blend away lines. Skin looks smooth and flawless.

product_description: This Natural Brow Duo from Pixi is a brow pencil and gel combo that  can shape and tame your unruly brows in no time. One end of this Brow  Duo contains a waterproof brow pencil with an angled tip to give you  ultimate application, whilst the other end is home to a tinted soft-hold  gel to keep your styled brows in place throughout the day. Now you can  achieve super-star polished eyebrows with minimal effort!

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with theBalm's Sexy Mama Anti-Shine Translucent Powder, an oil-banishing setting powder that creates a soft, matt-finish complexion.
Perfect for setting makeup in place, the translucent pressed powder harnesses tiny, oil-absorbing spheres to soak up excess shine and grease for a soft and mattified complexion. Its undetectable, velvety veil leaves skin flawless and photo-ready. - K.N.

product_description: Shade, blend and build eye shadow with the Eye Shading Brush from Look Good Feel Better; the only global cancer charity supporting women with the visible side effects of cancer treatment. With a weighted handle with an embossed name for easy reference, the professional-quality brush features a tapered, rounded edge to deliver even application of colour on the eyelids. Its soft bristles are ideal for sensitive skin. E.N.

The mascara arrives with an integrated brush applicator, which effortlessly glides through eyelashes, separating each lash and coating individual fibers in product. Once dry, the mascara is smudgeproof, leaving lashes flawlessly defined all day. Expect long fluttering lashes with maximised volume.

product_description:
Treat lips to a tingly treat with the Hurraw! Tinted Cinnamon Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
The creamy balm effortlessly glides over skin, nourishing lips with a blend of organic Coconut Oil, Cacao Butter and Castor Oil, which works to deliver long-lasting moisture and ensure lips are free from dryness. Also boasting Sri Lankan Cinnamon Bark Oil, the tinted balm offers a sweet and spicy scent that leaves behind a unique tingling sensation.
The cinnamon lip balm is complete with wildcrafted alkanet root, which gives the balm a dreamy red tint that envelops the lips in sheer colour. Expect a brightened pout that is soft, smooth and hydrated.

product_description:
Prepping your skin while creating an even surface for make-up application, this Natio Ageless Illuminating Primer evens out imperfections and extends make-up life while helping to diminish the appearance of visible lines.
Suitable for all skin types, this Natio Ageless Illuminating Primer promotes a youthful looking appearance while prepping your skin for further make-up application. Certified organic rosehip oil helps repair and nourish damaged skin tissue while aloe vera refines the complexion to leave you looking and feeling gorgeous.
Directions of use:
name: Ageless Illuminating Primer (50g)

Arriving in one shade to suit all skin tones, the buildable formula provides sheer coverage and can be built up as desired. Enriched with Coco Water and Vitamin E, the bronzer delivers hydration upon application, alongside a beautiful bronzed glow. The Bronzing Ball is the ideal size to put in your handbag for touch ups on-the-go.

product_description:
Working to immediately erase the signs of fatigue and restore skin to a radiant and rested glow, the Elizabeth Arden Flawless Finish Correcting and Highlighting Perfector Pen boasts a luxuriously lightweight formula that works as an instant pick-me-up.
Blended with hydrators, antioxidants and reflective pigments that help correct problematic areas and highlight the contours of the face, this buildable, light-to-medium coverage formula works with all skin types and is gentle enough for the delicate skin around the eyes. - E.D

product_description:
Choosing between a matte or gloss finish for your lips has never been easier thanks to the twistable NUDESTIX lip pen.  The matte liquid lip pen features revolutionary gel polymers giving your lips a soft, hydrated, kissable feel all whilst making sure the colour remains bright and vibrant all day long. The matte finish of the lip pen is perfect for creating a neutral and natural look day and night.

  The lip gloss lip pen locks in a durable, neutral and natural colour thanks to the gel colour polymers. The gentle but effective formula works to maintain hydration and moisture levels ensuring that you always have a perfect pout.  Enhance your natural beauty with the NUDESTIX collection of make-up pencils. Suitable for all skin tones, the multi-purpose pencils give you a fresh faced, nude and neutral look, whilst highlighting your favourite features. Enriched with vitamins, antioxidants and moisturisers, the make-up collection is simple to use and sure to leave you with a glowing complexion.
