product_description:
Shape, groom and preen your eyebrows with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Slanted Tweezers, a pair of high quality stainless steel tweezers with a soft touch, pink design.
Offering a slanted tip, the tweezers expertly remove stray hairs with ultimate precision; use the slanted edge for general tweezing, or the tip to grab even the smallest of hairs. The must-have beauty tool allows you to clean up or completely reshape your brows. Housed in vintage-patterned packaging.
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Slanted Tweezers Soft Touch - Pink

product_description:
Maybelline presents the Lash Sensational Luscious Mascara, a multiplying lash effect treatment with a luxurious oil-infused formula that works to condition lashes from root-to-tip.
It’s enriched with a blend of Rose Hip, Safflower and Argan Oils to soften and nourish, whilst the patented fanning brush boasts ten layers of bristles to coat even the tiniest lashes with an intense liquid ink for full coverage and clump-free definition. Expect softer, fuller-looking lashes with maximum impact.
name: Lash Sensational Luscious Mascara - Very Black 9.5ml

product_description: Add depth and definition to your eyes with the RMK Color Performance Eye Shadow. Housed in a compact, the three shades of crease-resistant powder glide onto the eye lid to deliver high-pigmented, long-wearing colour, whilst the two application brushes allow you to experiment by shading, highlighting and blending to enhance and luminate the eyes. Wear the shades alone or together to create customised colour and a look as dramatic or natural as desired. E.N.
name: Color Performance Eye Shadow - 02

product_description:
Fatten up your lashes with Natio Extreme Volume Smudge Proof Mascara in Blackest Black. With a silky, smudge-proof, water-resistant formula that separates lashes, this mascara boasts long-wearing results to intensify the look of eyes and lashes.
Pack your peepers with the wow factor with this Natio Extreme Volume Smudge Proof Mascara in Blackest Black. This gorgeous mascara won’t budge, ensuring you remain looking as gorgeous as you do when you step out of the front door all day long.
Directions of use:
name: Maximum Curl Water Resistant Mascara - Blackest Black (10ml)

product_description:
Accentuate your pout with Vincent Longo's Duo Lip Pencil; a dual-ended pencil that combines two complementary shades of creamy, long-wearing colour.
Sharpening to a fine point without breakage, the precision pencil glides on effortlessly for controlled, mistake-free application. Ideal as a lip liner or full lip colour, it helps to reduce feathering whilst delivering vitamin-rich, smudge-resistant colour with a smooth, comfortable finish.
name: Longo Duo Lip Pencil 1.8g - Chocolate/Naked

product_description:
Sculpt, tame and set your brows with the Eylure x Fleur de Force Brow Tamer in 'Light'.
Created in collaboration with Youtube and beauty vlogger sensation, Fleur de Force, the 2-in-1 formula allows you to sculpt, tint and control your brows in two easy steps. The double ended wand combines a tinted and clear gel; use the tinted formula to add natural colour, depth and boldness, and use the clear gel to set brows in place all day, without glossy shine. Eyebrows look bold, controlled and defined with long-lasting results. Flake, smudge and fade-proof.
name: x Fleur de Force Brow Tamer - Light

product_description:
Add a healthy flush of colour to your makeup look with the Vincent Longo Water Canvas Blush; a unique, crème-to-powder blusher that delivers a subtle yet buildable glow to your cheeks.
With a unique texture, the blush blends effortlessly into skin, transforming into a luxurious powder that expertly brightens up the complexion; its formulation of 75% Microwater hydrates and moisturises whilst a dose of Vitamin E keeps skin protected and healthy-looking.
name: Longo Water Canvas Blush 5g - Aqua Crimson

product_description: Achieve professional make-up looks with the Bold Metals Tapered Shadow Brush from Real Techniques. Featuring a weighted brass ferrule for superior control, the densely packed, specially shaped head expertly blends eyeshadow into the crease and eyelid, whilst its UltraPlush™ synthetic taklon bristles effortlessly distribute powder to create a seamless finish.
name: Techniques Bold Metals Tapered Shadow Brush

product_description:
Add a healthy flush of colour to your complexion with the Colour Correcting Bronzing Powder from clinical skincare brand, ALGENIST.
Bridging the gap between makeup and skincare, the neutralising bronzer delivers sheer, buildable coverage that expertly blurs the appearance of pores, fine lines and wrinkles, whilst finely blended pigments attract natural light to create a warm, healthy glow. Utilising the brand's innovative AlgaCorrecting Complex, the powder visibly colour corrects and balances uneven skin tone to promote a smoother, healthier-looking complexion. Sweep across the whole face or use to contour the cheekbones, forehead and nose for sculpted, sunkissed results.
name: Colour Correcting Bronzing Powder 9g

product_description:
Create a range of everyday looks with the PÜR Vanity Palette Eyes and Cheek in 'Dream Chaser', an all-in-one face palette that combines four eyeshadows with a blush, bronzer and highlighter.
Housed in a convenient compact with integrated, oversized mirror, the palette contains natural, daytime shades that are perfect for all skin tones and eye colours. Infused with a skin-boosting Energy Complex comprising Green Tea, Ginseng and B Vitamins, each pressed powder glides effortlessly onto skin, defining, highlighting and adding warmth to the complexion. Use the four eyeshadows to create endless eye makeup looks; the highlighter for enhancing natural radiance; the bronzer for an all-over sunkissed finish; and the blush to add a touch of colour to cheeks. The sleek, portable compact is perfect for popping in your handbag for on-the-go touch-ups.
name: Vanity Palette Eyes and Cheek - Dream Chaser

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with PÜR Airbrush Powder Foundation Brush.
The large face brush utilises soft, synthetic bristles, and has been carefully designed to pick up and distribute the perfect amount of powder product. Buffing foundation expertly into skin, the makeup brush will help you reach desired coverage to camouflage imperfections. Can also be used with setting powders to mattify and lock makeup in place.
name: Airbrush Powder Foundation Brush

product_description:
Achieve a smoother complexion with the Undercover Crayon from Pixi, a brand who create skin-loving products to give you a flawless finish in fuss-free minutes. Its waterproof formula is enriched with wild rose to nourish the skin and liquorice root to reduce imperfections and dark spots. The twist-up concealer pencil provides full coverage with a matte finish and the peptides contained increase collagen production for a supple, more youthful complexion. E.N.
Directions for use: Lightly draw onto skin where concealing is needed and use the fingertips to gently blend.
name: Undercover Crayon - No.1 Cream

product_description:
Treat your lips to the Burt's Bees Strawberry Lip Balm; a 100% natural, ultra-nourishing formula that glides on effortlessly to soften and hydrate.
Harnessing the powers of Beeswax, Shea Butter and Fruit Extracts, the replenishing balm moisturises dry, chapped lips to leave them feeling smooth, comfortable and moisturised with a non-sticky, matte finish. Ideal for carrying in your pocket or handbag for conditioning on-the-go.
name: Bees Lip Balm - Strawberry

product_description:
Accentuate your eyes with theBalm's Meet Matt(e) Ador Eyeshadow Palette; a convenient compact that allows you to create endless make-up looks with superior colour longevity.
Blending seamlessly onto the eyelids for smooth, even application, the nine complementary shades can be used alone, layered together for customised, high-pigmented colour, or applied wet as an eyeliner to define eyes from every angle. Complete with an integrated mirror, you can expect show-stopping results with a professional, matte finish.
name: Meet Matt(e) Ador Eyeshadow Palette

product_description:
Be the queen of the contour with the Spectrum Collections C02 Flat Contour Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
Allowing you to buff and blend with precision, the flat top brush head effortlessly glides over skin, sculpting the jaw and cheekbones to deliver an enviable contour. The unicorn-inspired brush is effective with cream, liquid and powdered makeup, and can be used to create heavier, more defined results by building up product. Using the brush to buff offers a more natural looking finish.
name: Collections C02 Flat Contour Brush

product_description:
Refresh dry lips with the Hurraw! Lime Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Utilising a moisture-rich blend of Sweet Almond Oil, Coconut Oil and Olive Fruit Oil, the convenient stick effortlessly glides over skin, enveloping lips in a creamy veil of long-lasting hydration. The balm is complete a squeeze of Persian Lime Oil, which lends the formula an uplifting summer scent.
Expect instant refreshment and long-lasting comfort.
name: Lime Lip Balm 4.3g

product_description: Define your eyes with Lash Sensational Waterfproof Mascara from Maybelline, a plumping mascara to enhance eyelashes. With an expert liquid formula, the clump-free black mascara delivers ultimate impact and maximum definition so you can create a look as dramatic as desired. Its specially designed wand and curved brush allows you to layer the mascara and reach even the tiniest lashes for extra volume and bigger, bolder lashes. E.N.
name: Lash Sensational Waterproof Mascara - Black

product_description:
Achieve a flawless makeup look with Pupa's IL Principe Ranocchio in 'Warm Shades', a comprehensive makeup kit housing products for the face, lips and eyes.
Stored in a novelty, frog-shaped compact with regal design, the layered makeup palette offers two concealers to help perfect your complexion, and an array of warm, neutral-toned eyeshadows that deliver highly pigmented, easy-to-blend colour. The perfect kit for adding a healthy flush to your skin, it also contains a sunkissed bronzer and two cream blushers to make cheeks pop. Complete with four creamy lipsticks, three luscious lip glosses and two makeup applicators. Built-in mirror for on-the-go touch-ups.
name: IL Principe Ranocchio Makeup Palette - Warm Shades

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Teint Miracle Bare Skin Foundation SPF 15 from Lancôme. With a lightweight, creamy texture that blends effortlessly into skin, the liquid foundation delivers a long-wearing, matte finish that lasts up to twelve hours*.
Formulated with a high concentration of water for eighteen hour* hydration, Teint Miracle is infused with pearlescent pigments to leave skin with a radiant, dewy finish.
name: Teint Miracle Bare Skin Foundation SPF 15 30ml - 16 Café

product_description:
Achieve a flawless makeup look with Pupa's Pupart Red Cover Makeup Palette in 'Warm Shades', a comprehensive makeup kit housing products for the face, lips and eyes.
Stored in a slim compact with geometric red design, the makeup palette offers a skin-perfecting concealer to help camouflage blemishes, and an array of warm, neutral-toned eyeshadows that deliver highly pigmented, easy-to-blend colour. The ideal kit for adding a healthy flush to your skin, it also contains a compact blush to make cheeks pop. Complete with six luscious lip glosses, an eye primer and two dual-ended sponge tip applicators. Built-in mirror for on-the-go touch-ups.
name: Pupart Red Cover Makeup Palette - Warm Shades

product_description:
Add a pop of wearable colour to your lips with butter LONDON Sheer Wisdom Lip Oil in 'Royal Blood', a wine shade lip colour that deeply nourishes and revitalises your pout.
The makeup-meets-skincare formula combines a host of beneficial ingredients that work in synergy to condition, moisturise and protect your lips, all while imparting a beautiful, glossy hue. Gliding effortlessly onto lips, the melting, creamy oil fuses Tahitian Coconut Oil with Chia Seed Oil and Amino Acids to nourish, revitalise and firm the appearance of lips. It delivers a sheer colour whilst providing anti-ageing and antioxidant benefits. Lips feel intensely pampered and luscious.
name: LONDON Sheer Wisdom Lip Oil 2.5ml - Royal Blood

product_description:
Perfect the look of your complexion with EX1 Cosmetics Invisiwear Compact Powder, a feather light, ultra-finely milled pressed powder that works to beautify your skin whilst setting makeup in place.
The lightweight powder delivers just a hint of colour whilst controlling shine with long-lasting effect; it's the ultimate skin finisher. Expect a flawless and photo-ready complexion.
name: Cosmetics Invisiwear Compact Powder 9.5g (Various Shades)

product_description: Enhance the shape of your lips with the Certified Organic Lipliner from INIKA. Formulated using a blend of pressed plant waxes and oils, combined with natural mineral pigments for a long-wearing lip pencil. Its lightweight, creamy, nude brown colour effortlessly melts onto the lips for easy and even application and extends the wear of lipstick without feathering or bleeding.
name: Certified Organic Lipliner - Nude Delight

product_description:
Flawless Finish by Elizabeth Arden make-up offers long-lasting, custom controlled coverage with a satin finish in a portable compact. Porcelain Beige is for those with a fair complexion. 
Flawless Finish in Porcelain Beige is a versatile cream foundation which glides on with ease and covers almost any flaw. Smooth on Flawless Finish with a damp sponge for the ideal finish, or apply it dry for full coverage.
Flawless Finish by Elizabeth Arden can also be used as a concealer and it is dermatologically and clinically tested, along with being ideal for all skin types.
name: Arden Flawless Finish Foundation - Porcelain Beige

product_description:
Perfect for every mood, outfit or occasion, Lottie London's Eyeshadow Palette combines twelve shades in a range of shimmer and matte finishes.
With a super smooth texture that melts effortlessly onto the lids, each powder can be applied separately or blended together to create endless eye make-up looks with long-wearing results.
Housed in a chic palette with a dual-ended applicator, you can achieve show-stopping results on-the-go.
name: London 12 Piece Eyeshadow Palette - The Nudes 12g

product_description:
Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion with the Glow Foundation SPF37 PA+++ from Korean Skincare brand, Skin79, a lightweight liquid foundation that delivers long-wearing, natural-looking coverage.
Enriched with Avocado Oil, Niacinamide and Allantoin, the blendable, buildable foundation infuses skin with intense moisture and hydration, whilst camouflaging blemishes and imperfections for an airbrushed finish. Its Multiple Shining Effect brightens and whitens lack-lustre complexions to correct dull, uneven skin tones without fear of the product caking.
name: Glow Foundation SPF37 PA+++ #21

product_description:
Line and define your eyes with Christian BRETON Carbon Eye Pencil, a highly pigmented eyeliner that adds a shock of colour to your peepers.
Gliding smoothly over the lids, the rich liner is suitable for even the most sensitive eyes and delivers creamy, high definition colour with precise results. Create sleek lines or blend out for a smokey finish.
name: BRETON Carbon Eye Pencil 3.5ml (Various Shades)

product_description:
Nourish skin with the Smart Derma Mild BB Cream R (Recovery) SPF30 PA++ from Korean brand Skin79; an advanced formula that seeks to repair weak, damaged and lacklustre skin while smoothing the look of imperfections with natural, light coverage.
Fortified with age-defying Grape-based ingredient Resveratrol, the tinted moisturiser helps stimulate natural elasticity levels to reduce the appearance of wrinkles, while Allantoin and Panthenol infuse skin with essential hydration. Enhanced with broad spectrum UV protection, the triple-action cream leaves skin looking brighter and revitalised with a healthy-looking glow.
name: Smart Derma Mild BB Cream R (Recovery) SPF30 PA++ 40ml

product_description: Achieve glowing perfection with the Shiseido 'Face Colour Enhancing Trio' in 'Peach'. Complete with a small brush, the all-in-one compact opens to reveal a trio of sculpting and highlighting blush colours, perfect for inspiring glowing cheekbones in one simple stroke. The carefully considered colours and textures create a three dimensional look when applied. Use alone or blend together for a professionally contoured finish. - K.N.
name: Face Color Enhancing Trio, OR1, Peach 7g

product_description:
Maximise and nourish your lashes with Mavala's Treatment Creamy Mascara in 'Night Blue', a smudge-resistant mascara with nourishing, lash-loving formula.
Adding length, separation and definition to your eyelashes, the blue mascara features a curved brush that allows you to apply with control and precision, and its nourishing formula leaves lashes feeling soft and supple. Expect elongated lashes with a professional finish.
name: Treatment Creamy Mascara - Night Blue 10ml

product_description: Achieve a flawless makeup look with Lottie London's Powder Power Brush, a large face brush with ultra-soft bristles. Perfect for applying both loose and pressed powders, the brush picks up product perfectly and delivers an even coat onto skin. Sweep the super soft brush across the face and body to achieve an even, flawless finish. - K.N.
name: London Powder Power Brush

product_description:
Khôl & Contour with built-in sharpener is enriched with pure pigments adding a intense look to your eyes for up to 16 hours. With a soft and blendable formula you can apply to both inner and outer rims of the eye. Featuring hypo-allergenic, with natural wax and vitamin E, the Kohl is gentle on the delicate area of your eyes.
The built-in pencil sharpener can be used for all the Khol & contour eye pencil range. -SA
name: Kohl & Contour Pencil Sharpner

product_description:
Encased in a bright pink, sleek tube designed for portability and  protection, the Professional Touch Up Tube Set from Japonesque contains  five brushes essential for keeping makeup flawless throughout the day or  night.
All brushes feature a short matte wand for superior control. A great  multi-tasking set ideal for the purse, desk drawer or as a gift.
name: Brush Set Touch Up Tube Pink

product_description:
A favourite of professional makeup artists, the AmazingCosmetics® Hydrate Concealer provides high performance, natural looking coverage that effectively erases the appearance of dark circles, redness, blemishes and more without feeling cakey or dry.
Water-resistant, highly pigmented and long wearing, the creamy stick concealer contains ultra-hydrating Sodium Hyaluronate for a visible plumping effect, helping to smooth the look of fine lines and wrinkles, while Vitamin A and E provide essential free radical protection. Featuring a buildable formula and push up applicator, it’s ideal for on-the-go touch ups.
colour: Dark Beige, Fair, Light Caramel, Light Golden, Medium Beige
name: Cosmetics Hydrate - Various Shades

product_description:
Prep and perfect your skin with the INIKA Certified Organic Pure Primer, a hydrating makeup base infused with Hyaluronic Acid to prolong makeup wear whilst hydrating and soothing the skin.
Creating the perfect canvas for foundation, the primer with 81% certified organic ingredients (including Jojoba and Lemon Myrtle Essential Oils) glides effortlessly across skin, delivering a moisturising veil that helps prep skin for makeup application whilst inspiring a radiant, dewy complexion. Can be worn alone or under your favourite foundation.
name: Certified Organic Pure Primer

product_description:
NUDESTIX Magnetic Eye Colour is a long-wearing eye pencil that complements many eye shapes. This neutral earth tone shadow glides on smoothly to give precision lining or blend with other shades. The waterproof and crease-proof formula may be used with all healthy skin types to create a number of dramatic looks - for daytime or evening. Wear as a single eye colour, as a lid contour, or for highlights that are sure to get attention. This product is free of fragrances and does not contain preservatives. Included are a black case and a pencil sharpener.
Apply with a brush, make-up sponge or fingers to blend.
name: Magnetic Eye Colour

product_description:
Create a neutral eye makeup look with the butter LONDON Sheer Wisdom Serum Eye Shadow in 'Rose Petal', a natural-looking eyeshadow that combines the benefits of makeup with anti-ageing skincare.
Delivering a neutral hue with satin-matt finish, the eyeshadow contains a blend of anti-ageing peptides to help improve the appearance of wrinkles, and Spherical Polymers for a smoothing effect. Gliding effortlessly onto lids, the uniquely textured eyeshadow transforms from a fluid serum to a light powder, imparting high performance pigments with a subtle wash of colour that resists creasing for a flawless, natural makeup look. It blends easily and adheres seamlessly to the lids. Perfect worn alone or as a primer for other eyeshadows.
name: LONDON Sheer Wisdom Serum Eye Shadow 4ml - Rose Petal

product_description:
Give your lips an indulgent slick of high shine colour and shimmer all day long with the Youngblood Mighty Shiny Lip Gel in 8 shades.
This non-sticky formula is packed with antioxidants and naturally nourishing oils such as jojoba seed, sweet almond and meadowfoam which combat dryness and gently protect against environmental elements. 
Youngblood’s plastic slanted applicator will help you dispense the desired amount directly onto lips and ensure that excess product doesn’t ooze out after use. Layer these sheer and shimmery tints over lipstick or use alone to keep your perfect pout hydrated! -MB
name: Mighty Shiny Lip Gel

product_description:
Enhance your lips with the ModelCo Shine Lip Gloss in 'Berry Pink', a shimmering, high shine lip lacquer that delivers a shock of beautifully reflective colour with long-lasting finish.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with its wand applicator, the non-sticky gloss imparts a soft colour tint and features an in-built mirror for flawless, on-the-go applications . Lips looks luscious and hydrated.
name: Shine Lip Gloss - Berry Pink

product_description:
Enhance your lips with the ModelCo Shine Lip Gloss in 'Rosie', a shimmering, high shine lip lacquer that delivers a shock of beautifully reflective colour with long-lasting finish.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with its wand applicator, the non-sticky gloss imparts a soft colour tint and features an in-built mirror for flawless, on-the-go applications . Lips looks luscious and hydrated.
name: Shine Lip Gloss - Rosie

product_description:
Indulge your lips in the nourishing colours of Lord & Berry's 20100 Matte Lipstick, a jumbo lipstick pencil with hydrating matt finish.
Gliding effortlessly across the lips, the vibrant lipstick delivers a highly pigmented splash of colour that's long lasting and ultra-comfortable on lips. Lips are instantly softened and soothed. - K.N.
name: & Berry 20100 Matte Lipstick (Various Shades)

product_description:
Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion with the ModelCo Fluidsplash 3-in-1 Foundation; an oil-free formula that combines the benefits of a concealer, foundation and eye base.
Infused with Aloe Vera and antioxidant Vitamin E, the ultra-hydrating liquid foundation blends seamlessly onto skin to minimise the appearance of blemishes and imperfections, whilst delivering long-lasting coverage for a dewy, radiant finish. Provides SPF15+ protection.
name: Fluidsplash 3-in-1 Foundation - Shell 02

product_description: Get ready to glow with the Contour Cosmetics Contour Bronzing Rocks. Suitable for all skin tones, the intensely pigmented powder rocks add a natural sun-kissed finish to your makeup look. The perfect finishing touch to your contour routine, dust the gold-shimmering bronzer across cheekbones and blend for a summer-ready radiance in seconds.
name: Cosmetics Contour Bronzing Rocks

product_description:
Line and define your eyes with the ModelCo Lash and Line Superlash Mascara and Liquid Liner, an innovative, 2-in-1 product that combines a black liquid eyeliner with a volumising black mascara.
The double-ended design features a buildable black mascara to one end with a special, dual-action brush; the flat side expertly lengthens and thickens the appearance of lashes, whilst the curved side adds lift, drama and volume, all without clumping. The liquid eyeliner is equipped with a fine tip for precision application, and delivers a shock of rich black colour that dries quickly and won't smudge or feather.
The long-lasting, water-resistant mascara and eyeliner will add depth and intensity to your makeup look.
name: Lash and Line Superlash Mascara and Liquid Liner

product_description: Contour and glow with the ModelCo Bronze 2-in-1 Duo. Containing both a matte and shimmer shade, the oil-controlled pressed powders deliver an even and long lasting finish that seamlessly blends for a natural looking result. The matte shade is ideal for adding depth and definition, while the subtle glitter pigments in the bronzer shade add a soft, sun-kissed glow. Complete with a Kabuki brush for professional looking results.
name: Bronze 2-in-1 Duo

product_description:
Douse your lips in rich, moisturising colour with the ModelCo Lip Lacquer in 'Creme Brûlée', a highly pigmented lip gloss that delivers a slick of vivid, long-wearing colour.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with its wand applicator, the non-sticky gloss imparts a rich colour tint whilst intensely hydrating to keep lips feeling comfortable and luscious all day
name: Lip Lacquer - Creme Brulee (2)

product_description:
Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the butter LONDON Lippy Liquid; a long-wearing formula that combines the pigment of a lipstick with the shine of a gloss.
Infused with Shea Butter and antioxidant Vitamin E, the liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to moisturise and protect lips, whilst delivering non-drying colour with an ultra-glossy finish. Expect smooth, luscious lips that are subtly scented with delicious notes of Vanilla.
name: LONDON Lippy Liquid - Bonkers

product_description:
Add a healthy warmth to your complexion with this Natio Blusher in Peach Glow. This soft peachy pink blush provides the perfect, natural way to create a soft radiant glow and leave you looking as if you are glowing from within!
A versatile powder blush that highlights your complexion with a natural, healthy glow, this Natio Blusher in Peach Glow features universally flattering earthy undertones to ensure it fits your complexion perfectly!
Directions of use:
name: Blusher - Peach Glow (5g)

product_description:
Achieve knockout lashes with the Triple Threat 24 Hour Mascara from PÜR. Expertly formulated, it provides superior length, curl and volume that lasts for up to 24 hours without smudging or drying out.
The innovative brush combs through each individual lash for precise application and grips from the root for maximum coverage, whilst the nourishing formula conditions lashes and reduces premature fallout. Expect bold, lush eyelashes that stand the test of time.
name: Triple Threat 24 Hour Mascara - Black

product_description:
Prep your nails for the perfect manicure with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Fingernail Clippers.
Made from durable stainless steel with a vintage-inspired floral design, the clippers are suitable for all nail types and easy to use.
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Fingernail Clippers - Floral

product_description:
Created to give a lasting finish, the Cloud Nine Amplify Spray is a must have product if you want to achieve salon perfect style. Giving a weightless, firm hold, this fine spray works to prepare hair for styling whilst giving a lasting shine.
Made to create lift from the roots with the Cloud Nine Waving Wand, and soft, luscious curls with the Cloud Nine Irons, the Amplify Spray ensures your 'do lasts all day. K.D.
name: Nine Amplify Spray

product_description:
Shape, sculpt and define your brows with Eylure Brow Palette in Mid Brown. The palette features a tinted wax and two powders to help you to define your brows from start to finish.
The palette includes a dark wax, highlighter and brow colour, all of which can help to fill in, shade and define so that you can make the perfect statement with your well-groomed brows. -SA
name: Brow Palette - Mid Brown

product_description:
Achieve show-stopping makeup looks with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Angled Shadow Brush.
Fitted with soft, synthetic bristles and an aluminium ferrule that is long-lasting and won't rust, the angled makeup brush is perfect for building and layering eyeshadow onto the lids; it delivers product with ease and expertly blends and buffs to create a smokey eye. Its angled tip allows you to effortlessly add depth to your crease to create the illusion of bigger eyes. The bristles are soft and feel comfortable on application. Complete with a wooden handle.
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Angled Shadow Brush

product_description: Achieve a flawless complexion with the TimeBalm Primer from theBalm. Fortified with vitamins A, C and E to nourish, protect and hydrate, the lightweight primer can be worn alone or applied under make-up to minimise the appearance of fine lines and pores, whilst combating uneven skin tone for a softer, smoother finish. Blendable and buildable. E.N.
name: TimeBalm Primer

product_description: Lottie London present the Perfectly Precise Small Eyeshadow Brush; a super-soft brush with densely packed bristles that work great with crème or powder colours. Perfect for applying base colour, or for buffing in the crease, the brush picks up and deposits the perfect amount of product every time for a professional make-up look.
name: London Perfectly Precise - Small Eyeshadow Brush

product_description: Keep falsies looking natural with Eylure Lashfix Latex Free Strip Lash Adhesive. The long-lasting eyelash glue is safe and effective for use on the eyes, and dries clear to lend your look a natural finish. Keeping false lashes perfectly in place, the latex-free formula dries quickly is perfect for use with your favourite Eylure strip lashes.
name: Lashfix Latex Free Strip Lash Adhesive 8.5ml - Clear

product_description:
RMK Face Pop Eyes in 'Red Brown Beige' is a limited edition eyeshadow duo that has been specially curated in celebration of the brand's twentieth birthday.
Each striking eyeshadow (pink and neutral) delivers a shimmering finish that blends effortlessly on the lid. Wear each colour individually or blend together to create a bold or subtle makeup finish. Complete with a dual-ended sponge tip applicator.
name: Face Pop Eyes - Red Brown Beige

product_description: The Compact Soleil from Chantecaille provides sun-kissed colour with the stroke of a brush. Micro-fine powder technology with a silky, glowing finish creates an incredibly natural looking bronzer for a mistake-proof and flawless application. Infused with skin-softening natural botanicals Gingko Biloba and Wild Rose, the formula also works to heal and protect, leaving skin smooth and visibly radiant.
name: Compact Soleil Bronzer

product_description: Expertly define your favourite facial features with Lottie London's Contour Queen Brush; a must-have tool for effortless contouring and sculpting. Featuring a specially designed, flat edge, the make-up brush can be used to apply both cream and powder products to the cheekbones, nose and chin for a smooth, refined finish.
name: London Contour Queen - Flat Edge Brush

product_description:
Enhance your pout with RMK's Face Pop W Stick Gloss in 'Lollipop Girl', a dual-ended lip gloss with Jelly Gloss to one end and Color Gloss to the other.
Combining rich pink with a muted beige, each gloss glides effortlessly across lips, delivering a luscious hue with creamy texture and shiny finish. Lips look healthy and glossy.
name: Face Pop W Stick Gloss - Lollipop Girl

product_description:
Perfect your pout with the Maybelline's Color Sensational 'Creamy Mattes' Lipstick, a creamy, pure pigmented lipstick with a matt finish.

Gliding effortlessly across your lips, the lipstick delivers a sumptuous, bold colour with a super-creamy, matt texture. Expect well defined lips that make a statement. - K.N.
colour: Craving Coral, Divine Wine, Magnetic Magenta, Nude Embrace, Rose Rush, Siren in Scarlett
name: Color Sensational Mattes Lipstick (Various Shades)

product_description: Add depth and definition to your eyes with the RMK Color Performance Eye Shadow. Housed in a compact, the three shades of crease-resistant powder glide onto the eye lid to deliver high-pigmented, long-wearing colour, whilst the two application brushes allow you to experiment by shading, highlighting and blending to enhance and luminate the eyes. Wear the shades alone or together to create customised colour and a look as dramatic or natural as desired. E.N.
name: Color Performance Eye Shadow - 03

product_description:
Enhance your pout with RMK's Face Pop W Stick Gloss in 'Glam Glitter', a dual-ended lip gloss with Jelly Gloss to one end and Color Gloss to the other.
Combining rich pink with a muted beige, each gloss glides effortlessly across lips, delivering a luscious hue with creamy texture and shiny finish. Lips look healthy and glossy.
name: Face Pop W Stick Gloss - Glam Glitter

product_description:
Achieve a picture-perfect complexion with the Lottie London Translucent Setting Powder; a lightweight finishing powder designed to set make-up in place.
Blending effortlessly onto skin, the invisible face powder helps to control shine and minimise the appearance of pores, whilst targeting oily T-zone areas for a long-lasting matte finish. Skin stays flawless throughout the day.
name: London Translucent Setting Powder 15g (Various Shades)

product_description:
Add a hint of luscious colour to your lips with the High Definition Lip Essentials Collection, a trio of moisturising lip glosses with wet-look finish.
Infused with antioxidant Vitamin E, the protective lip glosses glide effortlessly over lips with a doe foot applicator, and deliver a lightly pigmented hue with glossy sheen. Lips look intensely hydrated and visibly plumped.
name: Definition Lip Essentials Collection

product_description:
Embrace your romantic side with the Living Nature Colour Me Romantic Lipstick Set; a trio of natural pink hues, which define the lip and enhance any makeup look. Each lipstick is hand crafted in New Zealand and flamed to a perfect finish. Certified natural, the pink lip colours are formulated to nourish the lip, whilst delivering long-wearing colour. The trio of lipsticks arrive housed in a vibrant gift box, perfect for treatment a loved one or even yourself.
Made in New Zealand.
Bloom
Bloom is a stunning vintage pink hue that brightens up the lip.
Laughter
Laughter is a true pink shade with ultra-subtle blue undertones and a shimmering finish.
Summer Rain
Summer Rain adds a pop of colour to the pout. The dark pink lipstick delivers intense results.
name: Nature Colour Me Romantic Lipstick Set - 3 Different Shades of Pink (Worth £60.00)

product_description:
A versatile makeup tool, the Japonesque Pro Smudge Brush can be used to smudge edges, soften lines and blend colours together for a seamless finish. Ideal for use with loose or pressed pigments, the brush has soft bristles that will create delicate lines in the crease of the eye or at the outer corners. - L.M.
Directions for Use: Use the brush to smudge or blend eyeshadows or eyeliners.
name: Pro Smudge Brush

product_description:
Discover a go-to palette with the Pixi Get The Look Palette - It's Eye Time; the ideal palette to tackle every occasion. Created in collaboration with beauty enthusiast Judy Travis, also known as ‘itsjudytime’, the palette includes a selection of Judy’s favourite hues and is designed to effortlessly take you from day to night.
The eyeshadow palette boasts an array of twelve eye-catching, easy to wear hues, each with an intense colour pay off and a blendable formula. Effortlessly sweep onto your lid for seamless, long lasting colour that enhances your makeup look. The palette is complete with a detachable mirror for custom placement inside.
name: Get The Look Palette - It's Eye Time

product_description: Add depth and definition to your eyes with the RMK Color Performance Eye Shadow. Housed in a compact, the three shades of crease-resistant powder glide onto the eye lid to deliver high-pigmented, long-wearing colour, whilst the two application brushes allow you to experiment by shading, highlighting and blending to enhance and luminate the eyes. Wear the shades alone or together to create customised colour and a look as dramatic or natural as desired. E.N.
name: Color Performance Eye Shadow - Ex-01

product_description:
Illamasqua's Lip Brush with Cover is perfect for creating professional makeup looks on-the-go.
Fitted with flat, synthetic bristles with a rounded edge, the tool expertly applies lipsticks and lip products with precision, resulting in a smooth and flawless makeup look. Complete with a detachable handle that doubles as a storage lid for protection and travel convenience.
name: Lip Brush with Cover

product_description:
The perfect starter kit for makeup mavens. Lottie London's The Best of the Brushes Collection combines five must-have makeup brushes to create flawless face and eye makeup looks. - K.N.
Powder Power Brush:
A large face brush with ultra-soft bristles. Perfect for applying both loose and pressed powders, the brush picks up product perfectly and delivers an even coat onto skin. Sweep the super soft brush across the face and body to achieve an even, flawless finish.
Shade & Shadow Angle Brush:
A professional-grade, angled shadow brush with ultra-soft bristles. Perfect for shaping, smudging and lining, the brush delivers the perfect amount of colour, adding definition and shape to the eye. Can be used in the crease, corners or across the entire lid to create depth and contour.
All Eyes On You Eyeshadow Brush:
A multi-tasking eyeshadow brush with compact, rounded bristles. Perfect for applying base colour, or for buffing in the crease, the brush picks up and deposits the perfect amount of product, and works great with both crème or powder colours.
Blend In Eyeshadow Brush:
A super-soft eyeshadow brush with curved bristles. Perfect for buffing, shaping and diffusing your eyeshadow colour, the brush delivers the perfect amount of product and helps create sultry, smokey makeup looks.
Flawless Base Foundation Brush:
A blue-tipped foundation brush with ultra-soft bristles. Perfect for applying your favourite liquid foundation, the brush buffs product into the skin to create an even, polished coat. Sweep the super soft brush across the face to achieve a flawless finish.
name: London The Best of the Brushes Collection

product_description:
Plump up your pout with the Magic Pout Potion from Ciaté London. The 2-in-1 formula primes and plumps lips, for a smooth and fuller looking finish.
Boasting Volulip® technology, the matte Potion boosts lips to give a full and volumised appearance. The moisturising formula is applied before lip colour and helps to prevent feathering whilst also increasing the staying power of lip products, for an ultra-long wearing finish.
name: Magic Pout Potion

product_description:
Sculpt and define your features with the Japonesque Velvet Touch Face Palette, a carefully curated makeup palette that helps you to achieve a professionally contoured makeup look. Combining three best-selling blushers with an opalescent highlighter and matt contour shade, expect perfectly chiselled, light-reflecting results.
3 x Velvet Touch® Blush (01 cool bright pink, 02 soft peachy nude, 03 peach coral with gold reflects)
Three best-selling blushers with a silky, lightweight finish. Delivering highly pigmented, buildable colour, each blush blends effortlessly into skin, leaving a radiant flush of colour that lends your cheeks a naturally glowing, multi-dimensional look.
1 x Highlight Powder
A luminous highlighter with pearlescent sheen. Infused with shimmering particles, the powder creates a light-reflecting makeup look. Highlight and accentuate where the sun would naturally hit to create a luminous, glowing complexion.
1 x Medium Contour 
A medium matt brown contouring shade; perfect for chiselling and sculpting your complexion. Use in the hollows of your face, and where natural shadows fall to create a professional contoured makeup look.
name: Velvet Touch Face Palette

product_description:
Achieve a soft, blended finish with the Spectrum Collections A06 Large Fluffy Shader Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘Shady Lady’ blending brush arrives in a wide, flat shape, which is ideal for applying a wash of powder and cream makeup products to the entire eye lid. The large, fluffy head boasts super soft, synthetic bristles to blend hues with a seamless, expert finish.
Ideal for a subtle everyday look or for building colours to create intense drama, the unicorn-inspired eyeshadow brush is an essential additional to any brush collection.
name: Collections A06 Large Fluffy Shader Brush

product_description:
Flawless Finish by Elizabeth Arden make-up offers long-lasting, custom controlled coverage with a satin finish in a portable compact. Perfect Beige is for those with a medium to olive complexion. 
Flawless Finish in Perfect Beige is a versatile cream foundation which glides on with ease and covers almost any flaw. Smooth on Flawless Finish with a damp sponge for the ideal finish, or apply it dry for full coverage.
Flawless Finish by Elizabeth Arden can also be used as a concealer and it is dermatologically and clinically tested, along with being ideal for all skin types.
name: Arden Flawless Finish Foundation - Perfect Beige

product_description:
Thoroughly eliminate traces of makeup with the INIKA Certified Organic Makeup Remover; a silky, oil-based formula that frees the face of any makeup product.
Effortlessly sweeping onto skin, the gentle yet effective formula melts all traces of makeup, without leaving behind an unwanted greasy residue. Suitable for all skin types including sensitive skin and delicate eyes, the natural makeup remover leaves skin ultra-clean and dewy.
name: Certified Organic Makeup Remover 70ml

product_description:
Create show-stopping makeup looks with the PUPA Eye Blending Brush, a professional eye makeup brush for blending and diffusing compact, baked or loose powder eyeshadows.
Handmade in Italy, the brush is fitted with 100% natural goat bristles and features a conical and compact shape that effortlessly buffs and blends product onto the lids. It seamlessly blends colour into the crease and brow bone for smokey or subdued looks.
name: Eye Blending Brush

product_description:
Add delicate volume and length to your peepers with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Nancy False Strip Lashes, a pair of reusable false eyelashes that lend your lashes a naturally fuller appearance.
Lightweight and comfortable to wear, the lashes add beautiful fullness, volume and length to your eyes, taking you perfectly from day to night with their versatile design. The synthetic strip lashes are easy to apply and reusable. Adhesive included.
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Nancy False Strip Lashes

product_description:
Groom and perfect unruly brows with the PUPA Eyebrow Design Set. Custom tailored to suit individual shades, the comprehensive eyebrow tool kit contains everything you need to pluck, preen and shape for gorgeously defined arches – all conveniently housed in a mirrored compact for on-the-move applications.
The mini tweezers allow you to remove excess hair for the ideal starting point, while the subtly pigmented setting wax locks stray hairs into place without feeling sticky. Fortified with spherical polymers, the coloured compact powder offers a silky-soft texture and buildable coverage, working to fill in sparse gaps and add enhanced structure, with the double tipped applicator featuring a comb and angled brush for flawless looking results.
name: Eyebrow Design Set - Blonde

product_description:
Add a healthy warmth to your complexion with this Natio Blusher in Rosewood. This soft burnt sienna pink blush provides the perfect, natural way to create a soft radiant glow and leave you looking as if you are glowing from within!
A versatile powder blush that highlights your complexion with a natural, healthy glow, this Natio Blusher in Rosewood features universally flattering earthy undertones to ensure it fits your complexion perfectly!
Directions of use:
name: Blusher - Rosewood (5g)

product_description:
Combining the benefits of a moisturiser with a hint of colour, this Natio Tinted Moisturiser SPF20 in Neutral provides fresh and barely-there make-up perfection to leave you looking effortlessly flawless throughout the day.
Natio Tinted Moisturiser SPF 20 in Neutral combines the benefits of a moisturiser and broad-spectrum UVA/UVB sunscreen with a hint of foundation colour. It gives natural coverage with a sheer satin finish. This hydrating formula is ideal for all skin types.
Directions of use:
name: Tinted Moisturiser Spf20 - Neutral (50ml)

product_description: Deeply hydrate your peepers with the Garnier Light BB Eye Cream, a fast-absorbing beauty balm developed to target signs of ageing, including fine lines and wrinkles. Combining powerful haloxyl and mineral pigments, the lightweight cream minimises signs of fatigue, dark circles and puffiness, whilst smoothening skin and restoring radiance. Its unique roll-on design remains gentle to the delicate eye contour area so you can experience younger-looking, rejuvenated skin. E.N.
name: Light BB Eye Cream (7ml)

product_description:
Make eyes stand out with the Lord & Berry Ink Glam Liquid  Eyeliner. The glossy black formula creates sharp definition with rich  pigmentation. Easy to apply with a tapered tip applicator, this  waterproof eyeliner is quick-drying for an intense and professional  look.
Directions: Use the tapered applicator to create a smooth line on the upper lashline.
name: & Berry Ink Glam Liquid Eye Liner - Black

product_description:
Achieve naturally sunkissed skin with PÜR Glow Together Gradient Matte-Shimmer Bronzer, a jumbo face and body bronzing palette that combines three matt shades with three shimmer shades.
Working to lend your skin a bronzed glow, the formula glides and blends seamlessly over skin, delivering a golden tone that mimics a natural tan. The blend of matt and shimmer shades play with light to create subtle radiance and luminosity. Use the combination of matt shades to contour and enhance natural shadows, and use the three shimmering shades to highlight high points on the face.
name: Glow Together Gradient Matte-Shimmer Bronzer 17g

product_description:
Add luminous radiance to your complexion with Maybelline Master Strobing Liquid 100 in 'Medium', a liquid highlighter infused with micro-pearls to enhance and brighten your features.
Delivering an illuminating strobe effect, the liquid formula blends effortlessly onto skin, adding radiance and dimension to help sculpt and contour your complexion. Wear alone on high points of the face such as the brow bone, down the centre of the nose and the cheekbones, or mix with primer or foundation for an all-over glow. Skin looks beautifully dewy and radiant.
name: Master Strobing Liquid 200 25ml - Medium

product_description:
Eylure Defining and Shading Brow Crayon in Blonde helps you to fill in and add colour to your brows when they are looking sparse.
The pencil has a soft textured formula that provides you with intense, long lasting colour to create perfectly groomed brows. -SA
name: Defining and Shading Brow Crayon - Blonde

product_description:
Accentuate your pout with Vincent Longo's Duo Lip Pencil; a dual-ended pencil that combines two complementary shades of creamy, long-wearing colour.
Sharpening to a fine point without breakage, the precision pencil glides on effortlessly for controlled, mistake-free application. Ideal as a lip liner or full lip colour, it helps to reduce feathering whilst delivering vitamin-rich, smudge-resistant colour with a smooth, comfortable finish.
name: Longo Duo Lip Pencil 1.8g - Wine/Rosewood

product_description:
Accentuate your pout with Vincent Longo's Duo Lip Pencil; a dual-ended pencil that combines two complementary shades of creamy, long-wearing colour.
Sharpening to a fine point without breakage, the precision pencil glides on effortlessly for controlled, mistake-free application. Ideal as a lip liner or full lip colour, it helps to reduce feathering whilst delivering vitamin-rich, smudge-resistant colour with a smooth, comfortable finish.
name: Longo Duo Lip Pencil 1.8g - Red/Coralo Red

product_description:
Restore life to skin with the High Definition SOS Lip and Skin Balm; an innovative treatment that was originally developed to soothe skin after High Definition Brows treatments in the salon.
Now available for use at home, the versatile SOS balm tackles dry, irritated and sunburned skin. The balm boasts an integrated applicator, which sweeps over skin and instantly delivers hydration and a soothing feel. Ideal for dry and chapped lips, the balm envelops skin in essential moisture, whilst delivering a healthy glow.
Expect comfortable skin that appears calm, comfortable and healthy.
name: Definition SOS Lip and Skin Balm

product_description:
Create natural or smokey eye makeup looks with Lancôme Ombre Hypnôse Mono Eye Shadow in '1204 Cuban Light', a rich brown colour with iridescent finish.
Sweeping effortlessly onto lids, the smooth, easy-to-blend eyeshadow delivers buildable colour that can be applied subtly to create a sheer wash, or built upon for an intensified, dramatic look. Highly pigmented, the crease-resistant eyeshadow imparts smooth, even coverage every time for a flawless, show-stopping effect.
Housed in a mini compact with dual-ended applicator sponge.
name: Ombre Hypnôse Mono Eye Shadow - 1204 Cuban Light

product_description:
Create a range of evening looks with the PÜR Vanity Palette Eyes and Cheek in 'Goal Digger', an all-in-one face palette that combines four eyeshadows with a blush, bronzer and highlighter.
Housed in a convenient compact with integrated, oversized mirror, the palette contains a mix of vivid shades that are perfect for all skin tones and eye colours. Infused with a skin-boosting Energy Complex comprising Green Tea, Ginseng and B Vitamins, each pressed powder glides effortlessly onto skin, defining, highlighting and adding warmth to the complexion. Use the four eyeshadows to create endless eye makeup looks; the highlighter for enhancing natural radiance; the bronzer for an all-over sunkissed finish; and the blush to add a touch of colour to cheeks. The sleek, portable compact is perfect for popping in your handbag for on-the-go touch-ups.
name: Vanity Palette Eyes and Cheek - Goal Digger

product_description:
Get flawless skin in seconds with the New York 20th Anniversary Laura's Star Performers from Laura Geller. The limited edition set combines a pair of their cult-favourite complexion correctors, each housed in a mirrored compact and working in perfect harmony to smooth the look of redness and imperfections while imparting a healthy looking radiance.
Baked Balance-N-Brighten Color Correcting Foundation (Medium) 
Laura Geller's Baked Balance-n-Brighten Color Correcting Foundation is a compact foundation that has been baked for 24 hours on terracotta tiles and hand finished in Italy. Infused with colour-correcting swirls of soft tan and cream pigments, it delivers weightless, creamy coverage and intelligently adjusts to your skin to create flawless, luminous results.
Free from mineral oil and parabens.
Baked Bronze-N-Brighten (Medium)
Featuring marbled swirls of liquid pigments, the long-wearing formula glides effortlessly over skin and intelligently adjusts to your individual tone to create dewy, bronzed results. Its brightening properties leave skin with a luminous finish, and its dose of antioxidants, Centella Asiatica and White Tea Extracts help to safeguard from signs of ageing.
Free from mineral oil and parabens.
name: Geller New York 20th Anniversary Laura's Star Performers - Medium

product_description:
ModelCo have collaborated with American model, Hailey Baldwin, to create The Filter Contour & Glow Cream; a versatile compact to accentuate your favourite facial features.
Combining a bronze shade to contour and a light pearl hue to highlight, each creamy formula blends seamlessly onto the face to deliver natural-looking colour that complements all skin tones. Apply to the cheekbones, brow bones and down the bridge of the nose to achieve a sculpted, defined finish with enhanced radiance.
name: The Filter Contour & Glow Cream

product_description:
Get ready to rock the dramatic eye look with Daniel Sandler Purple Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner. With a groundbreaking formula that keeps your look intact all day, this eyeliner has excellent coverage and guarantees zero smudging.
Daniel Sandler Purple Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner feels great to apply, thanks to its high content of silicone. Purple Velvet is absolutely waterproof, super long-wearing and extraordinarily soft, combining rich colour with out-of-this-world coverage and no smudging.
name: Sandler Purple Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner

product_description:
Line and define your peepers with the butter LONDON Wink Eye Pencil; an ultra-smooth eyeliner that glides effortlessly across the lid, without pulling on the delicate skin. The eye pencil arrives with a sharp point that can be used to produce clean and precise lines to enhance the eyes. The smooth formula can also be smudged and blended out for a smokey and sultry-looking finish.
Once applied, the long-wearing eyeliner sets firmly into place to ensure eyes remain flawlessly defined all day, however busy your lifestyle is.
name: LONDON Wink Eye Pencil Twigged 1.2g

product_description:
Let your lips do the talking with the Lancôme Absolu Rouge Sheer Lipstick; hydrating lip colour that arrives in a variety of shades, from timeless hues to vibrant new colours.
The lip-shaping lipstick treats the pout to a veil of moisturising colour, simply click the rose and sweep effortlessly over lips. Utilising Pro-Xylane™, the creamy formula seeks to boost skin’s moisture levels, leaving lips kissably soft, hydrated and comfortable.
Each L’Absolu Rouge Sheer Lipstick offers sheer yet buildable results with a subtle shine. Expect enviable definition.
name: Absolu Rouge Sheer Lipstick (Various Shades)

product_description:
Designed to give you instantly longer lashes, the freezeframe Instant Lash Original is a brush on lash extending gel. Adding up to 4-8mm in length, it boasts two innovative technologies which work to apply a collection of tiny synthetic hairs in a nourishing and thickening dark gel base.
With an improved patented silicone brush designed to deposit lash extensions perfectly, this is the perfect pre-cursor to mascara, giving you effect of fake lashes in one simple step. Enjoy dramatic, show stopping lashes that last all day! K.D.
name: Instant Lash Original

product_description:
Protect and perfect the complexion with the SAMPAR Crazy Cream in Nude; a lightweight, tinted moisturiser that delivers long lasting hydration, whilst protecting the visage from photo-ageing UV rays. The silky formula glides onto skin, absorbing quickly to deliver an essential veil of moisture.
Utilising a Hydrocomplex, the Crazy Cream ensures skin appears supple, firm and comfortably hydrated, whilst the addition of Adenosine boosts skin’s collagen levels to assist in reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The moisturiser also boasts Smart Sun Prevention to shield the complexion from harmful UV’s and in turn prevent signs of sun damage and photo-ageing.
Offering both skincare and makeup benefits, the tinted formula perfects the complexion with its nude hue, which is ideal for light to fair skin tones. The product can be worn alone for a naturally flawless-looking finish, or can function as an effective base for a makeup routine. However the product is used, the Crazy Cream guarantees to deliver a radiant and unified finish.
name: Crazy Cream - Nude 30ml

product_description:
Purify and refresh your complexion with SAMPAR's Dry Cleansing Foaming; a no-rinse make-up remover for the face, eyes and lips.
Infused with Dandelion Extract and an OAT Natura Complex, the luxurious cleanser expertly eliminates dirt, impurities and waterproof make-up, whilst providing antioxidant protection to guard from the damaging effects of free radicals and environmental aggressors. Zinc, Magnesium and Copper minerals help to boost cell activity for a radiant, revitalised complexion with improved texture and tone.
name: Dry Cleansing Foaming 100ml

product_description: Define your eyes from every angle with Pixi's Lash Line Ink Eyeliner in 'Velvet Cocoa'. Its waterproof, fast-drying formula delivers a high intensity finish, whilst its precision tip allows mistake-free application for professional results. Ideal for creating both natural and cat eye looks.
name: Lash Line Ink Eyeliner - Brown

product_description: Achieve a flawless complexion with the Max Factor Ageless Elixir Foundation; a long-wearing, two-in-one foundation and serum that delivers natural-looking colour, whilst providing SPF 15 to shield from environmental aggressors and dehydration. Its silky texture glides effortlessly onto skin for a streak-free finish, whilst hiding imperfections, combating uneven skin tone and enhancing luminosity to leave you with a youthful glow. Buildable and blendable.
name: Factor Ageless Elixir Foundation (Various Shades)

product_description:
Redefine the lip line with the Chantecaille Lip Keep Definer; a transparent lip liner that enhances the lips, whilst locking in lip colour.
The pencil effortlessly glides across skin, providing an invisible line of product that is able to fill the lips. Enriched with an array of Amino Acids, the lip pencil delivers hydration where applied, whilst offering a visible firming effect. Lips are smooth, defined and primed for lip colour. If used before the application of Chantecaille’s Lip Sleek, the Lip Keep Definer enhances its wear and improves its longevity.
name: Lip Keep Definer 15ml

product_description:
Achieve an expert contour with the Chantecaille Sculpting Brush; an ultra-soft, cruelty-free makeup brush that is the perfect tool for contouring and highlighting.
Boasting ombré fibers, the angled brush head is an ideal shape for adding enviable definition to the visage. Working with liquid, gel and powder products, the brush expertly carves cheekbones and sculpts the jawline. The synthetic brush seamlessly blends product onto skin, delivering a professional-looking, airbrushed effect.
name: Sculpting Brush

product_description:
Create eyebrows to be proud of with RMK W Eyebrow (Pencil) 01 in grey. Boasting a ingenious design, the pencil features a retractable pencil at one end and at the other a felt head for adding powder.
The pencil also features a screw brush for grooming and smudging the eyebrow at the centre of the pencil. The oval-shaped pencil gives you great control for eyebrows with an exquisite shape and great natural look. -SA
name: W Eyebrow (Pencil) 01

product_description:
Chantecaille's Galactic Lip Shine combines the ultra-hydrating properties of a serum with the superior, mirror-like shine of a lip gloss.
Infused with an antioxidant-rich blend of Raspberry Seed Oil and Vitamin E, the conditioning formula soothes and protects lips, whilst Wild Mango and Shea Butters moisturise and soften. Suitable for wearing alone or over your favourite lipstick, its unique polychromatic pearl enhances the natural colour of your lips to leave you with a picture-perfect pout.
name: Galactic Lip Shine

product_description:
Get a lit-from-within radiance with the Ciaté London Dewy Stix; a luminous highlighting stick without shimmer or pigment that leaves you with a gorgeous, natural looking glow.
The silky balm dries instantly when applied to veil skin with a non-tacky, translucent shine that adds depth and dimension to all skin tones. Creating a ‘your skin but better’ effect, the gel-like formula is easy to apply with supercharged ingredients like Hyaluronic Acid and Argan Oil working to keep skin feeling soft and smooth. Simply glide across facial contours where light naturally hits for an effortless, dew-glistened complexion.
name: London Dewy Stix - Glow

product_description:
Create subtle or defined makeup looks with Pupa's IL Principino in 'Warm Shades 002', a portable eye and lip palette combining four eyeshadows with a creamy lipstick and lip gloss.
Housed in a novelty, frog-shaped compact with built-in mirror, the palette (from the brand's 'This is a Love Story' collection) features four warm, neutral-toned eyeshadows that deliver highly pigmented, easy-to-blend colour, and two luscious lip colours to create a glossy, fuller-looking pout.
Perfect for popping in your handbag, it is equipped with a sponge tip applicator with regal gold crown detail.
name: IL Principino Eye and Lip Palette - Warm Shades 002

product_description:
Create barely there looks or natural smokey eyes with the Japonesque Velvet Touch Eye Palette, a pro-designed eyeshadow palette filled with eight complementary neutral shades.
The versatile palette allows you to create a range of looks that add subtle depth or bold definition to the eyes. The carefully selected hues are highly pigmented and effortlessly blendable; each shade delivers buttery rich pigments with a soft, velvety finish.
Shades Include: 01 French Vanilla, 02 Burnt Orange, 03 Dusty-Mauve (mid tone neutral), 04 Smokey Plum (dark tone), 05 Soft Warm Brown, 06 Soft Khaki Taupe, 07 Warm Chestnut (warm neutral), 08 Deep Neutral Brown.
name: Velvet Touch Eye Palette

product_description:
Define your pout with Living Nature's Lip Pencil; a soft, gentle lip liner that can be used as a natural-looking lip colour, or to prevent feathering and bleeding.
Infused with vegetable waxes, its smooth formula glides effortlessly over the lips to deliver long-wearing colour with ultimate staying power, whilst its precision tip allows mistake-free application for a professional finish. Extends the wear of your favourite lipstick.
name: Nature Lip Pencil 1.13g - Various Shades

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Blending Set Infused with Collagen, a set of latex-free makeup sponges that expertly apply and blend a range of makeup products onto your skin with an airbrushed finish.
Infused with Collagen for an anti-ageing boost, each specially shaped blender allows you to apply foundation and concealer to large areas of the face, whilst targeting smaller, hard-to-reach areas such as around the eyes and nose. Versatile and easy to use, they will also blend your favourite highlighters and blushers, and serve as a great tool for contouring. Soaking the sponges in water prior to use will ensure makeup doesn't absorb into them (which means no wastage!).
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Blending Set Infused with Collagen

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Teint Miracle Foundation SPF15 from Lancôme. With a lightweight, creamy texture that blends effortlessly into skin, the liquid foundation delivers a long-wearing, matte finish that lasts up to twelve hours*.
Formulated with a high concentration of water for eighteen hour* hydration, Teint Miracle is infused with pearlescent pigments to leave skin with a radiant, dewy finish. Available in a range of shades to suit the unique beauty of every complexion type.
name: Teint Miracle 15 Foundation 30ml

product_description:
Achieve a flawless makeup look with Pupa's IL Principe Ranocchio in 'Cool Shades', a comprehensive makeup kit housing products for the face, lips and eyes.
Stored in a novelty, frog-shaped compact with regal design, the layered makeup palette offers two concealers to help perfect your complexion, and an array of cool, neutral-toned eyeshadows that deliver highly pigmented, easy-to-blend colour. The perfect kit for adding a healthy flush to your skin, it also contains a sunkissed bronzer and two cream blushers to make cheeks pop. Complete with four creamy lipsticks, three luscious lip glosses and two makeup applicators. Built-in mirror for on-the-go touch-ups.
Contains: 2 x concealers, 1 x bronzer, 2 x cream blushes, 2 x all overs, 1 x eye primer, 6 x compact eyeshadows, 2 x eye applicator, 1 x lip balm, 4 x lip creams, 3 x lip glosses, 1 x lip applicator.
name: IL Principe Ranocchio Makeup Palette - Cool Shades

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Mavala Lipstick in 'Sensual Pink'.
Gliding effortlessly across lips in a uniform layer, the lightweight lipstick delivers a rich, creamy hue that won't settle into fine lines. Its long-lasting coverage ensures lips feel comfortable all day, even if prone to dryness.
