product_description:
Easy and efficient to apply, the Pixi Shea Butter Lip Balm in Pixi Pink is the ultimate tinted lip balm. Perfect for keeping in your handbag, this balm boasts a twist-up design with a secure click lid for safe keeping.
Featuring a subtle hint of colour for a chic look, it's infused with shea butter to nourish and hydrate the lips to ensure you're given a long lasting kissable pout! K.D.
name: Shea Butter Lip Balm - Pixi Pink

product_description:
Light reflecting minerals in this Natio Pure Mineral Foundation in Light Medium adapt to the colour and texture of your skin, leaving it fresh, radiant and beautiful. Softening the appearance of fine lines too, this foundation brings a radiant look to skin instantly.
Lasting from morning to night, this Natio Pure Mineral Foundation in Light Medium doesn’t require touch-ups and is quick and easy to apply. This gorgeous foundation enhances your true beauty without looking cakey on the skin.
Directions of use:
name: Pure Mineral Foundation - Light Medium (50ml)

product_description: Sculpt your features like a pro with the Contour Cosmetics Contour Compact in Original. Combining six varied shades of smooth cream formulas, the contour palette offers warm undertones and light shades that perfectly suit pale to olive skin tones. Each colour blends effortlessly to add definition and shape to your facial structure, leaving you with perfectly chiselled cheekbones and a flawless complexion. Presented in a chic portable compact for on-the-go applications and touch ups!
name: Cosmetics Contour Compact - Contour Original

product_description:
Achieve a photo-ready complexion with the ModelCo Mineral Powder; a weightless, mattifying formula that combines the benefits of a foundation, concealer and powder in one.
Working to conceal shine without blocking natural radiance, the loose powder blends seamlessly onto skin to deliver a silky soft veil; it helps to minimise the appearance of imperfections, whilst enhancing luminosity for a smooth, flawless finish. Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive and acne-prone.
name: Mineral Powder - Nude 01

product_description: Apply blusher, bronzer or foundation with this versatile contour brush, angled for expert application. Use for definition or for giving cheekbones a naturally sculpted look. Featuring a weighted handle with an embossed brush name for easy reference. 'Look Good Feel Better' is the only global cancer charity supporting women with the visible side effects of cancer treatment. E.N.
name: Good Feel Better Angled Contour Brush

product_description:
Drench your lips in a lustrous sheen with the RMK Color Lip Gloss in 'Red Flash'.
Combining the vibrant colour of a lipstick with the clarity of a lip Gloss, the colour glides effortlessly over lips with its square-shaped applicator, and delivers a veil of sheer yet brilliant colour. Its host of moisturising ingredients, including Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil keep lips feeling hydrated and comfortable.
name: Color Lip Gloss - 07 Red Flash

product_description:
Correct blemishes whilst highlighting skin with Lord & Berry Conceal-It Stick. Formulated with a blend of macadamia nut oil and waterlily extracts, the creamy concealer give medium coverage and hides under-eye circles, fine lines and minor imperfections. It hydrates the skin and provides long-lasting coverage for a flawless finish with a luminous sheen.
Use the bullet to apply the concealer to imperfections, concentrating on the eye area. Also use to highlight cheekbones.
name: & Berry Luminizer Highlighter & Concealer Stick

product_description:
Accentuate your eyes with the PUPA Vamp! Waterproof Mascara; an amplifying black mascara dedicated to volumising, thickening and lengthening lashes.
Synergising a water-resistant Hydrophobic Polymer and an innovative plastic film coating, the creamy, buildable formula delivers ultimate impact and definition for an intense, smudge-proof finish. Its specially designed brush and rounded tip capture even the shortest lashes to reveal bigger, bolder results.
name: Vamp! Waterproof Mascara - Extra Black 9ml

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the SAMPAR Glamour Shot Eyes Concealer; an innovative, universal formula that targets wrinkles, fine lines and dark circles that are present at the eye contour. The anti-ageing formula is technically a skincare product, but is able to offer similar results to makeup alongside its expected skincare benefits.
Formulated with HQA Microlens and Hyaluronic Acid, the clear concealer glides onto delicate skin, delivering an invisible, soft focus finish. It works to reduce the appearance of dark circles, redness and fine lines and wrinkles, as well as lifting skin with immediate effect due to Oat extract.
The unique formula also boasts an Urban Advance Complex, which blends Shea Butter serum, Mint Endorphin and Probiotic Sugar together to act as an antioxidant shield. This protects skin from environmental aggressors, as well as strengthening the its natural defences.
Expect a smooth and illuminated eye area that is unified and radiant.
name: Glamour Shot Eyes Concealer 10ml

product_description:
Shape your eyes gently and precisely with this Natio Eyeshadow Brush. A short brush that is cut full and square, this brush is ideal for applying, shading and blending eyeshadow and aids in contouring eyes precisely.
This Natio Eyeshadow Brush disperses pigment evenly and smoothly while feeling gorgeous against your skin. Ensure a professional-looking finish every time you apply your make-up with this high quality brush from Natio.
name: Eyeshadow Brush

product_description:
Illuminate your assets with theBalm Cindy Lou Manizer. The all-in-one essential contour artist compact contains a multi-functional product that can be used as a shadow, blush and a subtle highlighter.
The peachy pink hue adds a splash of colour to your cheeks, a hint of shimmer to your lids whilst enhancing your  favourite facial features. -SA
name: Cindy Lou Manizer Rose Highlighter

product_description:
Achieve a flawless base with the brushworks HD Detail and Contour Sponge; a dual-purpose complexion sponge that is the perfect tool for blending out product, as well as precision application.
The latex-free sponge is effective with both liquid and powder products, simply dab across the face to blend makeup and reveal a seamless, natural-looking finish, which is ideal when sculpting high definition cheekbones during contouring. The larger surface can also be used to pat powder onto the face to reduce the appearance of shine.
The pointed top of the sponge is ideal for navigating the contours of the face, such as the nose and eyes. The precision tip is able to reach areas often missed with other applicators and target fine lines and creases to prevent a cakey appearance. Expect professional looking results and a high quality contour.
name: HD Detail and Contour Sponge

product_description: The Real Techniques Core Collection kit by Samantha Chapman includes 4 coverage essentials: detailer brush, pointed foundation brush, buffing brush and contour brush. All of these tools are held in a professional case & stand. Now in a valuable duo bundle so you can save money whilst boasting picture perfect makeup.
name: Techniques The Ultimate Collection

product_description: Add natural length and definition to your peepers with Eylure 3 Dimensional 111 Lashes. Lightweight and reusable, the natural-feel false lashes are crafted with a layered effect and a patented offset band that increases length and depth to enhance the natural beauty of your eyes. Perfect for adding depth and fullness to your eyes. Long-lasting.
name: 3 Dimensional 111 Lashes

product_description:
Create professional makeup looks with the RMK 20th Anniversary Brush Kit, a limited edition set specially curated to celebrate the brand's 20th anniversary.
Housed in an original RMK brush case, the set offers two eyeshadow brushes for expert blending and shading; two sponge tipped applicators for placing colour; and an eyeliner brush for defining the lash line.
name: 20th Anniversary Brush Kit

product_description: Perfect for creating a dramatic, bold lash effect without the weight, this brown Volcanic Minerals Mascara by KORRES is enriched with volcanic minerals, cotton extract, sunflower polymers and grape is an ultra-volumising option that will really open up your eyes. - E.D
name: Volcanic Minerals Mascara - 02 Brown (New)

product_description: Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion with Laura Geller's Spackle® Under Make-Up Primer in 'Ethereal'. Fortified with crushed pearl and encapsulated Liquorice Root, the lightweight, oil-free formula inhibits the production of melanin in the skin; combating uneven skin tone and hyperpigmentation. Suitable for all skin types, the tinted primer blends seamlessly into skin to deliver natural-looking colour, whilst ensuring make-up remains fresh for hours.
name: Geller Spackle Under Make-Up Ethereal Primer 59ml

product_description:
Prep and perfect your eyes with theBalm's Put a Lid On It Eye Lid Primer, a quick-drying eyeshadow primer with brightening properties.

Gliding effortlessly along the lid, the formula enriched with light reflecting properties works to enhance the look of your eyeshadow whilst prolonging wear. The must have primer harnesses skin-smoothing ingredients to ensure lids are perfectly prepped to make eyeshadow pop. - K.N.
name: Put a Lid On It Eye Lid Primer

product_description:
Perfect your arches with the Elizabeth Arden Statement Brow; a multi-tasking tinted brow gel that works to condition, fill and define in one simple sweep.
Fortified with Beeswax and Carnauba for long lasting hold, the pigmented formula delivers the coverage of a pencil with the natural finish of a powder. Kaolin provides fuller texture and shape, while microspheres ensure a smooth and effortless application that stays smudge-free for up to 12 hours of wear. Achieve maximum impact eyebrows for a powerful makeup look.
colour: Blonde, Dark Brown, Light Brown, Medium Brown
name: Arden Statement Brow (Various Shades)

product_description:
The Bellápierre Cosmetics Glowing Complexion Essentials Kit in 'Fair' combines a selection of must-have makeup products to leave your skin flawless and healthy looking. Utilising only natural and kind-to-skin ingredients, the collection is suitable for all skin types and will leave your skin looking radiant and feeling happy.
Makeup Base (8.5g):
A multi-tasking product that can be used as a concealer or waterproof base for other pigments. Its natural formula transforms shimmer products into matte shades, and expertly conceals blemishes and imperfections that are difficult to cover with makeup. Paraben free.
Mineral Foundation in 'Ivory' (4g):
A 5-in-1 mineral foundation formulated with four natural ingredients. Utilising kind and gentle minerals, the foundation delivers complete coverage as a foundation, and works as a concealer and setting powder whilst protecting skin with SPF 15+. Skin appears flawless and your natural skin tone is enhanced. Non-comedogenic.
Mineral Bronzer in 'Warming Matte' (2g):
A warming mineral bronzer with an award-winning, silky powder formula. Perfect for adding sunkissed radiance to your skin, the bronzer helps enhance your natural tone whilst delivering a healthy, natural-looking tan. Non-comedogenic, talc and paraben free.
Mineral Luminizer in 'Champagne' (2.35g):
A finely milled highlighter perfect for illuminating natural high points on the face. Dust lightly all over for a shimmery finish, or apply to cheekbones, brow bones and down the centre of the nose for a naturally radiant finish.
Kabuki Brush:
Specifically designed for use with mineral foundations and powders, this best-selling brush utilises synthetic bristles with a super-soft, dense shape that helps deliver complete and seamless coverage for flawless looking skin. 100% synthetic fibres that will not shed during application.
name: Cosmetics Glowing Complexion Essentials Kit - Fair

product_description:
Expertly define your eyebrows with the Mellow Cosmetics Tinted Brow Gel; a lightweight, non-sticky formula that allows you to create enviable arches with minimal effort.
Featuring a spoolie brush applicator, the brow gel enhances shape and tames unruly hairs, whilst helping to fill in sparse brows with natural, hair-like colour and a long-wearing finish. Expect perfectly groomed, tinted brows that last.
name: Cosmetics Tinted Brow Gel - Light Brown

product_description:
Add a healthy flush of colour to your complexion with RMK Face Pop Creamy Cheeks, a duo of cream-textured blushers with soft, dewy finish.
Delivering subtle definition, the blushers can be applied with a sponge to lend your cheeks a healthy, glowing appearance. Use the deeper shade for defining, and the lighter shade for highlighting. Complete with application sponge.
colour: Hot Pink, Pale Pink, Silver Pink, Strawberry Pink
name: Face Pop Creamy Cheeks (Various Shades)

product_description:
Define your favourite facial features with the Contour & Highlight Pro Palette from Bellápierre Cosmetics. Combining six different shades in a convenient palette, the kit features everything you need to shade and enhance.
Expertly sculpting and creating subtle definition, each easy-to-blend shade works on specific areas of the face for added depth and dimension. The contour powder applies effortlessly onto the forehead, bridge of the nose, cheekbones and jawline, whilst the highlighter brightens and illuminates your face for a fuller-looking finish.
name: Cosmetics Contour & Highlight Pro Palette

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your complexion with Laura Geller's Baked Blush-n-Brighten, a compact blusher that has been baked for 24 hours on terracotta tiles and hand finished in Italy.
Infused with swirls of liquid pigments, the smooth, long-wearing blush glides effortlessly over skin and delivers a radiant flush of colour to cheeks. Its brightening properties enhance the luminosity of your makeup look, and its dose of antioxidants, Centella Asiatica and White Tea Extracts, help to safeguard skin.
Expect a bright and healthy-looking complexion.
name: Geller Baked Blush-n-Brighten

product_description:
Suitable for sensitive eyes, the Lord & Berry Silk Kajal Eye  Pencil lines and defines eyes, leaving a silky smooth, semi-matte  finish. Easy to control, the kohl is smudgeable for a sexy look.  Ophthalmologically-tested, it can be used on the inner rim to enhance  the natural colour of your eyes.
Apply along the inside of the eyelids, or for an intense kohl look apply on  inside lower lid and outside upper lid. For a  more discreet look, apply using fine, precise lines. Blink firmly  after application to naturally smudge. It can be used with or without eyeshadow.
name: & Berry Silk Kajal Eye Pencil

product_description:
Intensify your brows with the PUPA Eyebrow Long Lasting Waterproof Pencil; a double sided pencil that creates a naturally defined finish.
Boasting a new generation formula, the water resistant pencil is effortlessly applied to brows, creating fine, precise lines that mimic hairs. Arriving with a soft spoolie to one side, the pencil not only adds definition to brows, but combs hairs and blends the colour to deliver a natural result.
Expect long lasting colour with a professional-looking finish.
name: Eyebrow Long Lasting Waterproof Pencil (Various Shades)

product_description:
Achieve maximum coverage with the Illamasqua Rich Liquid Foundation; a coveted makeup base utilised and loved by professional makeup artists.
The liquid formula is effortlessly applied to the complexion, offering seamless, blended and water-resistant results. Delivering a semi-matte finish, the foundation conditions the skin and is able to eliminate excess oil to reduce unwanted shine. A perfect base for flawless and long lasting makeup application.
name: Rich Liquid Foundation 30ml (Various Shades)

product_description:
Create enviable arches with the Mellow Cosmetics Brow Pomade; a creamy gel formula that applies effortlessly to deliver natural, hair-like colour.
Blendable and buildable, the smudge-proof, volumising brow gel enhances shape and tames unruly hairs, whilst helping to fill in sparse eyebrows for an expertly defined finish that lasts. Available in a range of shades.
name: Cosmetics Brow Pomade (Various Shades)

product_description:
Achieve flawless eyebrows with the Brows on Point Micro Pencil - Blonde from brow experts Billion Dollar Brows. Dual ended, Brows on Point comprises a precision point to one end and a spoolie brush to the other. The ultra-fine tip creates natural looking brush strokes that mimic the appearance of individual hairs for a subtle finish, whilst the spoolie can be used to comb and blend.
The pencil boasts a mechanical function, constantly delivering a precision tip without the need to sharpen. Filling in sparse brows to accentuate your look, the brow makeup offers maximum colour pay off and a professional finish. The formula is both water and smudge proof, gliding onto brows effortlessly and providing long lasting results.
name: Dollar Brows Brows on Point Micro Pencil - Blonde

product_description: Add luscious colour to your pout with Lord & Berry's Timeless Kissproof Lipstick. Fortified with a nourishing, antioxidant-rich blend of Neem, Sesame and Indian Frankincense Essential Oils, the lipstick delivers long-wearing, transfer-resistant colour with a vibrant matte finish. Features a unique applicator tip that defines lips in one effortless stroke.
colour: Bazaar, Blossom, Iconic, Muse, Perfect Nude, Red Passion
name: & Berry Timeless Kissproof Lipstick

product_description: Wield the perfect tool for flawless skin. The Amazing Cosmetics Velvet Brush is hand shaped and hand cut, and inset with 100% wool bristles for a professional finish every time. Luxurious and comfortable, use the brush to sweep powder across the face to set your foundation in place, or in dedicated areas to conceal, highlight and add a flush of blush. A multi-tasking miracle. - K.N.
name: Cosmetics Velvet Brush

product_description:
Lend the perfect finishing touch to your makeup look with the Pixi Eye Accents Kit. Carefully curated to help you achieve dazzling eyes, the set contains a precision mascara, specially designed to define and separate your lower lashes, and a clear brow gel to set your perfectly sculpted brows in place.
Lower Lash Mascara
A water-resistant mascara specially created to coat the lower, hard-to-reach lashes. Combining a vitamin-rich formula with a precision, short bristled brush, the mascara expertly coats and separates from root to tip, delivering a shock of black that is long-wearing and suitable for sensitive eyes. Infused with Vitamin E and Panthenol to nourish, strengthen and protect. No parabens. Not tested on animals.
Brow Tamer
A long-wearing, clear brow gel that expertly sets and defines your brows, all day. Holding your desired shape in place, the gel is the perfect finishing touch for your eyebrows. Its Aloe Vera-infused formula feels calming on skin, and it leaves brows with a natural, soft effect.
name: Eye Accents Kit

product_description:
Add luscious colour to your pout with Pixi's Get The Look Palette - It's Lip Time; a collection of twelve lip crèmes in a range of natural and vibrant shades.
Blending effortlessly onto lips to deliver high-pigmented, non-drying colour, each lip tint can be worn alone or layered with other shades to create a customised finish. Complete with a mirror for mistake-free application on-the-move.
name: Get The Look Palette - It's Lip Time

product_description:
Shape, define and tame your brows with Eylure Brow Magician, an innovative 2-in-1 eyebrow kit that allows you to fill, sculpt and set your brows.
The dual-ended tool features a brow crayon to one end; a natural-looking shade that allows you to shape and fill sparse areas for a fuller-looking, more sculpted arch, and a long-stay brow 'mascara' to the other; its easy-to-use, loaded spoolie brush enhances and builds colour whilst taming hairs into place.
Brows look beautifully sculpted and defined.
name: Brow Magician (Various Shades)

product_description: Expertly define your eyes from every angle with the Kohl Eyeliner Pencil from Lottie London. Featuring a precision tip for controlled application, the eye pencil glides on effortlessly to deliver a look as subtle or dramatic as desired. Creates a gel-like finish with excellent stay-ability. Can be sharpened.
name: London Longwear Kohl Eyeliner Pencil 9g (Various Shades)

product_description:
Refresh the lips with the Hurraw! Lemon Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Fortified with a hydrating blend of Sweet Almond, Jojoba Seed and Olive Fruit Oil, the creamy citrus lip balm envelops lips in long lasting moisture in just one simple swipe. The balm works to eliminate areas of dryness, whilst treating the pout to an uplifting lemon fragrance. Expect touchably soft lips with an added lemony kick due to the addition of Malagasy Lemongrass.
name: Lemon Lip Balm

product_description:
Add natural-looking colour to your complexion with the Daniel Sandler Watercolour Crème Rouge Blush in 'Soft Bronze'; a delicate pink-peach hybrid with a twist of bronze.
Infused with an antioxidant blend of Vitamin E and Grape Seed Oil, the blusher blends effortlessly onto bare skin or over foundation to deliver smooth, streak-free colour, whilst defending against free radicals and environmental aggressors. Enhances natural radiance for glowing perfection.
name: Sandler Watercolour Creme Rouge Blush - Soft Bronze (3.5g)

product_description:
Enhance your lips with the ModelCo Shine Lip Gloss in 'Marshmallow', a shimmering, high shine lip lacquer that delivers a shock of beautifully reflective colour with long-lasting finish.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with its wand applicator, the non-sticky gloss imparts a soft colour tint and features an in-built mirror for flawless, on-the-go applications . Lips looks luscious and hydrated.
name: Shine Lip Gloss - Marshmallow

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Color Correcting Concealer Palette from Bellápierre Cosmetics.
Counteract the look of redness, dark circles and uneven skin tones with this multi-tasking kit, containing six versatile concealers that use color opposites to neutralize imperfections, a technique used by makeup artists for decades.
The creamy, mineral-based formulas effortlessly glide onto skin and seamlessly blend for a natural finish. Housed in a chic compact with a convenient mirror, the palette is a must-have set for any beauty buff to combat discolouration and blemishes.
name: Cosmetics Color Correcting Concealer Palette

product_description:
Achieve a flawless and radiant complexion with Laura Geller's Spackle® Treatment Under Make-Up Primer in 'Champagne'; a lightweight formula that works to instantly smoothen uneven skin whilst prolonging make-up wear and adding a subtle glow to the complexion.
Offering all the benefits of the original Spackle® primer with added shimmer, the antioxidant-rich primer glides effortlessly across the skin, improving texture and minimising the appearance of imperfections. Suitable for all skin types, your complexion will look perfected and softened thanks to its dose of Aloe Vera Gel. Fortified with White Tea and Centella Asiatica Extracts.
name: Geller Spackle Under Make-Up Primer Champagne 59ml

product_description: Create intricate eye makeup looks with Lottie London's Shade and Shadow Brush, a professional-grade, angled shadow brush with ultra-soft bristles. Perfect for shaping, smudging and lining, the brush delivers the perfect amount of colour, adding definition and shape to the eye with precision. Can be used in the crease, corners or across the entire lid to create smooth or blurred out lines. - K.N.
name: London Shade and Shadow Brush

product_description:
Drench lips in a tropical treat with the Hurraw! Papaya Pineapple Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Formulated with over 60% Cold Pressed Papaya Seed Oil, the lip balm is rich in essential fatty acids, which envelop skin in a veil of nourishing moisture. The lip balm also boasts a generous dose of Papaya Fruit Extract, which works to eliminate dead skin cells and reveal ultra-soft and smooth lips. Complete with a delicious Pineapple scent, the lip balm leaves lips thoroughly nourished and completely kissable in one simple swipe.
name: Papaya Pineapple Lip Balm

product_description: A setting powder that delivers the fine textured translucent layer that fits for the flawless finish. By blending the 4 different textures with the powder brush, they work to eliminate the shine on T-zone and correct the tone for a natural bright complexion. Comes in a compact with a sliding compartment to keep the brush in place.
name: Pressed Powder - N01

product_description: Brighten up with Lottie London's Treasure Tattoos, a set of easy-to-use, metallic body transfers. Perfect for enhancing an outfit, the golden tats can be layered or paired with jewellery to create cool, festival-inspired, boho vibes. - K.N.
name: London Treasure Tattoos

product_description:
Create stunning yet natural-looking eyes with the Pixi Crayon Combo - Super Natural (2.21g). With a matte charcoal brown to line and a glowing nude tan to define, this double-ended pencil will instantly enhance your peepers.
Enriched with energising caffeine, soothing chamomile and brightening pearl powder, the waterproof pencil gives rich colour payoff, whilst being easily blendable for a soft-focus effect. Super smooth, the colour glides on effortlessly and stays put around the clock. - L.M.

Directions of Use:
name: Crayon Combo - Super Natural (2.21g)

product_description:
Enhance the look of your pout with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss, a plumping lip formula that works to add a slick of colour to your lips whilst creating a fuller appearance.
Delivering high shine colour, the lip gloss glides effortlessly across lips with a cushion like feel, and expertly stimulates hyaluronic synthesis to enhance your natural lip shape. Lips appear fuller, smoother and plumper. Leaving lips with a lasting tingling sensation, the lip gloss will boost lips, your mood and your confidence.
name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss - Fireworks

product_description: Working to give you thick, black lashes that really flutter, the gorgeous Lord & Berry Back to Black Mascara is designed to give your lashes a serious lift. – E.D
name: & Berry Back to Black Mascara

product_description:
Line and define your eyes with KORRES Pencil Kohl Minerals - Black. Formulated with nourishing vitamins and tonic volcanic minerals, it has a satin soft texture that glides effortlessly onto your eyes, so you can create the perfect smokey eye.
Intensely pigmented, it produces long-lasting and smudge-proof definition that stays put around the clock. - L.M.
name: Pencil Kohl Minerals - Black

product_description:
Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion with the ModelCo Mco Translucent Pressed Powder; a weightless, mattifying powder that creates an undetectable veil over skin for a shine-free finish.
Infused with antioxidant Vitamin E, the velvety formula blends seamlessly onto skin to set make-up in place, whilst controlling unwanted shine and blurring imperfections to reveal a picture-perfect complexion. Delivers natural to medium coverage to help improve skin tone and texture.
name: Mco Translucent Pressed Powder - Neutral

product_description:
Create natural or smokey eye makeup looks with Lancôme Ombre Hypnôse Mono Eye Shadow in 'P203 Rose Perlée', a dusky pink colour with pearly finish.
Sweeping effortlessly onto lids, the smooth, easy-to-blend eyeshadow delivers buildable colour that can be applied subtly to create a sheer wash, or built upon for an intensified, dramatic look. Highly pigmented, the crease-resistant eyeshadow imparts smooth, even coverage every time for a flawless, show-stopping effect.
Housed in a mini compact with dual-ended applicator sponge.
name: Ombre Hypnôse Mono Eye Shadow - P203 Rose Perlée

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your complexion with the Trifle Cosmetics Creamsicle; a creamy, tinted lip and cheek stain with a long-wearing finish.
Infused with Organic Shea Butter, the blendable, buildable balm melts onto skin to soften and moisturise, whilst delivering smooth, vibrant colour for a bright, lit-from-within look that won't fade.
name: Cosmetics Creamsicle - Gelato 20ml

product_description:
Treat and conceal with Uriage's Hyséac Acne Treatment and Concealer Stick, a multi-tasking anti-blemish stick formulated to conceal and ‘heal’ imperfections on combination to oily skin.
Easy-to-use and perfect for on-the-go, the dual-skincare formula offers a hydro-alcoholic lotion to dry out imperfections whilst soothing skin, and a correcting balm that helps camouflage blemishes with its tinted hue and soft-focus powders. The product's antibacterial properties and TLR2-Regul® complex help skin look flawless and mattified, whilst Uriage Thermal water soothes, moisturises and strengthens the skin's barrier.
Skin appears clear and calm.
name: Hyséac Acne Treatment and Concealer Stick

product_description:
Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the butter LONDON Lippy Liquid; a long-wearing formula that combines the pigment of a lipstick with the shine of a gloss.
Infused with Shea Butter and antioxidant Vitamin E, the liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to moisturise and protect lips, whilst delivering non-drying colour with an ultra-glossy finish. Expect smooth, luscious lips that are subtly scented with delicious notes of Vanilla.
name: LONDON Lippy Liquid - Fruit Cake

product_description: Expertly define your eyes from every angle with the butter LONDON Iconoclast Liquid Liner in 'Brilliant Black'. Featuring a precision tip for controlled, mistake-free application, the eyeliner glides on effortlessly to create subtle, thin lines or dramatic cat eyes. Delivers a high-shine, long-wearing finish that lasts up to sixteen hours.
name: LONDON Iconoclast Liquid Liner - Brilliant Black

product_description:
The Sigma Spa® Spa® Express Brush Cleaning Glove is an innovative, compact brush cleaning device designed to thoroughly clean your favourite makeup brushes quickly and effectively.
The cleaning glove features a universally fit strap to be placed around the thumb and wrist for security, and seven patented textures including 'Wash', 'Rinse' and  'Refine' designed to deep clean both eye and face brushes.
Travel friendly, the unique cleaning tool is perfect for those on-the-go or with a modest brush collection. - K.N.
name: Spa® Express Brush Cleaning Glove

product_description:
Create a fuller-looking pout with Maybelline's Color Drama Lip Contour Palette in 'Blushed Bombshell', an all-in-one lip colour kit that allows you to prime, line, colour and highlight your lips.
Equipped with a dual-ended applicator brush, the palette combines a carefully curated range of nude and pink hues that are perfect for priming, defining and brightening your lips; use the brush to prime, line, fill and highlight for luscious, contoured lips.
name: Color Drama Lip Contour Palette 4g - Blushed Bombshell

product_description:
Get statement lashes with Lord & Berry Mascare  Treatment Mascara. The 3-in-1 formula thickens, volumes and treats your  lashes to leave them in pristine condition. Quick-drying, the mascara  won't clump, making it an essential addition to your make-up collection.
Directions: Use the in-built wand to apply the mascara to both upper and lower lashes. Remove with eye make-up remover.
name: & Berry Mascare Treatment Mascara - Black

product_description:
DuWop Mattillume Purifying Translucent Powder Lighter mattifies while providing a subtle luminosity and diffuses the appearance of fine lines. A crescent of deeper pigment allows the colour to be customised.
DuWop Mattillume Purifying Translucent Powder Lighter looks and feels like a translucent powder but is actually an innovation in baked clay, with a texture defined by lightness and incomparable transparency. 
Much like a traditional clay mask, DuWop Mattillume Purifying Translucent Powder also draws skin impurities to the surface where they can be washed away at the end of the day. This natural, paraben-free, oil-free, fragrance-free and talc-free formula glides on with ease, resulting in a luminous, fresh and pure complexion.
DuWop Mattillume is paraben-free, oil-free, fragrance-free and talc-free. DuWop never tests products on animals.
Directions of use:
name: Mattillume Purifying Translucent Powder - Lighter

product_description:
Achieve brighter eyes with the Endless Silky Eye Intensify Duo from Pixi, a brand who create skin-loving products to give you a flawless finish in fuss-free minutes. The dual-ended eye liner is waterproof and provides long-lasting wear with a smudge-free application. Its silky formula allows the pencil to glide effortlessly onto the eyelid to bring out natural tones and enhance eyes. E.N.
Directions for use: Trace the lash line with the darker shade in the duo, then highlight the inner and outer corners with the lighter end of the pencil.
name: Endless Silky Eye Intensify Duo - Brown Eye Intensify

product_description: Accentuate your eyes with the Illamasqua Masquara Gain; an innovative mascara to volumise, lengthen and define lashes. Infused with a walnut-derived active that acts as a natural dye extract, the jet black formula tints lashes for ultimate impact and definition, allowing you to experience improved colour intensity after just two weeks. Lashes appear bigger, bolder and expertly enhanced.
name: Masquara Gain

product_description:
Achieve a sunkissed glow with theBalm's Betty-Lou Manizer, a 3-in-1 bronzer, shimmer and eyeshadow.
With a shimmering bronze finish, the silky pressed powder is perfect for creating a subtle glow and brightening the eyes. Sweep across your cheekbones and brow bones for a healthy glow, or sweep sparingly over the entire face for a subtly radiant complexion. - K.N.
Talc-free.
name: Betty Lou Manizer 3-in-1 Bronzer

product_description:
Create contoured eye makeup looks with the Illamasqua Eyeshadow Brush, an easy-to-use makeup tool fitted with synthetic bristles.

Perfect for diffusing and blending cream and powder products with its moulded shape, the makeup brush features a mix of soft, large and short bristles; utilise the shorter hairs for controlled colour placement, and the larger hairs for expert blending. Buff away colour in circular motions for a smouldering finish.

Hypoallergenic. Suitable for all skin types. Cruelty-free.
name: Eyeshadow Blending Brush

product_description:
Inspired by the original rainbow face powder created in 1917, Shiseido's 7 Lights Powder Illuminator can be used as a highlighter, blush, bronzer or an all-over powder.
Infused with innovative light-reflecting pigments, the unique powder combines seven rainbow-coloured shades to address multiple skin concerns; it blends seamlessly onto skin to help correct uneven tone, combat dryness and restore a radiant, healthy-looking glow. Housed in a mirrored compact.
name: 7 Lights Powder Illuminator 10g

product_description:
Calling all Watercolour devotees, this Daniel Sandler Watercolour Crème-Rouge Blusher in Soft Pink is perfect for those who fell in love with his award-winner fluid formulas who want a flawless finish with long-stay and water resistant results!
This Daniel Sandler Watercolour Crème-Rouge Blusher in Soft Pink comes with added care for the cheeks and contains anti-oxidants vitamin E and grape seed oil to help fight free radicals. Daniel hates to set rules, so he created this soft pink shade to be as versatile as possible on a spectrum of complexions. He recommends soft pink for warm skin tones.
Directions of use:
name: Sandler Watercolour Creme-Rouge Blusher - Soft Pink (3.5g)

product_description:
Made from premium stainless steel with a chic rose gold design, The Vintage Cosmetics Company Scissors allow you to precisely cut fingernails, toenails and strip lashes.
Easy to use, their sleek, sharp design makes them a must-have beauty tool for all your trimming needs. Housed in vintage-inspired, floral packaging.
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Scissors - Rose Gold

product_description: Define your eyes with Maybelline's Colossal Go Extreme Mascara; a plumping mascara to enhance eyelashes. With an expert collagen, clump-free formula, the black mascara delivers ultimate impact and maximum definition so you can create a look as dramatic as desired. Its specially designed, double curved wand allows more product to reach the super-sized brush for extra volume and bigger, bolder lashes.
name: Colossal Go Extreme Mascara Black 9.5ml

product_description:
Create endless make-up looks with the 'Go Natural' 12 Eyeshadow Palette from Bellápierre Cosmetics. Combining twelve neutral hues, you can define and highlight eyes with excellent colour longevity and seamless blendability.
Melting effortlessly onto the lids for smooth and even application, the rich, velvety eyeshadow powders can be worn alone or together for customised colour that won't crease, fade or smudge. Housed in a convenient compact with a dual-ended brush and built-in mirror.
name: Cosmetics 12 Eyeshadow Palette - Go Natural

product_description: Accentuate your eyes with the Mellow Cosmetics Baked Eyeshadow; a silky smooth powder that delivers long-wearing, crease-resistant colour. Blendable and buildable, the high-pigmented eyeshadow can be applied dry for a soft, smokey finish, or wet for a more intense eye make-up look with superior staying power.
colour: Coco, Gold, Jade, Lilac, Metallica, Olive, Peach, Pitch, Plum
name: Cosmetics Baked Eyeshadow (Various Shades)

product_description:
This anti-ageing super moisturiser lifts plumping to a new level! Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Plump Perfect Ultra Lift And Firm Moisture Lotion SPF 30 smoothes surface lines, and targets deeper wrinkles to firm, lift and re-densify the look of your skin.
Experience next level ceramide plumping benefits with CPT technology (cellular plumping technology) and SNAP-8, a new peptide, and collagen-supporting naturally-derived extract which acts as a double dimension skin plumper.
With continued use of this lightweight Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Plump Perfect Ultra Lift And Firm Moisture Lotion you’ll notice your skin will appear smoother, firmer, visibly relaxed and revitalised. With broad spectrum UVA/UVB SPF 30 it also helps protect from the ageing effects of the sun.
name: Arden Ceramide Plump Perfect Ultra Lift And Firm Moisture Lotion Spf 30 (50ml)

product_description:
Create defined yet natural-looking brows with the High Definition Brow Crème; a versatile formula that helps to fill in brows and enviably frame the face.
Arriving in three shades that cover hair colours ranging from fair to dark, the brow crème works on all hair and skin tones. The rich formula glides onto brows like a cream, but dries with a matte finish, similar to a powdered product. Working to fill sparse brows and add definition in the form of transfer-resistant hair-like strokes, the brow crème ensures eyebrows appear flawless all day, and all night.
Bombshell: Best suited to fair hair and skin.
Foxy: Ideal for medium hair and skin.
Vamp: Perfect for dark hair and skin.
name: Definition Brow Crème (Various Shades)

product_description:
Create endless make-up looks with the Illamasqua Sealing Gel; a primer and setting gel that transforms powder products into a water-resistant paste.
Ideal for brow products, eyeliner or eyeshadow, the fast-drying formula ensures superior longevity, whilst intensifying colour so you can achieve a bolder, statement look. Can also be applied before foundation for a smoother, more refined finish.
name: Sealing Gel 6ml

product_description:
Treat your skin to the ultimate in colour, coverage and anti-ageing  technology with Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Lift and Firm Makeup SPF 15  30ml. Enriched with CPT technology, it plumps, lift and firms the  skin, giving a more cushioned and youthful appearance.
Mica and alumina blur the look of fine lines, creating a luminous,  soft focus effect. The ceramide triple complex strengthens and  retexturises your skin, whilst the calibrated micropsheres deliver  precise, long-lasting colour. Directions of Use:Apply using your fingers, blending upwards and outwards.
colour: Beige, Bisque, Cognac, Cream, Vanilla Shell, Warm Sunbeige
name: Arden Ceramide Lift and Firm Makeup SPF15 30ml

product_description:
Perfect the look of your complexion with theBalm's BalmShelter Tinted MoisturiserSPF 18, a lightweight formula developed to even and smoothen the appearance of your skin.
Delivering a weightless veil of silky-smooth protection, the tinted moisturiser blends seamlessly to even out skin tone and improve texture, whilst shielding from damaging UV rays and hydrating the complexion. Expect a smoother, more refined looking canvas.
name: BalmShelter Tinted Moisturiser SPF18 (Various Shades)

product_description:
Highlight your best features with ALGENIST Reveal Concentrated Luminizing Drops, a lightweight serum highlighter infused with light reflecting pigments and ultra-fine, luminous pearls to lend your complexion a radiant glow.
Gliding effortlessly onto skin, the featherweight formula diffuses light to create a soft focus, luminous effect whilst colour correcting and treating uneven skin tone with an AlgaCorrecting Complex. Wear it alone to highlight targeted areas such as the cheekbones and down the centre of the nose, or mix with your daily beauty products for an all-over glow. It also delivers anti-ageing and blurring properties with its dose of Alguronic Acid; a patented compound that helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Expect naturally radiant-looking skin.
name: Reveal Concentrated Luminizing Drops 15ml (Various Shades)

product_description:
Achieve unbeatable volume with PUPA Vamp! Mascara; a thickening, high-performance formula that delivers high definition lashes. Enriched with an array of waxes, the smudge-proof mascara boasts a creamy formula that coats each individual lash, whilst a special filming agent offers strong yet flexible hold.
The built-in applicator is designed in an intelligent sinuous shape with soft and dense fibers. This allows for the ideal dose of mascara to create exaggerated and volumised lashes. The round tip allows you to target the shortest and most difficult to reach eyelashes, ensuring each hair is coated for the fullest results.
colour: Chocolate Brown, Deep Night, Extra Black
name: Vamp! Mascara 9ml (Various Shades)

product_description:
Enhance your pout with Ciaté London's Kiss Collective Mini Liquid Velvet Lipstick Trio, a set of moisturising, matt lipsticks enriched with intensely conditioning, Hyaluronic Acid.
Delivering a creamy, non-drying colour with highly pigmented pay off, the lipsticks utilise Ciaté’s proprietary blend of moisturising PlushPigment™ to create lush, velvety colour that glides effortlessly onto lips for a bold finish. Their dose of Hyaluronic Acid helps lips appear smooth, supple and fuller, and their precision tips ensure perfect application. Lips look matt and sultry with incredible hydration.
The Set Contains Shades: 'Starlet', 'Pin Up', and 'Wonderland'.
name: London Kiss Collective Mini Liquid Velvet Lipstick Trio

product_description:
The Laura Geller Iconic New York City Collection Eye Shadow Palette in ‘Downtown Cool’ is an opulent edit of chic shades inspired by the cultural hub of downtown Manhattan, whether it's an insightful tour around a historical museum or dinner in ever-on-trend SoHo.
The mirrored compact houses twelve carefully-curated eyeshadows in a range of shades and finishes, from matte nude to shimmering gold, each with a rich, densely-pigmented formula. Easily blended, each shade sweeps across the lid for instant, stay-true colour, perfect for creating subtle daytime looks or a sultry smoky eye.
Shades: Cloud Nine (lustrous bisque)
Heather (dusty matte plum)
Shimmer Toast (glimmering rosy taupe)
Electric Plum (purple pearl)
Sahara (matte mushroom)
Brick (matte cayenne)
Gilded Bronze (metallic brass)
Navy (matte navy blue)
Cream (matte vanilla)
Nutmeg (matte clay)
Goddess (sparkling topaz)
Gotham (black onyx)
name: Geller The Iconic New York City Collection Eye Shadow Palette in Downtown Cool 13.2g

product_description:
Perfect your pout with Stila's Stay All Day® Liquid Lipstick, a creamy-matt lip colour that delivers full coverage with a long-wearing finish that stays put for up to six hours.
Enriched with Vitamin E and Avocado Oil, the weightless liquid lipstick glides effortlessly over lips, intensely nourishing and hydrating whilst imparting a shock of comfortable colour that won't bleed or transfer. Equipped with a doe foot applicator, lips are left silky, supple and saturated in moisture.
name: Stay All Day Liquid Lipstick 3ml (Various Shades)

product_description:
Inject life into dull, dry lips with the Hurraw! Orange Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
The rich and creamy balm effortlessly glides over lips, enveloping them in a veil of essential moisture, due to the skin-loving combination of Sweet Almond, Jojoba and Castor Seed Oil. Delivering an uplifting orange fragrance in one simple swipe, the lip balm refreshes lips, leaving skin soft, smooth and smelling good enough to eat.
name: Orange Lip Balm

product_description:
ModelCo have collaborated with American model, Hailey Baldwin, to create the Super Lips Long-Lasting Lip Lacquer.
Weightless and non-sticky, the high shine formula combines the texture and finish of a gloss with the staying power and pigment of a lipstick; it glides effortlessly onto lips with its precise applicator tip, saturating your pout in vivid colour that nourishes and hydrates to lend lips a fuller, plumped-up appearance.
Long-lasting and richly pigmented, the lip gloss will leave your lips with a luxe, high shine finish.
name: Super Lips Long-Lasting Lip Lacquer (Various Shades)

product_description: Experiment and create the perfect brows with the Shiseido Eyebrow Styling Compact in medium brown. This compact kit contains two medium brown powders and a double-sided applicator for you to mix and blend to your desired look. Complete with a mirror inside the compact, you can pop the palette into your handbag and touch up your brows on the go. - K.R
name: Eyebrow Styling Compact BR602 4g

product_description:
Treat lips to a herbal infusion using the Hurraw! Kapha Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Inspired by basic Ayurvedic Dosha principles, a traditional medicine of India, the rich lip balm is infused with Cold Pressed Organic Sesame Seed Oil and an array of plants, fruits and roots known to complement each Dosha. The creamy balm is enriched with organic Coconut Oil, Cacao Butter and Castor Oil, which work in synergy to deliver long-lasting moisture that ensures lips are free from dryness.
Complete with fragrances from three essential oils, zesty grapefruit, stimulating eucalyptus and warming ginger, the lip balm envelops lips in nourishing moisture and an energising scent.
name: Kapha Lip Balm

product_description:
The Genuine Lapland Lip Balm from Polaar delivers intense hydration all year round. Its magical formula is infused with a vitamin-rich blend of arctic raspberries, blackberries and lingon berries for powerful antioxidant protection against wind, cold temperatures and pollution.
Fast-absorbing and non-greasy, the white beauty balm is packed with nourishing shea butter, beeswax and coconut oil to repair dryness and deeply moisturise lips, leaving you with restored, comforted skin no matter where you are.
name: The Genuine Lapland Lip Balm Tube 10ml

product_description:
Gently cleanse your face with the Embryolisse Milky Makeup Remover, a nourishing emulsion that envelops your skin in a soft, creamy cocoon to gently yet effectively remove makeup and impurities.
Rich in natural active ingredients known for being gentle and tolerant, the formula cleanses deep down whilst respecting your skin's natural barrier; moisturising and soothing even the driest, most sensitive of complexions.
Ideal for dry and sensitive skin, the milky emulsion will leave your skin feeling cleansed, revitalised and most importantly, comfortable. - K.N.
name: Milky Make Up Remover Emulsion (200ml)

product_description:
DuWop Moon Venom makes your lips twinkle in the twilight. With all the pout perfecting power of the original Lip Venom, this version of the classic gloss shines with opal tones. A creamy dazzler that will leave lips shining like the stars!
Blood rushes to the surface as the blend of essential oils work their magic. Cinnamon, ginger, jojoba & creamy avocado oils help to create the tingle & provide your lips with a chic sheen.  Ultra light in texture & appearance, with not the slightest hint of “jam-jar stickiness”, DuWop's Moon Venom has a milky richness that allows you to glam-up day or night with pearly shimmer. A fantastic twist on an old favourite. Don't miss out on this lip plumper that will have you dancing in the moonlight, and outshining the others to boot!
Celebrity fans of the Venom line include Lindsay Lohan, Jennifer Aniston, Teri Hatcher, and Sienna Miller.
Directions of use:
Not tested on animals.
name: Moon Venom (3.5ml)

product_description: Perfect your complexion with the PUPA Luminys Baked All Over Illuminating Blush Powder. Developed with ‘baking’ technology to create an ultra-smooth and highly pigmented formula, the face powder features gradual ombré coloured powders in subtle stripes. With a soft shimmer, the shades are perfect for adding dynamic depth to cheeks and a touch of highlight, with universally flattering hues to suit all skin tones.
name: Luminys Baked All Over Illuminating Blush Powder - Natural Stripes

product_description: This soft-bristled concealer brush allows you to apply and blend at the same time. A precision tool ideal for reducing imperfections and covering up any dark circles or blemishes. Featuring a weighted handle with an embossed brush name for easy reference. 'Look Good Feel Better' is the only global cancer charity supporting women with the visible side effects of cancer treatment. E.N.
name: Good Feel Better Concealer Brush

product_description:
Apply contour cream with precision using the Spectrum Collections C05 Domed Contour Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘Best Face Forward’ brush is intelligently crafted with super soft, synthetic bristles that effortlessly pick up cream contour products. The brush glides over skin, sculpting enviable cheekbones and achieving a flawless contour. Designed to be used before larger contour brushes, which blend out the product, the domed contour brush is an essential addition to any brush collection.
name: Collections C05 Domed Contour Brush

product_description:
Focus on the finer details with the Spectrum Collections A19 Fine Detailer Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
Working on the face, eyes and lips, the versatile ‘To The Point’ brush boasts soft yet firm, synthetic bristles, which boast an array of uses. The unicorn-inspired detailer brush can be used to apply concealer, fill brows and complete an intricate eye look. The brush is an essential addition to any perfectionist’s brush collection.
name: Collections A19 Fine Detailer Brush

product_description: Handmade and complete cruelty free, the Illamasqua Dolly False Eye Lashes add subtle volume and length to your natural lashes. Super soft and lightweight, they are perfect for any occasion with a super delicate and defined finish. Long lasting and reusable, you can create a flirty, natural look with ease time and again.
name: Hypnotica Dolly Lashes

product_description:
Keep your feet snug and smelling sweet with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Aloe Vera Infused Cosy Socks.
Infused with a fresh Aloe Vera scent, the slipper socks will keep your feet warm and cosy whilst imparting a subtle fragrance to help uplift the senses.
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Aloe Vera Infused Cosy Socks - Mint

product_description: Handcrafted using natural fibres, the medium Japonesque Pro Eye Shadow Fluff Brush will create highlights of colour from the lid to the brow bone, as well as allowing for the precise application of colour on all eye areas. The makeup brush also has a long handle for optimum leverage. - L.M.
name: Pro Eye Shadow Fluff Brush - Medium

product_description: Define your eyes with The Colossal Go Extreme Mascara from Maybelline, a plumping mascara to enhance eyelashes. With an expert collagen, clump-free formula, the black mascara delivers ultimate impact and maximum definition so you can create a look as dramatic as desired. Its specially designed, double curved wand allows more product to reach the super-sized brush for extra volume and bigger, bolder lashes. E.N.
name: The Colossal Go Extreme Mascara - Black

product_description:
Designed to soothe, refresh and replenish the skin, the Pixi H2O Skintint in warm enhances the complexion for a naturally radiant look. Paraben and fragrance free, it contains Green Tea and Rose Water to moisturise and provide antioxidants, whilst Chamomile and Lavender soothe for a replenishing effect.
Lighter and more breathable than traditional foundations, Skintint gives your skin an even, all over natural coverage that lasts. Suitable for sensitive skin, it's a must have for your makeup bag! K.D.
name: H2O Skintint - 3 Warm

product_description:
Get that effortless sun-kissed glow with the Radiance Gel Bronzer from Chantecaille. Super light-weight and ultra-moisturising, the innovative liquid gel hybrid adds a beautiful touch of bronze whilst hydrating and smoothing skin.
Extracts of Raspberry Stem Cells act as a powerful antioxidant to soothe visible redness, and anti-ageing Bearberry Complex helps to reduce the appearance of fine lines. Long lasting and crease-free, it's the perfect tan enhancer - simply add a drop to foundation or dab onto cheekbones for a gorgeously radiant complexion.
name: Radiance Gel Bronzer Anti-Age

product_description:
Expertly frame the face with the Spectrum Collections A14 Brow Definer Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘Wing It’ brow brush boasts super soft yet firm, synthetic bristles and a precise, angled brush head, which makes applying gel, wax or powder brow makeup effortless. The winged definer leaves brows defined and enhanced.
The unicorn-inspired brush can also be used to apply gel eyeliner. The angled head reaches right into the lash line to deliver precise application and a fierce, cat-eye flick.
name: Collections A14 Brow Definer Brush

product_description: Control oily and combination skin with the Poreraxel Sebum Control Pact from Korean brand Skin79; a mattifying face powder that effectively balances and regulates sebum production for a smooth finish. Enriched with extracts of antioxidant-rich Lavender and anti-bacterial Marjoram, the refined formula alleviates the look of redness and imperfections while absorbing excess grease, particularly in the susceptible T-zone.
name: Poreraxel Sebum Control Pact

product_description:
Achieve a naturally flawless complexion with Mizon Watermax Moisture BB Cream, a lightweight beauty balm fortified with SPF 25 for sun protection.
Delivering a veil of perfection onto skin that never looks caked, the BB cream expertly conceals imperfections and smoothens the appearance of skin with a natural-looking finish. It resists moisture and provides the complexion with a long-lasting flawless appearance. It also contains a blend of Shea Butter, Mango Seed Oil and Aloe to intensely nourish.
name: Watermax Moisture BB Cream 50ml

product_description:
The perfect all rounder for brightening and lightening those gorgeous  eyes. The Eye Bright Kit from Pixi is a compact set for on the go touch  ups, containing two concealers, one brightener and one highlighter to  awaken eyes.
Hiding imperfections and camouflaging dark circles, a crease-free  formula with anti-aging ingredients protect and nourish your eyes.
name: Eye Bright Kit No.2 Medium/Tanned

product_description:
Achieve a flawless base with the Maybelline Master Camo Color Correcting Concealer Kit in 'Medium', a complexion-perfecting palette that corrects, conceals and highlights to create a photo-ready canvas.
Colour correcting your skin in three easy steps, the kit offers carefully curated colours that target specific skin tone concerns, such as redness, dark circles and blemish pigmentation. Its neutralising and brightening properties counteract and conceal imperfections to lend the skin a beautifully smooth, radiant and even appearance.
Use the correcting shades for banishing pigmentation and under eye circles, and use the highlighter to brighten shadows and enhance natural high points of the face such as the brow bone and cheekbones.
Complete with a dual-ended applicator brush.
name: Master Camo Color Correcting Concealer Kit 6g - Medium

product_description:
Enhance your natural features with PÜR Cameo Stick Dual Ended Contour Stick in 'Light' with Contour Blending Sponge, a 2-in-1 contouring and highlighting formula that works to sculpt and define the natural contours of your face.
Utilising natural light reflective ingredients that illuminate natural highlights whilst defining facial shadows, the formula expertly ‘chisels’ and ‘sculpts’, delivering a creamy texture that sets into a flawless powder finish.
Use the lighter shade to highlight high points on the face, such as the brow and cheekbones, and centre of the nose, and use the deeper shade to emphasise natural shadows such as under the cheekbones, jawline and forehead.
Enriched with a Ceretin® Complex made up of hydrating ceramides and anti-ageing vitamin A, the contouring foundation also helps blur away the appearance of dark spots and fine lines, lending you a flawless, quenched and perfected complexion. Complete with an application sponge for seamless blending.
name: Cameo Stick Dual Ended Contour Stick with Contour Blending Sponge 8.6g - Light

product_description:
Transform your look from day to night with the Gingerbabe Lip Eclipse Collection from Sigma. The collection boasts three different shades of Lip Eclipse lip glosses, which combined as a trio create the perfect gift.
The easy-to-wear liquid lipstick is formulated with a highly-pigmented colour that provides the coverage of a lipstick with the hydration of a gloss. The sponge applicator tip provides extreme control, delivering a precise pout. Lips are left kissably smooth, with a satin finish.
Lip Eclipse - Rosette
A deep dressed up pink / mauve shade.
Lip Eclipse - Seal of Approval
A neutral light pink / nude shade.
Lip Eclipse - She Knows the Ropes
A bright watermelon shade.
name: Gingerbabe Lip Eclipse Collection (Worth £51)

product_description:
Daniel Sandler Watercolour in Gentle is an uptown beige mixed with pretty peach tones. This expensive-looking, sheer nude shade will leave you looking chic and chiselled and is perfect on fair to medium skin tones.
Look at your most beautiful 24/7 with this Daniel Sandler Watercolour in Gentle. Whether you’re rushing around town, sitting on a beach or partying the night away, you’ll look fab from first thing in the morning to last thing at night in this blendable, waterproof formula.
Directions of use:
name: Sandler Watercolour - Gentle (15ml)

product_description: This Natural Brow Duo in soft black from Pixi is a brow pencil and gel combo that can shape and tame your unruly brows in no time. One end of this Brow Duo contains a waterproof brow pencil with an angled tip to give you ultimate application, whilst the other end is home to a tinted soft-hold gel to keep your styled brows in place throughout the day. Now you can achieve super-star polished eyebrows with minimal effort!
name: Natural Brow Duo - Soft Black

product_description:
The new Beautiful Colour Moisturising Lipstick provides a long lasting colour and satin-matte finish that lasts up to 12 hours. The lipstick can be easily applied and will give you soft, smooth and supple lips whilst keeping them moisturised and hydrated without the unwanted sticky residue of other lipsticks.
Providing you with a medium to full coverage the gentle smooth formula is packed full of vitamins and shea butter which help to protect and soothe your lips. Fade free and feather free the Elizabeth Arden Beautiful Colour Moisturising Lipstick is perfect for use on all types and it will give you that all important perfect pout. A.B.
colour: Bold Red, Coral Crush, Nude, Raspberry, Rose Petal
name: Arden Beautiful Color Moisturizing Lipstick Matte Finish Extension (3.5g) (Various Shades)

product_description:
Avoid all blending, bronzing and blushing blunders with Daniel Sandler Kabeauti Brush! This ergonomically designed brush enables instant easy application so you can achieve powder perfection.
This Daniel Sandler Kabeauti Brush measures 600mm by 43mm making the perfect circumference to provide even coverage and avoid under blending or over powdering. Suitable for bronzer, blusher and powder this is the perfect little weapon to carry in your purse.
name: SANDLER KABEAUTI BRUSH

product_description:
Add warm radiance to your skin with Elizabeth Arden Dare to Bare Bronzing Body Oil, a hydrating and illuminating formula that delivers a veil of shimmering bronze from head to toe.
Infused with a cocktail of protective and moisturising ingredients, including Jojoba and Macadamia Oil, and antioxidant Vitamin E, the lightweight bronzing oil instantly hydrates and lends skin a smooth, shimmering glow. Mica helps to blur fine lines and wrinkles for a youthful effect, and its Vanilla and Coconut scent transports your senses to a tropical paradise. 
Skin is radiant and illuminated. Apply to areas that catch the light, such as décolleté and shoulders, or mix with cream blush for a shimmering complexion.
name: Arden Dare to Bare Bronzing Body Oil 50ml (Limited Edition)

product_description: Accentuate your eyes with the Brow Pencil and Highlighter Duo from Lottie London. Featuring a dual-ended design, the pencil combines a highlighter to illuminate brow bones, and a hair-like colour to enhance natural shape and fill in sparse eyebrows. Adds dimension to your face for a professional eye make-up look.
name: London Brow Pencil and Highlighter Duo - Dark

product_description:
Achieve luscious lashes and intense colour with the Full Lash Volume Mascara from Shiseido. With a smudge-free formula and the brand's patented 360° Full Expression Brush®, the mascara allows precise application and curls and lifts eyelashes from the root to create an elegant fan effect.
Its exclusive, layerable Curl Up Wax dries instantly to set the curl and can be applied throughout the day without clumping to create a long-lasting look as dramatic or natural as you desire. Easily removed with water. E.N.
name: Full Lash Volume Mascara - Brown

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Mavala Lipstick in 'Dahlia'.
Gliding effortlessly across lips in a uniform layer, the lightweight lipstick delivers a rich, creamy hue that won't settle into fine lines. Its long-lasting coverage ensures lips feel comfortable all day, even if prone to dryness. Ideal for dry or sensitive lips, the lip colour helps protect against dryness for a healthy, supple-looking pout.
name: Lipstick - Dahlia 4g

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your complexion with the Bellapierre Cosmetics Cheek & Lip Stain; an oil-free formula that delivers a healthy glow.
Blendable and buildable, the stain can be applied sparingly for a subtle look, or layered for more intense finish. Use as a lip balm or on the apples of your cheeks for a sheer veil of colour. A handbag must-have.
name: Cosmetics Cheek & Lip Stain (5g)

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Mavala Lipstick in 'Camelia'.
Gliding effortlessly across lips in a uniform layer, the lightweight lipstick delivers a rich, creamy hue that won't settle into fine lines. Its long-lasting coverage ensures lips feel comfortable all day, even if prone to dryness. Ideal for dry or sensitive lips, the lip colour helps protect against dryness for a healthy, supple-looking pout.
name: Lipstick - Camelia 4g

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your pout with the Living Nature Lipstick; a smooth, creamy formula infused with natural pigments and nourishing waxes.
Hand poured and individually flamed to a perfect finish, the lipstick glides effortlessly across the lips to deliver long-wearing, luscious colour, without over-drying.
colour: Bloom, Coral Sea, Dusk, Laughter, Morning Sun
name: Nature Lipstick 4g - Various Shades

Made from soft, hydrophilic fibres, the makeup sponges don’t absorb product for minimal waste, with smooth edges for even coverage and a pointed tip for precise application. Suitable for use wet or dry, with both foundation, blush and bronzer products, the trio allow you to create flawless makeup looks with a smooth, airbrushed finish.

product_description: Add depth and definition to your eyes with the Loose Colour Concentrate Eye Shadow from Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics. Easy to apply, the micro-refined, light-reflecting mineral pigment powder blends seamlessly for expertly defined eyes and crease-proof colour with excellent stay-ability. The versatile formula can be used on the eyes, lips, cheeks and body.

Delivering true colour pigment with a glossy finish, the lightweight, non-sticky lip gloss glides effortlessly across lips with its lip-hugging applicator, imparting rich colour that lasts up to 6 hours and leaves your pout feeling comfortable and cushion soft. Its cocktail of Argan Oil and Vitamin E intensely nourish and protect to keep lips looking healthy and moisturised.

The creamy formula can be used after foundation application for a striking pop of colour, or prior to foundation to lend your cheeks a diffused glow. Its dose of Vitamin E means it can also be used as a lip stain for a complementary makeup finish.

Define your brows with the Eye Brow Cake from Illamasqua. Arriving in an array of shades, the high performance powder has been created to suit and enhance all hair colours.
Giving eyebrows edge, the Brow Cake helps to frame eyes by adding shape and definition to eyebrows with ease. Offering stunning results both wet and dry, apply the powder with an eyebrow brush to produce a flawless and professional looking finish with soft definition or sharp shape.

product_description:
Add natural emphasis to your brows with Lord & Berry's Diva Eyebrow Shadow, a matt-finish eyebrow powder that can be used both wet and dry.
Perfect for shaping, filling and defining your brows, the long-lasting and heat-resistant powder delivers excellent colour payoff, expertly filling in gaps in your brows whilst enhancing their natural shape. Extend the wear by using wet, or experience the soft, silky texture when used dry. Expect well-groomed and polished brows with a natural finish. - K.N.

Easy to blend and expertly buildable, the eyeshadow is perfect for applying over your finished eye makeup; tap along the outer corners of your lid to create dramatic, amplified looks. Complete with a Latex-free silicone applicator.

product_description: Add a flush of colour to your complexion with Chantecaille's Cheek Shade Refill. Formulated with micro-particles and processed with innovative technology to produce an ultra-fine powder, the weightless blusher blends effortlessly onto skin to deliver a subtle wash of colour with a long-lasting, matte finish. product_description: Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the Max Factor Colour Elixir Lipstick. product_description: Enhance your pout with Maybelline's Superstay 24hr Super Impact Lip Colour; a conditioning balm and long-wearing, saturated lip gloss in one convenient design. Available in a range of shades, you can expect bold, kissable colour that lasts.

name: Superstay 24hr Super Impact Lip Colour (Various Shades)

Treat your lips to a burst of colour and intense conditioning with the glo minerals Cream Glaze Lip Crayon; a high-shine, crayon-inspired lip colour.
Anti-oxidant rich, the crayon is infused with Vitamins C and E, alongside a healthy dose of Mango Oil and Shea Butter. The lip colour envelops lips in moisture and nourishing protection, ensuring lips look healthy as well as vibrant.
The pencil arrives with an integrated sharpener located in the cap, ensuring the crayon is always in tip top condition, even whilst on-the-go. Expect intense, highly pigmented lip colour that is long-wearing and ultra-nourishing.

Achieve a flawless complexion with the Velvet Mineral® Pressed Foundation from Amazing Cosmetics.
With a lightweight, ultra-fine texture, the jet-milled pressed powder blends seamlessly onto skin to minimise the appearance of pores, fine lines and imperfections, whilst delivering long-wearing, natural-looking coverage with a silky smooth, undetectable finish. Expect a comfortable, breathable complexion without caking or creasing.
colour: Fair, Medium Beige, Medium Golden, Tan Golden

product_description:
Expertly define your eyes with Sigma's Line Ace Eyeliner; a liquid liner that delivers long-lasting, saturated colour.
Gliding on effortlessly, the fast-drying eyeliner adds drama and definition without flaking, smudging or running for a mistake-free, professional finish. Complete with a tapered precision brush to accentuate eyes in one easy stroke.

product_description:
The make up essential for a trendsetting smile. Get instant sumptuous lips with this PÜR Minerals Summer Collection Pout Pen, a two-in-one balm and stain. Its paraben-free formula is infused with natural extracts to enhance moisture and hydrate lips, whilst shielding from free radical damage for the perfect pout. The precision pen tip glides on for effortless application and highlights your lips to add shine to your smile. E.N.
Directions for use: Apply lip stain to dry lips, then layer with hydrating balm for a pout that lasts all day long.

Infused with ginseng, a powerful antioxidant that works to condition, protect and deeply hydrate for ultimate comfort, lips are left soft, smooth and bursting with sumptuous colour. colour: BAM!, BOOM!, GRRRR!, HUBBA HUBBA!, POP!, POW!, SNAP!, VA VA VOOM!, ZAAP!

Expertly frame your face with the RMK W Eyebrow Color; a dual-ended, brow-defining mascara to enhance volume and create enviable arches with effortless application.
Featuring a unique spoolie brush to groom and shape, and a pointed liner head that draws precise lines, filling in brows for a denser, fuller appearance. Available in a variety of shades to complement the tone of your eyebrows and skin, you can expect a long-wearing, natural-looking finish.
colour: 02 Maron Brown, 03 Golden Mauve, 04 Red Brown

Achieve a flawless, visibly smoother complexion with the Living Nature Concealer; a lightweight, creamy formula that blends effortlessly onto skin to minimise the appearance of imperfections and dark circles, especially around the eye area.
Suitable for all skin types, its blend of Manuka Honey and Manuka Oil nourishes and protects, whilst pure minerals perfect your complexion to prepare for make-up application. Combats uneven skin tone to reveal a brighter, more refined look with a streak-free finish.

product_description: Achieve a flawless complexion with the Air Perfection CC Compact Cushion Foundation from PÜR Minerals. You can choose from a range of NUDESTIX Eye Pencil shades, including cream, shimmer, stardust, gold, bronze, burnish, pewter and smoke.

product_description:
RMK’s Eyelash Curler has a wider curve that will fit along the eye frame, a new resilient rubber filling and more stable handles. These features combined, allow you to gently catch and create curvaceous lashes right from the root.

Directions of use:
name: Eyelash Curler

product_description:

Each tool features dense yet luxuriously soft nylon bristles, which ensure an even and smooth coverage, plus the ergonomically curved handle and oval brush head are designed to adapt to the contours of your face for an immaculate finish.
The larger brushes are ideal for effortlessly blending foundation and buffing out blusher or bronzer, whilst the smaller pieces are perfect for precise contouring and highlighting. Featuring opulent silver-toned ferrules, the brush set will be a gorgeous addition to any dressing table or makeup kit.

The perfect all rounder for brightening and lightening those gorgeous eyes. The Eye Bright Kit from Pixi is a compact set for on the go touch ups, containing two concealers, one brightener and one highlighter to awaken eyes.

product_description: Add sheer colour to your eyes with the RMS Eye Polish; a cream eyeshadow with a glowing, light-reflecting finish. It provides all the benefits of raw mineral pigments without the dryness. Can also be used as a highlighter for a frosted make-up look.

The BB cream boasts a Vita Brightening Complex, allowing the formula to even and visibly brighten skin tone, as well as delivering anti-ageing benefits.
