Suitable for even the most senstive and  problem-prone skin, this stunning bronzer is a makeup bag essential. -  L.M. Directions of Use:
name: Cosmetics Compact Bronzer Starshine

product_description:
Drench your lips in a lustrous sheen with the RMK Color Lip Gloss in 'Apricot Flash'.
Combining the vibrant colour of a lipstick with the clarity of a lip Gloss, the colour glides effortlessly over lips with its square-shaped applicator, and delivers a veil of sheer yet brilliant colour. Its host of moisturising ingredients, including Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil keep lips feeling hydrated and comfortable.
name: Color Lip Gloss - 08 Apricot Flash

product_description:
Achieve a natural-looking, flawless complexion with the Injection Cushion BB Cream SPF50+ PA+++ from Korean skincare brand, Skin79; a moisturising BB cream with a patented, sponge-drenched delivery system.
Housed in a compact, the packaging contains a BB cream-soaked cushion that allows you to 'squeeze out' product by tapping on the makeup-soaked sponge with the application puff. Quick and easy to apply, the cream blends effortlessly into skin, creating a smoother, more even toned complexion that never looks cakey. Its blend of Hydrolyzed Collagen extract and Palmitoyltripeptide-5 enhance skin's moisture, and its innovative packaging ensures the blemish balm is never exposed to air or pollutants which can dry out and negatively affect the makeup's quality. Delivers smooth, natural and long-lasting coverage.
Contains SPF 50+ to keep skin safe from harmful UV rays.
name: Injection Cushion BB Cream SPF50+ PA+++ #21 14g

product_description:
Perfect skin with the Correct Primer from Korean beauty brand Mizon. Universally flattering, the CC primer has a silky-smooth formula that glides across skin to effectively disguise the appearance of enlarged pores, blemishes and lines.
The soft shade brightens and lifts skin, with powder pigments helping absorb excess sebum production and combat excess shine, allowing makeup to last longer. Enriched with Moringa to protect against environmental damage, the multi-tasking balm leaves skin looking flawless and healthy.
name: Correct Primer 8g

product_description:
Perk up your lashes with the Correct Volume Mascara in Black from South Korean-based beauty brand Mizon.
Delivering weightless volume and intense black pigmentation, the mascara adds length and definition without leaving eyelashes feeling heavy or clumped. The silhouette-shaped brush ensures an even and smooth application, catching even the smallest of lashes for fuller and voluptuous results. Easily removed without causing irritation.
name: Correct Volume Mascara - Black 5g

product_description:
Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion with the ModelCo Fluidsplash 3-in-1 Foundation; an oil-free formula that combines the benefits of a concealer, foundation and eye base.
Infused with Aloe Vera and antioxidant Vitamin E, the ultra-hydrating liquid foundation blends seamlessly onto skin to minimise the appearance of blemishes and imperfections, whilst delivering long-lasting coverage for a dewy, radiant finish. Provides SPF15+ protection.
name: Fluidsplash 3-in-1 Foundation - Shore 03

product_description:
Achieve that gorgeous rosy glow with the ModelCo Blush 2-in-1 Duo. Combining two best-selling blusher shades that are universally flattering for all skin tones, the micronised powders seamlessly blend across skin with a buildable coverage for custom intensity and depth. Long lasting and instantly brightening, light diffusing pigments add a soft-focus, healthy-looking radiance. Complete with Kabuki brush for a seamless, professional looking finish.
Shades: Cosmopolitan (dusty rose pink) and Peach Bellini (soft peach shimmer)
name: Blush 2-in-1 Duo

product_description:
Featuring a tapered tip for controlled application, this Natio Liquid Eye Liner in Black provides high definition to the eyes, helping to achieve everything from daytime styles to dramatic night-time looks.
Get gorgeous eyes everyday with this Natio Liqud Eyeliner in Black. Providing professional results time after time, every woman should own a liquid eyeliner like this one!
Directions of use:
name: Liquid Eye Liner - Black (2g)

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your complexion with the Trifle Cosmetics Creamsicle; a creamy, tinted lip and cheek stain with a long-wearing finish.
Infused with Organic Shea Butter, the blendable, buildable balm melts onto skin to soften and moisturise, whilst delivering smooth, vibrant colour for a bright, lit-from-within look that won't fade.
name: Cosmetics Creamsicle - Ganache 20ml

product_description: Sculpt your features like a pro with the Contour Cosmetics Multi Use Contouring Set in Original. Combining six varied shades of smooth cream formulas, the contour palette offers warm undertones and light shades that perfectly suit pale to olive skin tones. With concealer and highlighter hues, each colour blends effortlessly to add definition and shape to your facial structure, leaving you with perfectly chiselled cheekbones and a flawless complexion.
name: Cosmetics Multi Use Contouring Set - Contour Original

product_description:
Create professional-looking eye makeup looks with the Illamasqua Smoulder Eyeshadow Brush, a short, densely packed brush fitted with synthetic bristles.
Perfect for blurring and diffusing out pigments, the brush's dense head expertly smudges and blends product along the eye, creating a smokey, blurred effect that lends your peepers a sultry appearance. Buff away colour in circular motions for a smouldering finish.
name: Smoulder Eyeshadow Brush

product_description: Add a natural glow to your complexion with the Crème Colour Concentrate from Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics. Enriched with a nourishing blend of Aloe Leaf, Cocoa Extract and Vitamin E, the long-wearing cream formula blends seamlessly to deliver a flush of colour with a semi-matte finish. Versatile and easy-to-apply, simply use as an eyeshadow, blush, highlighter or lip colour for endless make-up looks.
name: Compulsive Cosmetics Crème Colour Concentrate (Various Shades)

product_description:
Get a flawless, radiant complexion with the Afterglow Illuminating Powder from PÜR Minerals, a brand who create natural make-up for all women, no matter what their skin tone. Its unique formula is infused with shea butter to smoothen skin and Ceretin® Complex to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for a softer texture. Mica reflects light away from imperfections and blemishes to diffuse the visibility of dark spots. E.N.
Directions for use: Use a powder brush to sweep over your cheeks, brow bone and décolleté. For definition, apply with a flat brush to the brow bone and at an angle from the outer corner of the eye to the nose.
name: Summer Collection Afterglow Illuminating Powder (8g)

product_description:
Create a flawless complexion with the PUPA Professionals BB Cream Primer. Exclusively developed by the PUPA laboratories, the multi-tasking formula combines the moisturising properties of a BB cream with the perfecting benefits of a primer.
A blend of Hyaluronic Acid and Beeswax ensure ultimate hydration and moisture balance, while advanced Silicone Polymers work to create a protective barrier between skin and makeup for longer lasting results. With a natural looking colour pigment coverage and SPF 20, it leaves skin feeling soft, smooth and protected with the appearance of blemishes and imperfections effectively disguised.
name: Professionals BB Cream Primer - Sand Pearl

product_description:
Create a false-lash look with PUPA Diva's Lashes Mascara; a volumising, intense black formula to plump, maximise and thicken lashes in one single stroke.
Utilising microgranules of Black Cellulose, the high-definition mascara delivers ultimate impact without clumping, flaking or smudging, whilst its specially designed brush features larger, stiffer bristles to capture lashes from the root. Expect show-stopping, luscious lashes with maximum control.
name: Diva's Lashes Mascara - Black 10ml

product_description:
Create colourful, captivating lips with the Lip Jelly Gloss 02 from RMK; a sheer tone lip gloss in Romantic Pink. The lip gloss jelly features a thick and glossy formula that adds lustrous juiciness to a plump pout.  
A newly developed, spoon-shaped spatula allows you to coat your lips to perfection with the highly concentrated moisturising gel. Lips are left full, glossy and with juicy colour. – E.W.
name: Lip Jelly Gloss 02

product_description:
Enhance your natural beauty with the INIKA Lip and Cheek Set - Cherry Glam; a four-piece makeup set arriving alongside a convenient cosmetic bag. The all-natural collection boasts an effective primer, mineral blusher, pink lipstick and a lip brush for expert application.
Certified Organic Pure Primer with Hyaluronic Acid (4ml)
Achieve long-lasting foundation coverage with the Certified Organic Pure Primer with Hyaluronic Acid; a hydrating formula that prepares skin for makeup application. Enriched with a generous dose of Hyaluronic Acid, the priming formula delivers a veil of moisture to the complexion, which visibly plumps skin and helps to reduce the appearance of any fine lines or wrinkles. A smooth and hydrated face is the perfect base for ensuring makeup has a lasting, professional- looking finish.
Mineral Blusher Puff Pot - Rosy Glow (3g)
Enhance the complexion with a rosy glow from the Mineral Blusher Puff Pot; a loose powder formula that delivers pure performance. Ideal for sensitive skin types due to its gentle formula, the blusher provides a sweep of warming colour to the cheeks.
Certified Organic Vegan Lipstick - Pink Poppy (4.2g)
Add a pop of colour to the lips with the Pink Poppy Certified Organic Vegan Lipstick; a creamy, pink hue. Enriched with a skin-loving blend of Shea Butter and Jojoba oil, the formula not only delivers enviable colour, but nourishes, hydrates and protects lips. The Pink Poppy hue delivers a long lasting hue with an intense colour pay off.
Vegan Lip Brush
Apply lip colour with precision with the Vegan Lip Brush. Boasting a small yet firm brush head, the applicator applies lipstick, tints or lip gloss evenly and accurately each time, delivering a professional finish. The brush is perfect for taking on-the-go, arriving with a lid, the brush can stay protected whilst inside your handbag.
name: Lip and Cheek Set - Cherry Glam

product_description:
PÜR's Best Seller Kit in 'Light' is a carefully curated makeup set that combines everything you need to achieve a flawless, sunkissed complexion. Combining a primer with a powder foundation, bronzer and mascara, the kit will allow you to experience long-lasting, perfected makeup. Complete with a makeup brush for effortless application.
Prep & Perfect Correcting Primer
A skin-perfecting primer infused with clinically proven ingredients to smooth and prep skin for flawless, long-lasting foundation. Utilising a Ceretin Complex which contains age-defying Retinol, the hydrating formula expertly reduces the appearance of lines and wrinkles whilst instantly minimising the look of pores and promoting a more uniform, even toned complexion. Neutral in colour, the antioxidant-rich primer is suitable for all skin tones, and feels lightweight on skin. Its brightening and firming properties lend your makeup a radiant, youthful finish, and its cocktail of Salicylic Acid, Shea Butter and Aloe Vera work in synergy to decongest pores, moisturise and soothe the complexion. Makeup looks flawless and silky smooth with extended wear.
4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Powder Foundation SPF 15 in 'Light'
A lightweight, pressed powder foundation with award-winning formula that utilises innovative skincare ingredients. Delivering minimal coverage for a natural, flawless complexion, the all-in-one foundation works as a foundation, concealer, powder and SPF simultaneously to improve the appearance of skin; it's clinically proven to camouflage and prevent imperfections. Encapsulated Mineral Water intensely hydrates, whilst botanical extracts promote a brighter, more even toned complexion. Skin looks flawless and is protected against harmful UV rays. Mess-free application. Suitable for contact lens wearers. 
Mineral Glow Powder in 'Bronze'
A micronized mineral bronzer that adds all-over warmth to the complexion. Perfect for sweeping over the whole face, or for contouring to sculpt and define, the powder delivers rich, golden undertones to create a sunkissed finish. Infused with moisturising Shea Butter and a Ceretin Complex that utilises Retinol, it helps to improve elasticity whilst reducing the appearance of lines and wrinkles. Skin looks beautifully radiant, smooth and healthy. Suitable for contact lens wearers. 
Big Look Mascara
A volumising mascara with clump-resistant application wand. Coating lashes in a rich, nourishing formula, the buildable mascara lifts and lengthens even the smallest of eyelashes to create a maximised, dramatised eye makeup look. Infused with Argan Oil, Coconut Oil and antioxidant Vitamin E, the black mascara adds a dewy sheen to lashes whilst intensifying, nourishing and preserving moisture. Lashes are protected and expertly volumised. 
Chisel Brush
A professional makeup brush that has been specially designed to flawlessly apply the 4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Powder Foundation. Working well with all powder products, the brush offers soft, synthetic bristles that pick up and deliver the perfect amount of product for flawless, well-blended results.
name: Best Seller Kit - Light

product_description: Great for those chunky eye liner and lip liner pencils, this Jumbo Sharpener from Lord & Berry is a must have for your make up accessory collection. - J.D
name: & Berry Jumbo Sharpener

product_description:
The Mermaid Matte Eye Shadow Set from Chantecaille boasts highly pigmented, shimmering formulas that can be used dry as an eyeshadow or wet as a distinctive eyeliner. Enriched with luxurious Silk Tree extract, the creamy powder is effortless to apply and easily blended, delivering a buildable base with a deep, rich pigmentation. Soft metallic particles create a gorgeous sheen with intense, long-lasting colour.
Shades: 
Elephant - smokey grey
Lion - creamy vanilla
Bee - neutral brown
name: 3 Mermaid Matte Eye Shadow

product_description: Perfect for storing your favourite Chantecaille shades, the Ma Palette is an eight-piece compact which can hold any eyeshadows, cheek powders or creams from the Chantecaille collection. Featuring a magnetic system to secure the products firmly in place, the palette is conveniently sized for travel and includes a 6”x4” mirror and full sized Eye Basic Brush.
name: Ma Palette

product_description:
Clarify and refresh your complexion with the SAMPAR Velvet Cleansing Milk; a weightless, gentle formula that expertly eliminates all traces of make-up and pollution without stripping moisture.
Infused with Rose Water and Lime Blossom, the luxurious milk purifies and rejuvenates the face and eye area, whilst the brand's groundbreaking Urban Advance Complex of Shea Butter Serum, Mint Endorphin and Probiotic Sugar provides antioxidant protection to defend against the damaging effects of environmental aggressors. Expect a soothed, revitalised complexion with renewed radiance.
name: Velvet Cleansing Milk 200ml

product_description:
Create definition with the Lord & Berry Couture Luxury Eye  Liner. The mechanical pencil liner blends easily whilst providing a  long-lasting and smudge-free finish. Create thin, bold lines, or thicker  definition that's water and humidity resistant. It glides effortlessly  over the skin, and the retractable design with built in sharpener offers  the ultimate in practicality.
Directions: Use small strokes to line to lower and upper lashlines.
name: & Berry Luxury Eye Liner - Black

product_description: This hand-sculpted foundation brush is the ultimate beauty tool for a professional look. Create an even, flawless finish with effortless application. Use to apply, distribute and blend foundation for complete coverage. Featuring a weighted handle with an embossed brush name for easy reference. 'Look Good Feel Better' is the only global cancer charity supporting women with the visible side effects of cancer treatment. E.N.
name: Good Feel Better Foundation Brush

product_description:
Combining durability and high performance, Chantecaille's Eye Liner Brush allows effortless application of brow colour and eyeliner.
Crafted from non-endangered wood with a pale ivory coating and nickel-plated ferrule, the tool features soft, synthetic taklon fibres and a flat, angled tip that lines, defines and shapes for a professional finish.
name: Eye Liner Brush

product_description: Turn heads with the PÜR Minerals Big Look Waterproof Mascara and create a dramatic eye look that stays put even in the rain! The argan oil-based formula is packed full of nourishing ingredients such as omega fatty acids, vitamin E and antioxidants that will ensure your lashes are cared for while they reach for the stars. The applicator features a large handle, with a no-clump tip that covers every millimetre of your lashes to lengthen, thicken and define. This is a cruelty and chemical free mascara that won’t budge until you tell it to! -MB
name: Big Look Waterproof Mascara

product_description:
This Balancing Act Oil Control powder by PÜR Minerals doesn’t just look good, it really works, too! It leaves your skin with a silky veil of neutral sheer powder, effectively using mattifying Sebaryl to fight excess oil. Can be used alone as a sheer foundation to even out skin or over the 4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Makeup for a heavier coverage and reliable shine control. LB
Directions for use:
Using the Chisel Brush, apply in circular motions to achieve an even and flawless finish. Layer as needed for desired coverage.
name: Balancing Act

product_description: Get perfect arches with the bareMinerals Brow Master™ Brow Gel; a smooth, natural-looking formula that seamlessly blends with all hair colours to create a flawless finish. The buildable gel allows you to customise your look, from filling sparse gaps to contouring a precise shape. Applied with an angled brush for maximum precision, eyebrows appear instantly fuller and redefined.
name: Brow Master™ Brow Gel

product_description:
Doubleglow7 from DuWop is a luminous face balm that gives instant radiance and clarity to the skin whether worn under, over, or instead of foundation.
Doubleglow7 contains seven essential skin nourishing ingredients: Jojoba, Aloe Vera, Lily Extract and Illuminating Pearls as well as Vitamins A, E and F. These seven secret weapons conspire to give you gorgeous, glowing skin.
name: Doubleglow7 Champagne 8g

product_description: A multi-functional sponge designed with two distinct surfaces for versatile use. The rounded side helps to blend products for a smoother finish, whilst the tip gives precision and covers imperfections for a flawless look. Featuring a weighted handle with an embossed brush name for easy reference. 'Look Good Feel Better' is the only global cancer charity supporting women with the visible side effects of cancer treatment. E.N.
name: Good Feel Better Flawless Complexion Sponge

product_description:
Volumise lashes to the max with Wake Me Up Mascara Extreme Black from Rimmel, an uplifting mascara to enhance, curl and lengthen eyelashes. Enriched with vitamins and cucumber extract to revitalise and energise lashes, whilst delivering ultimate impact and maximum definition.
Its specially designed wand delivers increased control and smudge-free application so you can create a look as dramatic as desired with a clump-free finish. The precision brush coats lashes from the root for eye-opening results. E.N.
name: Wake Me Up Mascara - Extreme Black

product_description:
Line and define your eyes with Mavala's Khol Pencil in 'Black', an extra mild eyeliner ideal for sensitive eyelids.
Gliding effortlessly across skin, the liner delivers an intense black colour that can be blended out for a smokey finish. Use on the upper eyelid; create sultry cat eyes or add depth to your lash line.
name: Khol Pencil - Black 1.4g

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Mavala Lipstick in 'Lilas'.
Gliding effortlessly across lips in a uniform layer, the lightweight lipstick delivers a rich, creamy hue that won't settle into fine lines. Its long-lasting coverage ensures lips feel comfortable all day, even if prone to dryness. Ideal for dry or sensitive lips, the lip colour helps protect against dryness for a healthy, supple-looking pout.
name: Lipstick - Lilas 4g

product_description:
Achieve luminous, youthful-looking eyes with the IRIS™ Eye Massager from FOREO, a brand who specialise in premium beauty devices. Designed with innovative Alternating T-Sonic™ technology, the tool features two modes: a gentle 'Pure Mode' to replicate the feeling of a manual massage and 'Spa Mode', which combines tapping and delicate pulsations for a professional beauty treatment experience.
Crafted from premium, ultra-hygienic silicone that is gentle to the delicate eye contour area, the device prevents bacteria build-up and improves the absorption of skincare products, especially serum and cream. Reduces the appearance of puffiness and dark circles, whilst smoothening crow's feet, fine lines and wrinkles for revitalised eyes.
Fully waterproof and easy to clean, its compact, lightweight design makes the IRIS™ ideal for travelling, so you can refresh eyes on the move. An advanced eye-brightening device with multiple intensity levels to suit individual needs and comfort requirements. E.N.
name: IRIS™ Eye Massager - Magenta

product_description:
Achieve a smooth, radiant canvas with Gatineau Perfection Ultime Anti-Ageing Complexion Cream SPF30 in 'Dark', a deeply hydrating moisturiser with natural tinted glow.
Lightweight and protective, the brightening moisturiser delivers a sheer wash of radiance onto skin; its unique peptide complex helps plump and enhance elasticity for younger-looking features. Blending Liquorice Root Extract, Hyaluronic Acid, Argireline and Vitamin B3 with SPF 30, the formula aids in defending against premature ageing and external attacks.
Expect a smoother, brighter, more even complexion with an incredibly hydrated finish. Can be worn alone or layered under foundation for an enhanced glow.
name: Perfection Ultime Anti-Ageing Complexion Cream SPF30 30ml - Dark

product_description:
Achieve a smooth, radiant canvas with Gatineau Perfection Ultime Anti-Ageing Complexion Cream SPF30 in 'Light', a deeply hydrating moisturiser with natural tinted glow.
Lightweight and protective, the brightening moisturiser delivers a sheer wash of radiance onto skin; its unique peptide complex helps plump and enhance elasticity for younger-looking features. Blending Liquorice Root Extract, Hyaluronic Acid, Argireline and Vitamin B3 with SPF 30, the formula aids in defending against premature ageing and external attacks.
Expect a smoother, brighter, more even complexion with an incredibly hydrated finish. Can be worn alone or layered under foundation for an enhanced glow.
name: Perfection Ultime Anti-Ageing Complexion Cream SPF30 30ml - Light

product_description:
Create enviable cheekbones with the Spectrum Collections C04 Angled Powder Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
Boasting a large, angled brush head with super soft bristles, the ‘Killer Cheek Bones’ brush sweeps powdered makeup over skin, applying product to places in need of definition, such as the jaw and cheekbones. The unicorn-inspired brush is an essential addition to any brush collection, ensuring each and every contour is flawless.
name: Collections C04 Angled Powder Brush

product_description:
Eylure have collaborated with Youtube beauty sensation, Fleur de Force, to create a sculpting Brow Palette in 'Light'.
The custom-mix brow kit combines a two-tone powder shadow with an illuminating highlighter for expertly filling, defining and enhancing your natural eyebrows. The waterproof brow powder combines a dark and light shade that you can blend together to achieve the perfect, individual colour for your brow tone, or use each hue independently; use the darker shade for adding depth, and the lighter shade for subtle shaping or filling sparse areas.
The illuminating highlighter is perfect for accentuating the brow bone and arch, and can even be used to add light and dimension to the inner corner of the eyes. Long-lasting, waterproof and smudge-proof.
name: x Fleur de Force Brow Palette - Light

product_description: Keep your makeup looking sharp with the Living Nature Pencil Sharpener. Specially designed for use with the brand's lip and eye pencils, the tool will effectively sharpen your pencils for precise and controlled application.
name: Nature Pencil Sharpener

product_description:
Line and define your peepers with the butter LONDON Wink Eye Pencil; an ultra-smooth eyeliner that glides effortlessly across the lid, without pulling on the delicate skin. The eye pencil arrives with a sharp point that can be used to produce clean and precise lines to enhance the eyes. The smooth formula can also be smudged and blended out for a smokey and sultry-looking finish.
Once applied, the long-wearing eyeliner sets firmly into place to ensure eyes remain flawlessly defined all day, however busy your lifestyle is.
name: LONDON Wink Eye Pencil Earl Grey 1.2g

product_description:
Achieve perfect brows with the Talika Lipocils Ink; a comprehensive eyebrow treatment that immediately fills sparse gaps with natural looking colour while a 4-week regrowth formula helps improve density and fullness with continued use.
The easy-to-use felt pen ensures precise and accurate application with a long-lasting, anti-smudge colour concealer enhancing shape and definition.
Powered by plant extracts and regenerative peptides, the Growth Serum and Regenerating Care formula seeks to stimulate regrowth for improved thickness, while improving bulb cells to anchor existing hair follicles and combat hair loss. The addition of Coleus stimulates the synthesis of Melanin, resulting in naturally enhanced colour pigmentation.
Brows look instantly sleek and perfectly groomed; while with continued use they appear thicker, stronger and less scattered.
name: Eyebrow Lipocils Ink - Brown

product_description:
Designed specially for those with fair hair and skin, the High Definition Brow Essentials Collection in 'Bombshell' combines everything you need to achieve perfectly groomed brows. The set features a versatile eye and brow palette for expert filling and shaping, a defining brow pencil and a clear setting gel to ensure a professional finish is achieved, every time.
Brow Define in 'Bombshell':
A medium firm eyebrow pencil enriched with waxes and vitamins to create fuller-looking brows. Perfect for filling, defining and shaping, the easy-to-blend pencil delivers smudge-proof colour with a natural finish, enhancing and sculpting for a professional look. Equipped with a built-in sharpener for precise application, the long-wearing formula, with added antioxidants, will ensure your brows stay bold and perfected, all day long. Dermatologically approved. Suitable for sensitive skin.
Brow Beater Setting Gel:
A clear, non-sticky setting gel that holds brows in place whilst conditioning for healthy-looking eyebrows. The taming formula feels lightweight on application, and expertly sets your perfectly defined brows in place, all day long.
Eye and Brow Palette in 'Bombshell':
A comprehensive eyebrow and eye palette combining three long-lasting brow powders with a highlighter and setting wax. The versatile set allows you to fill in your brows, defining, enhancing and sculpting for a well-groomed, professional finish. The silky-smooth powders are easy to apply and blend, and are infused with antioxidant Vitamins E and C; they double as eyeshadows to create soft, smokey makeup looks. Use the highlighter to enhance your brow bone, and the wax for a defined or bolder finish. Includes: 'Light Blonde',' Medium Blonde', 'Carbon', highlighter and wax. Housed in a mirrored compact with double ended applicator brush.
name: Definition Brow Essentials Collection - Bombshell

product_description:
Accentuate your eyes with the butter LONDON ShadowClutch Palette in 'Natural Charm'. Combining six warm-toned, neutral eyeshadow shades, you can create endless eye make-up looks with superior colour pay-off and seamless blendability.
Melting effortlessly onto the lids for smooth, even application, the high-pigmented, ultra-fine milled powders feature a built-in, oil-absorbing primer for a long-wearing, crease-resistant finish. Housed in a mirrored compact with a dual-ended brush for use on-the-go.
'Linen' - matte vanilla
'Quartz' - warm beige sheen
'Camo' - dark khaki sheen
'Camel' - matte nude
'Citrine' - coral sheen
'Leather' - matte chocolate brown
name: LONDON ShadowClutch Palette - Natural Charm

product_description:
Add luscious colour to your pout with the Juicy Shaker Lip Gloss from Lancôme. Fortified with a bi-phased formula that synergises beautiful pigments and a nourishing blend of Sweet Almond Oil, Omega 3 and Cranberry Oil, you can expect super smooth, plump lips with mirror-like shine.
Housed in unique cocktail shaker-inspired packaging with a shake-to-wake formula, the lip gloss allows you to tailor colour vibrancy; simply shake more for an intensified make-up look. Complete with a soft cushioned applicator to hug the lip contour for a mistake-free finish.
name: Juicy Shaker Lip Gloss - 201

product_description: Accentuate your eyes with the Lord & Berry Stylographic Eyeliner; a long-wearing liner with a tapered precision tip. Gliding effortlessly across the eyes in one stroke, the eyeliner allows you to create thin or thick lines with controlled, mistake-free application. Add drama and definition for a professional cat eye look.
name: & Berry Stylographic Eyeliner - Shodo

product_description:
Perfect the look of your complexion with Mizon Snail Repair Blemish Balm, a multi-functional BB cream that works to smoothen and hydrate skin whilst camouflaging imperfections.
Enriched with 45% Snail Secretion Filtrate, a hero ingredient in Korea known for its smoothing and anti-inflammatory properties, the BB cream works to conceal existing breakouts whilst improving skin's overall appearance. Its skin-smoothing formula delivers excellent coverage that expertly camouflages blemishes and scarring without accentuating them. Its dose of Papaya extract brightens and smoothens, and Adenosine helps to diminish fine lines and prevent wrinkles. Skin is hydrated without the shine, and looks smooth, even in tone and flawless.
Please Note: Comes in one shade only - suits very fair skin with pink undertones.
name: Snail Repair Blemish Balm 50ml

product_description:
The ALGENIST Reveal Colour Correcting Finishing Powder combines exclusive skincare technologies with advanced neutralising pigments to help combat uneven skin tone and discolouration with long term results.
Developed utilising exclusive biotechnology research, the ultra-refined face powder is based around an AlgaCorrecting Complex with a contrasting colour spectrum to correct redness with a soft-focus, airbrushed finish. The long-lasting formula attracts light while eliminating shine, effectively blurring the appearance of pores and wrinkles for a flawless looking complexion. Use to set makeup or dust where light naturally hits for a radiant glow.
name: Reveal Colour Correcting Finishing Powder 9g

product_description:
Create a false-lash look with Laura Geller's DramaLASH Mascara; a volumising, intense black formula to plump, maximise and thicken lashes in one single stroke.
Infused with Spherical Powders and nourishing Vitamin B5, the rich, gel-based mascara delivers ultimate impact and definition, whilst its specially designed, oversized brush captures lashes from the root. Expect show-stopping, luscious lashes without flaking, drying or clumping.
name: Geller DramaLASH Mascara - Black

product_description:
Experience perfectly cleansed skin with FOREO's Cleanser for Men, a transformative gel-to-foam formula that works to lift away dirt, grime and impurities from the skin whilst strengthening and replenishing.
Fortified with 96% natural origin ingredients, including detoxifying Moringa extract and regenerative Hydrothermal Mineral Nutrients, the cleanser has been created specially to complement the T-Sonic™ pulsations of the LUNA™ for MEN. Working in unison with the device's vibrations to enhance performance, actives in the blend become stimulated and absorption is maximised for deeper delivery. Its regenerative and antioxidant properties target pores to deliver a deep, penetrative cleanse. Skin feels purified, revitalised and invigorated.
name: Cleanser for Men (100ml)

product_description:
Create sultry looks with Japonesque's Pixelated Eyeshadow Palette, a collection of four exclusive Pro Basic shades and six Pixelated Color Eye Shadow shades.
Combining a range of complementary hues, the six pixelated colours are gilded with micronized pigments for a dramatic, light-reflecting finish, whilst the four basic shadows allow you to add subtle depth and definition to the eyes. Each versatile shade is highly pigmented and effortlessly blendable, delivering true colour that can be built up and intensified.
name: Pixelated Eyeshadow Palette

product_description:
Lengthen your lashes with the Mad Lash Mascara - Black from theBalm. Creating an ‘out of this world’ look, the mascara is able to capture each lash to deliver extreme length and volume.
Arriving with a unique, injection moulded wand applicator; Mad Lash is able to transform the look of lashes. The intense black formula boasts intense colour pay off that defines lashes and leaves them long, full and fluttering.

product_description:
Expertly frame your face with the Lottie London Brow Volume Powder; a lightweight, long-wearing powder that adds dimension to fine, sparse eyebrows.
Featuring an applicator wand for easy, mess-free usage, the brow powder delivers hair-like colour to fill in gaps and enhance natural shape for fuller, thicker-looking eyebrows in an instant. Available in a range of shades to suit all hair tones.

product_description: Get creative with the Sketch Stick from Illamasqua, a creamy multi-use crayon presented in a range of shades each with intense pigmentation for a vivid splash of colour. Long wearing and lightweight, the formula glides effortlessly across skin and can be built up to create varied looks - use straight from the stick for a concentrated burst or blend out for a more subtle wash.
colour: Fly, Free, Haze, Higher, Spirit, Trace, Trip
name: Hypnotica Sketch Stick 2.4g

product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with Lottie London's Powder Blusher; a lightweight, blendable powder that delivers a flush of colour to your complexion.
Available in a range of shades, the long-wearing blush builds effortlessly on skin to lend your cheeks a beautiful glow with excellent colour pay-off. Accentuates and defines your favourite facial features.

product_description: Accentuate your pout with the Baby Lips Color Crayon from Maybelline. Infused with moisturising oils, the easy-to-apply lip balm glides on effortlessly to soften and hydrate lips, whilst delivering bold, kissable colour with a long-wearing finish. Available in a range of shades.
colour: Candy Red, Creamy Caramel, Pink Crush, Playful Purple, Strawberry Pop, Sugary Orange
name: Baby Lips Color Crayon (Various Shades)

product_description:
Define and illuminate skin with the Contour & Highlight Cream Palette from Bellápierre Cosmetics. The set combines six multi-dimensional shades to help you achieve a sculpted and chiselled facial structure.
Universally flattering and ultra-blendable, the smooth cream formulas effortlessly glide onto skin with pure mineral pigmentation to enhance skin texture. Step-by-step instructions are included to ensure you achieve a professional, natural-looking finish. Housed in a chic compact complete with a convenient mirror, it’s a must-have for any makeup addict.

product_description:
Create flawless makeup looks with Japonesque's Retractable Powder Brush, a versatile makeup brush with adjustable handle that allows you to customise fibre density.
Utilising synthetic hairs for unrivalled results, the portable brush with softly domed head is perfect for fool-proof powder and bronzer application; it can also be used to buff out colour and apply highlighter for a glowing complexion.
Retracting the handle makes the fibres more dense, ideal for subtle contouring. Complete with protective cap.

product_description:
The gorgeous pink tints in this Daniel Sandler Watercolour Crème Bronzer in Fiji give a subtle lift to a dark complexion while its creamy formula blends beautifully into skin, adding a youthful radiant glow.
Bronzer is an eternal and key item in the make-up bag of most, and this Daniel Sandler Watercolour Crème Bronzer in Fiji will exceed every girl’s expectations and become her new best friend. Once applied this stunning bronzer will light up your face, making it universally flattering and highly desirable.
Directions of use:
name: Sandler Watercolour Creme Bronzer - Fiji (3.5g)

product_description:
Achieve a flawless make-up base with the RMS Skin2Skin Foundation Brush; an essential tool for professional application.
Combining durability and high performance, its layered, high quality synthetic fibres are set in a tight swirl pattern for effortless blending, allowing you to create a smooth, streak-free finish every time.
Designed with innovative Dual Technology, the brush features long and short bristles that reach every curve of your face, pressing colour onto the skin rather than sitting on the surface. Expect full coverage and an airbrushed effect.
name: Beauty Skin2Skin Foundation Brush

product_description:
Lengthen and volumise lashes and brows with Make Up by HD Brows Lash and Brow Booster. The treatment is enriched with active ingredients and a powerful Peptide complex, capixyl, that create a transparent gel which can be applied to your brows and lashes to leave them looking thicker, fuller and longer.
Ideal for those who suffer from weak, thin and short lashes or want to improve the appearance of their eyebrows, Provitamin B5 and Red Clover Extract moisturises hair to create the perfect treatment to improve your brows and lashes. -SA
Directions of use:
Apply to lashes and brows daily before make up
name: Definition Lash and Brow Booster

product_description: The perfect tool for applying make-up powder, Lottie London's Buff & Blend Buffer Brush allows you to achieve a flawless, airbrushed effect with ease. Featuring densely packed bristles, the brush effortlessly applies finishing powder and softens any contour lines for a professional, picture-perfect finish.
name: London Buff & Blend - Buffer Brush

product_description:
Enhance your eyes with Sigma's E71 Highlight Diffuser™ Brush; a must-have tool fitted with the brand's anti-bacterial, hypoallergenic SigmaTech® fibres.
With an angled, densely packed head, the versatile brush can be used to highlight brow bones, diffuse colour or soften edges for a well-blended finish. Its specially designed, patented three-ring ferrule is made from SigmaAlloy™ for ultimate strength, whilst the lightweight handle is crafted from a sustainable source of wood with eight layers of paint, making it scratch resistant.
name: E71 Highlight Diffuser™ Brush

product_description: Make your eyes the centre of attention with the Shiseido Luminizing  Satin Eye Color Trio in Beach Grass. Featuring three stunning shades, the  eyeshadow palette comes with a brush and a sponge applicator for easy  application no matter where you are. The silky smooth eyeshadows will  glide effortlessly onto your eyelids, whilst blending seamlessly for a  professional finish.
name: Luminizing Satin Eye Color Trio RD299 - Beach Grass 3g

product_description: Easy and efficient to apply, the Pixi Shea Butter Lip Balm in Scarlet Sorbet is the ultimate tinted lip balm. Perfect for keeping in your handbag, the lightweight balm boasts a twist-up design with a secure click lid for safe keeping. Featuring a subtle slick of sheer colour, the unique ‘lip-texture’ formula is hand poured into a luxurious base of Shea Butter to moisturise and soften, with additional vitamins to nourish and protect with long term results.
name: Shea Butter Lip Balm - Scarlet Sorbet

product_description:
Achieve that English Rose complexion with the Pixi Hello Rose!. The three-piece set combines a liquid highlighter, powder blush duo and lip plumping gloss to help you create a glowing and healthy-looking visage with a flush of delicate colour.  
Glow Booster in Pink Pearl 
Lightweight and silk-textured, the liquid highlighter enhances your natural radiance and perfectly preps skin for further makeup. Working to smooth and blur the look of imperfections, it contains brightening Mica as well as iridescent pigments to impart a dewy, radiant finish.   
Beauty Blush Duo in Rose Gold
The mineral-based powder is the perfect finishing touch to any makeup look, adding soft and natural looking radiance with a hint of highly pigmented color coverage. Infused with light reflecting particles and a soft shimmer, the universally flattering pair are easily blended to highlight and lift dull complexions.
LipLift Max in Sheer Rose
The LipLift Max has a unique formula infused with peptides to add a burst of volume to make lips look fuller, and Jojoba Oil to enhance moisture and intensively hydrate. Aloe and Chamomile work to soothe and soften, whilst adding a subtle sheen to your smile. The precision pen tip glides on for effortless application and the refreshing mint flavour leaves a cooling sensation.
name: Hello Rose!

product_description: Achieve a naturally radiant complexion with the Pixi Glow-y Powder, designed in collaboration with international beauty blogger Aspyn Ovard.  Adding a hint of sheer, natural-looking colour, the mineral-based powder contains subtle light reflecting pigments to brighten and highlight, easily blended and universally flattering for all skin tones.
name: Glow-y Powder - London Lustre

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Gourd Blending Sponge Infused with Collagen, a latex-free makeup sponge that expertly applies and blends a range of makeup products onto your skin with an airbrushed finish.
Infused with Collagen for an anti-ageing boost, the gourd-shaped blender allows you to apply foundation and concealer to large areas of the face, whilst targeting smaller, hard-to-reach areas such as around the eyes and nose. Versatile and easy to use, it will also blend your favourite highlighters and blushers, and serves as a great tool for contouring. Soaking the sponge in water prior to use will ensure makeup doesn't absorb into the sponge (which means no wastage!).
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Gourd Blending Sponge Infused with Collagen - Pink

product_description:
Made from premium stainless steel with a vintage-inspired floral design, The Vintage Cosmetics Company Scissors allow you to precisely cut fingernails, toenails and strip lashes.
Easy to use, their sleek, sharp design makes them a must-have beauty tool for all your trimming needs.
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Scissors - Floral

product_description:
Enhance the look of your pout with butter LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss, a plumping lip formula that works to add a slick of colour to your lips whilst creating a fuller appearance.
Delivering high shine colour, the lip gloss glides effortlessly across lips with a cushion like feel, and expertly stimulates hyaluronic synthesis to enhance your natural lip shape. Lips appear fuller, smoother and plumper. Leaving lips with a lasting tingling sensation, the lip gloss will boost lips, your mood and your confidence.
name: LONDON Plush Rush Lip Gloss - Free Fall

product_description: Add maximum intensity to your lashes with Eylure's Cheryl Evening Eyelashes in 'Oh My Goddess'. Soft, lightweight and reusable, the handmade false lashes are perfect from desk to dance floor; their bold, full design adds sophisticated definition, whilst their unique curve allows them to hug the eye contour for effortless application and comfortable wear.
name: X Cheryl Evening Eyelashes - Oh My Goddess

product_description:
Create subdued or smokey makeup looks with the PUPA Vamp! Compact Eyeshadow Duo in 'Milk Chocolate', a carefully curated eyeshadow duo that combines two complementary shades.
Creamy and easy-to-blend, each highly pigmented colour delivers a rich finish with long-lasting wear. Use each colour individually or blend together to create a unique eye makeup look. Feels comfortable on the lid. Complete with dual-ended sponge tip applicator.
name: Vamp! Compact Eyeshadow Duo - Milk Chocolate

product_description: Achieve a picture-perfect pout with Laura Geller's Spackle Supreme Lip Primer. Infused with Rose Hip Oil and antioxidant Vitamin E, the nourishing formula works to smoothen lines and plump lips, whilst preventing fading and feathering of your favourite lipstick. Its neutral shade suits all skin tones and creates a comfortable canvas for any shade of lip colour.
name: Geller Spackle Supreme Lip Primer

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Garnier Medium BB Cream and Blur, a daily moisturiser, primer and skin perfector in one. Its unique formula combines glycerin, vitamin C and mineral pigments to banish the look of imperfections and deliver intense hydration, whilst providing SPF 30 to protect from environmental aggressors.
Fast-absorbing and lightweight, the beauty balm cream combats uneven skin tone and locks in moisture for smoother, softer skin with visibly minimised pores, fine lines and wrinkles. Experience sheer coverage, a long-lasting matte finish and a younger-looking, luminous complexion. E.N.
name: Medium BB Cream and Blur (40ml)

product_description:
Perfect for face powder application, the Laura Geller Retractable Kabuki Brush picks up just the right amount of product for an even, professional finish.
With super soft, synthetic taklon bristles, the brush effortlessly distributes and blends powder and blush without absorbing make-up or oils from the face. Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion every time.
name: Geller Kabuki Brush

product_description:
Define your eyes with theBalm's What's Your Type?® Body Builder Mascara, a volumising, black mascara enriched with panthenol, bamboo and vitamin E to strengthen and condition lashes.
Working to lift, strengthen and volumise your eyelashes, the intense formula with volumising brush expertly coats every lash, delivering an intense shock of colour whilst lifting from the root to create a maximised, false lash effect. Eyes look sultry dramatised. - K.N.
name: What's Your Type - Body Builder Mascara

product_description:
Create sultry looks with theBalm's Smoke Balm Set 1, an eyeshadow palette with three highly pigmented, smokey hues.
With a satin smooth finish, each shade features triple milled pigments for high colour payoff, and can be used wet or dry to create a range of different looks. Expect magnetic, smokey eyes with little fallout and a professional finish. - K.N.
name: Smoke Balm Set 1

product_description:
Achieve endless make-up looks with the PIXI Mesmerising Mineral Palette. Combining six shades of eye shadow in complementing shades, you can define and highlight your eyes for natural-looking results with excellent colour longevity and seamless blendability.
Formulated with light-reflecting minerals and nourishing vitamin E to protect the delicate skin around the eye, the silky powder melts effortlessly onto the lids to deliver gemstone-inspired hues that won't crease or fade. Complete with a dual-ended sponge-tip applicator. E.N.

product_description:
The first oil free and silicone free primer, the PÜR Minerals Colour Correcting Primer – Hydrate & Balance in Purple, is perfect for those who suffer from breakouts and irritated skin. Calming, clarifying and mattifying, the primer will leave your skin perfectly prepared for the rest of your make up. 
The mineral rich formula is made up of salicylic acid, lavender extract and PÜR Minerals’ own Ceretin complex complete with a lilac colour to help reduce the appearance of blemishes. Pentavitin offers an instant and long lasting hydration of up to 72 hours ensuring that your skin is never left feeling dehydrated.
name: Colour Correcting Primer in Hydrate & Balance in Purple

product_description: The Matte Chic Liquid Lipstick from Chantecaille delivers intense, long-lasting colour with a virtually weightless feel. Infused with advanced peptides, the moisturising formula works to stimulate natural collagen production and blur imperfections for a visible plumping effect. The precise doe-foot applicator allows the colour to effortlessly glide on without bleeding or feathering, and it quickly sets for a bold, matte finish that doesn’t fade or transfer.
name: Matte Chic Liquid Lipstick - Marisa

product_description:
Hydrate and smoothen lips with the First Defence Lip Balm from MONU. Enriched with a nourishing blend of Vitamin A, Wheat Germ Oil and powerful antioxidant Vitamin E to soothe and protect lips from ageing.
Ideal for repairing dry or chapped lips, the luxurious balm restores moisture for long-lasting comfort and delivers an uplifting rose scent.

product_description:
Made from completely natural ingredients, TanOrganic Duo Bronzer in Brown works to give your skin an instant warm chocolate and golden caramel colour to enhance your skin tone. The bronzer is eco-certified and includes ingredients including organic oils of jojoba, coconut, sunflower and glycerine.
The bronzer is presented in an eco-friendly wooden compact that is spill proof and has a mirror on the lid to help with application. -SA

product_description:
Zelens Mattifying and Pore Refining Velvet Primer for lasting foundation coverage and a semi-matte finish. The velvety texture is ideal for oily and combination skin types that are prone to shine. Its oil and paraben-free formula contains green shiso leaf which provides antioxidant protection against free radical damage and environmental stresses. Excess oils are reduced to refine pores and give an even complexion, which prepares the skin for a flawless foundation application. E.N.
Directions for use: Apply underneath foundation for full coverage or apply alone over moisturiser for a nude finish.

product_description:
Achieve a soft glow with the Chantecaille Seashell Eye and Cheek Trio; a sea-shell inspired palette that boasts a trio of shimmering powder hues and an ultra-soft brush for application.
The pale pink shade can be swept across the entire lid to deliver an ethereal wash of colour, whilst the neutral taupe hue can be applied to the crease to define the eye contour and add the appearance of depth. Each shimmering colour can function as an eyeshadow, but can also be dusted onto the cheeks for a natural looking rosy flush. Expect a radiant finish.
Rose Quartz - A sparkling peony
Driftwood - A light brown
Cheek Cheer Shade - A golden tangerine
name: Seashell Eye and Cheek Trio 40ml

product_description: Expertly define your eyes with the Luster Glide Silk Infused Eye Liner from Chantecaille. Formulated with Advanced Pigment  Technology, each colour pigment particle is enriched with silicone,  retinyl linoleate and antioxidants, which improve the appearance of the  delicate skin around the eye area, whilst protecting against further  environmental damage.
Easy to blend, the luxurious formula gives smooth, crease-proof  colour that brightens and lifts your eyes. Presented in a sleek compact  case, it also comes with a brush and an in-built mirror for on-the-go  applications. Directions of Use:Smooth over your lids using the brush.
colour: Blonde, Cinnamon, Golden Orchid, Graphite, Mediterranean, Periwinkle, Romance, Seashell, Shimmering Emerald, Shimmering Taupe, Sky, Smolder, Sugar Cube, Truffle

Reveal a flawless, matte complexion with the Powder Foundation from Illamasqua.  Providing medium to full coverage, the ultra-fine makeup is quick and easy to apply and is perfect for taking on-the-go for touch-ups, aided by the internal mirror.
In one simple sweep, the powder offers an immaculate and even canvas that can be layered up for enhanced coverage. Imperfections are blurred and the complexion boasts a smooth, velvet matte finish.

product_description:
Beautifully define your lips with Elizabeth Arden Beautiful Colour  Smooth Line Lip Pencil 1.05g. Sharpening to a fine point, it  gives precise lines that will enhance your lips.

colour: Blush, Coral, Crimson, Mocha, Orchid, Plumrose, Raisin, Taupe
name: Arden Beautiful Colour Smooth Line Lip Pencil 1.05g

product_description:
Define your lips easily with the Elizabeth Arden Beautiful Color Precision Glide Lipliner (Various Colours). Lasting for up to 12 hours, the rich colour won't feather or fade, so your pout stays looking perfect around the clock.
Smooth and creamy, the pencil glides on effortlessly to contour your lips and enhance their natural shape, whilst the specially treated pigments create a flexible film that provides a luxurious feel which helps to prolong the life of lipstick and gloss. Ergonomically designed, the liner features a grip that allows for precise application, whilst the flexible paddle and sharpener allows for easy blending. - L.M.Directions of Use:
colour: Ballet Blush, Bare, Framboise, Fuchsia, Honey, Papaya, Red Door Red, Rose, Sugared Kiss
name: Arden Beautiful Color Precision Glide Lipliner (Various Colours)

product_description:
Douse your lips in rich, hydrating colour. The Color Bold Liquid Lipstick from Elizabeth Arden is a creamy, intensely pigmented lip formula that combines the coverage of a lipstick with the shine of a lip gloss.
Infused with conditioning emollients and micro-fine pigments, the liquid lipstick glides effortlessly across the lips with its easy-to-use flocked tip applicator, and delivers a rich shock of high-impact colour that feels moisturising and comfortable to wear. Its long-lasting formula will never feather or bleed, so lips look luscious, glossy and saturated for longer.
colour: Daring Beige, Extreme Pink, Fearless Red, Fiery Red, Luscious Raspberry, Pink Lover, Seductive Magenta
name: Arden Beautiful Color Bold Liquid Lipstick (Various Colors)

product_description:
Witness a perfected and youthful-looking complexion with Elizabeth Arden Prevage® Anti-Aging Foundation, a liquid foundation that feels beautifully lightweight on skin whilst delivering light to medium coverage with a naturally luminous finish.
Infused with a potent antioxidant Idebenone Complex and a host of anti-ageing ingredients, the youth-inspiring makeup glides effortlessly over skin, blending seamlessly to help blur imperfections and even out skin tone; its moisture-rich hydra-pigments expertly lock in moisture whilst providing long-wear colour with skin-smoothing properties. Working to diminish signs of ageing day after day, the anti-ageing foundation continuously repairs the appearance of skin, promoting a younger looking complexion by protecting from external aggressors and reducing the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
Skin looks naturally radiant with a smooth, perfected appearance.
colour: Shade 2, Shade 3, Shade 4, Shade 5, Shade 6, Shade 7, Shade 8
name: Arden Prevage Anti-Aging Foundation (Various Shades)

Create a flawless base with the Vincent Longo Water Canvas Crème-to-Powder Foundation, a unique, oil-free makeup that delivers light to medium coverage with a comfortable 'second skin' feeling.
Lightweight and refreshing on contact, the foundation blends effortlessly into skin, transforming into a luxurious texture that expertly evens out the complexion whilst camouflaging imperfections. Formulated with a patented process, it utilises 75% Microwater to hydrate and nourish skin whilst providing antioxidant protection. Skin looks naturally perfected and healthy.
colour: Caramel #13, Cocoa Riche #14, Crème Beige #2, Golden Beige #8, Golden Tan #10, Honey Pecan #11, Mahogany #16, Natural Tan #9, Porcelain #1, Sandy Beige #7, Sienna #15, Soft Amber #4, Soft Beige #3

Infused with Hyaluronic Acid to plump the appearance of lips, the formula combines the high shine of a gloss with the smooth, even coverage of a lipstick. Gliding on effortlessly, Lip Chic delivers comfortable, long-wearing colour with a non-sticky, velvety soft finish.
colour: Amaryllis, Bourbon Rose, Calla Lily, Camellia, China Rose, Gaia, Gypsy Rose, Heirloom Rose, Mandarin, Moroccan Rose, Nocturne, Patience, Red Juniper, Sari Rose, Tea Rose, Violetta
name: Lip Chic Lipstick (Various Shades)

product_description:
Intense colour with up to 16 hours of staying power – the Rimmel Provocalips Transfer Proof Lipstick is every girl’s best friend. It is kiss proof, transfer proof, food proof and will leave your lips feeling smooth and moisturised from dawn to dusk. To remove just use an oil based make up remover.  LB
STEP 1: Apply colour and keep lips apart for 60 seconds until the product sets.
STEP 2: Apply topcoat to lock the colour, moisture and add shine.
colour: Dare to Pink, Play with Fire
name: Provocalips Transfer Proof Lipstick (Various Shades)

product_description: Perfect your cheeks and pout with the Lilah B. Divine Duo™ Lip and Cheek Stain, a multi-tasking balm that adds a pop of colour and boasts conditioning properties. The creamy formula is enriched with natural extracts of Aloe and Agar to intensely hydrate, whilst the colour is long-lasting and easily blended. Simply dab the tint onto lips or cheeks to achieve a subtle slick of pigmented colour that’s perfect for day or night.
colour: b. fearless, b. lovely, b. memorable, b. real, b. sassy, b. true
name: B. Divine Duo™ Lip and Cheek Stain (Various Shades)

product_description: Add metallic colour to your eyes with Chantecaille's Iridescent Eyeshade Refill; a soft, silky eyeshadow that melts on effortlessly for a sheer, pearlescent finish. Utilising coated pearls, the blendable and buildable powder delivers lightweight, luminous colour with superior pay-off.
colour: Aqua, Chocolat, Emerald, Lilac Rose, Quartz, Rose Gold
name: Iridescent Eyeshade Refill (Various Shades)

product_description:
The ALGENIST Reveal Colour Correcting Radiant Primer perfectly preps skin for seamless, natural looking makeup application with a more radiant and even tone.
The advanced, tinted primer utilises the latest in biotechnological research to deliver instant and long-term benefits. The proprietary AlgaCorrecting Complex effectively neutralises redness and discolouration for a uniform complexion, with universally-flattering pigments veiling the appearance of imperfections.
An age-defying combination of Alguronic Acid and Microalgae Oil have been scientifically tested to deliver superior anti-ageing benefits, rich in Oleic Acid, Phytosterols, Tocopherols and Tocotrienols to optimise hydration levels and counteract nutrient loss.
Brimming with antioxidants and Vitamin E, the multi-tasking formula can be used alone for barely-there coverage or as a base for foundation to improve longevity. Skin feels smooth and supple with a healthy looking radiance.

product_description:
Achieve luminous, youthful-looking eyes with the IRIS™ Eye Massager from FOREO, a brand who specialise in premium beauty devices. Designed with innovative Alternating T-Sonic™ technology, the tool features two modes: a gentle 'Pure Mode' to replicate the feeling of a manual massage and 'Spa Mode', which combines tapping and delicate pulsations for a professional beauty treatment experience.
Crafted from premium, ultra-hygienic silicone that is gentle to the delicate eye contour area, the device prevents bacteria build-up and improves the absorption of skincare products, especially serum and cream. Reduces the appearance of puffiness and dark circles, whilst smoothening crow's feet, fine lines and wrinkles for revitalised eyes.
Fully waterproof and easy to clean, its compact, lightweight design makes the IRIS™ ideal for travelling, so you can refresh eyes on the move. An advanced eye-brightening device with multiple intensity levels to suit individual needs and comfort requirements. E.N.
name: IRIS™ Eye Massager - Petal Pink

product_description:
Transform peepers with the Illamasqua Eyeshadow in ‘Maiden’; a highly pigmented, intense formula that delivers outstanding colour pay off and long lasting wear.
Part of the May Queen collection to celebrate the folklore festivities of May Day, the 'Maiden' shade embraces the essence of spring-time renewal with a radiant gold-toned hue and glistening glitter pigments for an iridescent metallic finish.
Wear alone across the lid in a simple wash of colour, layer up for a bolder impact or apply with a damp brush for a solid slick of colour to reinvigorate your look. Housed in the sleek signature compact.
name: Eye Shadow - Maiden

product_description:
Create a flawless canvas with Laura Geller's Spackle® Treatment Soothing Make-Up Primer; an ultra-hydrating formula developed to calm and comfort sensitive skin.
Fortified with antioxidants and natural botanical extracts, the lightweight primer melts effortlessly onto skin to alleviate irritation, whilst innovative green pigments counteract the appearance of redness. Can be worn alone or under foundation for a smooth, natural-looking finish.
name: Geller Spackle Treatment Under Make-Up Soothing Primer

product_description:
Look pretty in pink with the ‘Like A Doll’ Luminys Blush from PUPA. Universally flattering for all skin types, the powder blusher has been baked for an intensified colour pigmentation and luxuriously silky texture that seamlessly blends.
Enriched with micro-refined Pearl extract, it illuminates skin with a soft shimmer, while Jojoba Oil and Vitamin E ensure an even and smooth coverage with long lasting results. Dust across cheeks as a highlighter or for that perfect rosy glow.
colour: Delicate Pink, Golden Brown, Intense Apricot
name: Like A Doll Luminys Blush (Various Shades)

product_description: Dust cheeks with the PUPA Desert Bronzing Powder for a gorgeous, sun-kissed glow. The powdered bronzer delivers a silky smooth colour coverage that blends perfectly for a natural and even finish with a warm, matte tone. Perfect for contouring and adding depth, the long lasting bronzer can be built up and adjusted for custom results to suit all skin tones. Housed in chic compact ideal for on-the-go touch-ups.

product_description:
Add a pop of vibrant colour to your pout with the Illamasqua Glamore Lipstick; a satin finish lipstick available in a selection of intense shades.
Delivering long-wearing, highly pigmented colour, the hydrating lipstick glides effortlessly across lips; its dose of moisturising Vitamin E ensures lips feel comfortable and conditioned all day. Can be worn traditionally or applied beneath a sheer lip gloss for added dimension.

product_description:
Perfect your complexion with Lord & Berry's Conceal-it Stick, a concealer and foundation stick with medium, buildable coverage to help camouflage dark circles and imperfections.
Enriched with Macadamia Nut Oil and Waterlily Extracts, the hydrating cover-up glides effortlessly and evenly onto skin, covering minor flaws, dark circles, blemishes and fine lines with long-lasting effect. Its rich, heat-resistant formulation feels luxurious on skin and leaves your complexion looking more even and perfected. - K.N.

Create a flawless make-up base with theBalm's Photobalm® Powder Foundation; a lightweight, blendable powder that delivers natural-looking, long-wearing colour.
Ideal for all skin types, its buildable formula buffs effortlessly onto the face for a perfected, camera-ready complexion in a flash. Housed in unique, vintage style packaging with a built-in mirror.
colour: After Dark, Dark, Light, Light/Medium, Lighter Than Light, Medium, Medium Dark, Mid Medium
name: Photobalm Powder Foundation - Various Shades

product_description:
A take-anywhere brow kit that includes three brushes, transparent botanical brow wax and pigmented brow powder, this jane iredale Bitty Brow Kit in Blonde is perfect for beautiful blondes who need instant brow enhancement!
Packaged in a travel-sized magnetic compact, this jane iredale Bitty Brow Kit in Blonde provides a soft, natural appearance for brows. Add colour, depth and highlights to your brows while covering any unwanted grey hairs with this handy brow-perfecting kit!

product_description:
Achieve mesmerising, picture-perfect eyes with the Bourjois Quad Smokey Stories Eyeshadow. Allowing you to experiment with four complementary shades, you can prime, define and highlight your eyes for natural-looking results with excellent colour longevity and seamless blendability.
Simply use the lightest shade to prime the eyelid, shadow with the medium shade, define with the darkest hue, and illuminate with the glitter for expert results and a soft, smokey finish. Features a dual-ended wand with a cushioned tip for effortless blending and a precision tip to contour. E.N.

product_description:
Say hello to radiant cheeks with Bellapierre Cosmetics Compact Blush Amaretto. A talc-free, powder mineral blush, it defines your  cheekbones with beautiful, natural-looking colour that leaves your  complexion looking bright and fresh.
The micronized minerals have fantastic staying power, and let your  natural skin tone shine through, whilst leaving your skin with a healthy  glow. Suitable for even the most senstive and problem-prone skin, this  stunning blusher is a makeup bag essential. - L.M. Directions of Use:
name: Cosmetics Compact Blush Amaretto

product_description: The award winning Lip & Skin Balm from RMS contains naturally healing and restoring active ingredients to repair and protect the skin. Used regularly, the balm will soften the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and heal and protect dehydrated and stressed skin. Delivers a light vanilla scent from certified Madagascan vanilla.
name: Beauty Lip and Skin Balm - Simply Vanilla

product_description: A setting powder that delivers the fine textured translucent layer  that fits for the flawless finish. By blending the 4 different textures  with the powder brush, they work to eliminate the shine on T-zone and  correct the tone for a natural bright complexion. Comes in a compact  with a sliding compartment to keep the brush in place.

product_description: The Elizabeth Arden Flawless Finish Foundation Brush expertly applies liquid and cream foundations. The muti-dimensional bristles won't pull or fall out, whilst the flat yet firm design allows you to apply your make up with precision.
name: Arden Flawless Finish Foundation Brush

product_description:
Enhance the eyes with the Daniel Sandler Shimmer Shadow in Gilded Taupe; a sheer, satin eyeshadow that adds instant radiance to the peepers.
The shimmering powder shadow effortlessly sweeps over the lid, delivering a sheer veil of colour. Use dry for a subtle wash of colour, or apply the shimmer shadow damp to create a richer finish with an enviable lustre.
name: Sandler Shimmer Shadow - Gilded Taupe

product_description: Create a flawless finish with the Omorovicza Mineral Touch in beige. The light yet creamy texture of the concealer works to give you a full coverage throughout the whole day ensuring that dark circles, spots, blemishes, discoloration and scars are hidden. Infused with vitamin C and vitamin E, the concealer not only works to keep unwanted marks covered but it helps to even out your skin tone as well as improving collagen production, leaving your skin feeling toned and supple.  Perfect for giving you that natural glow you have always wanted. A.B.
name: Mineral Touch in Beige

product_description:
The Contour Cosmetics Lip Contour Kit combines a creamy lip liner with a matte liquid lipstick for luscious lips in an instant.
Paired for the perfect shade combination, the lip liner ensures clean and precise definition, with the intensely pigmented lipstick gliding across the lip for true colour pay off and an on-trend matte finish. Presented in gorgeous packaging, the set is ideal for on-the-go glamour.

product_description:
The Baby Lips in Pink Punch by Maybelline is a super moisturising lip balm created to give you a perfect pout that's hydrated for up to 8 hours. With SPF20 protection and a subtle colour to compliment any skin tone, this lip balm comes in a convenient twist cover.
Boasting an exclusive renew formula, Baby Lips works to protect the lips whilst keeping them supple and soft. The ultimate addition to your handbag, it's a must have! K.D.
name: Baby Lips Lip Balm - Pink Punch

product_description: Expertly define your eyes with the Luster Glide Silk Infused Eye Liner from Chantecaille. With a precision tip that glides on effortlessly, the sharpenable pencil delivers long-wearing, transfer-proof colour with high-shine and ultimate staying power. Its versatile formula can be applied to the lash line, or blended onto the lids as an eyeshadow.
name: Luster Glide Silk Infused Eye Liner - Amethyst

product_description:
Lancôme's Teint Idole Ultra Cushion Foundation Refill has been designed to fit your empty Lancôme Teint Idole Ultra Cushion Foundation compact.
Delivering long-wearing, full coverage with a luminous velvet finish, the foundation blends effortlessly onto skin to camouflage imperfections and promote a more even, radiant skin tone. The cushion technology ensures mess-free, easy application; simply touch to activate, then apply to skin with a patting motion to create a true, full coverage effect. Lightweight and refreshing despite its high coverage, the makeup feels comfortable on skin and inspires a bright, natural-looking glow. Equipped with a puff applicator for easy application.
Portable and refillable, its the perfect every day makeup.
name: Teint Idole Ultra Cushion Foundation Refill (Various Shades)

product_description:
Add a pop of sumptuous colour to your pout with the Sigma Power Stick Lipstick; a high pigmented formula housed in a magnetic, twist-up tube.
With a soft, creamy texture, the lipstick glides effortlessly onto lips to deliver long-wearing, full coverage colour, whilst its slanted tip allows mistake-free application for a super smooth finish.
colour: Bloody Good, Clover, In Spades, Nancy, Sigma Pink, Stamina
name: Power Stick Lipstick

product_description:
Accentuate your favourite features with the Illamasqua Gleam Highlighter; an iridescent cream formula that allows you to create make-up looks with depth, definition and expert results.
Infused with Vitamin E and Mica Mineral, the translucent, silky highlighter delivers sheer, pearlescent pigments for a natural-looking, luminous glow. Can be used on the face and body.
name: Gleam Highlighter

product_description:
Emphasise your brows with the Billion Dollar Brows Brow Powder. The easy to apply, velvety smooth powder helps to fill in any gaps in your eyebrows whilst enhancing their natural shape and adding dimension to your face.
With seamless blendability and natural hair-like colours, the subtle powder will help to volumise and define your brows for a natural finish and enviable arch.
name: Dollar Brows Brow Powder 2g (Various Shades)

product_description:
Modify your foundation with the Illamasqua Skin Base Mixer; a tool that can create a new hue or help to adapt your foundation shade to suit the season. The ultimate fix, the mixers can adjust the brightness, warmth and depth of the complexion, as well as intelligently adapting to correct issues such as blemishes and discolouration. Arriving in a variety of hues, each Skin Base Mixer boasts a different purpose, benefitting different skin tones.
White
For a bright and lifted appearance, the white hue mixed with a Skin Base Foundation, or used alone, is ideal.
Amber
Amber is perfect for reducing redness, as well as balancing an uneven, olive tone complexion. Mix with your Skin Base Foundation.
Terracotta
Blur dark pigmentation with the Terracotta shade. Adding warmth, the hue is ideal for use around the eyes, mouth and hairline.
Chestnut
To achieve a chiselled under-contoured look, the Chestnut colour is the go-to mixer. The dark hue is designed to add further depth to the complexion.
name: Skin Base Mixer 30ml (Various Shades)

product_description:
Create eyebrows to be proud of with RMK W Eyebrow (Pencil) 03 in olive brown. Boasting a ingenious design, the pencil features a retractable pencil at one end and at the other a felt head for adding powder.
The pencil also features a screw brush for grooming and smudging the eyebrow, found at the centre of the pencil. The oval-shaped pencil gives you great control for eyebrows with an exquisite shape and great natural look. -SA
name: W Eyebrow (Pencil) 03

product_description:
Perfect the look of your skin with the Vincent Longo Perfect Canvas Loose Face Powder, an ultra-lightweight powder that creates a smooth, matt makeup finish.
Blending effortlessly into skin, the loose powder delivers a veil of invisible perfection, setting makeup in place whilst camouflaging pores and absorbing excess shine. Its brightening and refining properties leave skin looking healthy and naturally flawless. Can be used alone or layered over foundation or tinted moisturiser; it’s the perfect base for applying eye and cheek colours.
colour: Golden Banana, Golden Oriental, Golden Sienna, Porcelain, Topaz
name: Longo Perfect Canvas Loose Face Powder (Various Shades)

product_description: Define your eyes from every angle with the Eye Calligraphy Eyeliner Marker from Laura Geller. With a fast-drying formula, the liquid liner delivers intense colour that won't run or smudge, whilst its precision tip allows smooth, mistake-free application for a professional finish. Water-resistant.
colour: Beguiling Brown, Black, Charming Charcoal, Enchanting Emerald
name: Geller Eye Calligraphy Eyeliner Marker

product_description: Add depth and definition to your eyes with the Living Nature Eye Shadow. Utilising pure minerals, the blendable and buildable powder melts effortlessly onto the lids to deliver long-wearing, high-pigment colour with a crease-resistant finish. Can be applied dry for soft, subtle colour or wet for higher intensity.
colour: Black, Black, Brown, Brown, Brown, Dark Grey, Green, Grey, Light Grey, Vanilla White
name: Nature Eyeshadow 1.5g - Various Shades

product_description:
Enhance your pout with the PUPA I'm Matt Lip Fluid Liquid Lip Colour; a lightweight, velvety formula that delivers long-wearing, sumptuous colour with a matte finish.
Adding comfortable, hydrating colour with highly pigmented pay-off, the liquid lipstick glides effortlessly onto lips for a bold, lush finish. Features a flocked wand applicator for mistake-free, controlled results.
colour: Coralicious, Fire Red, Orange Juice, Red Passion, Rose Nude, Sable Brown
name: I'm Matt Lip Fluid Liquid Lip Colour (Various Shades)

product_description:
ModelCo have collaborated with American model, Hailey Baldwin, to create the On-The-Glow Cream Highlighter; a versatile formula to accentuate your favourite facial features.
Blending seamlessly onto skin, the silky cream formula can be worn alone, or layered with eyeshadows and lip, cheek and face highlighting products for a customised make-up look.
Delivering subtle, natural-looking colour and a perfect hint of radiance, you can achieve a sculpted, defined finish with a sheer glow. Simply apply to cheek bones, browbones and down the bridge of the nose to enhance luminosity.

product_description:
Expertly define and emphasise your brows with theBalm's Brow Pow Eyebrow Powder; a long-wearing powder that enables you to create picture-perfect arches and fuller-looking brows with natural-looking colour.
With seamless blendability, the velvety smooth powder helps to fill in any gaps in your eyebrows whilst enhancing their natural shape and adding dimension to your face. Complete with a built-in mirror for precise application. E.N.
name: Brow Pow Eyebrow Powder (Various Shades)

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the timeBalm Foundation from theBalm. Suitable for all skin types and tones, the lightweight foundation melts effortlessly onto the face using the sponge applicator and delivers medium to full coverage with an even, streak-free finish and natural-looking colour.
Blendable and buildable, its long-wearing, creamy formula is packed with vitamins A, C and E to maintain moisture and protect from environmental aggressors, whilst beeswax helps minimise the appearance of pores and imperfections to leave a smooth, picture-perfect canvas. E.N.
colour: Light, Light/Medium, Lighter than Light, Medium, Mid Medium
name: timeBalm Foundation (Various Shades)

product_description:
Add a healthy flush of colour to your makeup look with the Vincent Longo Water Canvas Blusher, a unique, crème-to-powder blush that delivers a subtle yet buildable glow to your cheeks.
With a unique texture, the blush blends effortlessly into skin, transforming into a luxurious powder that expertly brightens up the complexion; its formulation of 75% Microwater hydrates and moisturises whilst a dose of Vitamin E keeps skin protected and healthy-looking.
colour: Forever Flush, Nature Ray, Swan Lake, Terra Dew
name: Longo Water Canvas Blusher (Various Shades)

product_description: Add lustrous colour to your pout with the Illamasqua Liquid Lip Lure. Available in a range of shades, the liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to deliver intense, high-pigmented colour with the mirror-like shine of a lip gloss. Its unique cushioned wand allows mistake-free application for a long-wearing, picture-perfect finish.
colour: Box Red, Cool Deep Pink, Deep Berry, Deep Green, Deep Purple, Hot Orange, Pink Nude, Pow, Rose Pink, Warm Red
name: Hypnotica Liquid Lip Lure 10ml

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your lips with RMK Face Pop Matte Lips, a velvety lipstick with comfortable matt finish.
Available in a range of pink tones, the lipstick glides on effortlessly, delivering a vivid yet natural-looking hue with smooth, lightweight feel.
colour: Holographic Sheer Pink, Pure Pink, Rose Pink
name: Face Pop Matte Lips (Various Shades)

product_description:
Discover an innovative, multi-tasking palette with the Rimmel Insta Conceal and Contour Palette; a trio of natural hued, creamy shades, which highlight, conceal and contour the complexion.
The concealer can be used to mask the appearance of dark circles under the eyes, or to cover minor blemishes and imperfections. This ensures the base is flawless and perfected, ready for the highlight and contour. The light, highlighting hue should be applied to the high points of the face. Ideal for the bridge of the nose, brow bones and chin, the highlighter ensures a bright and radiant finish, whilst the dark, contouring shade adds definition. The contour cream should be used in the shadows of the face, ideal for sculpting enviable cheek bones or carving a high impact jaw.
Use all three shades in synergy to achieve a naturally flawless complexion and an expertly sculpted visage with your best features on show.
