product_description:
Envelops lips in a fragrant treat using the Hurraw! Chai Spice Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Effortlessly gliding over lips, the creamy lip balm is enriched with a skin-loving blend of Sweet Almond and Jojoba Seed Oil, which delivers instant and long-lasting hydration. The lip balm is inspired by Hurraw!’s favourite beverage,  chai tea and boasts a blend of Black Pepper, Cinnamon, Clove, Anise and Vanilla,  which lend the hydrator a rich spiciness. Lips are left thoroughly nourished and completely kissable in one simple swipe.

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your pout with Rimmel's Moisture Renew Lipstick, a creamy, hydrating lip colour that delivers a rich, highly pigmented colour.
Gliding effortlessly on, the lipstick imparts a vivid hue whilst saturating lips in long-lasting moisture and care with its cocktail of Vitamins A, C and E. Intensely hydrating, it will leave lips feeling super soft and comfortable.
colour: Brixton Lights, Nude Shock, Pink Lane, Rose Records
name: Moisture Renew Lipstick 4g (Various Shades)

product_description: The RMK Color Performance Cheek Blusher features three shades of high-pigmented colour to give your complexion a healthy glow. Housed in a silver compact, the lightweight powder melts effortlessly onto the cheeks for superior colour longevity, whilst the soft brush allows you to experiment by shading, highlighting and blending. Wear the shades alone or together to create customised colour and a look as dramatic or natural as desired. E.N.
name: Color Performance Cheek Blusher - Ex-02

product_description:
Enhance your lips with the ModelCo Shine Lip Gloss in 'Fairy Floss', a shimmering, high shine lip lacquer that delivers a shock of beautifully reflective colour with long-lasting finish.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with its wand applicator, the non-sticky gloss imparts a soft colour tint and features an in-built mirror for flawless, on-the-go applications . Lips looks luscious and hydrated.
name: Shine Lip Gloss - Fairy Floss

product_description:
Expertly define your eyes with the Pro Made Easy Eye Set from Illamasqua. Combining a volumising mascara, innovative brow colour and a versatile eyeshadow palette, you can achieve professional make-up looks.
Masquara Gain
An innovative mascara to volumise, lengthen and define lashes. Infused with a walnut-derived active that acts as a natural dye extract, the jet black formula tints lashes for ultimate impact and definition, allowing you to experience improved colour intensity after just two weeks. Lashes appear bigger, bolder and expertly enhanced.
Vital Eyeshadow Palette
Combining four complementing shades, you can define and highlight eyes with excellent colour longevity and seamless blendability. Melting effortlessly onto the lids for smooth and even application, the rich, velvety powder can be worn alone or together to deliver customised colour that won't crease, fade or smudge. Housed in a convenient mirrored compact. Can also be used on the body. Shades include: 'Bubbles' (warm peach), 'Trace' (grey brown), 'Envision' (warm brown) and 'Drop' (deep brown).
Brow Build in 'Thrive'
Tint, tame and define brows. With built-in fibres, the formula glides on to deliver long-wearing colour, allowing you to create enviable arches and emphasise the shape of your brows without having to worry about smudging or fading. Its handy spoolie brush fills in sparse brows for a fuller, thicker appearance with natural hair-like colour.
name: Pro Made Easy Eye Set Thrive - Dark

product_description:
Meet the needs of extremely thirsty lips with the Hurraw! Green Tea Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Instantly hydrating lips in one simple swipe, the creamy balm is infused with Organic Cold Pressed Hemp Oil, which is rich in omega fatty acids and therefore envelops lips in a veil of intense moisture. Dryness is eliminated with long-lasting effect.
The balm is complete with a healthy dose of Match Green Tea for added antioxidant benefits. The hardworking formula strives to leave lips ultra-comfortable and fragranced with a subtle green tea scent.
name: Green Tea Lip Balm

product_description:
Enhance the look of your lashes with the ModelCo Fibre Lash Brush-on Lashes, an award-winning two-step kit that combines a lengthening mascara with innovative brush-on lash fibres.
Working in unison to promote longer, dramatic lashes, the lash extension kit expertly adds 3-5mm of length to your natural lashes, boosting volume and definition with a water-resistant finish. Simply use the mascara to add length and definition, then apply the lash fibres to instantly enhance lash appearance. Finish with a final coat of mascara to seal in the fibres. Infused with Bees Wax and Carnauba Wax, the fibre lash formula keeps lashes nourished whilst delivering high-impact, voluptuous results. Smudge-proof, clump-free and easy to remove with warm water.
name: Fibre Lash Brush-on Lashes

product_description:
Achieve flawless eyebrows with the Brows on Point Micro Pencil - Raven from brow experts Billion Dollar Brows. Dual ended, Brows on Point comprises a precision point to one end and a spoolie brush to the other. The ultra-fine tip creates natural looking brush strokes that mimic the appearance of individual hairs for a subtle finish, whilst the spoolie can be used to comb and blend.
The pencil boasts a mechanical function, constantly delivering a precision tip without the need to sharpen. Filling in sparse brows to accentuate your look, the brow makeup offers maximum colour pay off and a professional finish. The formula is both water and smudge proof, gliding onto brows effortlessly and providing long lasting results.

product_description:
Daniel Sandler Luxury Matte Lipstick - Marilyn gives your lips a vibrant  pop of colour whilst caring for delicate skin. Long-lasting and with  rich pigmentation, the unique technology locks in colour and shine for  feather-resistant wear.
Enriched with conditioning shea butter  and hyaluronic acid, lips are left feeling pampered, whilst  multi-vitamins, avocado and jojoba oils moisturise, soothe and protect  against dryness and cracks. Lips are also plumped up by the folic  acid-filled treatment spheres, giving you a fuller and more defined  pout.

product_description:
The Laura Geller Iconic New York City Collection Eye Shadow Palette in ‘Uptown Chic’ is a luxurious collection of sophisticated shades inspired by the bustling uptown of Manhattan, whether it's a wistful stroll through Central Perk or a night out at the bright lights of Broadway.
The mirrored compact houses twelve carefully-curated eyeshadows in a range of shades and finishes, from matte nude to shimmering gold, each with a rich, densely-pigmented formula. Easily blended, each shade sweeps across the lid for instant, stay-true colour, perfect for creating subtle daytime looks or a sultry smoky eye.
Shades: Love Note (matte soft peachy nude)
Desert (shimmering fawn)
Bubbling (effervescent golden peach)
Brownstone (matte mocha brown)
Petal Pink (soft pinky mauve matte)
Uptown Tulip (lustrous desert rose)
Electric Rose (sizzling reddish copper)
Blackberry (shimmering plum wine)
Adobe (matte terracotta)
Chestnut Sparkle (chocolate shimmer)
24K Gold (metallic gold)
Fudge (matte blackened brown)

product_description:
The Japonesque BB/CC Cream Brush features mixed fibres and dual-length bristles to expertly apply and blend BB and CC creams. Made using a blend of natural and synthetic minerals, the brush is an essential makeup tool. - L.M.
Directions for Use: Use the dual-length bristles to apply and blend BB and CC creams.
name: BB/CC Cream Brush

product_description: Build the perfect smoky eye with the Lilah B. Palette Perfection Eye Quad in b. stunning. The eyeshadow quad offers four complementary shades in both matte and shimmer finishes, allowing you to create multi-dimensional and layered looks. Super blendable and highly pigmented, simply dust the lighter shade all over the lid for a natural finish or add in depth and precise lining with the darker hues. Housed in Lilah B.’s signature chic pebble-shaped case.
name: B. Palette Perfection Eye Quad - b. stunning

product_description:
Cover, correct and perfect your skin with ALGENIST Reveal Concentrated Colour Correcting Drops, a selection of lightweight serums that target specific skin concerns, such as redness and dullness.
Helping to neutralise dullness, redness, fatigue and dark circles, each specially curated colour improves the appearance of skin, visibly correcting to balance out and even skin tone. Infused with a host of beneficial ingredients, including an AlgaCorrecting Complex, Microalgae Oil and Alguronic Acid, the colour-correcting drops expertly rejuvenate skin whilst replenishing moisture and delivering anti-ageing and instant, skin-evening properties.
Bridging the gap between makeup and skincare, the drops can be worn alone or blended with daily skincare and makeup products to promote a smoother complexion and prolonged makeup wear. Expect a visibly corrected complexion with a more balanced and healthy appearance.
Pink: Corrects dullness and fatigued skin.
Green: Corrects redness.
Apricot: Corrects dark circles and dark spots.
Blue: Corrects sallowness and yellow tones.
name: Reveal Concentrated Colour Correcting Drops 15ml (Various Shades)

product_description:
Achieve a natural luminosity to your complexion with the INIKA Mineral Blusher in peacky keen, a neutral peach shade which suits all skin types. Formulated with highly pigmented minerals for a longer lasting, rich colour, this blusher is a must have addition to your makeup bag.
It's free from talc, oil, fragrance and preservatives, meaning it's kind to the skin whilst giving your complexion a luscious glow. K.D.Directions for use:
name: Mineral Blusher Peachy Keen

product_description:
Expertly apply make-up with the Japonesque Blending Trio; a set of three soft sponges with lightweight handles and latex-free, high-density foam heads for effortless blending of cream, powder, primer and foundation.
Features a round sponge for smooth application of make-up on the forehead jawline, an angled sponge to reach all facial contours, and a pointed design to reach awkward areas with ease. Expect professional results with an air-brushed effect.

product_description: Get that sunkissed glow instantly with the Lilah B. Bronzed Beauty™ Bronzer. Formulated with raw extracts of Aloe and Agar, the powdered bronzer features two shades allowing you to contour and highlight effortlessly whilst working to gently hydrate skin. Intensely pigmented and super blendable, the bronzer is perfect lightly dusted over cheekbones for a natural, radiant finish.

Reach new lengths with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Gracie False Strip Lashes, a pair of reusable false eyelashes that extend and enhance the look of your natural eyelashes.
Lightweight and comfortable to wear, the lashes add natural-looking length and fullness to your peepers, taking you perfectly from day to night with their versatile design. The synthetic strip lashes are easy to apply and reusable.

product_description: Take lashes to new lengths with the PÜR Minerals Impact Plus Mascara; a nourishing, mineral-based treatment to strengthen from within while creating instant volume and glamour. The highly pigmented formula coats each and every lash with bold, smudge-proof colour, with vitamins and conditioning agents helping create natural fullness and healthier looking regrowth.

Add intense colour to your pout with the KORRES Raspberry Twist Lipstick; a long-wearing, twist-up pencil that delivers full coverage without over-drying lips.
Enriched with Raspberry Oil, the lipstick glides on effortlessly and precisely for high-shine, sumptuous colour, whilst deeply nourishing, moisturising and hydrating dry lips to leave them soft and smooth. Provides antioxidant protection to keep lips supple and comfortable.

product_description:
Add the finishing touches to your makeup look with the Spectrum Collections A10 Small Fan Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘Feeling Fancy’ small fan brush is the ideal companion for applying highlighter like a professional. The super soft, synthetic bristles sweep a subtle veil of highlighter over the cheek bones, brow bones or anywhere that can be enhanced with a glow. The brush can be used to apply an array of powder products, or is perfect for brushing away excess product under the eyes after eyeshadow application.
The unicorn-inspired fan brush is an essential addition to any brush collection, making highlighter application a breeze.

product_description: Achieve a flawless complexion with the timeBalm Anti Wrinkle Concealer from theBalm. Packed with vitamins A, C and E and a blend of soybean oil, panthenol and linoleic acid, the weightless formula deeply nourishes, hydrates and protects delicate skin from environmental aggressors, whilst delivering full coverage to blur the appearance of dark circles and imperfections. Complete with a sponge, its luxurious texture melts effortlessly onto the face for a smooth, even make-up base. E.N.
colour: Light, Light/Medium, Lighter Than Light, Medium, Medium/Dark
name: timeBalm Anti Wrinkle Concealer (Various Shades)

product_description:
The Vintage Cosmetics Company Smokey Eye Make-Up Brush Set combines a trio of eye brushes that allow you to create effortless, sultry, smokey eyes. Fitted with soft, synthetic bristles and rust-proof aluminium ferrules, each brush is labelled with its purpose, ensuring fool-proof, professional-looking results. Complete with wooden handles. Housed in vintage-inspired floral packaging.
Shadow Brush
A dome-shaped eyeshadow brush for applying base colours over the entire lid. Its soft bristles allow you to sweep colour across the eye with ease, creating the perfect canvas to build a smokey eye.
Angled Shadow Brush
An angled eyeshaodw brush perfect for building and layering colour onto the lids; it delivers product with ease and expertly blends and buffs to create a smokey eye. Its angled tip allows you to effortlessly add depth to your crease to create the illusion of bigger eyes. The bristles are soft and feel comfortable on application.
Smudger Brush
A short, densely-bristled brush, perfect for smudging and buffing deep shapes into the crease, or for blending smokey shades together for a seamless finish.

product_description: Colour your lips with a choice of Matte Lipsticks from FACE Stockholm. Available in a range of shades, each lipstick provides intensely colour saturated coverage with no shine. With a long-wearing and non-drying formula, the lip colour glides on and stays put. The perfect handbag essential for a vibrant, matte-finish pout. – E.W.

product_description: Add sumptuous, saturated colour to your pout with the Chantecaille Lipstick; a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that glides on effortlessly to deliver comfortable, full coverage. Infused with natural Beeswax, emollient Amino Acids and Vitamins A and C, the nourishing formula leaves lips velvety soft, smooth and hydrated.
colour: Agave, Cerise, Lotus, Magnolia, Narcissia, Poppy, Sweet Pea, Tulipe
name: Lipstick (Various Shades)

product_description:
Perfect the appearance of skin with Elizabeth Arden's Pure Finish Mineral Tinted Moisturiser SPF 15 PA++, a hydrating formula that delivers sheer, natural coverage to smoothen the look of your complexion.
Infused with a cocktail of vitamins and antioxidants to moisturise and protect, the cream glides effortlessly over skin, delivering a natural-looking tint that helps even out skin's appearance whilst locking in moisture and enhancing radiance. Its Micro-light Minerals (naturally-derived mineral pigments) diffuse light to create the illusion of smoother fine lines and wrinkles. Expect a transformed complexion with a fresh, luminous glow.

product_description:
Highlight your best features with Chantecaille's Liquid Lumière, an anti-ageing highlighting fluid that works to illuminate and hydrate skin.
Infused with micro-sized, light reflecting pigments and a host of firming ingredients*, the lightweight highlighter instantly boosts radiance whilst blurring away the appearance of imperfections and promoting a smoother, firmer-looking complexion.
Its velvety, buildable texture blends effortlessly on skin to leave you with a luminous, contoured appearance. Wear over your foundation for targeted highlighting, or mix into your makeup/skincare for an all-over glow.
name: Liquid Lumière Anti-Aging Face Illuminator 23ml

product_description:
Add luscious colour to your lips with the Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics Lip Tar; an intense liquid lipstick that glides on effortlessly to deliver full coverage.
Enriched with Hemp Oil and Vitamin E, the high-pigmented formula conditions and hydrates, whilst a dose of refreshing Peppermint Oil leaves lips feeling revitalised. Its doe foot applicator hugs the lip contours for a picture-perfect pout.
colour: Anime, Anita, Black Dahlia, Black Metal Dahlia, Derelict, Grandma, Hollywood, Hoochie, Indrid, John Doe, Lydia, Memento, NSFW, Pagan, Queen, Rx, Stalker, Stud, Tarred, Traffic
name: Compulsive Cosmetics Lip Tar (Various Shades)

product_description:
Instantly achieve flawless brows with the 60 Seconds to Contour Brows Kit from brow experts, Billion Dollar Brows. Giving you the brows you’ve been craving, the kit boasts everything you need to lift and define your eyebrows; bringing out your inner glow. The Contour Brows Kit contains a dual ended highlighter and concealer pencil, blending brush and pencil sharpener, which combine to offer professional results.
Dual-Sided Highlighter and Concealer Pencil 2.83g
The dual sided pencil works as both a concealer and highlighter. The concealer can be used to define brows and cover any regrowth or imperfections, whilst the highlighter enhances the brow bone to visibly lift brows and offer added definition. Arriving in a universal hue, the highlighting pencil will complement any skin tone and deliver picture-perfect brows.
Smudge Brush
Working in synergy with the Highlighter and Concealer Pencil, the Smudge Brush effortlessly blends out the product to deliver a professional finish and a natural looking glow. The brush features a straight brush head, ideal for smudging cream based cosmetics.
Pencil Sharpener
Keep your pencils on point with the essential Pencil Sharpener. Comprising a dual hold design, the effective tool sharpens pencils to optimum precision, allowing for better results. The sharpener is complete with an integrated cleaning tool.
name: Dollar Brows 60 Seconds to Contour Brows Kit

product_description:
The professional bronzer brush from Japonesque is ideal for achieving a flawless sun-kissed glow.
The extra soft, dome shape is excellent for buffing out colour or applying bronzers on the cheeks, shoulders and decolletage.
name: Pro Bronzer Brush

product_description:
The expertly crafted shape of the mineral face brush from Japonesque allows you to control how much product is applied. Achieving a smooth and flawless finish becomes effortless.
Ideal for buffing and blending loose and pressed mineral powders.
name: Mineral Face Brush

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your pout with Revlon's Colorburst Lacquer Balm; a high-shine lip colour with a comfortable, balm-like feel.
Infused with a triple butter complex of shea, mango and coconut, the chubby, easy-to-use crayon glides effortlessly over lips, delivering highly pigmented, velvety colour with a dose of moisture. Retractable crayon with no need for sharpening.
name: Colorburst Lacquer Balm (Various Shades)

product_description: Containing everything you need to apply your foundation, powder, eyeshadow and eyeliner, the Japonesque Essential Brush Set features four must-have brushes that are perfect for the application of your daily makeup. They're presented in a pretty pouch to prevent the bristles from getting damaged. - L.M.
name: Essential Brush Set

product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with the Illamasqua Gel Colour; a gel-based, sheer cheek tint that adds a pop of colour to your complexion.
With a smooth, high-pigmented formula, the blusher stick glides on effortlessly to deliver blendable, buildable colour with an even, streak-free finish. Expect a radiant, healthy sheen and excellent colour payoff. Can also be used as a lip stain.
name: Gel Colour - Fluster 8g

product_description:
Create barely there looks or smouldering smokey eyes with theBalm's Appetit, an eyeshadow palette filled with a selection of delectable, talc-free shadows in neutral and smokey shades.
Combining nine complementary eyeshadows with shimmer, matt and foil finishes, the versatile palette allows you to create a range of looks that add subtle depth or bold definition to the eyes. The shadows can be used both wet or dry; use dry for a more muted finish, and use wet for added shine and drama. The carefully selected hues are highly pigmented and effortlessly blendable. Complete with an integrated mirror.
name: Appetit Eyeshadow Palette

product_description:
Achieve a flawless makeup base with Laura Geller Filter Fix Baked Correcting Setting Powder in Universal Apricot, a loose, baked setting powder that prolongs makeup wear whilst blurring the appearance of imperfections.
The universal shade contains skin-brightening Apricot Pigments that camouflage blemishes and unwanted marks, and ultra HD Perfecting Pigments to lend skin a smooth, photo-ready finish. Delivering a flawless veil that blends seamlessly onto skin, the lightweight powder will hydrate the complexion whilst regulating excess shine to keep makeup looking freshly applied for longer. The loose powder is dispensed via a netted pot delivery system.
name: Geller Filter Fix Baked Correcting Setting Powder Universal Apricot

product_description:
Created to hydrate and nourish the lips whilst giving a subtle hint of colour, the Shine On Tinted Lip Salve by Balance Me is a must have. Containing anti-oxidants, fatty acids and vitamins, the specialised formula ensures you're given a perfected pout that lasts.
With a high shine finish, this lip salve comes in a range of hues to suit any mood or occasion. K.D.
name: Me Shine On Tinted Lip Salve Rose Blush

product_description: The High Definition Illuminator instantly highlights and lifts dull complexions. The ultra-lightweight pressed powder contains light-diffusing, pearlescent pigments to deliver a soft shimmer, enhancing the look of contours and creating a sculpted appearance. Enriched with Vitamins C and E as well as nourishing Argan Oil, the super smooth formula glides onto skin and is easily blended for a natural, healthy-looking glow.
name: Definition Illuminator

product_description: Create expert results with the High Definition Smudger Brush; a must-have tool for distributing and blending eyeshadow or eyeliner. Featuring soft, natural bristles and a compact, rounded head, the multi-tasking brush picks up and deposits the perfect amount of product, allowing you to achieve a sultry, smokey eye make-up look.
name: Definition Smudger Brush

product_description: Achieve that effortless sun-kissed glow with the Lilah B. Retractable Bronzer Brush #2, a compact and chic brush that’s the perfect addition to any beauty buffs’ makeup collection. Simply twist the top to reveal the super soft bristles that allow you to blend powdered bronzer with precision and control for a flawless finish. Hypo-allergenic and super hygienic, the tool is ideal for on-the-go applications.
name: B. Retractable Bronzer Brush #2

product_description:
Line and define your eyes with Lord & Berry's Perfecto Waterproof Felt Tip Liner, a 100% waterproof, chubby felt pen eyeliner that creates thin to thick lines with control and precision.
Utilising a newly developed 'Film Builder' which enhances durability, the long-lasting formula glides effortlessly across the eyes with its silky smooth formula, and lasts over twenty-four hours for sultry, defined eyes that last all day and night. Completely smudge-proof, the quick-drying eyeliner feels weightless on the eye and leaves no stain after removal. - K.N.
name: & Berry Perfecto Liner Long Lasting Waterproof Felt Tip Liner - Black Wardrobe

product_description:
Perfect for every mood, outfit or occasion, Lottie London's Eyeshadow Palette combines twelve shades in a range of shimmer and matte finishes.
With a super smooth texture that melts effortlessly onto the lids, each powder can be applied separately or blended together to create endless eye make-up looks with long-wearing results.
Housed in a chic palette with a dual-ended applicator, you can achieve show-stopping results on-the-go.
name: London 12 Piece Eyeshadow Palette - The Smokes 12g

product_description: Perfect your makeup with the Shiseido refining makeup primer. Non-comedogenic and dermatologically tested, the imperfection erasing primer will perfectly prep skin for makeup application, filling in lines and counteracting dullness for a smooth and even glow. With a natural finish, the primer will sit effortlessly on the skin, combatting redness for an even complexion whilst keeping your makeup in place all day long. - K.N.
name: Refining Makeup Primer (30ml)

product_description: Expertly define your eyes with Pixi's Endless Silky Eye Pen; an award-winning, smudge-proof eyeliner that delivers high-pigmented colour with superior stayability. Enriched with antioxidant Vitamin E to nourish and protect the delicate eye area, the waterproof, silky formula glides on effortlessly to enhance your peepers in a single stroke.
name: Endless Silky Eye Pen - Cobolt Blue

product_description:
Line and define your eyes with KORRES Pencil Shimmer Minerals. Formulated with nourishing beeswax and tonic volcanic minerals, it has a satin soft texture that glides effortlessly onto your eyes, whilst the hint of shimmer adds a subtle, glamourous touch.
Intensely pigmented, it produces long-lasting and smudge-proof deinition that stays put around the clock. - L.M.
name: Pencil Shimmer Minerals

product_description: Create neutral or sultry eye makeup looks with Lottie London's All Eyes on You Eyeshadow Brush, a multi-tasking eyeshadow brush with compact, rounded bristles. Perfect for applying base colour, or for buffing in the crease, the brush picks up and deposits the perfect amount of product, and works great with both crème or powder colours. - K.N.
name: London All Eyes on You Eyeshadow Brush

product_description:
Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion with the ModelCo Fluidsplash 3-in-1 Foundation; an oil-free formula that combines the benefits of a concealer, foundation and eye base.
Infused with Aloe Vera and antioxidant Vitamin E, the ultra-hydrating liquid foundation blends seamlessly onto skin to minimise the appearance of blemishes and imperfections, whilst delivering long-lasting coverage for a dewy, radiant finish. Provides SPF15+ protection.
name: Fluidsplash 3-in-1 Foundation - Urchin 04

product_description:
Combining everything you need to achieve a flawless face, INIKA introduce their Face in a Box Starter Kit in 'Trust'. Formulated specially for medium to dark skin tones, the set contains a range of makeup essentials to create a radiant, natural-looking complexion with a beautiful finish.
Loose Mineral Foundation - Trust (3g):
Multi-tasking, this lightweight formula acts as a concealer, foundation and powder all in one, and is formulated with pure ingredients to help give your complexion a picture perfect canvas every time. Offers natural sun protection with SPF25 without clogging pores for a flawless-looking, radiant finish. Ideal for hiding acne, scarring, rosacea or pigmentation.
Liquid Foundation - Tan (10ml):
A buildable, natural coverage foundation infused with hyaluronic acid to hydrate and illuminate skin. Combining the hydration of a moisturiser with the coverage of a foundation, the antioxidant-packed makeup glides effortlessly across the skin with no oily residue, blending seamlessly to cover imperfections whilst enriching the epidermis with a powerhouse of vitamins, minerals and nurturing oils, including argan and rosehip. Won't clog pores.
Mineral Bronzer - Sunloving (3.5g):
This natural-looking bronzer will add a beautiful sun-kissed glow to your skin and is perfect on its own or over foundation. Add definition to your face by contouring your features or simply dust all over the face and décolletage.
Certified Organic Pure Primer (10ml):
The perfect pre-foundation prep, this hydrating primer will provide an even base for foundation application; improving makeup's staying power whilst protecting skin. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid for superior hydration.
Certified Organic Perfection Concealer - Medium (4ml):
A lightweight, perfecting concealer to disguise dark circles, blemishes and even out skin pigmentation for a flawless base. Combining light reflective mineral pigments with Shea Butter and Aloe Vera, the hydrating formula blends easily to create a radiant, light-reflecting finish whilst camouflaging dark, puffy eyes.
Mineral Mattifying Powder (0.7g):
A translucent, loose powder perfect for use before foundation to absorb excess oil, or after foundation for setting makeup in place with a natural, matt finish. Its silky blend of the lightest minerals feel weightless and soothing on the skin. Creates a perfected complexion and protects with natural SPF 15. Will never clog pores. Perfect for even the most sensitive skin types.
Mineral Blush - Rosy Glow (0.7g):
A silky soft, loose mineral blusher with highly concentrated, pigmented formula and puff pot applicator. Delivering a flush of warm, rich colour onto cheeks, the super-soft formula creates a healthy glow that's ideal for even the most sensitive skin. Free from talc, parabens and other nasty fillers.
Vegan Kabuki Brush:
This ethical brush combines sustainable wood with cruelty-free synthetic bristles for perfect application. Award-winning and highly coveted, the Kabuki delivers complete and seamless coverage due to its thick, dense brush head and leaves your skin looking flawless. Feels incredibly soft on the skin. 100% Vegan and Certified Cruelty Free.
name: Face in a Box Starter Kit - Trust

product_description: The Shiseido Advanced Hydro Liquid Compact Case is perfect for housing your Shiseido Hydro Liquid Compact Foundation. The robust foundation compact opens to reveal space for your creamy foundation and an area for your sponge applicator, so you can pop it in your bag and touch up your foundation at any point throughout the day. - L.M
name: Advanced Hydro Liquid Compact Case (12g)

product_description: Expertly define eyes with Japonesque's Cut Crease Blending Brush; an innovative make-up brush dedicated to helping you achieve an effortless, smooth crease line. Featuring a densely packed, bevelled tip with natural fibres, the edge can be used to distribute colour for added depth and definition, whilst the flat face allows precision blending for a professional finish every time.
name: Cut Crease Blending Brush

product_description:
Enhance your natural beauty with the INIKA Lip and Cheek Set - Pretty in Pink; a four-piece makeup set arriving alongside a convenient cosmetic bag. The all-natural collection boasts an effective primer, mineral blusher, nude lipstick and a lip brush for expert application.
Certified Organic Pure Primer with Hyaluronic Acid (4ml)
Achieve long-lasting foundation coverage with the Certified Organic Pure Primer with Hyaluronic Acid; a hydrating formula that prepares skin for makeup application. Enriched with a generous dose of Hyaluronic Acid, the priming formula delivers a veil of moisture to the complexion, which visibly plumps skin and helps to reduce the appearance of any fine lines or wrinkles. A smooth and hydrated face is the perfect base for ensuring makeup has a lasting, professional- looking finish.
Mineral Blusher Puff Pot - Pink Petal (3g)
Enhance the complexion with a rosy glow from the Mineral Blusher Puff Pot; a loose powder formula that delivers pure performance. Ideal for sensitive skin types due to its gentle formula, the blusher provides a sweep of warming colour to the cheeks.
Certified Organic Vegan Lipstick - Nude Pink (4.2g)
Add a pop of colour to the lips with the Nude Pink Certified Organic Vegan Lipstick; a creamy, pink hue. Enriched with a skin-loving blend of Shea Butter and Jojoba oil, the formula not only delivers enviable colour, but nourishes, hydrates and protects lips. The Nude Pink hue delivers a long lasting hue with an intense colour pay off.
Vegan Lip Brush
Apply lip colour with precision with the Vegan Lip Brush. Boasting a small yet firm brush head, the applicator applies lipstick, tints or lip gloss evenly and accurately each time, delivering a professional finish. The brush is perfect for taking on-the-go, arriving with a lid, the brush can stay protected whilst inside your handbag.
name: Lip and Cheek Set - Pretty in Pink

product_description:
Banish imperfections with the Menaji Camo Camouflage Stick - Bronze. Wonderfully discreet, this oil-based concealer hides spots, bumps and general imperfections, and is enriched with SPF8 protection to shield your skin from the sun's harmful rays.
Specially formulated to withstand the naturally higher oil production of male skin, it's fragrance-free and hypo-allergenic, making it suitable for even the most sensitive of complexions.

Directions of Use:
name: Camo Camouflage Stick - Bronze (7g)

product_description:
Line and define your peepers with the Pixi Endless Silky Eye Pen in Matte Mulberry. Gliding onto the eye like silk, the liner creates a flawless line in a single sweep.
The eye pencil boasts an ultra-longwearing, waterproof formula that guarantees to stay in place all day and all night; without the need for a touch-up. Gentle yet effective, the eyeliner delivers an intense colour pay off. Matte Mulberry offers a matte brown plum hue.
name: Endless Silky Eye Pen - Matte Mulberry

product_description:
Fatten up your lashes with Natio Extreme Volume Smudge Proof Mascara in Black. With a silky, smudge-proof, water-resistant formula that perfectly separates lashes, this must-have mascara boasts long-wearing results to intensify the look of eyes and lashes.
Pack your peepers with the wow factor with this Natio Extreme Volume Smudge Proof Mascara in Black. This gorgeous mascara won’t budge, ensuring you remain looking as gorgeous as you do when you step out of the front door all day long.
Directions of use:
name: Extreme Volume Smudge Proof Mascara - Black (10ml)

product_description:
Pure Venom Pure Berry, a sheer wearable red from DuWop gives a subtle shine and enduring colour. As it plumps your lips for a perfect pout, Pure Venom in Pure Berry will soothe and condition your lips for a comfortable, long-lasting stain.
The Pure Venom earth friendly recyclable tin from DuWop will make an adorable addition to your make up bag, while the Pure Berry shade will add a pretty tint to compliment this seasons trends.
Directions of use:
name: Pure Venom - Berry

product_description:
The reverse time duo from DuWop cleverly combines two of our highly renowned products, Reverse Lipliner and Reverse Eyeliner, to create the ultimate dynamic duo, Reverse Time. It's the perfect kit to combat some of the makeup world's biggest problems: 
The limited-edition Reverse Time set includes a full size version of DuWop's Reverse Lipliner and Reverse Eyeliner.
The Reverse Lipliner and Reverse Eyeliner are colorless matte pencils that improve the texture and appearance of the skin by plumping the fine lines around the lips and eyes. The miracle ingredient in the pencils is Kombuchka™, a product that causes “lipofilling” — a reaction that restores volume to the skin in areas where fine lines appear. Other ingredients include pure macadamia oil and vitamin E, known for their softening and hydrating properties.
name: Reverse Time 2 x 3.8g

product_description:
Explore your wild side with this Safari Chic brush set from Japonesque.
This is a perfect, take-everywhere 3-piece set featuring unique  animal print bristles, A signature microfiber case holds the  distinctive, ultra-plush brushes expertly designed for flawless makeup  application.
name: Safari Chic Brush Set

product_description:
Achieve full brows with help from the Lancôme Sourcils Styler Brow Mascara; an innovative brow product co-created with renowned celebrity makeup artist, Lisa Eldridge.
Arriving with an innovative, hairbrush-inspired applicator, the brow mascara effortlessly sweeps through eyebrows. Begin by pushing the brush against the hairs to coat them in product and achieve a thick and full effect, then smooth in the direction of hair growth to create enviable definition.
The smudge-resistant gel formula dries quickly, holding brows flawlessly in place for up to 14 hours without the need for a touch up.
name: Sourcils Styler Brow Mascara - 00

product_description:
Add a flush of colour to your complexion with the Vincent Longo Dew Drop Radiant Blush; a long-wearing, compact powder infused with a subtle pearl shimmer to reflect light.
Developed with a unique powder-pressing technique, the buildable blusher blends seamlessly onto skin to add dimension and enhance natural radiance for a bright, lit-from-within make-up look. Infused with antioxidant Vitamin E to nourish and protect, you can expect a smooth, demi-matte finish with a delicate glimmer.
name: Longo Dew Drop Radiant Blush 5g - Sandalwood

product_description:
Add a flush of colour to your complexion with the Vincent Longo Dew Drop Radiant Blush; a long-wearing, compact powder infused with a subtle pearl shimmer to reflect light.
Developed with a unique powder-pressing technique, the buildable blusher blends seamlessly onto skin to add dimension and enhance natural radiance for a bright, lit-from-within make-up look. Infused with antioxidant Vitamin E to nourish and protect, you can expect a smooth, demi-matte finish with a delicate glimmer.
name: Longo Dew Drop Radiant Blush 5g - Temple Peach

product_description:
Lancôme's Teint Miracle Cushion Foundation Refill 035 has been designed to fit your empty Lancôme Teint Miracle Cushion Foundation compact.
Delivering buildable coverage with a fresh, dewy finish, the foundation blends effortlessly onto skin to camouflage imperfections and promote a more even, radiant skin tone. The cushion delivery system ensures mess-free, easy application; simply touch to activate, then apply to skin with a patting motion to create a naturally flawless effect. The foundation is equipped with a Fresh Touch Puff, an advanced applicator that enables maximum control when picking up product, and feels cooling on contact with skin. 
Portable and refillable, its the perfect every day makeup.
name: Teint Miracle Cushion Foundation Refill - 035

product_description:
Create stunning and bright eyes with the Pixi Crayon Combo - Wide Awake (2.21g). With a matte nude to brighten and a glowing cream to lighten, this double-ended pencil will instantly enhance your peepers.
Enriched with energising caffeine, soothing chamomile and brightening pearl powder, the waterproof pencil gives rich colour payoff, whilst being easily blendable for a soft-focus effect. Super smooth, the colour glides on effortlessly and stays put around the clock. - L.M.
name: Crayon Combo - Wide Awake (2.98G)

product_description:
Define and lift your lashes with Sigma's High Caliber Lash Mascara, a waterproof mascara with long-lasting, 13 hour wear.
With a firm, straight wand to lift and lengthen, the maximising mascara intensifies and lifts the appearance of your eyelashes; boosting body and creating drama. Its intense black formula effortlessly coats lashes from root to tip, lifting upwards for high impact, smudge and flake resistant finish. Lashes are enviably long and lifted.
name: High Caliber Lash Mascara

product_description:
Daniel Sandler Blending Brush blends smoothly along the eye crease, creating soft, smoky looks, and is great for highlighting the brow bone. Made only from the finest natural hairs you can shape and shade as you wish.
Apply a splash of colour to your lids with zero effort using this Daniel Sandler Blending Brush. This handbag friendly sized brush guarantees seamless blending time after time for professional results.
name: Sandler Blending Brush

product_description:
Give your skin a warm glow with this discreet make-up. The Karin Herzog Egypt Earth Powder Hator Dark is a totally naturally alternative to make up and will diminish shadows and uneven tones.
The Karin Herzog Egypt Earth Powder Hator Dark will provide you with an optimised alterative to all types of foundation. The use of Mica (shining stone) works to deflect the light, giving your skin a brightness and radiance that is truly beautiful.
This Egyptian Earth Powder work hard to control oil production and their effect will last all day. This fantastic product also has much more staying power than traditional foundations, its so good that even sport does not affect the appearance of these powders!
Lookfantastic Tip:
 
Directions of Use:
name: Herzog Egyptian Earth Face Powder - Hator (Dark) (10ml)

product_description: Combining durability and high performance, Illamasqua's Blush Up Brush allows effortless blusher application. Crafted with premium quality synthetic bristles and a unique flat head that hugs the contours of your face, the make-up brush is the perfect tool for blending and contouring, enabling you to achieve a professionally sculpted, defined finish. Easy to clean.
name: Blush Up Brush

product_description:
Create endless make-up looks with the Vital Eyeshadow Palette from Illamasqua. Combining four complementing shades, you can define and highlight eyes with excellent colour longevity and seamless blendability.
Melting effortlessly onto the lids for smooth and even application, the rich, velvety powder can be worn alone or together to deliver customised colour that won't crease, fade or smudge. Housed in a convenient mirrored compact. Can also be used on the body.
'Bubbles': Warm peach.
'Trace': Grey brown.
'Envision': Warm brown.
'Drop': Deep brown.
name: Vital Eyeshadow Palette

product_description:
Apply your favourite BB cream whilst on-the-go with the Gold BB Pumping Cushion from Korean brand Skin79. Effortless to apply, the pumping cushion expresses Skin79’s triple action Gold BB formula, which works to visibly firm the skin and produce a matte finish. The compact arrives with a handy cushion puff, which aids the application.
Enriched with a cocktail of 24K gold, Caviar Extract and Argan oil, the lightweight formula gently moisturises the skin, whilst delivering multiple anti-ageing and sun protection benefits. Expect naturally flawless skin that is youthful and healthy looking.
name: Gold BB Pumping Cushion

product_description:
Achieve endless make-up looks with the PIXI Mesmerising Mineral Palette. Combining six shades of eye shadow in complementing shades, you can define and highlight your eyes for natural-looking results with excellent colour longevity and seamless blendability.
Formulated with light-reflecting minerals and nourishing vitamin E to protect the delicate skin around the eye, the silky powder melts effortlessly onto the lids to deliver gemstone-inspired hues that won't crease or fade. Complete with a dual-ended sponge-tip applicator. E.N.
name: Mesmerising Mineral Palette - Amethyst Aura

product_description:
Combining high performance and durability, the Chantecaille Eye Basic Brush works best for all-over, even application of eye colour on the lids.
Crafted from non-endangered wood with a pale ivory coating, the handle offers superior control, whilst the soft pony hair bristles and firm, tapered tip deliver seamless, smooth colour for a professional finish. Can also be used to sweep highlighter under the brows, or to shade the sides of the nose for a contoured make-up look.
name: Eye Basic Brush

product_description:
Achieve endless eye make-up looks with the Treasure Chest Eyeshadow Palette from Mellow Cosmetics. Combining twelve shades in a range of matte and shimmering finishes, the palette is perfect for creating daytime or evening looks.
Blending seamlessly onto lids for smooth, flawless application, each high-pigmented, buildable powder delivers long-wearing, crease-resistant colour with superior staying power. Can be worn alone or mixed together for customised results.
name: Cosmetics Treasure Chest Eyeshadow Palette

product_description:
ModelCo have collaborated with American model, Hailey Baldwin, to create the Glow Skin Perfecting Beauty Balm, a multi-tasking, skin-refining formula that promises to perfect your complexion.
Lightweight and oil free, the silky, blendable balm creates a luxurious veil over skin; it delivers an instant boost of hydration, whilst enhancing natural radiance to create a lit-from-within look. Can be worn alone or used as a primer to minimise the appearance of fine lines and pores for smooth, flawless make-up application. Combats signs of fatigue to leave your complexion fresh and dewy with restored luminosity.
name: Glow Skin Perfecting Beauty Balm

product_description:
Created to hydrate and nourish the lips whilst giving a subtle hint of colour, the Shine On Tinted Lip Salve by Balance Me is a must have. Containing anti-oxidants, fatty acids and vitamins, the specialised formula ensures you're given a perfected pout that lasts.
With a high shine finish, this lip salve comes in a range of hues to suit any mood or occasion. K.D.
name: Me Shine On Tinted Lip Salve Ruby Red

product_description:
Achieve a professional makeup finish with Pixi's Strobe and Bronze Palette, a mix of bronzer and highlighting shades to add warmth and radiance to your complexion.
Designed in collaboration with beauty blogger, Maryam Maquillage, the face kit combines three bronzing shades with three highlighters, allowing you to add all-over warmth to your face, define natural hollows and enhance luminosity. Blending seamlessly onto skin, the sunkissed bronzers are perfect for sculpting your cheeks, forehead and nose, or for sweeping across the whole face, and the highlighters are best applied to high points on the face (areas that naturally catch the light) such as cheekbones, corner of the eyes and down the centre of the nose.
The sheer, buildable powders are fade-resistant to leave you with flawless, long-lasting makeup.
name: Strobe and Bronze Palette - Glow and Bronze

product_description:
Perk up tired peepers with the Chantecaille Brightening Eye Powder Kajal; an advanced eye liner pencil works to instantly alleviate signs of fatigue and dullness.
Enriched with Aloe Vera, the creamy, nude-toned formula glides across the waterline to brighten the whites of the eye and minimise the look of redness. Boasting long-lasting and comfortable wear, it leaves eyes looking refreshed and wide awake.
name: Brightening Eye Powder Kajal - Nude

product_description: The Matte Chic Liquid Lipstick from Chantecaille delivers intense, long-lasting colour with a virtually weightless feel. Infused with advanced peptides, the moisturising formula works to stimulate natural collagen production and blur imperfections for a visible plumping effect. The precise doe-foot applicator allows the colour to effortlessly glide on without bleeding or feathering, and it quickly sets for a bold, matte finish that doesn’t fade or transfer.
name: Matte Chic Liquid Lipstick - Jerry

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your pout with the Pixi GelTint and SilkGloss in 'Beach' and 'Fresh', a dual-ended lip colour with lip tint to one end, and luscious lip gloss to the other.
Infused with Aloe Vera, Jojoba and Shea Butter, the nourishing lip colour glides effortlessly on, delivering a wash of hydration with a long-lasting, stained effect finish. Lips feel comfortable and nourished with a healthy slick of colour.
name: Beach GelTint and Fresh SilkGloss

product_description:
ModelCo have collaborated with American model, Hailey Baldwin, to create the Feline Kit Liquid Eye Liner & Applicator Tool.
Featuring a precision 3D tip, the intense black eyeliner glides effortlessly onto lids to deliver long-wearing, smudge-proof colour for a professional make-up look.
Serving as a guide and 'steady hand', the three-sided tool allows you to line and define your eyes, and acts as a mess-free shield when creating a variety of angles and shapes. Can also be used for lip, brow, mascara and eyeshadow products.
name: Feline Kit Liquid Eye Liner & Applicator Tool

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your pout with the Pixi GelTint and SilkGloss in 'Berry' and 'Sweet', a dual-ended lip colour with lip tint to one end, and luscious lip gloss to the other.
Infused with Aloe Vera, Jojoba and Shea Butter, the nourishing lip colour glides effortlessly on, delivering a wash of hydration with a long-lasting, stained effect finish. Lips feel comfortable and nourished with a healthy slick of colour.
name: Berry GelTint and Sweet SilkGloss

product_description:
Emanate sultry glamour with the Illamasqua Bronzing Duo in Glint/Solar; a chic mirrored compact combining two sun-kissed shades to bronze, contour and highlight.
Easily blended and universally flattering, the pressed powders contain crushed pearl essence for a subtle shimmer and smooth, even finish. Ideally balanced to add light and shaded definition all over the face, the duo leave skin looking radiant and glowing.
name: Bronzing Duo - Glint/Solar 2 x 4g

product_description:
Expertly define your eyes with the Complement Palette from Illamasqua. Combining four eyeshadow shades in shimmer, metallic and matte finishes, you can create endless eye make-up looks with superior colour pay-off and seamless blendability.
Melting effortlessly onto the lids for smooth, even application, the high-pigmented, long-wearing powders deliver crease-resistant colour that suits all skin tones. Housed in a mirrored compact, you can create sultry, smokey eyes on-the-go.
'Focus' - cool brown metallic
'Slink' - soft champagne shimmer
'Forgiveness' - rich chocolate plum
'Queen of the Night' - blackened plum
name: Complement Palette 6.5g

product_description:
Get ready to rock the dramatic eye look with Daniel Sandler Green Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner. With a groundbreaking formula that keeps your look intact all day, this eyeliner has excellent coverage and guarantees zero smudging.
Daniel Sandler Green Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner feels great to apply, thanks to its high content of silicone. Green Velvet is absolutely waterproof, super long-wearing and extraordinarily soft, combining rich colour with out-of-this-world coverage and no smudging.
name: Sandler Green Velvet Waterproof Eyeliner

product_description: Eylure present the Vegas Nay Easy Elegance Lashes; a pair of textured eyelashes with corner kicks for an expertly defined, fuller-looking finish and elongated appearance. Suitable for all eye shapes, the reusable lashes are complete with adhesive glue and an instruction booklet for easy application. Long-lasting and lightweight.
name: Vegas Nay - Easy Elegance Lashes

product_description:
This Translucent Face Powder SPF10 by RMK is an innovative micro bead powder that works to absorb excess oils on the skin whilst giving a perfected finish to your foundation. Covering up open pores and dull tones, this Face Powder gives your skin a semi-matte look that lasts.
Formulated with an added SPF10 to protect against the damaging effects of the sun, you'll be given a salon perfect finish everytime with the RMK Translucent Face Powder SPF10. K.D.
name: Translucent Face Powder SPF10 N00 (8.5g)

product_description:
Add the finer details to your eye makeup looks with the Spectrum Collections A12 Fluffy Pencil Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The small ‘Draw Me Pretty’ brush is the ideal size for more intricate finishing touches, including highlighting the inner corner of the eye, adding colour to the crease and smoking out liners. An essential addition to any brush collection, the synthetic pencil brush offers professional-looking results.
name: Collections A12 Fluffy Pencil Brush

product_description:
Subtly enhance your makeup look with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Connie False Strip Lashes, a pair of reusable false eyelashes that lend your eyes a soft and naturally fuller appearance.
Lightweight and comfortable to wear, the crossed knot lashes add natural-looking fullness and volume to your peepers; their soft black colour makes them ideal for those with lighter hair colours, or those who desire a less dramatic finish. The synthetic strip lashes are easy to apply and reusable.
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Connie False Strip Lashes

product_description:
Treat your lips to the moisturising and plumping properties of butter LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick, a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that delivers a shock of colour whilst dousing lips in essential moisture.
Accentuating the natural curves of your pout, the luscious formula is enriched with a Phyto-Endorphin Complex to boost your mood, and a Plumping Complex to help increase the appearance of fullness; lips look smoother, firmer and more defined. Standing the test of time, the lipstick withstands feathering and bleeding, so your pout looks irresistably kissable, for longer.
name: LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick - Rebellious

product_description:
Refine your brows with the GreatShape Eyebrow Kit from jane iredale. Designed to create defined brows with a natural looking finish, the eyebrow kit is host to a pigmented brow powder and nourishing wax, alongside a handy dual-ended applicator. Stowed inside a rose-gold mirrored compact, the brow kit contains everything you need for flawless brows.
Mineral-rich, the powder glides onto brows to add colour and depth, filling in any sparse areas and delivering a long-lasting, water resistant finish.
The brow wax is created with a botanical formula that nourishes and protects each strand. Without leaving behind a sticky residue, the wax can be used to hold brows in place, resulting in an enviable shape.
name: iredale GreatShape Eyebrow Kit - Blonde

product_description: Maybelline presents the Sun Bricks Bronzer Powder Blondes Palette, an all-in-one must have beauty product for any makeup buff. The chic palette features a natural matte bronzer as well as lighter, shimmery ‘bricks’ that are perfect for highlighting. Dust all over for a subtle sunkissed glow or apply the darker shade with precision as a contour for enhanced depth and structure.
name: Dream Sun Bricks Bronzer Powder Blondes Palette

product_description:
Achieve full brows with help from the Lancôme Sourcils Styler Brow Mascara; an innovative brow product co-created with renowned celebrity makeup artist, Lisa Eldridge.
Arriving with an innovative, hairbrush-inspired applicator, the brow mascara effortlessly sweeps through eyebrows. Begin by pushing the brush against the hairs to coat them in product and achieve a thick and full effect, then smooth in the direction of hair growth to create enviable definition.
The smudge-resistant gel formula dries quickly, holding brows flawlessly in place for up to 14 hours without the need for a touch up.
name: Sourcils Styler Brow Mascara - 03

product_description:
Treat your lips to the moisturising and plumping properties of butter LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick, a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that delivers a shock of colour whilst dousing lips in essential moisture.
Accentuating the natural curves of your pout, the luscious formula is enriched with a Phyto-Endorphin Complex to boost your mood, and a Plumping Complex to help increase the appearance of fullness; lips look smoother, firmer and more defined. Standing the test of time, the lipstick withstands feathering and bleeding, so your pout looks irresistably kissable, for longer.
name: LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick - Free

product_description:
Finish up your eye make-up only with the best when you use Daniel Sandler Eyeshadow Brush Two. This make-up brush is ideal for applying eye shadows on your lid and under your brow bone for a perfect final touch.
To use after the Daniel Sandler Eyeshadow Brush One, the Daniel Sandler Eyeshadow Brush Two (made from 100% natural hair) is a more densely packed colour brush to allow closer control of dark colours near the lash line and firmer blending.
name: Sandler Eyeshadow Brush Two

product_description:
Shape, groom and preen your eyebrows with The Vintage Cosmetics Company 3 Piece Tweezer Set, a trio of high quality stainless steel tweezers with a vintage-inspired, floral design.
Offering three types of tips, the tweezers expertly remove stray hairs with ultimate precision. The must-have beauty set for cleaning up or completely reshaping your brows. Complete with a matching floral travel pouch for safe storage.
Slanted Tweezers
Ideal for general brow tidying and reshaping. Use the slanted tip to remove hairs and create your desired shape.
Pointed Tweezers
Perfect for removing ingrown hairs and splinters. Great for fine hair removal.
Precision Pointed Tweezers
Equipped with both a slanted and pointed tip for expert results. Use the slanted tip to shape and define, and the point to precisely remove extra fine hairs.
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company 3 Piece Tweezer Set

product_description:
Treat your lips to the moisturising and plumping properties of butter LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick, a long-wearing, creamy lipstick that delivers a shock of colour whilst dousing lips in essential moisture.
Accentuating the natural curves of your pout, the luscious formula is enriched with a Phyto-Endorphin Complex to boost your mood, and a Plumping Complex to help increase the appearance of fullness; lips look smoother, firmer and more defined. Standing the test of time, the lipstick withstands feathering and bleeding, so your pout looks irresistably kissable, for longer.
name: LONDON Plush Rush Lipstick - Elated

product_description: Keep your brows on point with Eylure's Brow Sharpener. The dual chamber pencil sharpener is perfect for sharpening eyebrow pencils; keeping your brow pencil sharp enables better control and natural-looking, feather-like strokes.
name: Brow Sharpener

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Blending Set Infused with Vitamin E, a set of latex-free makeup sponges that expertly apply and blend a range of makeup products onto your skin with an airbrushed finish. 
Infused with Vitamin E for a moisturising boost, each specially shaped blender allows you to apply foundation and concealer to large areas of the face, whilst targeting smaller, hard-to-reach areas such as around the eyes and nose. Versatile and easy to use, they will also blend your favourite highlighters and blushers, and serve as a great tool for contouring. Soaking the sponges in water prior to use will ensure makeup doesn't absorb into them (which means no wastage!).
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Blending Set Infused with Vitamin E

product_description:
Transform peepers with the Illamasqua Eyeshadow in ‘Ritual’; a highly pigmented, intense formula that delivers outstanding colour pay off and long lasting wear.
Part of the May Queen collection to celebrate the folklore festivities of May Day, the 'Ritual' shade embraces the essence of spring-time renewal with a fresh, iridescent pink hue and glistening glitter pigments for an iridescent metallic finish.
Wear alone across the lid in a simple wash of colour, layer up for a bolder impact or apply with a damp brush for a solid slick of colour to reinvigorate your look. Housed in the sleek signature compact.
name: Eye Shadow - Ritual

product_description:
The Vintage Cosmetics Company Pedicure Purse houses an array of must-have beauty tools for achieving the perfect pedicure, wherever you are. Made from high quality stainless steel with a pink and vintage floral design. Housed in a pink satin purse.
Toenail Clippers - Perfect for clipping and trimming long or broken nails.
Nail Scissors - For snipping and trimming your toenails.
Cuticle Pusher - A dual-ended tool with large paddle for gently pushing back cuticles, and a smaller paddle for cleaning around and under nails.
Cuticle Tool - A must-have for trimming hangnails and keeping cuticles preened.
Toe Separators - A handy toe separator to keep good distance between toes when painting to avoid smudges and transferring.
Orange Sticks - Can be used to shape the base of the nail, clean underneath or swipe away any nail varnish mistakes.
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Pedicure Purse - Pink/Floral Satin

product_description: Add intensity to your lashes with Eylure's Exaggerate No.146 Eyelashes. Soft, lightweight and reusable, the handmade false lashes are perfect for any occasion; their full and feathery design adds sophisticated definition, whilst their unique curve allows them to hug the eye contour for effortless application and comfortable wear.
name: Exaggerate No.146 Eyelashes

product_description:
Drench your lips in a lustrous sheen with the RMK Color Lip Gloss in 'Sparkle Rose'.
Combining the vibrant colour of a lipstick with the clarity of a lip Gloss, the colour glides effortlessly over lips with its square-shaped applicator, and delivers a veil of sheer yet brilliant colour. Its host of moisturising ingredients, including Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil keep lips feeling hydrated and comfortable.
name: Color Lip Gloss - 02 Sparkle Rose

product_description:
Add a flush of colour to your complexion with the Trifle Cosmetics Lip & Cheek Jam; a dual-purpose, 99% natural formula that imparts a healthy, buildable wash of colour.
The water-based lip and cheek stain creates a bright, radiant make-up look whilst defining and adding vibrant colour to your lips. Expect smooth, streak-free colour that lasts up to ten hours without over-drying.
name: Cosmetics Lip & Cheek Jam 6ml

product_description:
Create endless make-up looks with Sigma's Make Your Pout Lip Set; a four-piece collection that combines cool pink, vivid orange and deep brick red hues with a range of matte, cream and high-shine finishes.
Power Stick in 'Bloody Good'
A long-wearing formula housed in a magnetic, twist-up tube. With a soft, creamy texture, the lipstick glides onto lips to deliver high pigmented, full coverage colour, whilst its slanted tip allows mistake-free application for a super smooth finish.
Power Crayon in 'Sigma Pink'
A high pigmented formula that glides on effortlessly to line and define lips with the brand's signature pink hue. With a twist-up design, the pencil delivers long-wearing, luscious colour without over-drying, leaving lips soft, hydrated and silky smooth.
Lip Eclipse in 'She Knows the Ropes'
Add sumptuous colour to your pout. With a high pigmented formula and cushioned tip applicator, the opaque liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to deliver a juicy watermelon hue with a long-lasting, smooth finish.
Power Liner in 'Make Your Mark'
With a twist-up design, the long-wearing pencil can be used alone for an all-over matte look, or applied with your favourite lip colour for a more intense finish. Applies effortlessly and precisely to deliver a silky smooth, light red shade.
name: Make Your Pout Lip Set

product_description: Achieve an expertly contoured look with the Sculpting Face Powder Duo from Illamasqua. Combining a neutral matte shade for sharp definition, and a shimmering hue to highlight and illuminate your favourite features, the blendable, buildable powder can be used dry for a natural finish, or wet for more intense colour. Housed in a mirrored compact for easy application on-the-go. Suits all skin tones.
name: Sculpting Face Powder Duo - Illum/Nefertiti

product_description:
This Translucent Face Powder by RMK  is an innovative micro bead   powder that works to absorb excess oils on  the skin whilst giving a   perfected finish to your foundation. Covering  up open pores and dull   tones, this Face Powder gives your skin a  semi-matte look that lasts.
Formulated with an added SPF10 to protect against the damaging    effects of the sun, you'll be given a salon perfect finish everytime    with the RMK Translucent Face Powder SPF10. This refill is designed to    fit easily into your Translucent Face Powder compact, so you can ensure    you're looking perfectly preened around the clock. K.D.
name: Translucent Face Powder (Refill) P00 (6.5g)

product_description: Combining durability and high performance, the Illamasqua Fine Eyeliner Brush with Cover can be used to apply liquid, cream and powder make-up to the delicate eye area. Crafted with premium quality synthetic bristles and an angled head, the brush allows you to create smooth, precise lines for beautifully defined eyes in an instant. Stored in its detachable handle for convenient travelling.
name: Fine Eyeliner Brush with Cover

product_description:
Achieve endless make-up looks with the PIXI Mesmerising Mineral Palette. Combining six shades of eye shadow in complementing shades, you can define and highlight your eyes for natural-looking results with excellent colour longevity and seamless blendability.
Formulated with light-reflecting minerals and nourishing vitamin E to protect the delicate skin around the eye, the silky powder melts effortlessly onto the lids to deliver gemstone-inspired hues that won't crease or fade. Complete with a dual-ended sponge-tip applicator. E.N.
name: Mesmerising Mineral Palette - Mineral Contour

product_description:
Treat yourself to this high quality Daniel Sandler Brow Filler Brush to apply colour and definition to your eye brows. Sleek and easy to use, it has specially angled bristles for precise application of eyebrow shades to your brows.
Defining your eyebrows will help you better define the beauty of your natural features or enhance your natural look to your liking. This Daniel Sandler Brow Filler Brush is perfect for applying your desired eyebrow colour and smoothing your eyebrows into shape so that the individual hairs fall where you want them to. As a result you can get perfectly defined yet natural looking brows to enhance and compliment your features.
name: Sandler Brow Filler Brush

product_description:
Create a range of eye makeup looks with PÜR Precision Crease Brush, a makeup tool designed to expertly apply cream and powder eyeshadows.
The soft, tapered brush utilises synthetic bristles to pick up and distribute the perfect amount of product; in an effortless back and forth motion, it layers, buffs and blends colour in the crease to add depth and dimension to the eyes without pulling or dragging,
name: Precision Crease Brush

product_description:
Create colourful, captivating lips with the Lip Jelly Gloss 04 from RMK; a sheer tone lip gloss in Orange Pearl. The lip gloss jelly features a thick and glossy formula that adds lustrous juiciness to a plump pout.  
A newly developed, spoon-shaped spatula allows you to coat your lips to perfection with the highly concentrated moisturising gel. Lips are left full, glossy and with juicy colour. – E.W.
name: Lip Jelly Gloss 04

product_description:
A new addition to the Venom family, DuWop Lip Venom Haute Chocolate - Vanilla combines its orginal formula of Lip Venom to create a sweet and spicy formula that will plump your lips. The lip venom blends essential oils jojoba, avocado, and sunflower to nourish and plump your lips.
Helping you to achieve irresistible lips, DuWop have added the delectable fragrance and flavour of Vanilla Chocolate. -SA
name: Lip Venom Haute Chocolate - Vanilla

product_description:
Fill and define your brows with ease. The PÜR Brow Sculpt and Groom Brush is a 2-in-1 eyebrow tool with grooming spoolie to one end, and angled brush to the other.
The angled brush (with synthetic bristles) is perfect for applying powder and gel brow products; fill, shape and define your hairs for professional results. The spoolie brush grooms, combs and preens whilst blending product to ensure a natural-looking finish.
name: Brow Sculpt and Groom Brush

product_description:
Keep your makeup perfected throughout the day with the Vincent Longo Water Canvas Travel Compact, an airtight and moisture controlled compact that allows you to touch up your foundation on-the-go.
Equipped with a Water Canvas Makeup Sponge and generous mirror, the compact is specially designed to hold a refill of your favourite Water Canvas Foundation; it will keep your foundation fresh and protected against air and moisture for flawless, effortless touch-ups wherever you are.
name: Longo Water Canvas Travel Compact

product_description:
Refresh your skin, banish shine and cover imperfections with the Menaji The Ultimate Cover Up Kit. This trio of products will leave your skin with a flawless finish, as well as helping it to stay soft, smooth and supple.
Use the Face & Body Scrub in the shower to revive your skin. Use the Camo Camouflage Stick to cover dark circles and imperfections, then finish with the Anti-Shine Powder to create a long-lasting matte finish.
name: The Ultimate Cover Up Kit

product_description:
Achieve that sun kissed look all year round with the PÜR Minerals Mineral Glow. Without oil, alcohol, fillers, fragrance or chemical dyes this powder works wonders on all skin types and makes you emanate a healthy glow. The powder with bronze and golden tones can also be converted to an eye shadow or a blush, making it a real all-rounder. Vegan friendly and gluten free it even works for allergy sufferers. LB
Use the Powder Makeup Brush to sweep Mineral Glow pressed mineral powder over your face, neck or body for a touch of sun. Mineral Glow can be used alone or over the 4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Makeup Foundation.
name: Mineral Glow

product_description: Intensify your peepers with High Definition Faux Eyelashes in 'Vamp'. Lightweight and reusable, these striking false lashes are perfect for achieving a fuller, more dramatic look, lending your lashes a vampy, more defined appearance.
name: Definition Faux Eye Lashes - Vamp (Multipack)

product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with Vincent Longo's La Riviera Sun Matte Bronzer; a multi-tonal, compact bronzer pressed into a unique pattern for warm, natural-looking colour with a long-lasting matte finish.
Suitable for all skin tones, the blendable powder can be applied to the entire face for a sun-kissed glow, or to targeted areas, such as the cheekbones, brow bones and centre of the nose to create a sculpted, defined make-up look. Infused with antioxidant Vitamin E to nourish and protect, the bronzer delivers the perfect balance of red and brown tones to enhance the skin's luminosity.
name: Longo La Riviera Sun Matte Bronzer 5g - Sun-Kissed

product_description: Flat-topped PÜR Minerals Liquid Chisel Brush. Use to apply PÜR Minerals 4-in-1 Liquid or Powder Foundation. This professional make-up brush is made of a mixture of natural and synthetic fibres for a super even coverage and perfect distribution. Apply and layer with this chisel brush for an airbrushed, flawless finish every time. -MB
name: Liquid Chisel Brush

product_description: Enhance the shape of your lips with the Certified Organic Lipliner from INIKA. Formulated using a blend of pressed plant waxes and oils, combined with natural mineral pigments for a long-wearing lip pencil. Its lightweight, creamy, deep pink colour effortlessly melts onto the lips for easy and even application and extends the wear of lipstick without feathering or bleeding.
name: Certified Organic Lipliner - Moroccan Rose

product_description:
Make your eye makeup last longer with Pixi Eye Bright Primer No.1. This line-filling primer conceals imperfections and prolongs the life of eyeshadows and eyeliners. Light-reflecting technology brighens and evens out your skin tone, whilst the lightweight formula neutralises oily eyelids. Hypoallergenic, it also contains optical pigments which diffuse and fill in fine lines, for a flawless finish.

Directions of Use: Spread evenly onto clean lids using the in-built applicator.
name: Eye Bright Primer No.1

product_description:
Douse your lips in RMK's Lip Jelly Gloss, a sheer, juicy lip colour with thick, glossy texture.
Gliding smoothly across lips, the highly concentrated, moisturising gel delivers a sheer wash of coral pink colour, creating a full, plumped-up effect with its ultra-glossy formula. For fool proof application, the lip gloss features a newly developed, spoon-shaped spatula to pick up and deliver product effortlessly.
name: Lip Jelly Gloss 07

product_description:
DuWop's Award winning Venom Gloss Pink Champagne has the fiery tingle & shine of the famous Lip Venom, now with rich long lasting colour in a squeeze & glide tube. Get cutest baby-pink colour, lip-smacking fullness & dazzle in this little shiner! 
Blood rushes to the surface as the blend of essential oils work their magic. Cinnamon, ginger, jojoba & creamy avocado oils help to create the tingle & provide your lips with a chic sheen. Bee-stung lips are a look that has become a modern classic and the Venom range has always led the way in plumping your pout. DuWop have injected a spectrum of dazzling colours into the Venom Gloss collection, with shades all named after poisonous plants. Pink Champagne is subtle enough for everyday wear yet has enough warmth to show off your perfect pout in the evening. Match with a flute of your favourite bubbly & enjoy!
Celebrity fans of the Venom line include Lindsay Lohan, Jennifer Aniston, Teri Hatcher, and Sienna Miller.
Directions of use:
Not tested on animals.
name: Venom Gloss - Pink Champagne (10.4ml)

product_description:
Perfect the look of your skin with Green People Age Defy+ Tinted DD Moisturiser SPF15 in 'Light', the UK's first certified organic daily defence moisturiser that works to fight ageing whilst evening out skin's tone.
Enriched with a plethora of moisturising plant actives, including Jojoba, Shea Butter and Squalane, the tinted moisturiser works to instantly hydrate and condition skin whilst natural earth mineral pigments deliver sheer coverage that adapts to complement fair skin tones. Its easy-to-blend texture corrects colour imperfections, reducing redness and balancing out sallowness, whilst its dose of stem cell derived Sea Fennel  actively stimulates cell renewal to reduce the look of age spots, brighten and firm the skin. Expect a renewed and younger looking complexion. Fortified with SPF 15 to protect from harmful UVA and UVB rays. - K.N.
name: People Age Defy+ Tinted DD Moisturiser SPF15 - Light (30ml)

product_description:
Hydrate and protect skin with the Moisture Blender SPF30 PA++ from Korean skincare brand Skin79; a rich, moisturising cream that seeks to smooth and soften the surface layer of skin.
Enriched with a harmonic blend of plant extracts and oils, the velvet-textured cream effortlessly melts into skin to deliver essential nutrients and vitamins. A protective barrier shields against free radical damage and broad spectrum UV rays, helping alleviate signs of premature ageing and discolouration for a refined and healthy-looking complexion.
name: Moisture Blender SPF30 PA++ 40ml

product_description:
Line and define your lips with Lord & Berry Silhouette  Neutral Lip Liner in Clear. The soft and creamy formula is enriched with  hydrolised wheat proteins that inflate when they come into contact with  moisture, to gently and subtly fill in fine lines around the mouth  area. Easy to apply, the active ingredients stimulate cell regeneration  for a smoother, more youthful look.
Directions: Line lips with the pencil then fill in using lipstick and gloss.
name: & Berry Silhouette Neutral Lip Liner Clear

product_description:
Drench your lips in a lustrous sheen with the RMK Color Lip Gloss in 'Nude Pink'.
Combining the vibrant colour of a lipstick with the clarity of a lip Gloss, the colour glides effortlessly over lips with its square-shaped applicator, and delivers a veil of sheer yet brilliant colour. Its host of moisturising ingredients, including Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil keep lips feeling hydrated and comfortable.
name: Color Lip Gloss - 10 Nude Pink

product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with the Baked Split Highlighter from Laura Geller. Complete with a dual-ended brush, the mirrored compact houses a duo of highlighting powders that blend seamlessly to illuminate your favourite facial features.
Use on the browbones and inner corners of the eyes for a lit-from-within look, or sweep the silky powder across your cheekbones, forehead and down the centre of your nose to create a multi-dimensional effect. Can be applied wet for increased colour intensity.
'French Vanilla': a classic, smooth, sheer beige.
'Portofino': a sparkling peach.
name: Geller Baked Split Highlighter with Brush - Portofino/French Vanilla

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your makeup look with Pupa's IL Bacio Kit in 'Soft Orange', a portable lip colour palette offering one lip gloss and three creamy lipsticks.
Housed in a novelty, lip-shaped compact with gold crown embellishment, the palette is the smallest piece from the 'This is a Love Story' collection, and is the perfect way to add a touch of colour to your complexion. Use the creamy lipstick colours all-over the lips, and add a splash of gloss to the centre of lips to create the appearance of a fuller pout.
Perfect for popping in your handbag, it is equipped with a handy mirror for on-the-go touch-ups.
name: IL Bacio Kit - Soft Orange

product_description:
Achieve perfectly groomed and defined eyebrows with the High Definition Eye & Brow Palette in 'Bombshell', a comprehensive eyebrow and eye palette combining three long-lasting brow powders with a highlighter and setting wax. Specially formulated for fair hair and skin.
The versatile compact allows you to fill in your brows, defining, enhancing and sculpting for a well-groomed, professional finish. The silky-smooth powders are easy to apply and blend, and are infused with antioxidant Vitamins E and C; they double as eyeshadows to create soft, smokey makeup looks. Use the highlighter to enhance your brow bone, and the wax for a defined or bolder finish. Housed in a mirrored compact with double ended applicator brush.
Includes: 'Light Blonde',' Medium Blonde', 'Carbon', highlighter and wax.
Suitable for fair hair and skin.
name: Definition Eye & Brow Palette - Bombshell

product_description:
Achieve the perfect lip colour with this trio of Private Lipsticks from DuWop. Featuring Pearl, Pink and Nude shades, the colours conspire to give you gorgeous lips that morph to your perfect shade in just 5 minutes.
Each of the lipsticks within the trio include a blend of three naturally derived pigments – annatto, hibiscus, and henna – and the technology behind the classic “mood lipsticks” of the seventies to provide vibrant shades that adapt to suit each individual’s colouring.  Keeping lip colour lightweight and emollient, the formula also contains hydrating ingredients such as beeswax, caster oil and Vitamin E. -SA
name: Mini Private Lipstick Trio

product_description:
The 'Full Cover' foundation brush from Pixi is the ultimate beauty tool for a professional look. Its soft bristles are made from durable synthetic fibre and are densely packed to create an even, flawless finish with effortless application.
