Use to apply, distribute and blend foundation for complete coverage. The shaped head fits perfectly into facial contours, without leaving visible brush strokes or uneven lines. E.N.
Directions for use: Dab and buff foundation into skin. Can also be used to blend out bronzer, blush, highlighter or eyeshadow.
name: Full Cover Foundation Brush

product_description: This Large Dome Brush #2 from FACE Stockholm allows you to quickly and evenly apply powder and blush to your face. The make-up brush is made from high quality goat hair for soft, comfortable application. – E.W.
name: Stockholm Large Dome Brush #2

product_description: The Lip Screen Tint in Neutral with SPF15 from Chantecaille is a soothing treatment designed to smooth and hydrate whilst protecting your pout from the damaging effects of the sun. Enriched with nourishing extracts of Rose and Honey, the neutral-toned balm simply melts in to leave lips feeling moisturised and restored.
name: Lip Screen Tint Neutral spf 15

product_description:
Create a flawless complexion with the PUPA Professionals BB Cream Primer for Combination/Oily Skin. Exclusively developed by the PUPA laboratories, the multi-tasking formula combines the moisturising properties of a BB cream with the perfecting benefits of a primer.
A blend of Hyaluronic Acid and Beeswax ensure ultimate hydration and moisture balance, while advanced Silicone Polymers work to create a protective barrier between skin and makeup for longer lasting results. With a natural looking colour pigment coverage and SPF 20, it leaves skin feeling soft, smooth and protected with the appearance of blemishes and imperfections effectively disguised.
name: Professionals BB Cream Primer for Combination-Oily Skin - Dark/Medium

product_description:
Protect and perfect your pout with Maybelline's Baby Lips Vitamin Shot Lip Balm, a lip colour that combines moisturising benefits with a hint of fruity colour.
Drenching your lips in eight hour hydration, the vitamin-rich lip balm delivers comforting, moisturising properties whilst imparting a delicious, fruity scent. Lips look luscious, hydrated and naturally beautiful. - K.N.
name: Baby Lips Vitamin Shot Lip Balm - Peach Punch

product_description:
Create subdued or smokey makeup looks with the PUPA Vamp! Compact Eyeshadow Duo in 'Silver Stone', a carefully curated eyeshadow duo that combines two complementary shades.
Creamy and easy-to-blend, each highly pigmented colour delivers a rich finish with long-lasting wear. Use each colour individually or blend together to create a unique eye makeup look. Feels comfortable on the lid. Complete with dual-ended sponge tip applicator.
name: Vamp! Compact Eyeshadow Duo - Silver Stone

product_description:
Discover the first transparent foundation with the SAMPAR Glamour Shot Foundation; an innovative, universal formula that is designed to replace liquid foundation. The anti-ageing formula is technically a skincare product that is able to offer similar results to makeup as well as its expected skincare benefits.
Formulated with HQA Microlens and Hyaluronic Acid, the clear foundation glides onto the visage, delivering an invisible, soft focus finish. This reduces the appearance of enlarged pores, redness and fine lines and wrinkles, whilst Oat extract visibly lifts skin with immediate effect.
The unique formula also boasts an Urban Advance Complex, which blends Shea Butter serum, Mint Endorphin and Probiotic Sugar together to act as an antioxidant shield. This protects skin from environmental aggressors, as well as strengthening the complexion’s natural defences.
Expect a smooth, matte complexion that is unified and radiant.
name: Glamour Shot Foundation 25ml

product_description: Enhance lashes with butter LONDON's Fitlash Primer; a blue-tinted, conditioning lash primer to boost the benefits of your favourite mascara. Fortified with Rice Bran Wax, Meadowfoam Seed Oil and Wheat Amino Acids, the formula nourishes and strengthens lashes, whilst adding definition and increased fullness for bigger, bolder results. Coats and lifts from the root to lengthen, separate and thicken lashes with a clump-free finish.
name: LONDON Fitlash Primer

product_description:
Boasting a super silky formula,  this Define Eye Pencil by Natio gives you a professional finish every  time. Crafted with jojoba oil to give you extra moisture and for a silky  application, this pencil is ideal for defining, filling and shaping the  eyebrows.
Directions of use:
name: Define Eye Pencil - Charcoal

product_description:
Dramatically boost the length and volume of your lashes with this Natio Super Long Lash Mascara in Black. Every woman seeks longer lashes, so get the look you desire every day with this gorgeous Natio Mascara.
Featuring a new high-tech flexi brush for super long lashes, this Natio Super Long Lash Mascara in Black separates and sculpts lashes while coating each lash in elongating colour.
Directions of use:
name: Super Long Lash Mascara - Black (10ml)

product_description:
An all-in-one foundation, concealer and powder with built in SPF 15 protection, this Natio Clever Stick SPF15 in Beige has been created with a silky formula to cover flawlessly, leaving a smooth, seamlessly silky finish.
The unique formula of this Natio Clever Stick SPF15 in Beige is the easiest and quickest way to achieve satin-smooth coverage – perfect for touch ups on the go.
Directions of use:
name: Clever Stick Spf15 - Beige (15g)

product_description:
Created in celebration of the RMK's 20th anniversary, the limited edition '20th Anniversary Eyeshadow Palette 01' combines six eyeshadows in one compact.
Offering matt, pearl and shimmering finishes, each shade delivers a natural-looking, buildable hue that blends effortlessly to define and enhance the shape and colour of your eyes. Blend the colours together or use individually to create customised makeup looks.
name: 20th Anniversary Eyeshadow Palette 01

product_description:
This long-wearing moisturising lip colour is enriched with essential oils to help your lips feeling velvety soft and silky smooth. This Natio Lip Colour in Flutter is a pinky nude hue that’ll leave your pout perfectly on-point and gorgeously alluring.
Pack your pout with gorgeous colour and must-needed moisture with this Natio Lip Colour in Flutter. A staple lip product for every woman’s make-up bag, this stunning shade will leave your lips looking and feeling absolutely beautiful.
Directions of use:
name: Lip Colour - Flutter (4g)

product_description:
Create a neutral eye makeup look with the butter LONDON Sheer Wisdom Serum Eye Shadow in 'Butter Cream', a natural-looking eyeshadow that combines the benefits of makeup with anti-ageing skincare.
Delivering a neutral hue with satin-matt finish, the eyeshadow contains a blend of anti-ageing peptides to help improve the appearance of wrinkles, and Spherical Polymers for a smoothing effect. Gliding effortlessly onto lids, the uniquely textured eyeshadow transforms from a fluid serum to a light powder, imparting high performance pigments with a subtle wash of colour that resists creasing for a flawless, natural makeup look. It blends easily and adheres seamlessly to the lids. Perfect worn alone or as a primer for other eyeshadows.
name: LONDON Sheer Wisdom Serum Eye Shadow 4ml - Butter Cream

product_description:
Achieve legendary lashes with the Talika Lipocils Lipo and Mascara; a 2-in-1, dual-ended lash regrowth and lengthening mascara in one.
Specialists in eyelash growth for over 60 years, Talika have developed Lipocils Expert® - a highly advanced, deeply conditioning formula that delivers triple action benefits with five natural ingredients, seeking to stimulate regrowth, intensify natural pigmentation and enhance curl.
The exclusive black mascara provides instant results for thicker and voluminous looking lashes free from clumps or flaking, while the Lipocils treatment boasts long lasting visible results in just 28 days. Lashes appear intensified and full with maximum curl and density.
name: Lipocils Lipo and Mascara - Black 2.5ml

product_description: PÜR Minerals Dirty Girl Mudd Mask is just what you need to reveal a cleaner, clearer complexion. With the help of salicylic acid to gently exfoliate and unclog pores and natural clay to clarify, you’ll be going make-up-free in no time! This non-drying mask works to improve skin tone and texture and is cruelty- and chemical-free. -MB
name: Dirty Girl Mudd Mask

product_description:
Achieve well-groomed eyebrows with Chantecaille's Full Brow Perfecting Gel, a brow taming formula with convenient spoolie application.
Enriched with Panthenol to strengthen hairs, the gel glides effortlessly through your brows to set, define and hold in place all day. The perfecting solution leaves brows tamed and well-groomed without stiffness or sticky residue.
Use as the last step in your eyebrow routine to keep your brows looking perfect for longer.
name: Full Brow Perfecting Gel

product_description:
Achieve a flawless, sculpted complexion with PÜR Airbrush Blurring Powder Brush.
The domed face brush utilises soft, synthetic bristles to expertly distribute and blend powder makeup, including blushers, bronzers and highlighters. Picking up the perfect amount of products, it’s perfect for sweeping powders across the whole face, or targeting specific areas for contouring, highlighting and brightening.
name: Airbrush Blurring Powder Brush

product_description:
Prime, perfect and correct your skin with PÜR No Filter Blurring Photography Primer, a unique makeup primer with prismatic blurring micro-pearls to improve the appearance of skin whilst prolonging makeup wear.
Perfect worn alone, as a primer or mixed into foundation, the colour correcting formula moisturises, camouflages imperfections and illuminates skin all-in-one, whilst locking makeup in place for a flawless finish. Infused with Coconut, Olive and Shea essential oils, a vitamin-rich Energy Complex with moisturising Agave, and age-defying ingredients, the primer expertly preps the complexion for smooth makeup application, creating the perfect canvas for long-lasting, youthful-looking results. Skin is left feeling nourished and radiant. When mixed with foundation, it will create a dewy yet shine-free finish.
name: No Filter Blurring Photography Primer 15ml

product_description:
PÜR's Best Seller Kit in 'Light Tan' is a carefully curated makeup set that combines everything you need to achieve a flawless, sunkissed complexion. Combining a primer with a powder foundation, bronzer and mascara, the kit will allow you to experience long-lasting, perfected makeup. Complete with a makeup brush for effortless application.
Prep & Perfect Correcting Primer
A skin-perfecting primer infused with clinically proven ingredients to smooth and prep skin for flawless, long-lasting foundation. Utilising a Ceretin Complex which contains age-defying Retinol, the hydrating formula expertly reduces the appearance of lines and wrinkles whilst instantly minimising the look of pores and promoting a more uniform, even toned complexion. Neutral in colour, the antioxidant-rich primer is suitable for all skin tones, and feels lightweight on skin. Its brightening and firming properties lend your makeup a radiant, youthful finish, and its cocktail of Salicylic Acid, Shea Butter and Aloe Vera work in synergy to decongest pores, moisturise and soothe the complexion. Makeup looks flawless and silky smooth with extended wear.
4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Powder Foundation SPF 15 in 'Light Tan'
A lightweight, pressed powder foundation with award-winning formula that utilises innovative skincare ingredients. Delivering minimal coverage for a natural, flawless complexion, the all-in-one foundation works as a foundation, concealer, powder and SPF simultaneously to improve the appearance of skin; it's clinically proven to camouflage and prevent imperfections. Encapsulated Mineral Water intensely hydrates, whilst botanical extracts promote a brighter, more even toned complexion. Skin looks flawless and is protected against harmful UV rays. Mess-free application. Suitable for contact lens wearers. 
Mineral Glow Powder in 'Bronze'
A micronized mineral bronzer that adds all-over warmth to the complexion. Perfect for sweeping over the whole face, or for contouring to sculpt and define, the powder delivers rich, golden undertones to create a sunkissed finish. Infused with moisturising Shea Butter and a Ceretin Complex that utilises Retinol, it helps to improve elasticity whilst reducing the appearance of lines and wrinkles. Skin looks beautifully radiant, smooth and healthy. Suitable for contact lens wearers. 
Big Look Mascara
A volumising mascara with clump-resistant application wand. Coating lashes in a rich, nourishing formula, the buildable mascara lifts and lengthens even the smallest of eyelashes to create a maximised, dramatised eye makeup look. Infused with Argan Oil, Coconut Oil and antioxidant Vitamin E, the black mascara adds a dewy sheen to lashes whilst intensifying, nourishing and preserving moisture. Lashes are protected and expertly volumised. 
Chisel Brush
A professional makeup brush that has been specially designed to flawlessly apply the 4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Powder Foundation. Working well with all powder products, the brush offers soft, synthetic bristles that pick up and deliver the perfect amount of product for flawless, well-blended results.
name: Best Seller Kit - Light Tan

product_description: KORRES Wild Rose CC Cream is a moisturiser formulated to boost radiance for brighter skin. Enriched with vitamin C, the lightweight, non-greasy cream minimises the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and covers up impurities. Rose oil contains linoleic acid to regenerate and soothe skin by forming a protective layer on the surface. Its SPF30 provides protection from the sun's harmful rays and reduces redness and irritation caused by damaged skin. You can experience softer, hydrated skin and a more even skin tone. E.N.
name: Wild Rose CC Cream - Light SPF30 (30ml)

product_description:
RMK Face Pop Eyes in 'Silver Gold Beige' is a limited edition eyeshadow duo that has been specially curated in celebration of the brand's twentieth birthday.
Each striking eyeshadow (pink and neutral) delivers a shimmering pigment that blends effortlessly on the lid. Wear each colour individually or blend together to create a bold or subtle makeup finish. Complete with a dual-ended sponge tip applicator.
name: Face Pop Eyes - Silver Gold Beige

product_description:
Achieve a false lash look with ModelCo's Extreme Black Volume Lash Mascara, created in collaboration with American model, Hailey Baldwin.
Equipped with a tapered silicone brush, the volumising mascara captures individual lashes from the root for ultimate impact and definition with a clump-free, water-resistant finish. Separates, curls and lengthens lashes to create show-stopping results.
name: Volume Lash Mascara - Extreme Black

product_description:
Achieve luminous, youthful-looking eyes with the IRIS™ Eye Massager from FOREO, a brand who specialise in premium beauty devices. Designed with innovative Alternating T-Sonic™ technology, the tool features two modes: a gentle 'Pure Mode' to replicate the feeling of a manual massage and 'Spa Mode', which combines tapping and delicate pulsations for a professional beauty treatment experience.
Crafted from premium, ultra-hygienic silicone that is gentle to the delicate eye contour area, the device prevents bacteria build-up and improves the absorption of skincare products, especially serum and cream. Reduces the appearance of puffiness and dark circles, whilst smoothening crow's feet, fine lines and wrinkles for revitalised eyes.
Fully waterproof and easy to clean, its compact, lightweight design makes the IRIS™ ideal for travelling, so you can refresh eyes on the move. An advanced eye-brightening device with multiple intensity levels to suit individual needs and comfort requirements. E.N.
name: IRIS™ Eye Massager - Mint

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Laura Geller Spackle Multi-Tasking Primer & Setting Mist; a weightless formula that works to prime, hydrate and set make-up.
Enriched with soothing Aloe Vera, Cucumber Extract and Vitamin B5, the fast-absorbing mist can be used before make-up application, to set foundation in place, or anytime throughout the day for an instant refresh.
name: Geller Spackle Multi Tasking Primer & Setting Mist

product_description:
Maximise and nourish your lashes with Mavala's Treatment Waterproof Mascara in 'Night Blue', a water-resistant mascara with conditioning, lash-loving formula.
Thickening, fortifying and lengthening your eyelashes, the long-wearing blue mascara features a professional curved brush that grabs every lash, curling, lengthening and separating, and its Silk Protein-enriched formula conditions and protects to enhance the appearance of your natural lashes. Lashes look silky, soft and elongated.
name: Treatment Waterproof Mascara - Night Blue 10ml

product_description:
Fatten up your lashes with Natio Extreme Volume Smudge Proof Mascara in Brown/Black. With a silky, smudge-proof, water-resistant formula that separates lashes, this mascara boasts long-wearing results to intensify the look of eyes and lashes.
Pack your peepers with the wow factor with this Natio Extreme Volume Smudge Proof Mascara in Brown/Black. This gorgeous mascara won’t budge, ensuring you remain looking as gorgeous as you do when you step out of the front door all day long.
Directions of use:
name: Extreme Volume Smudge Proof Mascara - Brown/Black (10ml)

product_description:
Define your lips with RMK Face Pop Lips, a rich, smooth lipstick with subtle shimmer finish.
Available in a range of neutral tones, the lipstick contains delicate pearl particles that help to create a smoother, full-looking pout. Gliding effortlessly across lips, it delivers a shock of rich colour to complement your natural lip shape and skin tone.
colour: Coral Beige, Mode Beige, Natural Beige, Red Beige
name: Face Pop Lips (Various Shades)

product_description:
Discover the ultimate, all-in-one product with the Smart Derma Mild BB Cream A (All Day) SPF50 PA+++ from Skin79. Caring for even sensitive skin types, the BB cream works to moisturise, prime and protect, with long lasting results.
The formula boasts Network Holding technology, meaning it works as a primer and improves the wear of makeup. Concentrated with Amino acids, BB Cream A visibly improves skin’s elasticity, leaving behind a smooth and supple complexion.
The lightweight formula melts effortlessly into the skin and can be applied throughout the day without fear of the product caking.
name: Smart Derma Mild BB Cream A (All Day) SPF50 PA+++ 40ml

product_description:
Keep your makeup brushes clean and hygienic with The Vintage Cosmetics Company Brush Cleaning Tool in Pink, a 100% silicone and ergonomic makeup brush cleaning pad.
Waterproof and durable, the cleansing tool helps to rid your brushes of oil, dirt and makeup residue, all of which can contribute to clogged pores and blemishes. The textured surface agitates the bristles on your brushes to help dislodge dirt and build-up, leaving them clean, soft and ready for flawless makeup application.
name: Vintage Cosmetics Company Brush Cleaning Tool - Pink

product_description:
The Baby Lips by Maybelline is a super moisturising lip balm created to give you a perfect pout that's hydrated for up to 8 hours. With SPF20 protection, this lip balm comes in a convenient twist cover.
Boasting an exclusive renew formula, Baby Lips works to protect the lips whilst keeping them supple and soft. The ultimate addition to your handbag, it's a must have! K.D.
name: Baby Lips Lip Balm - Intensive Care

product_description: Banish the appearance of dark circles, age spots, freckles and an uneven complexion with the PÜR Minerals Colour Correcting Primer in Peach. The mineral rich formula is made up of natural colour perfecting ingredients. Skin will be left with a brighter, healthier appearance whilst the clinically proven skin care technology helps to reduce the appearance of fine lines. Leaving your skin perfectly prepared for the rest of your make-up, the PÜR Minerals natural make-up is perfect for all skin tones.
name: Colour Correcting Primer in Dark Spot Corrector in Peach

product_description:
Define your pout with the Spectrum Collections A15 Lip Liner Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘Get Your Pout Out’ brush boasts soft yet firm, flat bristles, which work with a variety of cream and liquid liners. Effortlessly gliding over skin, the brush is ideal for lining, defining and filling in the lips.  Complete with a tapered tip, the unicorn-inspired brush offers superior precision and prepares lips for a wash of colour.
name: Collections A15 Lip Liner Brush

product_description:
Drench lips in colour with the glo minerals Suede Matte Lipstick; a conditioning lip colour in a convenient, slender stick for precise application.
Rich in antioxidants, the lipstick is fortified with Vitamins C and E, alongside a skin-loving blend of Mango Oil and Shea Butter. The lip colour envelops lips in moisture and nourishing protection, ensuring lips look healthy as well as vibrant.
Complete with an added touch of peppermint, the matte lipstick envelops lips in a refreshing scent, whilst offering a cooling sensation, which works to revive the senses. Expect highly pigmented lip colour that is ultra-smooth and long-wearing.
name: minerals Suede Matte Lipstick (Various Shades)

product_description: Line and define your eyes with Living Nature's Eye Pencil; a soft, gentle eye liner that creates high definition make-up results. Enriched with vegetable waxes and naturally occurring oxides, the creamy pencil glides effortlessly across the eye, delivering intense colour with ultimate staying power. Its precision tip allows mistake-free application for a professional finish.
name: Nature Eye Pencil 4.13g - Various Shades

product_description:
Accentuate your favourite facial features with Laura Geller's Easy Illuminating Stick; a chubby highlighter to illuminate your complexion.
Infused with light-reflecting optics, the creamy formula can be worn alone or applied over foundation for an expertly defined, sculpted make-up look. Glides smoothly over cheekbones, brow bones and the bridge of the nose to deliver a long-wearing, luminous finish.
name: Geller Easy Illuminating Stick

product_description:
Shape, fill and define your brows with Billion Dollar Brows Universal Brow Pencil - Blonde, a mechanical eyebrow pencil designed specifically for light hair and skin tones.
The dual-ended pencil is a neutral colour that works great on fair hair; its smooth formula can be built upon for desired intensity, and delivers a soft, natural finish for brows that look fuller and shapely. Use feather like strokes to achieve a natural finish, and utilise the spoolie to blend away harsh lines whilst grooming and controlling hairs. Washes off easily.
name: Dollar Brows Universal Brow Pencil - Blonde

product_description:
Perfect for every mood, outfit or occasion, The Delectable Eyeshadow Palette from Laura Geller combines fourteen crease-resistant shades that can be applied wet or dry to expertly define eyes.
Combining the long-wearing benefits of a primer with luxurious colours of pure Baked pigments, the eyeshadows can be worn alone or blended together to create endless make-up looks with superior staying power. Melting effortlessly onto the lids for smooth, even application, the palette is complete with an integrated mirror and dual-ended brush.
name: Geller The Delectable Eyeshadow Palette with Brush - Smokey Neutrals

product_description:
Say hello to vibrant and kissably soft lips with the Lord & Berry  20100 Matte Lipstick Pencil. With a smooth and silky texture, it glides on  effortlessly to produce seamless, long-lasting coverage, whilst having a natural, shine-free finish.
Easy to apply, the chunky design gives you optimum grip and control,  whilst the tapered point allows for accurate and precise application. -  L.M.Directions of Use:Smooth onto your lips as often as desired.
name: & Berry 20100 Matte Lipstick Pencil (Various Shades)

product_description:
Add kissable colour to your pout with the Burt's Bees 'Bordeaux Vines' Gloss Lip Crayon; a long-wearing, ultra-hydrating formula that glides on effortlessly to deliver a deep red hue with medium to full coverage.
Enriched with a nourishing blend of Kendi Oil, Shea Butter and Jojoba Oil, the chubby crayon softens and protects, whilst infusing lips with eight-hour moisture to leave them smooth, supple and comfortable. No sharpening required.
name: Bees 100% Natural Gloss Lip Crayon - Bordeaux Vines 2.83g

product_description:
Achieve a flawless make-up base with the Amazing Cosmetics AmazingConcealer® Foundation; a long-wearing, water-resistant foundation that blends seamlessly onto skin for medium to full coverage and a professional finish.
With a translucent mineral base and lightweight pigments, the oil-free formula minimises the appearance of fine lines, enlarged pores and imperfections, whilst nourishing vitamins combat uneven skin tone for a smoother, more refined complexion. Suitable for all skin types, you can expect natural-looking colour that won't fade, crease or leave skin dry.
colour: Fair, Light Golden, Medium Beige, Medium Golden, Tan Golden
name: Cosmetics AmazingConcealer® Foundation 35ml - Various Shades

product_description:
The Baby Lips in Cherry Me by Maybelline is a super moisturising lip balm created to give you a perfect pout that's hydrated for up to 8 hours. With SPF20 protection and a subtle colour to complement any skin tone, this lip balm comes in a convenient twist cover.
Boasting an exclusive renew formula, Baby Lips works to protect the lips whilst keeping them supple and soft. The ultimate addition to your handbag, it's a must have! K.D.
name: Baby Lips Cherry Me

product_description: Discover a versatile brush for both cosmetics and beauty treatments with the Foundation & Mask Brush from Chantecaille. Boasting innovative synthetic fibers, the sleek brush dispenses product both quickly and effectively, whether that be a signature foundation or luxurious mask. Whatever the use, the professional tool delivers flawless results.
name: Foundation & Mask Brush

product_description:
Achieve a dewy and radiant complexion with the glo minerals Protective Liquid Satin Foundation; a skin-nurturing formula that works to perfect skin. Suitable for all skin types, the liquid makeup is effective even on sensitive skin and those with rosacea.
Non-comedogenic, the liquid mineral foundation effortlessly glides over the face, providing a veil of high coverage that conceals and corrects blemishes, redness and other minor imperfections. The foundation is infused with Vitamins A, C and E, alongside a healthy dose of Green Tea extract, which work in synergy to provide essential nutrients to the face. This ensures skin is visibly radiant and healthy-looking.
Alongside creating a flawless, airbrushed complexion, the makeup provides skin with broad-spectrum UV protection as an added bonus to care for skin. Arriving in a vast array of shades, glo possesses a hue for any skin tone.
name: minerals Protective Liquid Satin Foundation - Golden Fair

product_description:
Designed by Cheryl Cole for Eylure, these Eylure Girls Aloud Lashes by Cheryl are a must for a night out. Gorgeous, subtle and versatile, emulate Cheryl’s unrivalled style in these fabulous flirty lashes. Hey, if they’re good enough for Cheryl…
Eylure Girls Aloud Lashes by Cheryl are suitable for all eye shapes and for contact lens wearers. Easy to apply, safe and hygienic, Eylure Lashes enhance the natural beauty of your eyes without the fuss of mascara! Adhesive and application instructions are included.
name: Girls Aloud Lashes - Cheryl

product_description:
Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion with the Extreme Concealing Kit from Bellápierre Cosmetics. Combining four skin-perfecting products and a handy concealer brush, you can hide imperfections for a professional make-up look.
Dark Circle Eliminator
A peach-toned conceal to hide blue or purple discolouration under the eyes. Infused with Sunflower Seed and Jojoba Oils, the innovative formula banishes dark circles, under-eye bags and imperfections to reveal a younger-looking, more refined eye contour.
Green Concealer Cream
Hide redness from blemishes or rosacea with the lightweight concealer cream. With a green formula, the cream delivers long-wearing, full coverage to camouflage imperfections and blotchiness, leaving your complexion corrected, perfected and rebalanced.
Contour Cream
Ideal for the cheekbones, forehead, bridge of the nose and jawline, the contour cream expertly sculpts and creates subtle definition for added depth and dimension. Easy-to-blend, the shade works on specific areas of the face for a professional finish.
Banana Setting Powder
A lightweight, yellow-toned powder to cover up discolouration and instantly reduce the appearance of visible redness. Gliding on effortlessly, its yellow tinge becomes invisible when applied to skin for long-wearing coverage and a smooth, soft finish.
Concealer Brush
With a tapered head, the brush is ideal for diminishing imperfections and covering up dark circles or blemishes. The synthetic bristles camouflage small areas, whilst the flat side hides larger blotchy, uneven patches of skin.
name: Cosmetics Extreme Concealing Kit

product_description:
Achieve the most accurate application with this Summer Collection Wake Up Brow Pencil from PÜR Minerals. This exclusive tool allows you to create your personal brow shape and definition, as natural or dramatic as you require. With its self-sharpening design to reduce mess, the dual-ended pencil features an eyebrow pencil and illuminator to add colour for brighter looking eyes. E.N.
Directions for use: Using the brow pencil tip, apply short strokes following the shape of your eyebrow. For brighter eyes add the eye illuminator along the water-line of the eye and under brows using soft, short strokes from the inner corner to outer corner.
name: Summer Collection Wake Up Brow

product_description: Tint, tame and define brows with the Brow Build Gel from Illamasqua. With built-in fibres, the formula glides on to deliver long-wearing colour, allowing you to create enviable arches and emphasise the shape of your brows without having to worry about smudging or fading. Its handy spoolie brush fills in sparse brows for a fuller, thicker appearance with natural hair-like colour.
name: Brow Build

product_description:
Expertly frame your face with Eylure Brow Designer, an instant brow tint to help enhance the colour and definition of your eyebrows.
Expertly darkening and defining hairs without marking skin, the formula helps to boost the appearance of sparse brows; its soft and natural finish lends your brows a fuller, more sculpted appearance. Defining and filling your eyebrows will help to shape and contour your face.
Expect beautifully defined brows with a natural-looking finish.
name: Brow Designer (Various Shades)

product_description:
Be creative with light using Illamasqua Pure Pigment; a high-shine, pure-colour powder designed to highlight the eyes, cheeks and brow bone.
Arriving in an eye-catching selection of metallic hues, Pure Pigment is able to complement and enhance any skin tone, as well as providing an array of different looks. The powder can be worn alone, or mixed with eyeshadow and blusher to add a glittering shimmer finish. Apply wet for a bolder, more dramatic colour pay off.
colour: Android, Beguile, Berber, Furore, Ore, Static
name: Pure Pigment 1.3g (Various Shades)

product_description:
Add natural emphasis to your brows with PÜR Browder Perfecting Brow Powder, a unique fibre formula that works to fill gaps and sparseness without that harsh, 'drawn on' effect.
Perfect for shaping, filling and defining your brows, the long-lasting powder delivers naturally bold definition, expertly filling in gaps in your eyebrows whilst enhancing their natural shape. Complete with a flocked applicator, the formula can also be used as a smokey eyeliner powder. Expect well-groomed and polished brows with a natural finish.
name: Browder Perfecting Brow Powder 2g (Various Shades)

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with Laura Geller's Spackle® Classic Under Make-Up Primer; a lightweight formula that works to instantly smoothen uneven skin whilst prolonging make-up wear.
Fortified with White Tea and Centella Asiatica Extracts, the antioxidant-rich primer glides effortlessly across the skin, improving texture and minimising the appearance of imperfections. Suitable for all skin types, your complexion will look perfected and softened thanks to its dose of Aloe Vera Gel.
name: Geller Spackle Classic Under Make-Up Primer Original 59ml

product_description:
Highlight your complexion with the Glowing Palette from Bellápierre Cosmetics. The set combines six universally flattering shades to suit a wide range of skin tones, formulated with natural ingredients and mineral pigments for long-lasting colour that’s kind to skin.
Each powder seamlessly blends for a soft, buildable finish with a subtle shimmer to pinpoint your favourite features. Housed in a chic compact with a convenient mirror, the palette is the perfect partner for your contour or strobing regime.
name: Cosmetics Glowing Palette

product_description:
Create eyebrows to be proud of with RMK W Eyebrow (Powder) 01 in dark brown. Boasting a ingenious design, the pencil features a retractable pencil at one end and at the other a felt head for adding powder.
The pencil also features a screw brush for grooming and smudging the eyebrow, found at the centre of the pencil. The oval-shaped pencil gives you great control for eyebrows with an exquisite shape and great natural look. -SA
name: W Eyebrow (Powder) 01

product_description:
Add a touch of sparkle to your peepers with Illamasqua’s Pure Pigment in Axolotl. Part of the Extinct collection, pure pigment is a finely milled loose powder that boasts an intense colour payoff. The formula can be applied lightly and is buildable for added impact and a more dramatic finish.
Axolotl is a sparkling silver colour with a shimmering metallic finish, able to add brilliance to the eyes. Pure Pigment can be worn alone or over other products to give them a glistening edge.
name: Pure Pigment - Axolotl

product_description:
Line and define your peepers with the butter LONDON Wink Eye Pencil; an ultra-smooth eyeliner that glides effortlessly across the lid, without pulling on the delicate skin. The eye pencil arrives with a sharp point that can be used to produce clean and precise lines to enhance the eyes. The smooth formula can also be smudged and blended out for a smokey and sultry-looking finish.
Once applied, the long-wearing eyeliner sets firmly into place to ensure eyes remain flawlessly defined all day, however busy your lifestyle is.
name: LONDON Wink Eye Pencil Union Jack Black 1.2g

product_description:
Achieve a smooth, radiant canvas with Gatineau Perfection Ultime Anti-Ageing Complexion Cream SPF30 in 'Medium', a deeply hydrating moisturiser with natural tinted glow.
Lightweight and protective, the brightening moisturiser delivers a sheer wash of radiance onto skin; its unique peptide complex helps plump and enhance elasticity for younger-looking features. Blending Liquorice Root Extract, Hyaluronic Acid, Argireline and Vitamin B3 with SPF 30, the formula aids in defending against premature ageing and external attacks.
Expect a smoother, brighter, more even complexion with an incredibly hydrated finish. Can be worn alone or layered under foundation for an enhanced glow.
name: Perfection Ultime Anti-Ageing Complexion Cream SPF30 30ml - Medium

product_description:
Maximise and define your eyes with Sigma's Monumental Lash Mascara, a waterproof mascara with long-lasting, 13 hour wear.
With a thick, full wand for incredible volume, the amplifying mascara intensifies, maximises and thickens the appearance of your eyelashes; boosting body and creating drama. Its intense black formula effortlessly coats lashes from root to tip for a high impact, smudge and flake resistant finish. Lashes are enviably volumised and lifted.
name: Monumental Lash Mascara

product_description:
Discover a versatile beauty tool with the brushworks HD Multi Tasking Sponge; an essential applicator that delivers the flawless application of foundation and other liquid makeup products. Crafted with a variety of sides in a number of shapes, the high quality sponge performs an array of makeup tasks.
The flat side works effectively when contouring with cream product, whilst the tapered end is ideal for detailing. The pointed top of the sponge designed for navigating the contours of the face, such as the nose and eyes. The precision tip is able to reach areas often missed with other applicators and target fine lines and creases to prevent a cakey appearance. Expect effortless application and seamless blending, leaving the face flawless and sculpted.
name: HD Multi Tasking Sponge

product_description:
Daniel Sandler Watercolour Fluid Blusher Angel contains vitamin E and jojoba to enhance application and nourish skin. It is silicone based and oil free, doesn't clog pores and suits every skin type. The silicone makes it virtually rub-off proof and water-resistant.
Give your cheeks a hint of colour with Daniel Sandler Watercolour Fluid Blusher Angel, this peach shade will add an instant glow to your cheeks. Your skin will be left feeling nourished and looking fab!
name: Sandler Watercolour Fluid Blusher Angel (15ml)

product_description:
As temperatures soar don’t get caught without this Daniel Sandler Watercolour Crème Bronzer in Riviera. This unique bronzing formula adds warmth to the complexion, leaving it looking sun kissed and beautifully flawless.
This Daniel Sandler Watercolour Crème Bronzer in Riviera creates the perfect chic balance between warmth and subtle highlights. A versatile and easy to use formula, this bronzer can be worn on the go in the city or strolling the coastline on holiday – enabling you to achieve a gorgeous version of yourself wherever you end up!
Directions of use:
name: Sandler Watercolour Creme Bronzer - Riviera (3.5g)

product_description:
Fill, shape and define your brows with the Real Techniques Brow Brush Set. Housed in a panoramic case, the set combines five tools to help you clean-up and sculpt your eyebrows. With two tweezers and three slanted brushes, your brows will look professional and controlled in five easy steps.
Angled Tweezer: Stainless steel with flat, slanted edges to help pluck and shape.
Detailing Tweezer: Stainless steel with pointed precision tip to clean away fine, shorter hairs.
Slanted Brow Spoolie: Use this to groom brows in place and blend colour for a natural, feather-stroke finish.
Slanted Arch Definer: Perfect for plotting out your brow shape. Dab a light spot of colour onto the start, arch and end of your brow as a guide. Can also be used to smudge brow colour and apply eyeliner.
Slanted Brow Brush: Expertly applies and blends brow colour.
Panoramic Case: A stand and carry case in one. Helps keep brushes organised at home or on-the-go. Stand case and insert wet brushes upside down to dry.
name: Techniques Brow Brush Set

product_description:
Conceal and correct with FACE Stockholm's Blemish and Capillary Corrective Concealer, a correcting formula perfect for neutralising a variety of skin imperfections.

With a creamy, easy to blend formula, the specialised concealer helps camouflage surface imperfections, such as blemishes, broken capillaries, scars and sunspots. Your complexion looks brighter and even. - K.N.
name: Stockholm Blemish and Capillary Corrective Concealer 2.8g

product_description:
theBalm present What's Your Type? Tall Dark and Handsome Mascara; an amplifying black mascara that works to volumise, enhance and lengthen lashes to leave you with a clump-free, smudge-proof finish.
Featuring a specially designed brush for precise application, the mascara coats and separates lashes from the root for ultimate impact, whilst its blend of panthenol, olive wax and rice wax condition and strengthen eyelashes for a long-wearing, expertly defined look. E.N.
name: What's Your Type? Tall Dark and Handsome Mascara

product_description:
Complete your contour with the Spectrum Collections C03 Tulip Powder Brush; an ultra-soft makeup brush that combines a vibrant colour palette with expert hand-crafted design.
The ‘Flawless Finish’ face brush allows for the precision application of both powder and cream formulas. Designed with an ultra-soft tapered tip, the tulip brush is ideal for contouring around the hairline, as well as adding highlight to the brow bone, cheek bones and nose.
Expect a flawless contoured finish that is makeup artist-worthy.
name: Collections C03 Tulip Powder Brush

product_description:
Boost your pout with the Miss PUPA Ultra Brilliant Lipstick from PUPA. Formed upon a base of creamy waxes and volume-enhancing natural extracts, the lipstick delivers a smooth texture with ultra-intense colour pigmentation and a wet gloss finish.
Brightening polymers create an extraordinary crystallised effect for maximum volume and shape, while Cotton extract enhances moisture levels to prevent the lipstick drying out or flaking. Lips appear fuller and plush with a dazzling lustre and long-lasting hue.
colour: Cinderella, Elite, Haute Couture Bikini, Haute Couture Fuchsia, Jezebel, Naturally Nude, Nude Rose, Paradise, Pop Pink, Red Scarlet Surprise, Ruby Red, Upper East Side
name: Miss PUPA Ultra Brilliant Lipstick (Various Shades)

product_description:
Brighten and illuminate tired, weary eyes with the Japonesque Pixelated Color Eyelighter, a creamy concealer that expertly camouflages and neutralises signs of fatigue around the eye area.
Helping to brighten dark circles and energise dull skin, the luxurious concealer utilises HD pigments that scatter light to diffuse the appearance of bags and imperfections. Eyes appear radiant and wide awake.
name: Pixelated Color Eyelighter (Various Shades)

product_description:
Add a healthy glow to your facial contours with the Vincent Longo Water Canvas Highlighter, a unique, crème-to-powder formula that delivers a luminous glow to your complexion.
With a unique texture, the highlighter blends effortlessly into skin, transforming into a luxurious powder that expertly brightens up high points on the face, such as cheekbones, brow bones and down the centre of the nose. Utilising 75% Microwater, it hydrates and moisturises whilst a dose of Vitamin E keeps skin protected and healthy-looking.
name: Longo Water Canvas Highlighter (Various Shades)

product_description:
Get beautifully groomed brows with the Lord & Berry Glacee  Eyebrow Fixer. The tinted gel blends effortlessly with the natural  colour of your brows, setting the shape and adding a subtle shine.
Directions: Use the inbuilt wand to 'comb' the gel through your brows.
name: & Berry Glacee Eyebrow Gel Fixer - Natural

product_description:
Create showstopping makeup looks with the Maybelline Master Precise Curvy Eyeliner in 'Intense Black', an innovative liquid eyeliner with patent pending tip that hugs the contour of your eye to define and enhance your peepers.
Delivering a shock of full-bodied colour, the eyeliner features an easy grip pen for enhanced control during application, and a curve hugging tip that glides effortlessly along the lid to create precise, seamless lines. Create sultry cat eyes with ease.
name: Master Precise Curvy Eye Liner - Intense Black

product_description:
Perfect your pout with the Sugar Plum Power Crayon Lip Collection from Sigma. The trio of Sigma’s best-selling Power Crayons is ideal as a gift, or an indulgent treat for yourself.
The collection contains three varying shades of high-pigment colour that can be worn alone or mixed-and-matched to create a custom look for any occasion. Presented in an easy-to-use twistable crayon, application of the hydrating formula is incredibly easy and the results are long-lasting.
Lip Power Crayon - Ode to Pink
A cool bubblegum pink shade.
Lip Power Crayon - Own It
A deep purple shade.
Lip Power Crayon - Rubicund
A neutral pink shade.
name: Sugar Plum Power Crayon Lip Collection (Worth £45)

product_description:
Deliver effortless definition in seconds with this Natio Smooth Eye Liner in Black. This carbon black hue is softly textured to glide effortlessly across the eyelids while defining and enhancing the shape of eyes to leave you looking totally gorgeous.
Doubling as a smoky eye shadow, this Natio Smooth Eye Liner in Black is suitable for even the most sensitive eyes. Line, define and leave your peepers looking beautiful with this make-up staple from Natio.
Directions of use:
name: Smooth Eye Liner - Black (2g)

product_description:
The Ultimate Illuminating Set from Contour Cosmetics combines a trio of shimmering nude powders to flawlessly highlight and define.
Universally flattering for all skin tones, the harmonious shades seamlessly glide onto skin with a silk-like texture and subtle metallic pigments, effortlessly blended for a natural looking luminosity. Dust across the high points of your face and where the light naturally hits for a dew-glistened complexion in an instant.
Housed in a chic, branded compact for an on-the-go glow.
Shades: Verve, Mink, Clique.
name: Cosmetics Spotlight - The Ultimate Illuminating Set

product_description:
Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the butter LONDON Lippy Liquid; a long-wearing formula that combines the pigment of a lipstick with the shine of a gloss.
Infused with Shea Butter and antioxidant Vitamin E, the liquid lipstick glides on effortlessly to moisturise and protect lips, whilst delivering non-drying colour with an ultra-glossy finish. Expect smooth, luscious lips that are subtly scented with delicious notes of Vanilla.
name: LONDON Yummy Mummy Lippy (7ml)

product_description:
Give your skin a glowing, sun-kissed look with the Buriti Bronzer from RMS. The cream bronzer contains Brazilian Buriti oil that is rich in Vitamin A and Beta-carotene. The sheer bronzer gives the appearance of healthy, shimmering skin without artificial glitter or powder that can often dull the complexion.
The purpose of a bronzer is to simply give the skin a naturally sun-kissed look without orange, grey or pink tones. Its lightweight, creamy texture glides on the skin and can be used on all skin types. An effective luminizer for darker skin tones.

product_description:
Catering specifically for fair skin, the Bellápierre Cosmetics All Over Face Highlight & Contour Kit combines five must-have products for your make-up bag. Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion and enhance your facial features for an expertly sculpted make-up look.
Mineral Foundation in 'Ivory' (4g)
A five-in-one formula that works as a concealer, foundation, finishing powder, setting powder and SPF. Suitable for all skin types, the lightweight powder is enriched with four natural ingredients: Mica, Zinc Oxides, Iron Oxides and Titanium Dioxide to blur imperfections and reduce the appearance of fine lines for a flawless, more refined finish. Blendable and buildable.
Mineral Contour Powder (2.35g)
Ideal for the upper cheekbones, centre of the forehead and bridge of the nose, the contour powder expertly sculpts and creates subtle definition for added depth and dimension. Easy-to-blend, the shade works on specific areas of the face for a professional finish.
Mineral Highlight Powder (2.35g)
Creates a radiant, luminous look and can be used to highlight high points on the face, including: cheekbones, brow bones and down the bridge of your nose. Its ultra-fine, lightweight texture blends effortlessly onto skin to brighten and enhance your favourite facial features.
Concealer Brush
With a slim, tapered design, the brush is ideal for diminishing imperfections and covering up dark circles or blemishes. The pointed tip and synthetic bristles can be used to camouflage small areas, whilst the flat side effortlessly hides larger blotchy, uneven patches of skin.
Kabuki Brush
Perfect for applying bronzer, contour powder and highlighter, the brush features soft, synthetic bristles to evenly distribute product on the face for a high definition finish. Allows easy sculpting, layering and contouring so you can achieve a professional make-up look.
name: Cosmetics All Over Face Highlight & Contour Kit - Fair

product_description:
Expertly define your eyes with Illamasqua's Colouring Eye Pencil; a multi-tasking pencil that can be used as an eyeliner, to define the crease or across the entire lid for endless make-up looks.
With a smooth, blendable formula, the creamy pencil glides on effortlessly to deliver intense, long-wearing colour with ultimate staying power. Its precision tip allows mistake-free application for a professional finish.
name: Colouring Eye Pencil 1.4g (Various Shades)

product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with Lottie London's Matte Powder Bronzer; a lightweight pressed powder that blends effortlessly onto skin to enhance natural radiance.
Perfect for sweeping across the entire face for a sun-kissed glow, or for contouring the cheekbones, forehead and jawline to create a sculpted, defined make-up look. Ideal for all skin tones.
name: London Matte Powder Bronzer 9g (Various Shades)

product_description: Perfect your complexion with the Lilah B. Flawless Finish Foundation. Expertly formulated with a unique combination of raw Aloe and Agar extracts, the powdered foundation provides an even, buildable coverage with a naturally luminous finish that feels as if you’re not wearing makeup at all. It’s ultra-lightweight and long lasting, working to keep skin hydrated without feeling cakey or clogged. Available in natural, flattering shades to suit various skin tones and housed in a chic pebble-shaped case.
colour: b. classic, b. natural, b. original, b. pure, b. timeless
name: B. Flawless Finish Foundation (Various Shades)

product_description:
Add a pop of colour to your eyes with Lord & Berry's Reglam Eyeshadow; a long-wearing, crease-proof eyeshadow with a velvety finish.
Buildable and blendable, the pencil-style eyeshadow glides effortlessly across the lid to deliver smooth, creamy colour with superior pay-off. Can also be used to highlight the eye contour.
name: & Berry Reglam Eyeshadow

product_description: Expertly define your eyes with the RMS Swift Eyeshadow; a light-reflecting pressed powder that delivers long-wearing, non-drying colour. Infused with wild-crafted Buriti Oil and organic Jojoba Oil, the buildable eyeshadow can be applied dry for a soft, smokey finish, or wet for more intense colour. Available in a range of hues, each shade name is inspired by 1960’s black and white television shows.
colour: EM-61 Enchanted Moonlight, EM-64 Enchanted Moonlight, EM-68 Enchanted Moonlight, GR-12 Garden Rose, GR-13 Garden Rose, GR-19 Garden Rose, SB-43 Sunset Beach, SB-46 Sunset Beach, SB-48 Sunset Beach, TM-21 Twilight Madness, TM-24 Twilight Madness, TM-27 Twilight Madness, TR-92 Tobacco Road, TR-94 Tobacco Road, TR-97 Tobacco Road, TT-71 Tempting Touch, TT-73 Tempting Touch, TT-76 Tempting Touch
name: Beauty Swift Eyeshadow (Various Shades)

product_description: Make a statement with the Elizabeth Arden Lasting Impression Mascara. Clinically proven to create longer-looking lashes, the high performance lengthening mascara boasts a unique brush with five iconic spheres to capture and coat even the tiniest lashes for maximum extension and a full, fanned out finish. Enriched with Ceramides and Avocado Oil, it intensively conditions and strengthens for thicker, healthier looking lashes free from clumps or flakes. Lashes appear lifted and defined, bound to make a lasting impression.
name: Arden Lasting Impression Mascara (Various Shades)

product_description:
Achieve a flawless, radiant complexion with Laura Geller's Baked Balance-n-Brighten Color Correcting Foundation, a compact foundation that has been baked for 24 hours on terracotta tiles and hand finished in Italy.
Infused with colour-correcting swirls of soft tan and cream pigments, the makeup delivers weightless, creamy coverage and intelligently adjusts to your skin to create flawless, luminous results. Its balancing, brightening properties help to counteract dullness and ruddiness, whilst its dose of antioxidants, Centella Asiatica and White Tea Extracts help to safeguard skin from signs of ageing.
Expect a radiant, even-toned complexion. Can be used alone or over your foundation for a healthy glow.
name: Geller Baked Balance-n-Brighten Color Correcting Foundation

product_description:
Perfect your complexion with Laura Geller's Baked Radiance Cream Concealer, a weightless formula that expertly camouflages dark circles, blemishes and imperfections.
Delivering creamy, full coverage, the concealer is infused with baked colour correcting pigments that effortlessly cover up areas of imperfection on the skin; its featherweight formulation ensures it never settles into lines, and feels exceptionally comfortable on skin.
Skin looks flawless and velvety smooth.
colour: Deep, Light, Medium, Porcelain, Sand, Tan
name: Geller Baked Radiance Cream Concealer 6ml

product_description:
Enhance your eyes with the PUPA Vamp! Wet and Dry Eyeshadow; a double-use, baked powder shadow that is able to create multiple, effective makeup looks. Applied dry, the eyeshadow delivers a veil of luminous colour that illuminates the eye area and when used wet, the powder provides a more intense and vibrant colour.
Arriving in an array of dreamy hues, each shade boasts a satin or pearl finish that captures the light and offers unique radiance. The eyeshadow is presented in a sleek compact with a convenient foam applicator.
colour: Champagne, Dark Taupe, Emerald, Fairyland, Golden Pink, Lavender, Mint, Navy, Pearl Gray, Sugar Pink, Taupe, Violet
name: Vamp! Wet and Dry Eyeshadow (Various Shades)

product_description:
Add a touch of sparkle to your peepers with Illamasqua’s Eyes that Hypnotise Pure Pigment Trio. The Pure Pigment shadows feature a finely milled loose powder that boasts an intense colour payoff and a shimmering finish. The formulas can be applied lightly and are buildable for added impact and a more dramatic finish. The trio of hues can be applied to highlight the eyes, cheeks, lips and brows, allowing you to be creative and play around with different makeup looks.
The Set Contains:
Pure Pigment - Fortune (1.3g)
True gold
Pure Pigment - Beguile (1.3g)
Light shimmer
Pure Pigment - Alluvium (1.3g)
Iridescent midnight blue
name: Eyes that Hypnotise Pure Pigment Trio

product_description:
Experience and aromatic punch with the Hurraw! Licorice Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
Perfect for liquorice lovers, the smooth and creamy balm is enriched with a sweet, skin-loving blend of Coconut Oil, Cocoa Seed Butter and Olive Oil, which deliver a nourishing veil of hydration to lips. The twist-up stick is complete with a delicious dose of Anise Seed Oil, which lends the balm a natural sweetness. Expect a smooth and hydrated pout that is calm, comfortable and free from dryness.

product_description:
Combat blemishes with Lord & Berry Conceal-It Stick. Formulated  with a blend of macadamia nut oil and waterlily extracts, the creamy  concealer give medium coverage and hides under-eye circles, fine lines  and minor imperfections. It hydrates the skin and provides long-lasting  coverage for a flawless finish.
Use the bullet to apply the concealer to imperfections, concentrating on the eye area.
name: & Berry Conceal-It Stick (various colours)

product_description:
Embrace a flawless complexion with the PUPA Made To Last Extreme Staying Power Total Comfort Foundation; a long lasting yet comfortable foundation.
Utilising ‘Last&Fix’ pigments which set firmly onto skin, the foundation is able to stay in place all day, maintaining the same colour and flawless finish. The unique, water-resistant formula delivers medium to high coverage that can be built up to achieve your desired look. Expect a shine-free, matte makeup look that lasts for hours.
colour: Golden Beige, Light Beige, Medium Beige, Natural Beige, Porcelain, Sand
name: Made To Last Extreme Staying Power Total Comfort Foundation (Various Shades)

product_description:
Create captivating eyes with the PUPA Multiplay Triple-Purpose Eye Pencil; a long-lasting liner that lines and defines your peepers.
The kajal pencil effortlessly glides onto the eye, delivering ultra-intense colour payoff with a blendable finish. The double sided pencil can be sharpened for precise and defined results, or smudged using the built-in smudging brush. This can create an array of looks from smokey eyes to using the pencil as eyeshadow.
The eyeliner arrives in several enchanting hues; the brown shades are perfect for blue eyes, the violet tones enhance green eyes and the blue ones are great for brown eyes, whilst black works to enhance all gazes.
colour: Basic Brun, Butter, Deep Black, Elm Green, Hyacinth Violet, Midnight Blue, Pearly Sky, Pure Silver
name: Multiplay Triple-Purpose Eye Pencil (Various Shades)

product_description:
A creamy and caring liquid concealer with vitamin E. Covers dark circles, bags and puffiness in the under eye area, as well as minor skin complexions such as small rashes and pimples.
Comes in three colors: light, medium and dark.
name: for Men - Concealer 0.3 Dark 2.5ml

product_description:
Thoroughly nourish lips with the Hurraw! Coffee Bean Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that cares for skin using premium organic, vegan and raw ingredients.
The creamy lip balm intelligently combines Sweet Almond, Coconut and Olive Fruit Oil, which creates a nourishing formula that thoroughly moisturises lips to leave them soft, smooth and kissable. Infused with Coffee Bean extract and a touch of raw Chocolate, the chapstick treats lips to a delicious mocha fragrance that lips can’t help but drink up. Expect all-day hydration.

product_description: The RMK Color Performance Cheek Blusher features three shades of high-pigmented colour to give your complexion a healthy glow. Housed in a silver compact, the lightweight powder melts effortlessly onto the cheeks for superior colour longevity, whilst the soft brush allows you to experiment by shading, highlighting and blending. Wear the shades alone or together to create customised colour and a look as dramatic or natural as desired. E.N.
name: Color Performance Cheek Blusher - 03

product_description: Achieve a flawless make-up base with the Prevage Anti-Aging Dual End Foundation Brush from Elizabeth Arden. Seamlessly distributing and blending foundation for effortless application, the specially designed brush features a heart-shaped end to cover larger areas of the face, and a smaller, tapered head that is perfect for eye contours and narrow areas around the nose and hairline. Its soft, synthetic bristles wash easily with soap and water for ultimate hygiene. Expect an even, streak-free finish every time.
name: Arden Prevage Anti-Aging Dual End Foundation Brush

product_description:
Enhance your lips with the ModelCo Shine Lip Gloss in 'Strip Tease', a shimmering, high shine lip lacquer that delivers a shock of beautifully reflective colour with long-lasting finish.
Gliding effortlessly onto lips with its wand applicator, the non-sticky gloss imparts a soft colour tint and features an in-built mirror for flawless, on-the-go applications . Lips looks luscious and hydrated.
name: Shine Lip Gloss - Strip Tease

product_description: Hydrate your lips and add vibrant colour with a Pot Gloss from FACE Stockholm. Available in a range of shimmer and non-shimmer colours, the hydrating lip gloss is balm textured, and so smoothly glides across the lips. The perfect handbag size lip balm pot means you can touch up throughout the day. – E.W.
colour: Alert, Lustrious, Perfect, Simplicity, Smart, Unique
name: Stockholm Pot Gloss 2.8g

product_description:
Capture the light with your makeup using the PUPA Luminys Touch Face Illuminator; a two in one highlighter and concealer that adds instant brightness to the complexion.
Utilising a P-LB Complex, the liquid formula combines makeup with skincare; not only concealing blemishes and dark circles, but working to eliminate their appearance completely. The illuminator is infused with soft focus powders that radiate the face and reflect light.
Expect a flawless complexion that boasts a luxurious glow.
name: Luminys Touch Face Illuminator (Various Shades)

product_description:
Keep brows held flawlessly in place with the Rimmel Brow This Way with Argan Oil; a smudge-proof eyebrow gel that sculpts and defines brows, whilst offering enviable hold.
Arriving with an integrated spoolie applicator, Brow This Way sweeps through natural brows and coats each hair in product. The lightweight gel effortlessly sculpts the brows with each brush stroke, whilst the coloured formula adds extra definition in order to frame the face. Enriched with Argan Oil, the brow product not only enhances brows, but nourishes and conditions the fiber.
The gel arrives in an array of colours, which are designed to suit all hair colours and skin tones, whilst the clear hue is universal. Expect bold yet natural-looking brows that are flawless all day.
name: Brow This Way with Argan Oil 5ml (Various Shades)

product_description:
The professional angled brow definer from Japonesque helps create perfect brows by lining, shaping and defining.
The brush deposits colour and shades the brow area while the angled tip creates definition from the brow arch to the tip.
Can be used with powder, pencil or cream product.
name: Pro Angled Brow Definer

product_description: Add subtle shimmer to your eyes with theBalm Overshadow Mineral Eyeshadow; a finely milled powder that can be applied dry for a soft, smokey finish, or wet for rich-pigmented colour. Its pure mineral formula melts effortlessly onto the lids for expertly defined eyes and crease-proof colour with excellent stay-ability. E.N.
colour: If You're Rich, I'm Single, No Money, No Honey, Work Is Overrated, You Buy, I'll Fly
name: Overshadow Mineral Eyeshadow (Various Shades)

product_description: A setting powder that delivers the fine textured translucent layer  that fits for the flawless finish. By blending the 4 different textures  with the powder brush, they work to eliminate the shine on T-zone and  correct the tone for a natural bright complexion. Comes in a compact  with a sliding compartment to keep the brush in place.
name: Pressed Powder - N02

product_description:
Shiseido have collaborated with award-winning, influential Japanese designer Yohji Yamamoto to create the limited edition Festive Camellia Palette. Decorated with blooming camellia flowers and a luxurious silk lid, the kit includes multiple shades for the cheeks and eyes.
Exceptionally blendable and buildable, the silky smooth powders melt effortlessly onto the eye lids and face to deliver long-wearing colour and can be worn alone or combined to create a variety of make-up looks. Complete with an integrated mirror. E.N.
Shades Include:
'Snow' - a silvery white with a subtle trace of cool lavender.
'Velvet' - a sensuous deep purple, slightly warm and semi-matte.
'Japonica' - a glimmering gold with a soft shine of reflected pink.
'Winter Rose' - a clear, fresh pink shade.
'Petal' - a warm semi-matte brown tone for natural definition.
'Heart' - a rich brownish-violet with shimmering multi-coloured pearls.
name: Festive Camellia Palette (12g)

product_description: Keep your brows on point with the High Definition Precision Eyebrow Scissors; an essential grooming tool that is able to tackle and trim eyebrows, ranging from unruly brows to the tiniest of hairs. Crafted with sharp, precision blades, the scissors provide superior eyebrow trimming, which keeps brows neat and tidy.
name: Definition Precision Eyebrow Scissors

product_description: Treat your pout to the yes to Coconut Cooling Lip Oil; a nourishing, lightweight treatment that delivers intense moisture to dry and chapped lips. Enriched with a delectable blend of Coconut, Olive and Eucalyptus Oils, it helps soften and smooth lips while adding a natural-looking sheen.
name: to Coconut Cooling Lip Oil

product_description: Experiment and create different eye looks with the HD Brows Duo Gel Liner. Containing a black and rich brown gel liner, the long-lasting formula can be used to subtly line your eyes, or create anything from a slight winged edge to a standout cat eye flick. - K.R
name: Definition Duo Gel Liner

product_description:
Enhance the natural beauty and structure of your face with Lord & Berry's Contouring Palette. Combining six different shades, the comprehensive contouring kit features everything you need to shade and highlight for enhancing or disguising facial features. Expertly sculpting and adding subtle definition, each easy-to-blend shade works on specific areas of the face to help create the appearance of defined and contoured facial features. - K.N.
Brightener (Highlighter Powder):
This silky, low glow powder highlighter creates a radiant, luminous look and can be used to highlight high points on the face, including: cheekbones, brow bones and down the bridge of your nose. Its ultra-fine, pressed powder texture is infused with luminescent pearls to leave skin looking dewy and radiant. Add a touch to the inner corners of your eyes for bright, wide awake peepers.
Bronzing (Bronzer Pressed Powder):
This sheer bronzing powder delivers a sunkissed glow to skin; perfect for sweeping across the whole face or for subtly sculpting cheekbones. A pressed powder formulation with the colour payoff of a loose power, it is easy to blend and provides the perfect sun-free glow and definition.
Concealer (Cream Concealer):
With a cream to powder texture, this concealer is ideal for brightening and concealing underneath the eyes. Its blurring formula helps conceal discolouration and dark circles without setting into fine lines or wrinkles.
Light Contour (Sculpt Cream to Powder Foundation):
A long-lasting, medium to high coverage cream contour designed for use on targeted areas to help subtly contour the face. Ideal for the upper cheekbones, centre of the forehead and bridge of the nose, its brightening properties and silky finish help create natural definition and depth. Enriched with natural minerals and oils, the cream to powder formula is easy to blend and is suitable for all skin types, especially those with oily skin or in areas of high humidity.
Deep Conditioner (Sculpt Cream to Powder Foundation):
A long-lasting, medium to high coverage cream contour designed for use on targeted areas to help expertly contour the face. Ideal for use along the hair line, jawline and under the chin, its silky, buildable and blendable formula helps create depth and definition with a natural shadow effect; facial features are enhanced and sculpted.
Blusher (Cream Blush):

Crafted from high quality stainless steel with perfectly aligned, sharp blades for precision cutting.
Cuticle Pusher and Cleaner

Gently shapes natural and artificial nails, whilst protecting from splitting and peeling.

Ideal for use on-the-go, the convenient case keeps all your manicure essentials in one place.

The ultimate makeup accessory, the Powder Brush from Make Up by HD Brows ensures you're given a flawless, all over application of your pressed powder. Suitable for use with foundation, blush or bronzer, this unique brush features a large dome shaped head which makes it perfect for blending.
It promises quick and easy application with a stunning, full coverage. A must have tool for your makeup bag. K.D.

product_description:
The Premium Brush Kit from Sigma combines fifteen, signature quality makeup brushes with exclusively thin fibres that softly and effectively pick up and deliver powder, liquid and cream products. Designed for use with the face, eyes and lips, this ultimate collection will allow you to create natural or dramatic looks with ease and precision. - K.N.
E10 - Small Eye Liner: Precise application of liner. Use with gel or liquid liners.
E15 - Flat Definer: Sharp and precise application. Press product along upper and lower lash lines to create an easy, thin liner. Works with gel, liquid or powder products.
E20 - Short Shader: Concentrated colour application. Apply colour onto small areas of the eye such as the outer eyelid. Also use to smudge the lower lash line.
E25 - Blending: Controlled blending. Blend colours together onto the lid with added control. Buff out harsh lines for a well-blended effect.
E35 - Tapered Blending: Controlled application of crease colour. Use tip to pick up colour, apply directly onto the crease and sweep through. Effect is blended, but defined.
E45 - Small Tapered Blending: Precise colour application onto the crease. Pick up colour with the tip of the brush, apply intense colours to the crease to add depth to eyes.
E50 - Large Fluff: Controlled highlighting. Apply highlighting shades onto the brow bone or upper cheekbone. Gives a soft and blended finish.
F10 - Powder/Blush: Precise placement of blush. Use for powder application.
F15 - Duo Fibre Powder/Blush: Soft blush application. Generates a diffused blush application. Works especially well with mineral product for a natural and delicate effect.
F20 - Large Powder: Controlled bronzer application. Bronzing of the cheekbones and temple area. Using the flat side gives definition and control.
F25 - Tapered Face: Exact product placement onto cheeks. Apply powder, blush or contour shades onto the cheeks and temples. Tapered shape gives precise placement.
F35 - Tapered Highlighter: Subtle highlighting. Apply highlighting shades onto the upper contours of the face. Diffused finish gives skin a natural glow.
F65 - Large Concealer: Conceal larger areas of the face or body. Works well with liquid or cream products.
F75 - Concealer: Precise product placement. Use around the lip area to conceal when wearing bold lip colours.
L05 - Lip: Precise application of colour onto the lips. Use the firm edge to define and contour the lips.
name: Premium Kit
